column23: Poorly written essay lacking in organization and length

column1: 396& Some people say that advertising encourages us to buy things we really do not need. Others say that advertisements tell us about new products that may improve our lives. Which viewpoint do you agree with? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>For the most of the times when I watch a TV or read a magazine, I sometimes see the advertisements, too. Most of them were always giving me the idea that I need to buy that product on the advertisement. <TS>It is really good that sometimes some advertisements introduce new products that can make our life more improved. But it is sure that a lot of advertisements are making the customers buy the product by using the power of the advertisement.</TR> There are a lot of examples about this.</IN>

<BO1><MI1>The most ridiculous advertisement is about the golf ball.</MI1> <SI1>It is said that many scientist studied the golf ball and made the ball go longer when it was hit by a golf club. I can’t understand that why scientists need to study the golf ball that is really not necessary for the improvement of our life. I guess the company that produces the golf ball might wanted to appeal people with showing their effort to make the ball better, but in my opinion, they must have not done any scientific study about the golf ball. If they really studied a lot about the golf ball, why can’t the ball go much longer than the ball that produced 10 years ago? It is only the company’s idea to higher the price so that they can have more profit.</SI1></BO1> 

<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR> ridiculous advertisement is an advertisement about a make-ups.</MI2> <SI2>They also say that they studied the make-ups scientifically, so that they could make women prettier. I guess the word ‘scientifically’ appeals to the people a lot. <TR>But</TR>, I think the reason that many women look prettier is not because of the make-ups, but because of the way they do the make-ups. I don’t think that the make-ups did a lot of work to improve the faces of women. If they really made women look prettier, then there should be no women that look ugly, because the history of the make-up is pretty long but the way to do the make-up is not.</SI2></BO2> 

<CO>Only by these two advertisements, you can see that our money is spent to the people who like our money, but not us. The company’s cunning trick is driving us to spend money to the products that are not that far different from the similar previous product. It is nonsense that we haven’t improve a lot from 20 years before, with a technology we have. We should not be trusting every word that the advertisements say. Their purpose is our money, not our comfort.</CO>
column23: Fairly organized, lacking in analysis. Overall acceptable essay

column1: 397&"Some people prefer to eat at food stands or restaurants. Other people prefer to prepare and eat food at home. Which do you prefer? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer."
column3:
<IN><TS>Sometimes I ate food restaurant. But I'd like to prepare meals and foods in home.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, there are some restaurants serving foods which are made of bad, harmful raw materials.</MI1> <SI1>And the others make foods in a unsanitary kitchen and by dirty hands. As we are not food experts, we can't distinguish good from bad foods. <TR>But</TR> in home, we prepare materials and we cook them in rules of our health. So eating home can keep our body healthy better than restaurant.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, of course, we can save money.</MI2> <SI2>As a matter of course, restaurant's final goal is to earn money. They are not volunteer. So it's too certain that eating foods in home makes our purse plumped.</SI2></BO2>

<BO3><MI3><TR>The last of all</TR>, in restaurant, we might meet many troubles like small children's noise, bad smells from waste, waiter's unkindness, etc.</MI3> <SI3>Furthermore in some circumstances, we should stand them and have to eat foods unpleasant. However in home, we can remove all the troubles as we can. then we can eat foods more comfortable than restaurant.</SI3></BO3>

<CO>For me, Nevertheless its taste and flavor, I prefer to eat home to keep my body health, have a plump purse and eat foods pleasant. I think these things are superior to something good from restaurant.</CO>
column23: Good structure. Need to work on usage of the English language. "make our purse plumped" is not a correct expression. "Break the bank, empty our wallets" are better expressions. Examples are too short and matter of fact, lacking in analysis.

column1:
398&"When people succeed, it is because of hard work. Luck has nothing to do 
with success." Do you agree or disagree with the quotation above?
column3:
<IN>To succeed, people work harder and harder. But, although people strive hard, all of them cannot succeed; a few are failed. <TS><TR>In other words, the luck influnces our success, and even in details of life.</TR></TS> Not only biographies of famous people, but also some maxims identify this fact.</IN> 

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, in your childhood, you must have read biographies of a renowned people, Robert bell, Thomas Edison, or Columbus.</MI1> <SI1>In the middle of your reading, you could know the fact that inventions and discoveries sometimes was originated by intution, chance, or unexpected resurts. <EX>Columbus, for example, who discoveried America ,called now "a land of grace", by chance. Had he traveled along his original intend, now we may know that he is the second man who discovered india.</EX> So, casuality affects the success.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, <EX>in my country, there is a old saying "There is a time for everything.",</EX> and I comply with this maxim, in that you should do timely so that you aquire the best outcome.</MI2> <SI2><EX>Suppose you'll be about to graduate a university, even though you have more high point than any other student in your major, if there is no extra spot in firms that you want, you cannot be accepted.</EX> Thus, time influences the success.</SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>Therefore</TR>, both biographies of famous people and old proverbs announce that the luck is essetial to succeed. Working hard without luck, and luck without working hard are useless. So, if you want to get a success, you should work hard, of course, and you should be lucky as well.</CO>
column23: To improve your score, avoid speaking in second person "you" or "yours". Conclusion "both biographies of famous people" did not  connect with body paragraphs, you only talked about Columbus. Good thesis. Poor usage and grammar.

column1: 399&"When people succeed, it is because of hard work. Luck has nothing to do with success." Do you agree or disagree with the quotation above? Use specific reasons and examples to explain your position.
column3:
<IN>I think we must not believe luck. <EX>Many proverbs teach us that "Depending on luck is totally absurd"</EX> so <TS>I would argue that if people want to be succeed, only hard work is necessary.</TS></IN>
 
<BO1><MI1>Believing on luck is good in some ways because it gives us hope. However, unfortunately, without effort, our wishes will not come true.</MI1> <SI1><EX>For example, there is very well-known story about Edison that he experimented about one thousand times in order to make a perfect bulb. <TR>Finally</TR>, he accomplished and that was not a lucky.</EX></SI1></BO1>
 
<BO2><MI2><TR>Also</TR>, most of gambling addicts become misery in the end.</MI2> <SI2>Only little people lucky gamble. I read a newspaper article about them. Despite they got a big money, they use it for gambling and lose it. We could aware that how follow luck is worthless. If many people could earn money by gambling, What is the other innocent hard workers work for?</SI2></BO2>
 
<CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, I think we can't achieve anything without effort and luck is just a false image. We don't need to pursue that but try to do best in our lives.</CO>
column23: Too short. Need more in depth analysis. Fix grammar and usage issues.

column1: 400&"When people succeed, it is because of hard work. Luck has nothing to do with success." Do you agree or disagree?
column3:
<IN>Everybody want to succeed. Someone may have a succeful outcome while others fail to be successful. Many people seem to believe that diligence is the most important factor for a person to succeed. <TS>I basically agree with it, however I also believe that other factors must be considered to analyze people's success.</TS> They are ability and luck.</IN>

<BO1><MI1>First of all, ability is as an essential quality of success as that of hard work.</MI1> <SI1>Hard work must be based on the personal knack. Without having a proper skill for particular field of the work, a person cannot be successful no matter how he works hard. <EX>For example, a baseball player must have a sense of body control. He should be able to see a ball;s position porperly, hit a ball in right way.</EX> Without ability, the hardwork has nothing to do with success.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2>Moreover, luck also plays an important role in success.</MI2> <SI2>Even though a person has proper ability and works hard enough, bad luck can lead him to failure. Good luck may not necessarily be needed to succeed, avoiding badluck is vital. <EX>Agriculture is an example for this. Whether being a successful year for a farmer or not is not completely depend on his ability or diligent disposition. The weather condition of the year, which cannot be controled of exactly predicted by human beings decides his success of failure.</EX></SI2></BO2>

<CO>In conclusion, the term "When people succeed, it is only because of hard work" is wrong. I insist that ability, luck and hard work together can quarantee a person's success. Although it is hard to get all of these conditions in one time, we should make efforts as much as we can.</CO>
column23: Too short. Needs lengthier explanations. Contains lapses in logic. "Good luck may not necesarily be needed to succeed, avoiding badluck is votal". By definition, luck is something outside of one's control. Bad luck cannot be "avoided". It's better to say "be prepared for adverse conditions", in that example.

column1: 401&A company has announced that it wishes to build a large factory near your community. Discuss the advantages and disadvantages of this new influence on your community. Do you support or oppose the factory? Explain your position
column3:
<IN>A large factory can give citizens in community a lot of benefits. It can be the good beginning to put vigor in the community. On the other hand, there's disadvantages that we can't ignore. <TS>I believe that we should consider about evaluating both advantages and disadvantages when it comes to building a factory.</TS></IN>
 
<BO1><MI1>In fact, if you build a large factory in your community, it would bring a lot of benefits to your community.</MI1> <SI1>if there's a large factory, many convenient stores and other factories would be built to support demand in the large factory. In addition, the economy of the community will be vigorous because of many spending and buying. Cosequently, whole community can advance due to the large factory in the various ways.</SI1></BO1>
 
<BO2><MI2>However, building a large factory also brings the considerable disadvantages to your community.</MI2> <SI2>The fatory would creat environment problems such as air pollution, water pollutions etc. Besides, people would feel more complex and stress in the more industrialized city than before.</SI2></BO2>

<CO>In conclusions, building a large factory depends on the community's situation. If the community needs more industrious environment, then it can enjoy more convinience and economic improvement with a large factory. But if the comminity has already industrialized enough with lot of factories, then you should think again. The community never improve unless you don't consider these things before you build.</CO>

column1: 402&A person you know is planning to move to your town or city. What do you think this person would like and dislike about living in your town or city? Why? Use specific reasons and details to develop your essay.
column3:
<IN>I live in Seoul, the capital city of Korea. Seoul is the biggiest city in Korea. Many people’d like to move to Seoul as they can have more opportunity to experience something new. If my friend wants to move to Seoul, I suggest him or her to move to other town because of air pollution and rude people in here.</IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, I don’t want my friend to live here because air pollution in Seoul is really severe.</MI1> <SI1>Many cars , people and factories produce polluted air. As time goes by this is getting worse. I’ve lived in the countryside when I was young. I haven’t got a cold even in winter at that time as I could breathe fresh air. However, I often have a sore throat easily whenever I go outside because of the dirty air.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2></TR>Secondly</TR>, Here in Seoul, Most people are selfish and rude to other people.</MI2> <SI2>If I go to Big markets or department stores, it’s so crowded that people get to push other people or harm them by any chance. Once a woman suddenly stepped my foot and she didn’t say anything to me. Moreover , when I was in the subway or a bus, people pushed me severly and didn’t oppologize to me.</SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, I don’t suggest to live here to people that I know because Seoul is so crowded with cars and people, has dirty air and most people are unfriendly. Big cities usually have these kind of disadvantages. To live a better life, I think people would rather move to the suburbs if they consider their health.</CO>
column23: Logical essays. Examples are stated matter of a factly and does not analyze the problems with living in a city. Good transtitions. Poor thesis because you did not take a firm stance.

column1: 403&A person you know is planning to move to your town or city. What do you think this person would like and dislike about living in your town or city? Why? Use specific reasons and details to develop your essay.
column3:
<IN><TS>I recommend my friend to move my town.</TS> Although my home town has some faults ; no entertaining location such as movie theater, and complex traffic condition for visitors ; here has several good things, enough to cover the faults.</IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>Initially</TR>, in my town , people can breathe with clean air.</MI1> <SI1>Because my town is not only located in out side of city(Seoul) but have many street trees. I think my town is one of the most clean cities in Seoul Korea.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, my town has many parks and convenient places.</MI1> <SI2>Despite having little place to see movie, we can spend our time happily with family in park. and our town has department store and big sale store, people can easily take their requirements.</SI2></BO2>

<BO3><MI3><TR>Last</TR>, my town is close to many famous schools, both high school and university.</MI3> <SI3>Students are able to go to school in short time, and save their own time to study or, do other things.</SI3></BO3>

<CO></TR>For these reasons</TR>, I think my hometown's living condition is better than any other town in my country. And I surely tell my friends, "Why don't you move to my hometown? "</CO>
column23: Where is your hometown? Need to state the city name. Lacking in content: essay is too short.

column1: 404&Advertising helps to sell products. Describe the qualities of an effective advertisement. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>Most people live in a society where advertisements are flooded. When they want to buy a product, they always remind a specific ads which is related to the product. <TS>The owners of company have to make a proper method for selling products.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, the ads must be conspicuous easily to people.</MI1> <SI1>For instance, all of us remember weird or odd ads showing on TV. Especially some posts are posted on the station’s wall in Korea. The copy is like this, “I love sun young.” At first people are getting confused to it, but later they are proved to be one of advertisement.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, I like the advertisement which presents a beauty, baby.</MI2> <SI2><TR>Even though</TR> they are not related to the ads directly, they make us happier. In addition they make us to buy the thing, which they advertise.</SI2></BO2>

<BO3><MI3><TR>Finally</TR>, they have to represent the societies’ trends and fashion well.</MI3> <SI3>Most people follow big main trends because of inspiration of stars or entertainers. They want to imitate or follow their fashions for they want to be one of them or look like an entertainer.</SI3></BO3>

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, we are living in a society where we do not elude ourselves from deluge of advertisements. <TR>Therefore</TR> owners of company have to use this fact properly. They must consider that we are easily fed up with routine or ordinary advertisements.</CO>
column23: lack of connection between examples and topic

column1: 405&agree of disagree? Television has destroyed communication among friends and family.
column3:
<IN>Nowadays, there is at least on television in every home. People get a lot of information and entertainment from it, yet some people insist that television has destroyed communication among friends and family. <TS>In my opinion, however, television helps a lot making a conversation among the people because it gathers family members and gives topics to talk with friends.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>Firstly</TR>, each family members can be frequently collected around the television.</MI1> <SI1>Family members now rarely have a chance to get together because they are more likely to enjoy their private time. <TR>However</TR> an interesting TV programs such as a famous movie and a popular drama can do it. <EX>For example, my family members always sit around television from 9 PM to 10 PM because everyone likes to see a "Nightline news".</EX> <TR>In this way, we can talk or discuss each other every day.</TR></SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, television bears a lot of topics which are interestiong to talk with someone else.</MI2> <SI2>It is difficult to make a conversation if both person don't have common interests. The fact that everybody watches television at least once a day makes it easy to find out the topics between two people. I once met a friend of mine in a subway train whom I didn't previously talk much with. <TR>Nevertheless</TR> each of us had seen a soccer game on television, we could communicate naturally.</SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, television does not destroy communication among friends and family but helps people to create conversation. It helps family members get together, gives topics interesting to talk. On condition that we are aware of some side effects of it, television truly will be an effective means for the people's relationship.</CO>
column23: Good organization. Poor grammar and usage.

column1: 406&Decisions can be made quickly, or they can be made after careful thought. Read and think about the following statement: The decisions that people make quickly are always wrong. Do you agree or disagree with the statement? Use reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3:
<IN>Sometimes, you should make a decision quickly, but at most times of your all life, you have a time to think about something before you conclude finally. Your consirderable thought is a aid to not only an individual but also a group of a firm, or community.</IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, contemplating makes advantage to you in that you have acceleration in doing a thing previously planned .</MI1> <SI1>If you make a decision rapidly, at the beginning, you can start more fast than does after pondering, however, you should plan on and off in the middle of working. So, the more advanced the plan, the more slackened the work. On the other hand, a plan ,thought heedfully for a long time, doesn't have any obstacle till you'll finish. So, pondering is essetial before doing something important.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, careful thought is also helpful your company or community.</MI2> <SI2>Meeting at your office in the morning, or planning a syllbus of your study-group, you should do brainstorming. When you develop ideas or solve problems in a group, your group do brainstorming. So, there are so many offers, and it means that so much time is needed. Although spending a lot time, you never think that it's extravangacy, because you knew the fact that it's shorter than the all revising times in the course of doing. Thus, brainstorming is good for work of your group or community.</SI2></BO2> 

<CO><TR>Therefore</TR>, your caretul thought provides you ,by and large, with profit of time, and in group's meeting if you did brainstorming first, while progressing work, you can perform smoothly. So, I detinitely claim that if time, and circumstance allow, contemplating must be the first thing that you have to do.</CO>
column23: Lack of thesis

column1: 407&Do you agree or disagree with the follow statement? People behave differently when they wear different clothes. Do you agree that different clothes influence the way people behave? Use specific examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>Nowadays, clothes have lots of function not only to protect our body but also to decorate our appearance. We usually wear clothes according to the situation. <TS>People say that different clothes influence the way people behave. I absolutely agree with this statement because our feeling and behavior are changed with our appearance.</TS></IN>
 
<BO1><MI1><TR>Generally</TR>, people get dressed up for formal meeting such as wedding ceremony, reception and graduation party.</MI1> <SI1>In this time, people perhaps behave and talk with others in a formal manner. <TR>In contrast</TR>, people put on a casual wear for informal meeting such as dinner appointments with families or friends. In this case, people may act in a free manner. <TR>Therefore</TR>, people behave differently according to what they wear.<SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover</TR>, people usually treat others differently depending on their appearance.</MI2> <SI2>Sometimes we can be estimated either as a gentleman or as a rascal with respect to our looks. I remember once I had on nice formal suits in academic seminar when I was a high school student. Everyone treated me as a researcher in the field of advanced technology. <TR>Then</TR>, I behaved like a famous scientist. <TR>In other word</TR>, my clothes control my action. <TR>Therefore</TR>, the clothes which people wear influence the way of people behavior.</SI2></BO2>

<BO3><MI3><TR>Besides</TR>, the formal dresses are higher in price and the laundry charges of those are more expensive than casual wear.</MI3> <SI3>When we make a mistake to tear or stain it, we may be spend a lot of money on mending or cleaning it. <TR>Consequently</TR>, we may behave more carefully. It means that people behave differently with clothes.</SI3></BO3>

<CO><TR>All things considered</TR>, I think that wearing different clothes influence people’s appearance. People’s appearance influences their feeling. <TR>Therefore</TR>, people behave differently when they wear different clothes for people usually behave according to their emotions.</CO>
column23: Well written and organized

column1:
408&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? 
"Parents are the best teachers."
column3:
<IN>It's a true that, thuought our life, parents influence us more greatly than any other people. However, the long time with their children cannot make the parents the best teachers. I will demonstrat why supporting "Parents are the best teachers" is not acceptable for three following reasons.</IN>

<BO1><MI1>To begin with, parents may be too close to their children emotionally.</MI1> <SI1>Parents limit the boundary in which their children act because of name of safety. <EX>For example, teachers think the trip on big city is valuable, whereas, parents don't admit traveling owing to danger.</EX> 
So, parents' overprotectiveness is a obstacle for children to expand their knowledge.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2>Second, parents may expect their children's interests to be similar to their own.</MI2> <SI2>If father's interest is sceience, then the father force their children to study science. But, there are few people who think over the children's real interests. So, the children cannot enjoy their favorite part any more. Thus, parents ignore their children's favorites.</SI2></BO2>

<BO3><MI3>Finally, children learn to do something bad by watching and imitating their parents.</MI3> <SI3>It takes high percentage for children who have chain-smoker father to be smoker. Also, In youth, seeing the violent, and alcholic father, in adult children use violence, and are alcholicer with easy. Thus, childrens succeed their parents' bad behaving.</BO3>

<CO>Therefore, we meet a number of teachers in our life, parents, tutors, friends, and books in our life. Nobody deny the parents are the first teachers of them, but all the parents aren't the best teachers. So, we should be expose to all around you, parents, tutors, friends, family, and books, and learn from them.</CO>
column23: Very good transitions.

column1:
409&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? 
It is more important for students to study history and literature than 
it is for them to study science and mathematics. Use specific reasons 
and example to support your opinion.
column3:
<IN>Whether it is more important for students to study history and literature or science and mathematics depends on the economic circumstance of society with them. <TS>In my view, <TR>however</TR>, science and mathematics should be considered more important than history and literature in the most society or country for the several reasons.</TS></IN> 

<BO1><MI1>The main reason for my view is that for the most people in the world that need living necessaries-e.g clothing, food, and housing-, the economic growth which is based on the engineering technology priors to art culture areas.</MI1> <SI1><TR>Therefore</TR>, nowadays, the basic studies including science and mathematics are the most important not only 
for the engineering technology but also for students to level up.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Another</TR> reason is that it is very difficult for people who had not hard studied science and mathematics before graduated from school, now not being students, again to study history and mathematics because they would have no basic knowledge about science and mathematics that should have been studied by them in school life.</MI2> <SI2>In case of history and literature, <TR>however</TR>, although they have no the basic knowledge about these, people can always study again.</SI2></BO2>

<BO3><TR>In addition</TR>, since mathematics could help develop intellectural capacity of students who are youger, it is more important than literature.</BO3>

<CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, to grow students balancing at varied areas, all of studies above are important. <TR>However</TR>, at the present-day when would need economic growth in the most 
society, I think that it is more important for students to study history and literature than it is for them to study science and mathematics.</CO>
column23: Sentences are too long. Contains lapses in logic. Doesn't not explain why.

column1:
410&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? 
Parents are the best teachers. Use specific reasons and examples to support 
your answer
column3:
<IN>There are Many peole who think that anyone can be best teachers. Nevertheless, There are some people who disprove of this opinion. <TS>I completely agree that parents are the best teachers because they have a lot of affection toward their children and can be a good example.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>For the first all</TR>, parents deal with their children with love.</MI1> <SI1>The most important condition being the best teacher is love toward students. Parents, we know, love their children more than their life. Virtually, they sometimes sacrifice thier life to save thier children. In this point of view, they themselves are the best teachers for their children.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2> <TR> Secondly </TR>, Parents can be a good example. <MI2>Children often say that they will like to be someone like their parents in the future.</MI2> <SI2>So, They try to imitate everything , such as experience, habit and personality, of their parents. Through it they gradually learn how to live.</SI2></BO2>

<CO> <TR> In conculsion </TR>, I absolutely agree that parents are the best teachers. Above all, they always teach their children with a lot of love, and parents can be a model which children try to follow. We all know parents teach us valuable things to live life.</CO>

column1:
411&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? 
Some people place a high value on loyalty to the employer. To others, it is perfectly acceptable to change jobs every few years to build a career. Discuss these two positions. Then indicate which position you agree with and why.
column3:
<IN>We can't live without working. Although working everyday makes us feel tired and does not provide us enough time to enjoy our hobby, we can earn true happiness in life through working day by day. Therefore, working which is the biggest part of our life should be something rewarding and enjoyable. <TS>If you are not satisfy with your position or you don't like the way the things goes in your work place, you have big problems. To resolve this problems, you should do some change with your occupation.</TS> The change in your career have many merits.</IN>
 
<BO1><MI1><TR>Firstly</TR>, too much consistency in your career can cause you ineffectiveness.</MI1> <SI1>You may get sick of same work in same place. The strong bondage and intimacy among the employers which originate from the one work place might ease the hard work, but unchangeable situation and place can make the employers feel bored. The change in your career eliminate this boredness since the change is something challengeable and courageous. <TR>Moreover</TR>, the freshness in work renews your work life. <TR>Therefore</TR>, you can work efficiently while you are enjoying this freshness.</SI1></BO1>
 
<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, if you don't change jobs at all then it can cause great depression and inefficiency.</MI2> <SI2><EX>For example, Japanese peoples are most likely to have a "lifetime" job.</EX> After graduating their college, they get a job and work in one place forever. They neither study their field more closely nor they work hard since they have unstable job. They don't have to worry about losing their job because of their laziness. <TR>In result</TR>, the whole company they work for never improve as well as themselves.</SI2></BO2>
 
<CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, to make your work full of vigorous and alive, you should change your career following what your heart want to. If you do that, you can get rid of boredness, and put the life in your work. It can not only make your work life enjoyable but also, you can improve yourself.</CO>
column23: Good structure. Uses blank statements.

column1:
412&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? 
Television has destroyed communication among frieds and family.
column3:
<IN><TS>I definitely agree that television has destroyed commnunication among friends and family.</TS> I think that we can easily think so because of following reasons.</IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, we only have the finite time to talk with family and friends because of our work or study etc.</MI1> <SI1>But watching television reduce the time. <EX>For example, after dinner we usually go livingroom to watch television. While we watch television, we seldom speak to others. Only we watch television and do nothing except laughing and weeping.</EX> </SI1>So the more we watch television, the more watching television destroies communication among friends and family.</BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, we also have the finite opportunities to gather together with family and friends.</MI2> <SI2>But watching television can make the finite opportunities decrease. <EX>For example, if you want to watch drama, your father must go to another room to see news. Then you may loose even the opportunity to gather together with your family as you watching television.</EX> </SI2> So watching television also reduce the opportunities to communicate with family and friends.</BO2>

<CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, watching television reduce both the time and the opportunities to take with family and friends. <TR>In other words</TR>, television can destroy commnunication among friends and family. <TR>Therefore</TR> I definitely agree that television has destroyed commnunication among friends and family.</CO>
column23: Well written essay that offers insights. Need to elaborate more. Length is too short.

column1:
413&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? 
Television has destroyed communication among friends and family. Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3:
<IN>It would be true that it has been more difficulties in our communication with friends and family in modern day life than it had been before. Could we blame it on Televison? In my point of view, in this society, which is getting more competitive annually, People have to work and study most of their time intead of sharing with close peoples. <TS>Considering that reality, TV can provide many clues to keep communication with our precious people.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1>TV helps to share diverse information about different cultures and generations.</MI1> <SI1>Popular dramas like "friends" can give you general thoughts and life styles of young, single, New Yorkers. Even though it can't describe exact what they are, many parents would more understand their children of sa age. It is effective to relieve generation gap.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Besides</TR>, TV gives a large amount of resources to discuss with our friends and family.</MI2> <SI2>Usually popluar dramas and daily news give people many conversational topics at school, work or the dinner table with their families. Small but continuous talkings and discussion are basis on our realationship and communication.</SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, Televison has provided many information about people we have to live with and help understand further. <TR>Moreover</TR> it has provided many issues we can discuss, share feelings with. Even it cause an argue it would be really helpful to understand each other. After having time watching TV and discussing, eventually we can realize that lack of communication with our friends and family due to our laziness and indifference not TV.</CO>
column23: Poor mechanics. Do not capitalize the word "television", however, TV is acceptable. Well organized

column1:
414&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? 
Universities should give the same amount of money to their students' sportsactivities as they give to their university libraries. Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3:
<IN><TS>I disagree that Universities should give the same amount of money to their students' sportsactivities as they give to their university libraries.</TS> Of course, physical health as well as intellectual abilty is very important. But we must think why we enroll university or college, also we must invest more productive thing after examining their's advantages and disadvantages.</IN>

<BO1><MI1>I think the people spend more time in liberary than in sports center.</MI1> <SI1>Most students have much homework, report , and thus they go to liberary for resolving the proplems. Although we spend time in sports center most people except for athletes spend only about one or two hours. Whereas liberary is a place which spends much time rather than one or two hours.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Also</TR>, we must think what is purpose that many people enroll university.</MI2> <SI2>Most people probably will enroll university for improving their intellectual capacity. Although athletes enroll nuiversity for improving their physical ability, athletes' rate of the whole students is very few. But we must not ignore their exsitence.</SI2> I think we must more productive selection.</BO2>

<CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, Health as well as knowledge is very important. But if we compare with both sports center investion and liberary investion, we can know more productive work of two investions. We must invest what uses many people foe much time. It is liberary.</CO>
column23: Usage issues: "universities" should not be capitalized. Words after a comma (,) should not be capitalized. Essay offers a superficial laundry list of reasons, but could improve by giving more detailed explanations.

column1: 415&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? It is more important for students to study history and literature than it is for them to study science and mathematics. Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3:
<IN>Some students think that history and literature are more important than science and mathematics while others believe the later is more important the former. <TS>However, I would rather choose history and literature than select science and mathematics.</TS> There are three main reasons why I choose those.</IN>

<BO1><MI1>Firstly, as students study history and literature, it might be possible for them to experience a variety of culture.</MI1> <SI1>History and literature involve culture of that time. So, students could experience culture as an indirect way while they learn history and literature. For example, in the case of Korea, education course imply learning of history of the Orient and the Occident as well as Korea. I think that other countries are same to Korea in these point about education course.</BO1>

<BO2><MI2>Secondly, the study of history and literature could teach us a lot of instructions.</MI2> <SI2><EX>For example, a king of one tribe teaches me forces of generosity and progressive thinking. He was a man of thousand years ago when Korea was divided three tribes. He had a generosity which is one of his characters to lead his fellowmen and progressive thinking. These two outstanding characters led to the revival of his trive and played a decisive role in unification of three tribes.</EX></SI2></BO2>

<BO3><MI3>Finally, history and literature are effective subjects to form students' emotion.</MI3> <SI3>The period of students is very sensitive and very important to form their emotion. In this time, if students learn literature which is one of the most helpful factors to form their emotion, they'll be stable to live their lives in the aspect of emotion. <EX>In Korea, people says that 'a good literature read in students days leads his/her whole life to a good way .'</EX></SI3></BO3>

<CO>In conclusion, if students study literature and history, they can experience a variety of cultures and get a lot of instructions and they are stable in the aspect of emotion.</CO>
column23: Thesis does not answer the question properly: the prompt did not ask for a personal preference of subjects but instead wants a more universal response of "which major is more important to students, society etc"? The thesis missed the point. However, it does offer good reasons to support humanities later on.

column1: 416&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? It is more important for students to study history and literature than it is for them to study science and mathematics. Use specipic reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3:
<IN>Some students think that history and literature are more important than science and mathematics, as they think history and literature are nobler subjects than science and mathematics. <TS>But, in my opinion, it is more important for students to study science and mathematics for developing technology to increase quality of human-being's life, and perceiving the law of world around you.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, it is known to be true that our advancing society is caused by new technology.</MI1> <SI1>From waking to sleeping, nothing is irrelevent new era's technology. Even, the simplest things, like toothbursh, soap, and chair, is engaged in new technology. Not only these trivial stuffs but also tremendous buildings advance our quality of life. Everybody know that the technology making theses things starts and ends with science and mathematics. Thus, for advancing our society science and mathematics are imperative.</BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, the world around you is conducted by regular raw.</MI2> <SI2>In other words, science and mathematics supervise our community. <EX>For example, subway, the most popular transport, arrives at dictated place on dictacted time. When you purchase costome in department store, if you submit a debit card, then costome's cost moves your account into department store's account.</EX></SI2> Thus, our all behavings in community are not far from science and mathematics. Thus, science and mathematics are essential science and mathematics.</BO2>

<CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, science and mathematics help our society increase quality of our life by developing technology, and know the law around you for adjusting the community. So, I prefer studying science and mathematics to studying history and literature, I recommend students to study science and mathematics hard.</CO>
column23: Good essay. Very thoughtful. imperfect grammar and usage.

column1:
417&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Parents are the best 
teachers. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>Theseday, children have lots of teachers. They have to go to private institutes or have some lessons. <TS>But I always think their parents is the best 
teachers to the children. Here is some reasons and samples.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, children spend so much time with their parents.</MI1> <SI1>Therefore parents have much time to teach them. It is the parents that understand their children very well. With spending much time with their children, they totally affect their children.</SI2></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover</TR>, parents know very well about their children.</MI2> <SI2>They know their children's advantages and disadvantages, so they can properly educate their children. Also, parents raise them from infant to adult.</SI2></BO2>

<BO3><MI3><TR>Finally</TR>, all education begin at home.</MI3> <SI3>On borning at their house, they start learning about around the world throug their parents. Parents is responsible for educating their children well. Parents is the starting point of teaching children.</SI3></BO3>

<CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, I agree with that parents are the best teachers. Of course, I know parents's role in education is decreasing thesedays. But they are still very important teacher to their children.</CO>
column23: Too short. Needs longer body paragraphs with detailed explanations and examples to receive a perfect score.

column1: 418&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Parents are the best teacher. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>Throughout our school days, we have met many teachers. We have gained new knowledge from their teaching and we have learned how we live this world from their lives. Teachers sometimes let us be in surprise because they let us know those things we can't know by ourselves. <TS>However, I think parents are the best teacher among teachers who we have ever met.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1>Parents are the best teacher because they are the nearest persons who can give advices with love.</MI1> <SI1><TR>First of all</TR>, parents have been with us at lest over 20 years. Watching children's growth, parents have become aware of the merits and demerits of their children. They know their children better than any other person. <TR>Plus</TR>t, any advice can be accepted very well when it is based on true heart. Parents can not help advising their lovely children from the bottom of their heart.</SI2></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Also</TR>, parent are the best teacher because they can give us the most real examples of life.</MI2> <SI2>I think the best teacher do not need to be the person who always show their perfect things. As a human being, anyone can not be perfect in everything. Only if we saw other persons' ideal things, we could feel inferior. However, from our parents we can learn living lessons. Our parents can make many mistakes and can not succeed like other parents. <TR>On the contrary</TR>, they can make brilliant successful things which many people may envy. Watching parents' life at the nearest place, we can know how to live from thire lives. Namely, we learn from both their success and failure.</SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, parents are the best teacher because of two reasons. Parents know their children best and they love their children than any other person. These things make parents the best teacher who can give an advice sincerely. <TR>Additionally</TR>, we can learn living lessons which make our life much better from parent's success and failure.</CO>
column23: Good, thoughtful essay

column1: 419&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Parents are the best teachers. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>Generally speaking, people go to school to become a well-educated person. They not only get academic knowledge from teachers but also learn how to socialize with peers there. There are a lot of teachers in your life, for example television, radio, friends, books, and so forth including parents. That who or what is the best teacher is a difficult question to be answered. <TS>However, it is absolutely true that parents are good teachers out of them because they bring up children with experiences and affection.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> parents raise you with a long period of direct or indirect experiences.</MI1> <SI1>They are your mother and father who bear you and also good elders who have more experiences than you. Therefore, they know about life well and give you sincere guidelines when you are in trouble.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2>Also, they love you.</MI2> <SI2><EX>If you make a mistake, they advise you with concerns and if you are a winner of TOEFL, they give you a true applause.</EX> Everyday morning prayer of parents protects you. They cannot always talk a word of praise because they really take cae of you.</SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> parents, one of the best teachers in the world, are special, for they teach you with their own experiences and love. They are so colse to you.</CO>
column23: Body paragraphs do not contain enough supporting information

column1: 420&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? People should read only those books that are about real events, real people, and established facts. Use specific reasons and details to support your opinion.
column3:
<IN>Nowadays, people live in seeing and hearing many news and information in television or books. They obtain such information and convince that they know the information completely. But if they only once read the information such as events, people and established facts, they can say that they understand the facts? <TS>I believe that obtaining certain facts by second-hand experience can't give us real understand and even if it gives us certain information, we are likely to forget it easily.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, we cannot know the facts completely by second-hand experience such as reading books.</MI1> <SI1><EX>For example, I have an experience that I couldn't understand about acid and alkali in chemistry class in my high school.</EX> The book is explained that certain liquid change its color according to its acidity, but I don't know the meaning of words. After I had an experiment in university, I could understand the meaning completely.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, the knowledge that obtained in books can be forgot easily.</MI2> <SI2>It is usually that the facts are just arrayed in books. We can perceive the facts easily in books, but the facts cannot be kept in our memories for a long time. The knowledge that is obtained easily is also likely to disappear in our memories. But the knowledge experienced by ourselves can also be remained in our memories for a long time.</SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, the information obtained in books is usually useless and even if it seems to be a necessary knowledge, it would be forgot in our memories. The books just can inform us the outline of many kinds of information, and if we would like to know the knowledge thoroughly, we have to experience it. Therefore I disagree that the knowledge obtained by only reading books is better</CO>
column23: Writer missed the point: the prompt is not asking whether people should learn from books or real experience. It's asking whether people should read fiction or non fiction(real people, real events).

column1: 421&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Playing games teaches us about life. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>I certainly agree with the statement that playing games teaches people about life and very needed for their life. When youngs play games, it is not just the games they which are playing and it is not waste of time. They not only learn playing skills, but life though it and about collaboration and friendship among other people. <TS>In other words, playing games help people prepare for their future life.</TS></IN>
 
<BO1><MI1><EX>For instance, consider team of sports.</EX></MI1> <SI1>They also have a social structure in which the highest person like the supervisor gives directions to players. In that way they are to play games as they are ordered which resembles the structure of our society.</SI1> Thus, it can bo called "the practice of one's living", as well.</BO1>

<CO>In conclusion, it is essential to play games as people grow. It helps them develop their relationship with others and moreover, teaches children about the life before they face the society. From my point of views, there must be more plays for people to get both fun and abilities in the future.</CO>
column23: Strong thesis. Lack of support information in body paragraph. Only one body: essay is too short.

column1: 422&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Playing games teaches us about life. Use specofic reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>From inactive, singleplay game, puzzle, to active, multiplay game, basketball, we play a lot of games in our whole life. <TS>In my country, there is a old saying "We can learn all life while playing games". I definitely agree this maxim in that games teach us not only laws of the games but also ability to collaborate.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1>The primary merit of playing games is the point that we can learn rules of the games spontaneously when we take part in the games.</MI1> <SI1><EX>When you are playing chess with your friend, if you move your marker, you can move yours till your friend move a marker.</EX> <EX>When playing basketball, you should be careful about defensive, offensive foul, and many violations as well.</EX></SI1> Thus, in games we could learn that we must observe the laws.</BO1>

<BO2><MI2>Another advantage of playing games is that for winning in games, we should cooperate with others.</MI2> <SI2><EX>For instance, when you play soccer, all eleven members from centerforward to goalkeeper should be just like one body's organs.</EX> Most supervisers of soccer teams emphasize the most necessary element in soccer is capacity for organization.</SI2>So, it is very important for us to collaborate in games.</BO2>

<CO>To sum up, when we play games, we know that we should submit rules of games, and we practice ability to organize with others. Games are the miniatures of human life because we should keep laws of our community and we should cooperate with our neighbors. Thus, I concent "playing games teach us about life".</CO>
