column1: 425&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Teachers should be paid according to how much their students learn. Give specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3:
<IN>Some people say that teachers should be paid according to how much their students learn; others say differently. <TS>However, I think that we cannot decide teachers' pay tested by students' quality.</TS> There are two major reasons for this.</IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, if it is a criteria of teachers' pay how much their students get high score, to make money, teachers should make them a machine of studying to improve their score.</MI1> <SI1><EX>For example, in my country, to enter a good university, most highschool students study until 11 PM.</EX> It is not a reason that they want to study very much. It is because a teacher could get more money from a school how many their students enter a university.</SI1> In this case, students become lost their interest of studying and desire.</BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover</TR>, besides these "lost students' interest" reasons in my country, you have others of a more character.</MI2> <SI2>It is not a only teacher's duty that they should teach schoolwork. They have to teach method of thinking and understanding abilities to their students. To improve other quality of students, teachers must use their extra time for students.</SI2> If teachers are paid their money computing students' score, in spite of good teachers, they could not get enough money.</BO2>

<CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, students will make their country's future. I am sure that for our country's brightening future, teachers should not be paid according to how much their students learn. It bring many benefits to our country as well as for our future life.</CO>
column23: Lapses in logic. Explains vaguely instead of in detail.

column1:
426&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Television has 
destroyed communication among friends and family. Use specific reasons and 
examples to support your opinion.
column3:
<IN>It is commonly said that television has destroyed communication among friends and family. People tend to think that the reason why communication vanishes is watching television. Personally, I don't agree with that. <TS>We seem to forget the fact that no one is forcing us to sit in front of television. Furthermore, television provides us with many issues to be thought together. In this essay, I will demonstrate why television has a good effect on our communication rather than a bad one.</TS></IN>
 
<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, we need to realize that no one is forcing us to watch television.</MI1> <SI1><EX>For example, I usually like watching news programs on television although I am not forced to do that.</EX> Even at this time, I am willing to stop watching television if someone asks me to talk about something.</SI1> <TR>Therefore</TR>, I think that television is just a tool and never interferes our communication.</BO2>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, television provides us with many issues which have never been talked about.</MI2> <SI2><EX>For example, when I was watching a news program yesterday, I was suprised at the fact that toys imported from another country had been made of toxic substances.</EX></SI2> Consequently, I could talk about dangerous toys around us with colleagues.</BO2>

<CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, I think that television has never destroyed people's communication. People who do not agree with this might hardly talk about issues 
given by television with other people. A lack of communication is not because of television but because of people, themselves. I support that television has 
a good effect on our communication because television, itself, provides many issues.</CO>
column23: Good essay. Excellent grammar and usage, with very few mistakes.

column1: 427&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Television has destroyed communication among friends and family. Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3:
<IN>These days most people have television at each home, and they like watching TV because some television program is useful to people and interesting. But television has various disadvantage. <TS>One of this is that television has destroyed communication among friend and family because television make people spend much time, and people don't be attractive communication.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, people can spend more time to watch television I have brother who like television very much, so he maybe watch television about 10 hours in a day.</MI1> <SI1>Especially, his time to watch television expend on vacation. I understand that he watch television so long time, If he watch television long time, problem occur. The problem is that my bother don't have time to study because he spend more time for watching television. he is a student who have to study a lot of, so It is great problem that student don't have study, so I think that television is not useful things.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, people can be the person who dislike talking, but this have already existed.</MI2> <SI2><EX>For example, today's teenagers. It is to be right that they like television because they experience television form birth to present.</EX></SI2> therefore they don't like talking. maybe they like television program, show, cartoon than communication.</BO2>

<CO><TR>In short</TR>, television has disadvantages. That television destroyed communication is just one of many disadvantages. I think that not only that television destroyed 
communication but also that television cause society problem can occur, so I agree that Television has destroyed communication among friends and family.</CO>
column23: Essay is repetitive and does not contain substance.

column1: 428&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Television has destroyed communication among friends and family. Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3:
<IN>Nowadays, television has become one of the basic items in our life. It is known that television have affect on human life in many ways. People say that television has destroyed communication among friends and family. <TS>I don’t agree with this statement because television can provide many benefits. It can give the opportunity to talk with each other in family and the clue to make friends with others.</TS></IN>
 
<BO1><MI1><TR>To begin with</TR>, television plays role in gathering family in a place such as living room and dining room.</MI1> <SI1>With watching interesting program on T.V., family can have very enjoyable time together to talk with each other. It’s very good chance to improve relationship and communication in family. I always watch a famous drama with my family together. It’s very precious time to me because this time is the only chance to gather family in same place. Without television, family could spend their time to do each job individually.</SI1> <TR>Therefore</TR>, television acts as a medium to enhance communication in family.</BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover</TR>, television can provide matters for us to talk with others.</MI2> <SI2>Namely, we can easily begin a conversation with others about interesting programs on T.V. Whenever I met my friends, we talked each other about T.V. programs last night. This was always very interesting issues.</SI2> We could discuss, explain and understand the issues.</BO2>

<CO><TR>Therefore</TR>, television doesn’t destroy communication but improve it. <TR>In conclusion</TR>, television can provide a variety of communication issues for us. It helps to talk with each other in family and in friends. Therefore, I think that television hasn’t destroyed communication among friends and family.</CO>

column1: 429&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Television has destroyed communication among friends and family. Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3:
<IN>Television has definitely changed lifestyles of people. And some may argue that televsion has destroyed communication among friends and family. <TS>But I disagree. Television has rather encouraged interpersonal communication by providing various topics to talk about and make a room for gathering.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, television provides various topics to talk about for people.</MI1> <SI1>Communication is usually based on mutual interests among friends and family. And television paves that basis for conversation.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, television offers an apportunity to get together.</MI2> <SI2>Unlike books and computers, people usually watch television with their family members or friends in the living room. That gathering often can be a first step to pleasant converations.<TR>Moreover</TR> you can even communicate with your family and friends while you watch TV.</SI2></BO2>

<CO>Considering the reasons mentioned above, television has not destroyed but helped communication among friends and family. We can make good use of television to an increased quality talk with others. Why don't we start talking about the interesting stories on TV while or after we watch TV ?</CO>
column23: Do not end with a question.

column1: 430&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Television has destroyed communication among friends and family. Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3:
<IN>Television helps people to get better communication. <TS>Althought many people believe that television blocks and gets rid of their communication, it is true that we can get a lot of interesting communication topics from TV and share more time with friends or family talking about that topics.<TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, Television has given us many kinds of topics to talk with.</MI1> <SI1>We can get social topics from TV news, interesting gossips from entertainment channels. TV is powerful and fast way to get a new informations. Terror on September 11th in NewYork, people could get that informations quickly by Television.</SI2></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, the topics from TV make people spend more time together.</MI2> <SI2>People who watch same program, they can be friends easily during talking about that program. People who watched TV on September 11th, they shared their sorrow and had much time together watching TV.</SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, it is obviously true that you can get some useful communication tips and topics from TV and share more time with friends or family talking about that topics. That's why television helps people to be close.</CO>

column1: 431&do you agree or disagree with the following statement? the best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide. use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>I disagree that the best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide. Reasons are when we follow in a group and tour guide, we can't enjoy our own time. and we are not free to go wherever we want. also, it takes long time to travel with big group</IN>

<BO1><MI1>When we follow groups, we have to go everywhere with our group.</MI1> <SI1>Than we can't enjoy our own time but if we travel with our family or friends, it make us feel good. <EX>for example, my grandmother went to Israel in a group led by a tour guide. When they arrived at beach, she wants to stay there for long time because she liked there. But because of the group, she had to leave there in an hour</EX></SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>second</TR> reason is we are not allowed to go wherever we want.</MI2> <SI2>If I really want to go somewhere but it wasn't included in tour course, I can't go there. <EX>For example, my cousins went to Europe in a group with a tour guide. Even though they really wanted to go the Wall of Berlin, they couldn't go because it wasn't included in tour course.</EX></SI2></BO2> 

<BO3><MI3><TR>A last reason</TR> is when we travel in a group, it takes long time to do someting.</MI3> <SI3>Think about that we are traveling with 50 other people. We went to the bathroom and it took 30 minutes. but if we travel with our family, it probably going to take about less than 10 minutes.</SI3></BO3>

<CO>in conclusion, i disagree that the best way to travel is in a group with a tour guide, because of these reasons that we can't enjoy our own time, it's not free to travel where Iwant, and it takes a long time to do something.</CO>

column1: 432&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Universities should give the same amount of money to their students’ sports activities as they give to their university libraries. Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3:
<IN>People say that universities should give the same amount of money their student’s sports activities as they give to their university libraries. <TS>I absolutely agree with this statement, because sports activities make students healthy.</TS> They also provide chances to learn many items such as cooperation and friendship which libraries can’t give to students.</IN>
 
<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, good health is the most important factor for students.</MI1> <SI1>If they get sick, they can’t study any more. It’s true that students have to keep a good health to study. Sports activities are the best way to get a healthy condition. I always exercised at gym in university. It made me healthier. If university didn’t invest on facilities to do sports activities, I couldn’t make use of wonderful exercise utilities. I might not keep a good health. Because student’s sport activities are at least as important as libraries, universities should give the same amount of money to those activities.</SI1></BO1>
 
<BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover</TR>, students can learn many previous properties throughout sports activities.</MI2> <SI2>Playing sports such as baseball, soccer and basketball can give chances for students to improve friendship between friends. Students keep good relationships with their friends by sports. Generally, sports activities can provide chances to learn how to cooperate each other throughout playing sports. Libraries can’t give these important items to students. I remember that I learned the importance of cooperation in organization by participating baseball team as a player in university. I couldn’t get this good experience at libraries. Namely, both sports activities and libraries are very important for students evenly.</SI2> <TR>Therefore,</TR> universities invest money on both evenly.</BO2>

<CO><TR>All things considered</TR>, I think that both sports activities and libraries in universities are evenly important factor to teach students. Therefore, universities should give the same amounts of money to their students’ sports activities as they give to their university libraries</CO>
column23: Bad connection between evidence and thesis.

column1: 433&Do you agree with the following statement? Attending a live performance is more enjoyable than watching the same event on television. Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3:
<IN>People who want to see a performance may attend a performance ground directly or watch it on television. <TS>I agree with the opinion that attending a live performance is more enjoyable.<TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, people who attend a live performance can feel enthusiastic mood on the spot.</MI1> <SI1>To people watching the same event on television could never experience such vivid feelings like a living respiration.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, there are some physical limitations in case of television.</MI2> <SI2>It is difficult to imagine that people in home could hear sound lively and watch a performance as vividly as on the spot.</SI2></BO2>

<CO>Of course, watching on television could satisfy them up to a certain degree. <TR>But</TR>, watching a live performance has limitations in vivid, so I think attending a live performance is more enjoyable than watching the same event on television.</CO>
column23: Too short

column1:
434&How do movies or television influence people's behavior? 
Use reasons and specific examples to explain your answer.
column3:
<IN>In modern times, multimedia and information era, movies and television give us many advantages or disadvantages to our lifes. <TS>An advantage part is that it give us much useful information, and the other part is that people imitate criminal methods on the movies and television.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, movies and television give us much information, such as advertisement and date course, for our modern life.</MI1> <SI1>We can see many advertisements on the movies and television. By watching them, we can easily and effectively choice things what we need, and compare with other goods. <TR>Another</TR> reason why they make advantage is because when the beautiful place that was on the movies or television, will become my date course with my girl friend. They give me much helpful information.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>In spite</TR> of this advantage information, movies and television have disadvantages for our life because their crime action can be imitated by criminal or children.</MI2> <SI1><EX>For example, in my country, Korea, after it is broadcasted "Terminator" which is a famous movie, on TV, many criminal did make crimes like terminator, shutting the guns on the shop and driving a motorcycle without helmet, and guns were the most popular toy for all children.</EX> It make possible to cause social confusion.</SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, movies or television gives us many useful information but make many crimes and social confusion. Despite the disadvantages, they need to make out life to be rich.</CO>

column1:
435&How do movies or television influence people's behavior? 
Use reasons and specific examples to support your answer
column3:
<IN>Today, many people see television. It influences people who see a television very much. Espacially, Children apart from their parents is exposed to television so much.</IN>

<BO1><MI1>First of all, television provide a lot of educational information.</MI1> <SI1>It deals with broad scopes from mathmatics to literature. We can get lots of information just seeing it. Tv is a teacher to many children.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2>Moreover, it may be somewhat violent.</MI2> <SI2>These day, we can see lots of violent movies on television. Many children easily see tv and they can imitate it. It is necessary that their parents take care of them.</SI2></BO2>

<BO3><MI3>Finally, we can easily get new information through television.</MI3> <SI3>If tv is compared with newspaper, they provide almost real-time informatin. Tv provides so new information that people know about the world.</SI3></BO3>

<CO>In conclusion, we can get an educational information, see a violent movie, and gain a new information. Television has a many good aspect and also it has a negative effect. It is our choice to see a excellent channel</CO>
column23: Too Short, lacking in analysis

column1: 436&If you could make one important change in a school in a school that you attended, what change would you make? Use reasons and specific examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>In modern universities, they have a lot of facilities for studying and learning. First of all, I think they should be prepared for students in many parts, such as materials for studying or equipments for the lesson. <TS>Particularly, I believe that library should be changed by setting a positive policy.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, universities should supply library with all type of books for studying.</MI1> <SI1>For example, some universities don't have enough books. The students have a great difficulty in preparing for classes. Although the university has to solve a lot of problems, it is important that they should give students affluent environment for the class. Then, the students will be able to concentrate on their own majors.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, universities should provide students with more convenient facility.</MI2> <SI2>Students, sometimes, have to study all day long in the library, but the chairs are not comfortable because they are too hard. It can affect student's health seriously, such as the backbone. Students should be provided with more suitable circumstance for studying.</SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In short</TR>, universities should be changed greatly for the students' real necessity. If universities try to change the educational environment, many students will wish to enter the school, and then the country will have excellent people for the society.</CO>
column23: The writer missed the point, the question is asking for a particular school that you've attended already, not universities in general

column1: 437&In general, people are living longer now. discuss the causes of this phenomenon. Use specific reasons and details to develop your essay.
column3:
<IN>As time goes, human beings live longer. <TS>As far as I think, there are two important reasons of this phenomenon: growing interest for health and the development of medical science.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>The first reason</TR> of human's life span being longer is peoples growing interest for health.</MI1> <SI1>Most of my acquaintances are doing exercise every day and night. The more society develops, the more people have their free time. They are using these free time to exercise, such as jogging and climbing mountains. In addition, people in modern times are in good nutrition. As modern society produces foods more and more, they can eat as much foods as they want. These good nutrition enables them to overcome sicknesses.</SI1> By exercising more and being in good nutrition, they can be in good health, thereby living longer.</BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>The second reason</TR> of human's life span being longer is the development of medical science.</MI2> <SI2>The development of medical science has produced transplanting. In the past, most people having cancer were died, but in modern times the transplanting skill helps doctors to heal the nearly dying people. In addition, medical science invented a variety of medicines. The more people invent medicines, the more they can be free from many diseases.</SI2> <TR>Thus</TR>, through the invention of transplanting and diverse medicines, modern human beings are living longer.</BO2>

<CO><TR>As shown above</TR>, people are living longer because of their growing interest for health and the development of medical science. As far as I think, this human's life span lengthening phenomenon will be continued without ending</CO>
column23: Straightforward, meets minimum requirements

column1: 438&In general, people are living longer now. discuss the causes of this phenomenon. Use specific reasons and details to develop your essay.
column3:
<IN>In an article, I saw, over two-thirds of old women(over 60) in developed country live until 80th; nowadays developed country show a tendency to have lots of old people over 60th. Now, the old are the hero of society. Most doctors foresee that the average life spans will be over 80 few years later, and it is important to know the reason why people live longer than several decades ago.</IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>The first</TR>, most important reason is medical advancement.</MI1> <SI1>In my case, I have an uncle who was dead by lung decease 20 years ago. Provided that he have a lung decease now, I guess he can cure it easily. Many dangerous deceases in several decades ago (like pest and small pax.) are disappeared now, and I convince medical development will conquer many uncured deceases like AIDS and cancer.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Another</TR> substantial point is increasing food diet makes people live longer.</MI2> <SI2>My ancestors made their food only for taste. So they took in too many fat and sugar. However, most contemporary people run after a diet balanced flavor and nutrition.</SI2></BO2>

<CO>Now, Most country in the world have a social policy to make nations live longer and longer. But It also can't avoid social problems like shortage of houses, the decease of aged and supporting them. So, The top priority of aged-policy is make society convenience for the aged.</CO>
column23: No thesis. "I guess" need to take a firm stance

column1: 439&It has recently been announced that a new high school may be built in your community. Do you support or oppose this plan? Why? Use specific reasons and details in your answer.
column3:
<IN><TS>To me, I support the plan to build a new high school in my neighborhood.</TS> Although there will be some problems during the construction, such as noises, dusts, and traffic jams, a new high school will bring several advantages to our community: good learning environments, better performances and community developments.</IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>Initially</TR>, a new high school will reduce the student number in a class.</MI1> <SI1>When I was a high school student, my classmates ware almost 50 and I couldn't concentrate myself on studying due to some noisy friends. My teachers also confessed they could not talk enough with all of students. If there were more schools in my hometown, I must have had better high school days.</BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, the competition between existing and newly opend shools can affect on students' achievements.</MI2> <SI2>Teachers can research other teaching methods in other school and will be able to adjust good ideas for his or her pupils. By sharing experience, information and teaching methodology, teachers and students can improve their performance.</BO2>

<BO3><MI3><TR>Besides</TR>, good educational environments will make my community more attaractive and, then, many people will consider to move in to my town.</MI3> <SI3>I have seen many parents think of the education as one of the most important factors for the family movements. If there is many new comers, it will be positive for local economy and bring a new investments repeatedly.</BO3>

<CO><TR>Despite</TR> some problems due to the construction, many people generally believe a good learning environment is more important than any other, and it will make a local community a better place to live. So, I pleasantly support the plan of building a new high school in my neighborhood.</CO>
column23: Well written. Good reasons

column1: 440&it has recently been announced that a new movie theater may be built in your neighbor hood. Do you support or oppose this plan? Why? Use specific reasons and details to support your answer.
column3:
<IN><TS>Building a new movie theatre near by my house is very nice. In short, I absolutely agree about the comment above. Although I support this, if I consider different perspective, this statement also has many disadvantages.</TS> <EX>For instance, there can be the dense traffic area because of the theatre. For this reason, it can cause serious environmental problems by exhaust fumes of cars, noise pollution and leavings.</EX> Likewise, it has many defects. <TR>However</TR> , I would recommend I agree with this because of the advantages that it has.<TR>Moreover</TR> , I assume that merits are more important than defects in the respect of takings and interesting.</IN>

<BO1><MI1>Before all else, building a theatre in my city is great from the point of enjoying modern living.</MI1> <SI1>
Human beings are very emotion-oriented. And they regard them, as they need a sort of excitement or a little pleasure in their lives. So, people go to the movies. And therefore, movies are drawing attention nowadays. In this situation, if people have a new theatre in their community. They will be very happy.</SI1> Since people can’t only watch movies in comfort but also raise the cultural standard.</BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Apart from this</TR>, that big building like a department store or a cinema is a kind of higher value-added business is true.</MI2> <SI2>
Just imagine! There are tall and wonderful architectures such as Starbucks, E-mart, TGIF restaurant or a general hospital in a town. These things are not common at all. Thus, the value is so high that nobody can buy easily. And the more essential point is the fixed property’s financial worth can rise with these, as these buildings are added value companies.</SI2> <TR>In other words</TR>, people can obtain good reputation of their town. And this is, on the other aspect, humans can change the image of their community to the better one than they had before.</BO2>

<CO><TR>To summarize</TR> , I believe this mention above has both advantages and shortcomings. But I would confirm that building a new movie house in my neighborhood is really needed. The three reasons are to get high salaries, to have cultural life and to gain immovable benefits. I accordingly assert that architects should aware of the importance of the big buildings that they have to make the one with much usefulness and profit.</CO>
column23: Confused thesis. Decide on one side, provide reasons. Do not hover over both sides.

column1: 441&It is better for children to grow up in the countryside than in a big city. Do you agree or disagree? Use specific reasons and examples to develop your essay.
column3:
<IN>If we enter a university or a company, we meet many people who have lived in the countryside or in a big city. Among of them, I have only heard much pride of people who grew up in the countryside. <TS>In my opinion, I agree that it is better for children to grow up in the countryside than in a big city because they can make special experiences.</TS> One thing is that children can play joyfully with their nature environment, and the other is that they are not contaminated by a big city's effect.</IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, I believe that children can grow up more joyfully with their nature environment in the countryside because nature gives them many amusements.</MI1> <SI1><EX>For example, children can climb up a mountain, or they can catch fishes in a stream.</EX> A big city can't give this entertainment. Children who grew up in the countryside have good memories and beautiful mind.</SI1></BO1>
 
<BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover</TR>, I prefer to live in the countryside during young life because children are not contaminated by a big city's effect and they can grow up robustly in clean nature.</MI2> <SI2>It is true to be said that a big city makes dirty airs and noisy. But in the countryside, children can breathe with clean airs and enjoy silent nature. Children will certainly have strong health in the countryside.</SI2></BO2>
 
<CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, I have two reasons why I agree that it is better for children to grow up in the countryside. It is because children can have much happiness which nature environment makes, and as they are not contaminated by a big city's effect children can grow up robustly.</CO>
column23: Two examples are actually the same one. Other than that great essay.

column1: 442&It is sometimes said that borrowing money from a friend can harm or damage the friendship. Do you agree? Why or why not? Use reasons and specific examples to explain your answer.
column3:
<IN>As human beings are social animals, they cannot live alone. Also people give and recieve many influence with one another. The best important person is friend among them;thus, they want to keep thiere relationship well. Sometimes they need money and they have to borrow money from a friend. Some people that borrowing money from a friend can harm or damage the friendship. <TS>However, I personally think borrowing money from a friend put possitive effect on thier friendship for several reasons.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, when they borrow money from a friend, they can become to be closer than before.</MI1> <SI1>Most people explain why they have to borrow money. A few years ago, I borrowed money from one of class mates. When I borrowed money for paying tuition, I expained my parents financal problems frankly. After that time, we became the best frand and she occasionally talk about her serious problems.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Next</TR>, people improve their trust and responsibilty because they have to pay back on exact time.</MI2> <SI2>Usually, when they borrow money from someone, they make appoinment that they will pay back until someday. <TR>Then</TR>, they try to pay back money. If they pay back exact day, people who lent money think they have trust and resonsibility. Thus they can build good relarionship with one another.</SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, as people borrow money from a friend, they can have better friendship as mentioned above. For they borrow money, they talk thier situations frankly, then they become to closer relationship and they can have trust and resposibility as they pay back exact time. When others need our help, we have to lend or give something we have for the warmer world.</CO>

column1: 443&Many parts of the world are losing important natural resourdes, such as forests, animals, or clean water. Choose one resource that is disappearing and explain why it meeds to be saved. Use specific reasons and examples to upport your oppinion
column3:
<IN>Since the Industrial Revolution, we have been losing many valuable natural resources, and it is regarded as the most serious problem that the earth is facing now. If we won’t take some actions about them, before long, the end of the earth must come. So, we have to exert to save disappearing resources. Although there are many resources we should protect, I think we especially try to prevent forests, in terms of their important functions as the earth’s lung and as the shelters of a number of lives on the earth.</IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, forests are the most important and massive air-supplier on the earth.</MI1> <SI1>By photosynthetic process, woods in forests provide oxygen to the lives on the earth and also absorb a lot of harmful atmosphere. Thanks to the functions of the forests like that, we can breathe and continue our life without difficulty. So to say, forests play a role as a huge filter of the earth.</SI1><TR>Therefore</TR>, if forests were gone, the earth would suffer from lack of air and we could not keep on our lives. <TR>Moreover</TR>, at last, it would result in the end of whole lives on the earth.</BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, forests are the shelters of a lot of lives on the earth.</MI2> <SI2>There exists so many lives in forests including plants, animals, insects and so on, and all of them are members that consist of echo-systems. If forests are gone, that means destruction of houses where millions of lives on the earth live.</SI2> So, the number of exterminated lives must be increased. And the downfall of the earth will be followed too.</BO2>

<CO><TR>Accordingly</TR>, since forests take an important part on the earth as I mentioned above, we must try to prevent and save forests with special care. We should always keep in mind that if we fail to save our forests, we also fail to save our lives and our earth.</CO>
column23: Well written essay

column1: 444&Many people visit museums when they travel to new places. Why do u think people visit museums?
column3:
<IN><TS>In many reasons, people like to visit museum when they travel new country.</TS> First of all, there are a lot of things that very strange to see. Secondly, we easily could know about cultures of countries. Thirdly, each country produced a deep impression to foreigners.</IN>

<BO1><MI1>First, when you visit new country you can find very strange stuff to see.</MI> <SI1><EX>For example, when people travel Korea people can see gold crowns, Turtle ship, and dinosaur bones in museum.</EX> It is seen very strange to foreigners, because there are not like this stuff in their country.</SI1> It makes them very exciting to visit Korea.</BO1>

<BO2><MI2>Second, we could to know about cultures of each country.</MI2> <SI2>As we know, there is huge development in each country, so we cannot understand about culture native to each country. That’s why we want to go museum when we visit each country. Few days ago one France model blamed us that we eat dogs. For that trouble, we were really upset. If we know about there culture native to each country, there are not many war and misunderstanding.</SI2> Therefore it will be good way to understand each other to go museum.</BO2>

<BO3><MI3>Third, each country produced a deep impression to foreigners.</MI3> <SI3>Two of my friend visited India because of their trip, but there are huge differences with two. One said it was really terrific to stay there. She drowned with their culture. But, another friend said it was worst trip on her life. She said most of place was really dirty, and many of Indians stink.</SI3> As we saw, there are different kinds of impression to foreigners, but if they go to museum to see each beautiful country, there will be no bad impression.</BO3>

<CO>In conclusion, there were such a many things the reasons we go to museums: We can see many strange thing, we could to know about cultures, each country produced a deep impression to foreigners. To go to museum, there will be a something special impression. No matter who you are, what you like, it is need to go to museum someday.</CO>

column1: 445&Many students have to live with roommates while going to school or university. What are some of the important qualities of a good roommate? Use specific reasons and examples to explain why these qualities are important.
column3:
<IN>These days many students have to live with roommates while going to school or university. Some students live well with their roommate, while others have some trouble. In this situation, it is necessary to think about what are some of the important qualities of a good roommate. I believe that having tolerant and cooperative mind is substantial to be a good roommate.</IN>
 
<BO1><MI1>First of all, a good roommate should have a tolerant mind.</MI1> <SI1>Sharing a room with another person, a student may face a lot of differences of his roommate such as different character and lifestyle. <EX>For example, I had used a room with my friend for 2 years when I was in high school. I was used to go to bed early but my roommate preferred to study at nightime.</EX></SI1> it was difficult to me to stand those noises from my roommate at first, but once I tried to understand it, there was no problem to stay with roommate.</BO1> 

<BO2><MI2>Another quality of a good roommate is cooperation.</MI2> <SI2>To live in a same place means that both members are responsible for maintaining their room. They should cooperatively keep their room clean and organized. If one roommate think that he always sweeps the room while his roommate does nothing, they will have a trouble. So a roommate needs to be cooperative with essential houseworks.</SI2></BO2>
 
<CO>In conclusion, tolerance and cooperation are some of the most important qualities to be a good roommate. Those qualities help members of the room understand and take care each other. Also I believe that tolerance and cooperation are truly play an important role in any human relationships.</CO>

column1: 446&Movies are so popular all over the world. Explain why movies are so popular. Use reasons and specific example to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>Nowadays, It is no exaggeration to say that movies were the beginning of the world's development. <TS>There are so many different categories and style of movies from all over the world. Here are 3 reasons for why movies are so popular.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, for the most part there are a lot movies dealing with our life.</MI1> <SI1>In here we can think back to the past days and reflect on ourselves. Moreover it show us the direction of our life.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, it make us happy.</MI2> <SI2>While we watch movies we can draw a fine picture of our future. Also we can become a fancy movie-star in imagine. Though it is not real, it give us happiness and make us feel better.</SI2></BO2>

<BO3><MI3><TR>Lastly</TR>, Movies help to broaden ours outlook and thoughts also it show us the world that we have never thought.</MI3> <SI3>So we can get out of "a big frog in a little pool". Only few years before space-travel was no more than a subject of movie. In addition in these days we can hold a conference at same time with people who lives in opposite sides of country. But now it all become reality by our effort.</SI3></BO3>

<CO><TR>In brief</TR>, movies lead to an unexpected results. Therefore now we can't think our world without it.</CO>

column1: 447&Neighbors are the people who live near us, In your opinion, what are the qualities of a good neighbor? Use specific details and examples in your answer.
column3:
<IN>I live in the places where millions of people live at the same time. I can't live alone without other people's help. I live in an apartment that has fifteen floors. I can say that many neighborhoods live near my house. <TS>In my opinion, the qualities of a good neighbor are same interests and nice personality.<TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, I think that neighbors who have same interests or hobbies are easy to become friends.</MI1> <SI1>Once becoming friends each other, they become people who I can't live without. A person who lives next door likes to play tennis so I play the tennis game with her every morning. We became best friends as we talk much and meet everyday in the morning. She's the one of the person that I think of first in the morning.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, If neighbors are simply good people, they will help me whenever I'm in need and won't harm me at all.</MI2> <SI2>When I was in highschool, one guy living near my family was a bad person. He borrowed 500 bucks from my parents and he disappeard forever. <TR>However</TR>, an old lady who has lived in my town was a really good person. She always smiled at me and gave me some chocolate and candies when I was little. I can’t forget her until now.</SI1></BO2> 

<CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, people who have same hobbies with me and are simply good people are the best neighbors to me. Spending a lot of time with my neighbor give me an opportunity to know them better and Unless they are criminals or murderers, I can get along with them well, build a helpful relationship. I think that I have to be a nice neighbor before I require for other people to be nice to me.</CO>

column1: 449&Neighbors are the people who live near us. In your opinion, what are the qualities of a good neighbor? Use specific details and examples in your answer.
column3:
<IN>Nowadays, it is said that people hardly communicate with their neighbors. It is bad news because we can live more joyful life if we make good relation with our neighbors. As we know, there is Korean saying that a good neighbor had better than a cousin. <TS>In order to become good neighbor, there are several qualities such as love about neighbors and sacrifice spirit</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, I believe that love about neighbors is most important quality among many reasons because one love bears much love.</MI1> <SI1>For example, if we give some help or a present to our neighbors when they have a party, they would remember neighbor's kindness and they also would like to help their neighbors. Therefore, when we love our neighbor and give some help to them, we can become a good neighbor.</BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover</TR>, I think that sacrifice spirit is another meaningful quality of a good neighbor because a person's sacrifice makes many people friendly.</MI2> <SI2><EX>For example, when it is a day with much snow, if we sweep our town's street our neighbors are moved and many of them will be trying to sweep in front of their house.</EX> Although one person's sacrifice is small effort, it will be warm of many people's heart.</BO2>

<CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, there are two major qualities of a good neighbor. One thing is love about our neighbors, and the other is sacrifice spirit. The better neighbors there are in our society, the better community our society will become.</CO>

column1: 450&Neighbors are the people who live near us. In your opinion, what are the qualities of a good neighbor? Use specific details and examples in your answer.
column3:
<IN>As this society is getting more industrialized and urbanized, people have a tendency to be more isolated and self-centered than the good old ages. However, we still need and appreciate a good neighbor. People say that neighbors are sometimes better than their own relatives who live away from them. Some people think it is because they can share things while other people say it is because they have a heart of gold in this less personalized society. <TS>In my case, I think the qualities of a good neighbor are giving a hand and consideration for other neighbors.</TS></IN>
 
<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, I think one quality of a good neighbor is a willingness of giving a hand when needed.</MI1> <SI1>I remember a close neighbor we had when I was young, who gave readily a hand when we needed. It was when my grandmother was discharged from the hospital and, since grandmother didn't get well completely, we needed someone who would give us a ride to take her back home. Thanks to our good neighbor's help, we could get my grandmother back safely.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, another quality that a good neighbor should have is consideration for others.</MI2> <SI2><EX>For example, there was a guy who lived next door during my high school years.</EX> He used to listen to the music very loudly and it annoyed me whenever I tried to study hard. A few days later, I asked him if he could turn the volume down so that I could concentrate on my study.</SI2> Because he was considerate enough to do as I told him, I could get to study better at home.</BO2>

<CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, I think qualities of a good neighbor are giving hands and consideration for others. I believe everyone asserts that a neighbor who has these qualities is a good one and we ourselves can be a good neighbor by exercising these things to our own neighbors.</CO>
column23: Examples do not provide in depth analysis. However, the essay is organized. Thesis could be written more clear

column1: 451&Nowadays, food has become easier to prepare. Has this change improved the way people live? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>Modern society people are not likely to wait something. They pefer a rapid and delicious thing, such as fast food, as the name itself shows us the tendency. It does keep pace with contemporary people who think waiting for taking out food is waste time. It is advantageous to them that fast food or instant food does not require much time. <TS>However, if the preference to that kind of food affects to the human mental system, it is certainly a serious problem.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1>Nowadays, food has become easier to prepare.</MI1> <SI1>It is convenient and people do not have to spend much time and labor. Even though you are hungry at 1:00 a.m. and irritated to cook something to eat, do not worry. Just hang up the phone, call up the food delivery service and delicious pizza should be arrived to your home in 20 minutes. It give you big pleasure.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>On the other hand</TR>, it is probable to say that the trend which want to fast food influences people's values in a negative way.</MI2> <SI2>They tend to find something easier and faster all the time. They do not know how to be patient nor become evaluate others with their efficiency. I believe that the way of thinking makes you lonely and miserable.<SI1></BO2> 

<CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, the change to fast food is not good really. One of your lifestyles could destroy your whole life. I would recommend that enjoy having it sometimes, but do not stick to it.</CO>

column1: 457&People attend college or university for many different reasons (for example, new experiences, career preparation, increased knowledge).Why do you think people attend college or university? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>The seniors of high school are eager to get into college or university. Many seniors go high when they receive acceptance letter, while others who are rejected to admission feel depressed. Now we can draw a very basic question to this college or university fever. <TS>Why are so many people want to attend college or university?</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1>Career preparation can be picked up as No.1 reason.</MI1> <SI1>Most jobs in admirable companies require bachelor's degree in college or university. So anyone who doesn't attend college are out of considerations for the job positions. And generally jobs that require bachelor's degree offer better salaries than jobs that doesn't. Besides practical reasons like jobs and salaries, people usually desire to get in-depth knowledge on specific fields - majors - in which they are interested. In college or university, not like in high school, students can select their majors and focus their studies on related subjects. And people attend college or university also to enjoy liberal lifestyles, whole new experiences and colorful cultures of different people. College students can manage their time schedules flexibly. And they are able to do lots of different experiences during their long vacations.</SI1></BO1>

<CO>People attend college or university not just for one single reason but for various reasons mentioned above. As for me, I attend Seoul National University majoring in industrial engineering to get in-depth knowledge, to get a good job upon graduation and to expose myself to colorful cultures and experiences.</CO>
column23: Do not start sentences with "And". This student knows big words but do not know how to use them properly. Only one body.

column1: 458&People attend college or university for many reasons(for example, new experiance, career preparation, increased knowledge). Why do you think people attend college or university? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>There are many reasons why people attend college or university. <EX>For example, people want to go on to the higher education for getting new experiences, preparing good jobs, and pursuing more deep learning etc.</EX> But in my viewpoint the most major reason of people’s wanting for the higher education is for getting a good job. Because there are several benefits when we have to choose our job.</IN>
 
<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, the benefit which the attending college or university can give us is that we can devote ourselves more specific area.</MI1> <SI1><EX>For example, the field of technology or economics is needed some levels specially educated man.</EX></SI1></BO1> 

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, the benefit of college or university degree is that kind of academic background can permit us more satisfactory salary.</MI2> <SI2>And contented salary makes our live more comfort and plentiful.</SI2></BO2>

<BO3><MI3><TR>And last</TR>, the benefit of academic background is that we can realize the desire for the success.</MI3> <SI3>We all of us want to get some kind of glory or success through the life. By attending college or university we can prepare the basis for this success.</SI3></BO3>
 
<CO>Now we look around for getting good job why people want to go to the college or university. Although getting a good job is the major reason people want to attend college or university, we never forget that what student must learn also in the academic coarse is a good sense for the community.</CO>
column23: Poor examples. A simple laundry list of reason without substance

column1: 459&People do many differenr things to stay healthy. What do you do for good health? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>Of all over the world, people worry about their health condition and they do many things to keep on their healthy. Or, as, these days, scientific technology develops, many health assistant stuffs are there. <TS>However, in spite of those things, i do only two simple, but difficult, things to keep my healthy; that is, having breakfast ans living regulary.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, i have always had a breakfast since i was a baby.</MI1> <SI1>Because my father is a very regular and stubborn person, all of members of my family have been followed by his rule. <TR>Thus</TR> our family always have a breakfast at 7:30 a whole of evey week. When i was middle school, I had complain against rule of my father. <TR>Otherwise</TR>, i have recognized that rule of my father was for all of our family. <TR>Even</TR> though we do not know wheather we follow rule of my father, we all are still healthy and no one have ever been at hospital, except dental clinic. Therefore, i think that what dose not skip breakfast is good for our healthy.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Additionally</TR>, i have lived regularly a whole of my life.</MI2> <SI2>This thing, also, is for my father. As i said in above pharagraph, my father is so punctual, so we, my elder sisters and me, were accustomed to sleeping at most before at 11:00pm and waking up at 7:00 am. Other people think that my father is eccentric, consevate and not suitable at the contury. <TR>However</TR>, i now do not think so. As my father taught us his rule, we coul grow well, without any infection and disease.</SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, these days, even though there are a lot of equipment and food for healthy of our human beings, I think that healthy is caused from base behaviors of our life. <TR>Therefore</TR>, i assert that to keep healthy, do not skip breakfast and live reqularly.</CO>
column23: No coherent

column23: incoherent transitions

column1: 461&People learn in different ways. Some people learn by doing things; other people learn by reading about things; others learn by listening to people talk about things. Which of these methods of learning is best for you? Use specific examples to support your choice.
column3:
<IN>People have their own way of learning. Some people learn by doing thing; other people learn by reading about things; others learn by listening to people talk about thing. Each method has own advantages. <TS>But in my experience, I think reading is the best way of learning because it is unlimited by time and place, prevents making a mistake.</TS></IN>
 
<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, I can learn by reading about things anywhere and anytime.</MI1> <SI1>I can read in a car, on the bed, even in a restroom. Also I can read early in the morning or at midnight. This advantage distinguishes reading from any other methods of learning. <EX>For example, I once had a chance to travel by plane for 10 hours.</EX> During in the plane, I could read a book about psychology and it was really helpful to learn about the field that I knew nothing about.</BO1>
 
<BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover</TR>, learning by reading reduces mistakes.</MI2> <SI2><TR>On the other hand</TR>, if I try to learn something by doing it myself, I may face a lot of mistakes and errors. When I want to observe stars with a scope, books about stars will tell me the way to find the stars in the sky easily. But in case of doing it myself, I may have to search entire sky to find the stars that I want to observe and it definitely will need much time.</BO2>
 
<CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, I think reading about things is the most effective way to learn. It truly can be done wherever and whenever I am, and it also helps me learn without making a mistake.</CO>

column1: 462&school should ask students to evaluate thier teachers. agree or disagree?
column3:
<IN>Evaluating teachers is hard to accept in the Orient. <EX>Especially, Korea, my country , regard the relation of between teacher and student as important.</EX> For this reason, many people think that evaluating teacher is against politness. <TS>Although it has a negative aspect, i agree this idea for two reasons.</TS></IN>
 
<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, students can claim their right of good education through evaluation of teachers.</MI1> <SI1>students need professor who teach faithfully. however, there was no way to communicate their expectation about good lecture without this evaluating system. in 1999, math professor in my school teach awfully. he give a lecture like speech to the wall, and he can not answer 
the question. finally, he is expelled through the student's evaluation. if our school does not have this system, we would be tolerate his teaching.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>another</TR> reason is that it is a good for teachers who neglect their study for studnets to check.</MI2> <SI2>one professor in oxford university which put this system into practice for a long time said that this system inspire the teacher to prepare sincerely and help to reflect their teaching.</SI2></BO2>

<CO>for above mentioned reason, this system is very good for studnets and teachers. we develop this system no as a matter of form.</CO>
column23: Poor examples

column1: 463&Some high schools require all students to wear uniforms. Other high schools permit students to decide what to wear to school. Which of these two school policies do you think is better? Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3:
<IN><TR>At first</TR>, people started wearing clothes to protect themselves from cold. However, this notion has weakened as they concerntrated on other functions of clothes; representation of one's status, aesthetic sense, group and etc. <TS>This has brought the idea of uniforms, to represent certain groups like soldiers, doctors, atheletes and even students. <EX>In Korea, uniform is required for almost all schools regarding high schools.</EX> I'm also bound to uniforms and I consent with the idea of wearing them.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>Firstly</TR>, school uniforms have a great influence on students as a means of bringing them together.</MI1> <SI1>People should know who they are and where they belong in the society. By wearing uniforms, they are distinguished from other members of society as a respective group.</SI1><TR>Therefore</TR>, the ones in certain group can find similarity and friendliness among themselves which make it easier for them to cooperate and integrate.</BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, it brings equality among students.</MI2> <SI2>Not everyone is financially equal as a matter fact and uniforms can be a good solution to it. A single student would only need a pair of uniforms to wear in his school and he won't have to pay extra cash for other clothes. In fact, I think it is also fair for everyone because no one would be particulary special in terms of clothes which we are very sensible to at this age. Imagine someone wearing extravagent clothes in school, it will certainly provoke conflicts among jealous students.</SI2></BO2>

<BO3><MI3><TR>Thirdly</TR>, it looks more elegant and polite for students to wear uniforms.</MI3> <SI3>There are exceptional students who would wear particular clothings that are not apt for the school; excessively violent or exposed(girls). It would give people negative prospect especially in Korea where people emphasize the politeness of students in terms of outwear; grown-ups who cling to the old school policy of obligating uniforms, regarding the neatness.</SI3></BO3> 

<CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, I'm for the policy of making students wear uniforms. Even though I occasionally desire to wear my own clothes in school I still prefer uniforms-I can take pride of my school, feel equal, and be polite. After a year, I will eventually graduate from my high school and the uniform would be a reminder of good memories.</CO>
column23: Thoughtful essay

column1: 464&Some people believe that success in life comes from taking risks or chances. Others believe that success results from careful planning. In your opinion, what does success come from? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>People say that success in life is composed of two main keys; careful planning and taking risks and chances. It is true that careful planning entails success and taking risks and chance also causes victory in life. <TS>Although both two items are main components to get success, I much agree that success in life comes from taking risks or chances.</TS></IN>
 
<BO1><MI1><TR>To begin with</TR>, chances are very important factor to success in life.</MI1> <SI1>Without taking chances, only good planning doesn’t make sure victory. A famous baseball player in Major League in U.S.A., Chan-Ho Park in L.A Dodgers, is a typical example in success stories. He makes a lot of money, attains fame and earns respect of people. When he was young, he was just one of pitchers, having potentials, in university. Soon he had a chance to play in Major League. He got the chance. Without this chance, he is not a star player in the world but just a good player in Korea.</SI1> <TR>Therefore</TR>, taking chances are major key factor in success.</BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover</TR>, every careful planning doesn’t make success safely.</MI2> <SI2>I have never heard success story without taking risk. All successful people, at least once, confronted risks, and they overcame the troubles well. For them, these risks are not serious problems but way to success. Chan-Ho, Park had a trouble to be demoted from Major League to Miner League at first year as a Major League player. Perhaps this was the biggest serious risk in his life. But he made use of this suffering period to sharpen his skills and improve his power. Two years later, he became the one of most powerful players in Major League.</SI2> <TR>Therefore</TR>, taking risk may also be good chance to achieve success.</BO2>

<CO><TR>All things considered</TR>, I believe that success consists of many factors. Of all components to get success, I think, taking risks or chances result in success in one’s life.</CO>
column23: Only used one example of Park the baseball player, in both body paragraphs. Need varied examples.

column1: 465&Some people prefer to eat at food stands or restaurants. Other people prefer to prepare and eat food at home. Which do you prefer? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>There are a lot of places to eat in the world. Someone likes to eat at restaurants or food stands. Others like to eat at home. <TS>Although each place has some advantages for eating, I prefer to eat at food stands, because you can save your times and efforts for preparing your meal.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>Firstly</TR>, I like to save my time in any place such as home, school and travel.</MI1> <SI1><TR>Actually</TR>, we live in competitive society. Sometimes, we can’t even eat a whole day during working. If you prepare your lunch in the early morning, you should be exhausted easily. You had better take rest more instead of preparing it.</SI></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>On the other hands</TR>, you can save your efforts for making your meal and finding some restaurants where you can spend a little money.</MI2> <SI2>There are a lot of food stands in near your place. You can be served good foods cheaper than any other place. And also you can simply and easily purchase your lunch.</SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, food stands are great places for eating food, because you can save your times and efforts for preparing your meal. I recommend that food stands are the best place for lunch.</CO>
column23: Avoid second person "you"

column1: 466&Some people prefer to live in a small town. Oters prefer to live in a big city. Which place would you prefer to live in? Use specific reasons and details to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>Some people like to live in a small town, while others prefer to live in a big city. <TS>However, I insist that living in a big city is better since there are better things that a small town such as conveniency in transportation and some stores, quickness to get currents. Furthermore, in personal I like meeting a lot of people.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, it is very easy to go somewhere using transportation such as buses, subway, trains and taxies in a big city where I live and to buy various products in one place.</MI1> <SI1>I live in Seoul which is the capital of Korea although my father's hometown is countryside. Whenever I go there, I am not comfortable and don't want t stay longer because there were just one bus through the town and only one supermarket. I couldn't go other farther places when I stay my grandparents' house. Also it took a long time to reach the store to buy some snacks and beverages. However, in Seoul it is not imageable. I can use buses anytime and go to the stores to buy something. That is why I prefer a big city.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, I feel the people who live there seem like out of date.</MI2> <SI2>In other words, when people live in a small town, they perhaps can't get the flow of clothing styles, popular songs etc. I believe that living is a big city gives us various merits quickly. <EX>For example, a few months ago wearing loose clothes was popular among young generation in Korea and it was like a boom. Thus I could see lots of shops try to display those items.</EX> <TR>However</TR> at the same time in country, the young people still don't know about the new current. Maybe it is not a whole case, but generally it happens.</SI2> Therefore, living in a big city can make me a fashionable person.</BO2>

<BO3><MI3><TR>Thirdly</TR>, I become very happy when I meet new people.</MI3> <SI3>I used to be a junior English teacher, at that time I met a lot of people such as children, their parents and other teachers including native speakers. If I lived in a small town, I couldn't talk and meet various people I mentioned above. Meeting people make me have many chances to get knowledge of various fields. It is known to be true that a big city gives more opportunities to get plentiful senses in those spheres than a small town.</SI3></BO3>

<CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, each person has his or her favorites, but I like to live in a big city. Many people want to move to the big city because of the conveniences, present flows and some veiled chances. I would like to get those things all. That is why I pursuit the changing and developing a city.</CO>
column23: Lapses in diction. Overall good essay

column1: 467&Some people prefer to live in a small town. Others prefer to live in a big city. Which place would you prefer to live in? Use specific reasons and details to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>In these days, People'd like to live where they feel comfortable to live. Some people prefer living in a big city while others prefer living in a small town. I had lived in a small town when I was young but now I live in a big city. <TS>I prefer to live in a big city rather than in a small town since I can use the public transportations more easily , enjoy various cultural events.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1>The first reason that I like to live in a big city is that we can use many different public transportations such as buses, trains, and subways.</MI1> <SI1>Using public trasportation is more convenient to go somewhere and economic than using my own car. Because I took the subway on my way school, I wasn't late for school when my car was broken. <TR>Moreover</TR>, the fee of the subway is cheaper than the gas expense of my own car.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, I can have more various cultural events like movies, plays, and concerts and so on.</MI2> <SI2>One of my favorite things to do is going to the movies with friends but in a small town I can't watch the new movies at the cinema as soon as they are released. Moreover big cities have a lot of movie theaters which have many screens at the same time. <TR>Therefore</TR> I can have the variety of choosing the movies.</SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, Living in a big city can bring you many wonderful advantages such as the public transportation and the various cultural events. Since I live in a big city now, I can go wherever I want to go fast and conveniently, save the money, I can have the more opportunity to obtain many cultural performances. Many people move to a big city to gain these kind of advantages.</CO>
column23: Basic essay. Supported by evidence, well organized. Lacking in in depth evidence

column1: 468&Some people prefer to live in large cities, while others prefer to live in small towns which of these two life-styles go you prefer? Use specific reasons and examples to support your choice.
column3:
<IN>Usually, people select their surroundings according to their personalities and situations. <TS>I'm a small town-type person.</TS> I would like to explain three reasons.</IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, I can enjoy nature such as mountains, brooks and hills.</MI1> <SI1>I'm born in Seoul. For this reason, I don't have a chance to enjoy nature. <TR>Also</TR>, I can see many stars I love. Second, I can know all neighbors well. One of the problems being in a large city is that we feel alienated so many times, but people who live in a small town know each other so they can share their situations or feelings. <TR>Third</TR>, using a lot lf high-tech utilities, I can access almost all information that I want to know. And I don't have to go to the city to work because I can use the Internet that links anywhere</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>However</TR>, there are lack of good educational environments, hospitals and entertainments.</MI2> <SI2>Some who likes to live in a small town might select to live a large city because of his/her children. For others who go to a hospital every day to care their health, it is hard to live in a small town.</SI2></BO2> 

<CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, I prefer living in small towns. I can wake up while birds sing, can share feelings with my friends, and can go anything by using the Internet. But you must be considered which of situation you are in.</CO>
column23: Colorful descriptions

column1: 469&Some people prefer to spend free time outdoors. Other people prefer to spend their leisure time indoors. Would you prefer to be outside or would you prefer to be inside for your leisure activities? Use specific reasons and examples to explain your choice.
column3:
<IN>There are two ways to spend on leisure. People can enjoy their free time either indoors or outdoors. <TS>I prefer to spend it outdoors because getting outside gives me a good relationship with others and helps me to become more healthy.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, being outdoors gives me the opportunity to try new activities and meet new people.</MI1> <SI1>I can play tennis or go to watch a movie with my friends. I can also have a good time to enjoy a baseball with my family. When I was a high school student, I attended many group activities at school. This was very good chance to make new friends. <TR>Therefore</TR>, being outdoors can be help to improve relationship with others and to make new friends.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, being outdoors means a chance to get rid of stress and to relax myself from daily routines.</MI2> <SI2>I can visit beautiful mountains, lakes and other famous places. Both a fresh air and a wonderful scene make me to refresh. This is good remedy to eradicate stress in my mind and to take myself easy. Therefore, being outdoors enable me to have a good health in both mental and physical aspects.</SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>All things considered</TR>, I think that I’d like to spend my free time outdoors. That seems to be more beneficial to me because I can obtain a good relationship with others and a good in shape.</CO>
column23: Minor errors in usage

column1:
470&Some people prefer to spend most of their time alone. Others like to be 
with friends most of the time. Do you prefer to spend your time alone or with 
friends? Use specific reasons to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>Some people want to be alone most of their time, while others like to be with friends most of the time. Preferences about this issue are most likely to be affected by their characters. <TS>For me, I feel like good when I spend time with my friends because talking with friends is more exciting than being alone and I can take counsel with friends about my current trouble.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, I want to spend my time in doing something enjoyable.</MI1> <SI1>When I am tired from studying, I like to be with my friends. <EX>For example</EX>, I was feeling so tired after studying lastnight. So I called friends and chatted with them having a cup of coffee. I could feel good after I came back home.</SI2></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, I can get useful advice from my friends about problems.</MI2> <SI2><EX>For example</EX>, it would be helpful to be with friends to solve problems if I have some trouble. Specifically, I was studying the applied mathematics somedays ago. I found that I had misunderstood one theorem in the textbook. Before long, I could understand more exactly about the theorem by discussing that problem with my friends.</SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, communication among friends is decreasing day by day and people are loosing many opportunities to help each other. In this situation, friends play important roles and can be good counselers about my tough life. <TR>Furthermore</TR>, I like making fun events with friends to enjoy my life. For these 
reasons, I prefer to be with friends most of the time.</CO>
column23: Need to improve usage of the English language

column1: 471&Some people prefer to spend most of their time alone. Others like to be with friends most of the time. Do you prefer to spend your time alone or with friends? Give reasons to support your answer
column3:
<IN>You should spend most of your time alone or with friends. Although the alone time is good for comtemplating something, relaxing your upset mind, or remembering the past, sometimes persons are solitary and gloomy when sole. But, time with friends is aid for not only consciousness but also inteligence.</IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, if your mind is hurted by something, caused by breaking through with lover, failing a important test, or very close person's dead, you will seek for someone, especially best friend, who could console you for calming down and escaping the gloomy situation.</MI1> <SI1><TR>In addition</TR>, you could have a funny time with friends, so You can forget the stress produced at workplace. Thus, time with friends supply relaxation and happiness.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, each of friends has pensonel occupation.</MI2> <SI2><TR>In ohter words</TR>, when you are with friends, since you meet people working various categories, you can hear diverse stories and learn sopisticated knowledges of pensonel jobs, gardening, car engineering, nursing, and educating. Thus, time with friends provide you with not only common senses but also speciallized knowledges.</SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, it is the friend who gives consolation when you are bad situation, and with friends you can gain common senses, and knowledges of various parts as well. So, I prefer to spend most of time with friends for helping my consciousness and intelligence, and I recommend you to be with your friends in rest time.</CO>

column1: 473&Some people say that advertising encourages us to buy things we really do not need. Others say that advertisements tell us about new products that may improve our lives. Which viewpoint do you agree with? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>For the most of the times when I watch a TV or read a magazine, I sometimes see the advertisements, too. Most of them were always giving me the idea that I need to buy that product on the advertisement. <TS>It is really good that sometimes some advertisements introduce new products that can make our life more improved. But it is sure that a lot of advertisements are making the customers buy the product by using the power of the advertisement.</TR> There are a lot of examples about this.</IN>

<BO1><MI1>The most ridiculous advertisement is about the golf ball.</MI1> <SI1>It is said that many scientist studied the golf ball and made the ball go longer when it was hit by a golf club. I can’t understand that why scientists need to study the golf ball that is really not necessary for the improvement of our life. I guess the company that produces the golf ball might wanted to appeal people with showing their effort to make the ball better, but in my opinion, they must have not done any scientific study about the golf ball. If they really studied a lot about the golf ball, why can’t the ball go much longer than the ball that produced 10 years ago? It is only the company’s idea to higher the price so that they can have more profit.</SI1></BO1> 

<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR> ridiculous advertisement is an advertisement about a make-ups.</MI2> <SI2>They also say that they studied the make-ups scientifically, so that they could make women prettier. I guess the word ‘scientifically’ appeals to the people a lot. <TR>But</TR>, I think the reason that many women look prettier is not because of the make-ups, but because of the way they do the make-ups. I don’t think that the make-ups did a lot of work to improve the faces of women. If they really made women look prettier, then there should be no women that look ugly, because the history of the make-up is pretty long but the way to do the make-up is not.</SI2></BO2> 

<CO>Only by these two advertisements, you can see that our money is spent to the people who like our money, but not us. The company’s cunning trick is driving us to spend money to the products that are not that far different from the similar previous product. It is nonsense that we haven’t improve a lot from 20 years before, with a technology we have. We should not be trusting every word that the advertisements say. Their purpose is our money, not our comfort.</CO>
column23: Fairly organized, lacking in analysis. Overall acceptable essay
