It is really good for one's mental. <TR>However,</TR> when it comes the source of knowledge, I think experience can be more beneficial than reading  a book.</CO>
column23: Good essay with some grammar mistakes. Good use of examples.

column1: 541&The decision that people make quickly are always wrong.
column3:
<IN>Some people think that quick decision is always wrong. <TS><TR>However,</TR> in my opinion, sometimes deciding quickly ables people to make good decisions.</TS> This is due to the fact that there is a arranged time for deciding and decision which is made quickly includes one's own mind more than decision which is made slowly.</IN>
 
<BO1><MI1><TR>To begin with,<T/R> As the old saying goes, "Early birds catch a worm".</MI1> <SI1>In otherwords, if someone postponed decision making, it might deters him from getting a chance for a best choice.
<EX>For example, last year I wanted to buy a watch. But I was in agony because of its highly expensive price. I decided to buy that watch after a multiple hesitation. but when I went to the watch shop, the watch which I hoped to buy was already sold out. finally I bought it from my friend. but I had to spend much more money than the original price. By this case, I learned that sometimes hesitation for making a decision brings worse situations.</EX></SI1></BO1>
 
<BO2><MI2><TR>On top of that,</TR> Decisions which were made quickly is more similar to people's true thinking.</MI2> <SI2>If people make a decision slowly, other people's thinking plays a significant role in making one's own decision. After deciding some matters with others opinion, the person who made deicisions might notice that there is a huge gap in what he decided and what he wanted. <EX><TR>For instance,</TR> when I had to choose my major in university, what I wanted to enter is engineering major. but when I hesitated to make a decision because engineering is was not a promising subject in Korea, my parents forced me to choose the medicine school. <TR>Finally</TR> I deicide to enter the medicine school. Recently I'm so regret to enter the medicine school because study of medicine school is so boring to me and I still have a attachment to the engineering major.</EX></SI2></BO2>
 
<CO><TR>To sum up,</TR> rapid decision making not only ables people to catch a nice chance, but also helps people to choose something only by their own intentions. In this regard, deciding swiftly is not always wrong.</CO>
column23: Good essay and good use of personal examples. Try to fix grammar mistakes so that the argument is clearer.

column1: 542&It has been said. "Not everything that is learned is contained in books". Compare and contrast knowledge gained from experience with knowledge gained from books. In your opinion, which source is more important? Why?
column3:
<IN>Different people have different opinion about the statement that experience is more important than books as gaining knowledge source. <TS>In my opinion, <TR>however,</TR> books are more significant source of information because it enable people to get knowledge effectively and give more deep, detailed information.</TS></IN>

 <BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> knowledge in books can be absorbed effectively, We can contact limitless information from books without taxing endeavor.</MI1> <SI1>If someone want to know about certain topic, they just visit library or bookstore and search books that is related to the topic. In contrast, experiential information requires not only exhausting progress but also time consuming work. <EX><TR>For instance,</TR> if you want to know about foreign nation likes Congo republic. Experiential knowledge needs you to visit the foreign country directly. There are so many requirements and process in order to go the country. <TR>Contrarily,</TR> you can figure out almost everything about Congo through just a few steps with books.</EX></SI1></BO1> 

 <BO2><MI2><TR>On top of that,</TR> books contain more deep and concentrated knowledge than experiential way.</MI2> <SI2>Thanks to numerous eminent ancient scholars and usefulness of characters, text materials are able to accumulate huge amount of information. <TR>On the contrary,</TR>experiential knowledge have no choice but to be descended by face-to-face method. <TR>Therefore,</TR> experiential know-how are susceptible to lose significant information in descending process. <EX>According to Institution of Korean Intangible Artifacts, traditional intangible experts have consistently diminished due to decrease of followers and troubles in transaction. <TR>However,</TR> information on books is still growing since human started to write on papers.</EX></SI2></BO2>

 <CO>For better living, both knowledge sources are required. <TR>However,</TR>books gives more valuable knowledge and it provides information efficiently. For these reasons, i strongly believe that books are more crucial source for spreading knowledge.</CO>
column23: Good essay and good use of personal examples. Try to fix grammar mistakes so that the argument is clearer.

column1: 543&The ability to cooperate with others is more important today than in the past.
column3:
<IN>Some people may believe that the cooperation skill is not important than in the past. <TS><TR>However,</TR> I totally think that the ability to work with other people is very critical in todays.</TS> This is because that, in todays, all works have do by a group or a team and people can work more efficiency with other people.</IN>

     <BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> almost occupations are the position to work and communicate other person in their office.</MI1>  <SI1>Before 100 years, people agriculture small plants for their family’s food. So their works alone are enough maintaining their life. In contradict, people should partake and join big company to earn money for their family. The occupation which allows work alone is hardly in a today’s businesses. It means that people have a lot of opportunity to contact and work their partners.  <EX>According a research conducted by The Labor Research Foundation of Korea, when people work their companies, they may work with five other members. <TR>Also,</TR> this co-work member will increase along social’s complexity. As our community and business have change to more large and complex, people are not able to work alone or small partner.</EX></SI1></BO1>

     <BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR> people can get more efficiency and performance by a group working in their jobs.</MI2> <SI2>Nowadays, there are too many information and special fields in our jobs. So only one people can do all works and assignments as people have limited ability for their job. <TR>Therefore,</TR> people should aggregate with other people to get projects more fast and large. <TR>Plus</TR> when people work in a group, a team is more efficiency and powerful than a sum of output of each member. <EX>I can give my personal experience as an example, when I and my friends were colleage students, we want to win robot contests. So I prepared and do hard works for my aim alone and my friends do their works individually. We believed that this project is well prepared and we have good team. After 1 month, we gather our outputs and achievements. That time, we were surprised that we are not going one direction, wasting a lot of time and energy. So we noticed that doing co-work give people more good result and consequence.</EX></SI2></BO2>

     <CO><TR>To sum up,</TR>people should have work with many people in their jobs in todays and people can output under working with other people in a complex job. For two reasons, I absolutely the co-work ability is more critical fact than in the past.</CO>
column23: Organized essay.However, too many grammar mistakes make essay very incoherent.

column1: 544&It is more important for a teacher to help students gain self-confidence than to provide them with specific information. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>It is often said that teachers have to concentrate on delivering specified knowledge rather than doing their best to get their students to obtain self-confidence. <TS><TR>However,</TR> in their lives, the advantage of the self-confidence far outweigh that of the amount of knowledge for the future for two reasons : they are capable of enhancing their academic performance and finally succeeding in their life.</TS></IN>
 
 <BO1><MI1><TR>To begin with,</TR> self-confidense given by teachers enables students to increase their academic performance by themselves.</MI1> <SI1>This is attributed to the fact that such self-esteem can serve as one of the key motivators for students to perform better and improve themselves. With such motivations, they will put in more efforts, concentrate better on tasks, and feel more responsible for their work. <EX>According to a study conducted by Hanyang University of Korea in 2009, there existed a huge difference between two groups of students in achievements. Through lectures, students in group A were able to get a help to elevate their confidence and those in group B were given detailed information about major subjects. The researchers showed that the students in group A spent more hours studying by 25 percent and performed higher than those in group B. <TR>In particular,</TR> they followed instuctions, submitted assignments on time, and participated actively in class discussion. This implies that self-esteem raised by their teachers has a direct correlation with the amount of efforts and energy into studying, resulting in an enhanced performance.</EX></SI1></BO1>
 
 <BO2><MI2><TR>In addition,</TR> the high level of confidence taught by teachers allows students to be hired by honorable companies.</MI2> <SI2>This is due to the fact that as modern society is becoming increasingly competitive, today's job markets require job candidates with self-confidense. <EX>According to the Ministry of Labor of Korea in 2007, the self-confidence of the applicants was the most important qualification for recruiting, taking up more than 65 percent of the final calls. In the employment interview, the interviewers tended to look at the applicants' personality, related to self-confidence. This implies that teahcer focusing on helping their students attain such characteristics, the students will be successful in the future through being hired by famous companies.</EX></SI2></BO2>
 
 <CO><TR>In brief,<TR> in a short-term, it looks like that teachers are better off spending most of their time on raising the students' knowledge. <TR>However,</TR> in a long run, the student cannot succeed in life without confidence obtained by their teachers. <TR>As a consequence,</TR> the teachers had better assist their pupils in terms of enhancing their self-confidence, not imparting information.</CO>
column23: Very good essay. Well organized and few grammar mistakes.

column1: 545&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? People should sometimes do things that they do not enjoy doing. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>Life is full of combination of hardship and joy,unexpectedness and predictability,and happiness and sadness. Everyone might have their preference and hatred, and some only apt to do things that they like only while others would put more emphasis on fulfilling responsibility regardless. <TS>Even if some say it's the best to do what you like exclusively, I disagree and following are my reasons.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First,</TR> from the perspective of wholeness, our society is composed of every distinctive individuals making wholeness as one piece. In my opinion, it's the best to do our best to fulfill our responsibility and accountability on our shoulders to make a difference of the world to which we belong.</MI1>
<SI1>Teachers might have to be diligent enough to provide the students with best learning experience, parents are to support their kids by working hard,students,doctors,firefighter and police would have to accommodate what they have in their hands to the best they can. Imagine teachers don't spend a lot of time preparing for the classes; doctors don't follow appropriate suits;parents don't work because they want to take a rest. Only consequences that will be left for us are poorly prepared education for the kids,patients who do not receive best treatment and children with no money to go to school.
<TR>Thus,</TR> it is my utter opinion that there are always thing we still have to do not just for ourselves but everyone involved in our family,society,and to a larger extent our country.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover,</TR> to look at it from individual's standpoint, we are living in a society where the competition is higher than ever,in which it puts a lot of demand on almost  every aspects of us.</MI2> <SI2><EX>Whether it be punctuallity  or diligence, only the ones who fulfill those demand and responsibilities are the ones finally accepted. <TR>Thus</TR> whatever your goal is, without having fulfillment of those necessary responsibility, the society wouldn't allow you to achieve it, because,for example,even if you are super good at drawing, if you fail to wake up early to go to university, you simply can't be recognized as a prominent artist that you might deserve. Because we tend to brand people's capacity based on the kind of education he/she accomplished.</EX></SI2></BO2>

<CO>As we can see from above, even if it may be difficult to do all we have on our shoulders and hands. For the benefit of us individual and all that are involved, I firmly believe it's still the best when we do things according to our responsibility rather our preference.</CO>

column1: 546&Renewable source of energy, such as solar and wind power will soon replace fossil fuels. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>It is often said that givne the fact that there are enough remaining fossil fuels we are able to use for a long time, we do not have to think about advance of renewable energy sourses. <TS><TR>Howerever,</TR> I firmly believe that now is the time for us to seriously contemplate on substituting renewable energy sources for the fossil fuels, suggesting that in the future, the fossil fuels are going to be replaced with renewable energy sourses for two reasons: the rest amount of the fossil feuls is limited and renewable sourse is helpful for saving money and the environment.</TS></IN>
 
 <BO1><MI1><TR>To begin with,</TR> with the advent and spread of renewable energy sourses such as wind and solar energy, people will not confront a problem in which they worry about the limited amount of fossil fuels.</MI1> <SI1>This is attributed to the fact that we knowing through it's name, the renewable energy is a almost perpetual and everlasting ones compared to the fossil fules. <EX>According to a study conducted by Seoul National University of Korea in 2009, the amount of fossil fues is so restrictive and limited that people only can use the fossil fuels for up-coming 50 years. The researchers showed that we should consider the limitedness of the fossil fuels and be prepared for it within the forthcoming half an century. This implies that in the future, we have no choice but to replace the traditional energy such as fossil fuels with renewable energy sources.</EX></SI1></BO1>
 
 <BO2><MI2><TR>In addition,</TR> considering the claim that utilizing renewable energy sourses will contribute to overcoming today's energy problems in terms of cost-effectiveness and environment, we end up replacing fossil fuels with renewable energy sources in the future.</MI2> <SI2>This is due to the fact that when governments and individuals increase the use of renewable energy sources such as solar energy, people can depend less on traditional energy sources such as fossil fuels which are running out, expensive. and even severely detrimental to the environment. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> when I was in fifth grade, my father decided to install a solar energy heater at our house. The cost of the installation was much high, but it was fully offset by government tax breaks on eco-friendly energy.</EX><TR>Moreover,</TR> we were able to save money which could have been wasted on the maintenance cost using gas every month. In the long run, using solar enegy allowed us to save money and the environment.</SI2></BO2>
 
 <CO><TR>In brief,</TR> it seems that we could not subsist well, if it were not for the fossil fuels because we are fairly used to utilizing the fossil fuels almost all places. <TR>In spite of this fact,</TR> the fossil fuels cannot help being replaced with renewable and alternative energy sources since the existing amount of them is capable of covering only short-term period and it is less cost-effective than the renewable ones, even damaging the environment.</CO>
column23: Organized essay. However, thesis statement does not address prompt correctly and grammar mistakes make main ideas less coherent.

column1: 547&A person you know is planning to move to your town or city. What do you think this person would like and dislike about living in your town or city? Why? Use specific reasons and details to develop your essay.
column3:
<IN>Every town or city has its own beauty and ugly side, New York,for instance,is well known for its glamorous and grand scale of skyscrapers and diversity culture, <TR>however,</TR> its also notorious for dirty streets and heavy traffic jam. In my town, the story goes same.<TS>In this essay, I would like to enumerate some of advantages and drawbacks of my town.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>Firstly,</TR> when a person comes to my town, he would notice right away how clean,yet convenient it is.</MI1>
<SI1>My town is situated in a rather rural area with a lot tree turning colors according to seasons,however, it
only takes 40 minutes to get to the metropolitan city called Seoul. I once used to live in a far remote countryside,in which it would take me at least 30 minutes to get to any place regardless of its kind. 
This inconvenience accumulated to the point where I started to hate every aspect of that place, if even there were surely many advantages. <TR>On the other hand,</TR> living in a metropolitan city would not be very pleasing from certain perspective:ever-lasting traffic jam,crowded area with people packed trying to bustle each other,high cost of living,busy life style are just a few of representation of city life. Ideally, my town offers the convenience of city life supplemented by serenity,coziness,and environmentally friendly of countryside.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Conversely,</TR> education and relative lack of job opportunity can be shortcomings of my town.</MI2> <SI2>My town is newly established town, thus every aspects of my town are of less experience. And this sometimes makes frustration and less desirable place to live for a long time. <EX>Education,for example, can only see the enhancement after a number of mistakes and correction,competition and advancement,experience over experience.</EX> However, because many families are farming-related backgrounds, they have tendency to put less emphasis on education than city might be. Moreover, less number of schools in my  town doesn't make it necessary to compete with one another;leading to rather laid-back in terms of developing new teaching methods and curriculum. Therefore, when put into strict comparison with those of city, it leaves a lot to be desired, specially for those who value highly of their child's education.</SI2></BO2>

<CO>Just like any other towns and cities, my town has its own good and bad side. Depending on how we perceive and what things we put value on, it can either be perfect place to live or worst place to live. 
<TR>However,</TR> experiencing as many places as possible wouldn't hurt, so I recommend visiting my town and see for yourself.</CO>
column23: Good essay. Well organized and has good flow. Should use more concrete examples to deliver argument more effectively. Pay attention to grammar mistakes.

column1: 548&Some people prefer to eat at food stands or restaurants. Other people prefer to prepare and eat food at home. Which do you prefer? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer
column3:
<IN>One of the trends brought about by 21 century is eating out, and it's a common dilemma among many what we choose to eat every night. Moreover, a lot of discussions have been made as to whether eating at home is better or eating out is more beneficial. <TS>While many argue in favor of eating at home on the many grounds such as cost effectiveness, I firmly believe that eating out is more suitable for today's life for many including myself.</TS></IN> 

<BO1><MI1><TR>Firstly,</TR> contrary to what many believe, eating out can actually save us a lot more money than eating at home.</MI1> <SI1>Reason behind this is that today's restaurants are very different from previous times in the way  they purchase ingredients needed to make food. Before, restaurants used to be owned rather in a small scale thus the way they bought ingredients was not so different from just regular home, which they go to a market and shop around to pick what seemingly is the best with a bit of negotiation on the price. <TR>However,</TR> newly developed network system of ingredient purchase for restaurants has been so advanced and well established that as long as they consume in bulk amount, they can purchase at a much cheaper rat ,which is directly translated in to their price.<TR>Not only that,</TR> in case we eat at home, the needed items for whatever the food we try to make have to be bought in a package most of the time. This creates a lot of waste of food because we usually end up throwing them away after them being in the fridge for a month or so. <TR>Therefore,</TR> in the long run, eating out can be much cost effectively smarter way of dining.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover,</TR> It is also more practical way of eating as well.</MI2> <SI2>We are living in a society where it puts a lot of demand on us for just about every aspect. we are swamped with work load and full of responsibility.
Time has been made valuable that can exceed any other side of our lives. Getting information,shopping,reading books,spending time with our families,recreation,and,most importantly work are just few things we have to do on a regular basis. <TR>Therefore,</TR> the one that knows how to spend time wisely might have better chance of succeeding in society. The problem with eating out is that it takes too much of our precious time away. Not only it takes more time to shop and cook the food but also cleaning up would take equally same amount of our important time. If we spend those time on something much more practical like searching on-line for stock market, reading newspapers and so forth, we are not only smart on spending the time wisely, but also our potential prospect would much more be bright due to better preparedness and knowledge gained from those efforts.</SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>All in all,</TR> while eating out has also negative side such as nutritional balance of the food and tendency to eat a lot on account of greater proportion served at restaurants, in my opinion, the advantage given by eating out is so great we just can not refuse that option these days.</CO>
column23: Well organized idea. Some grammar mistakes make essay less coherent. Should use more concrete exampels to deliver argument.

column1:
549&Some people say that success is the most important thing; 
however, it is more important to remain happy and optimistic when we failed.
column3:
<IN>In today's globalized society, it is widely believed that success is the most important thing in our life. Some people advocate that success is the best way to make their life meaningful.
<TR>However,</TR> I disagree with this view. <TS>I believe that remaining happy and optimistic is more important.</TS> This is because first, happiness and optimistic mind make us having big energy not to give up and second, our final purpose of life is happiness, not success.</IN>
 
<BO1><MI1><TR>To begin with,</TR> people having a mind to remain optimistic are able to make themselves stronger because they have a great power to survive hard situation.</MI1> <SI1>In other words, it is difficult for people who pursuit only success to solve their problems when they meet rough situation. <EX>I have experienced this on many occasions but the most notable example was when I was a university student. I was able to get high grades because I tried to keep optimistic mind when I fail a test. If I had forgave the test, I would not had a good job after graduation.</EX> <TR>Thus,</TR> it is legitimate to say that keeping optimistic and happy when we failed is most important.</SI1></BO1>
 
<BO2><MI2><TR>On top of that,</TR> success is not the most important but many people pursuit success.</MI2> <SI2>This is largely due to the fact that most people in our society try to succeed in every field. To be specific, if we can remain happy and optimistic, success is not necessary. <EX>For instance, according to a study done by the New York Times, it revealed that 90 percent of CEOs agree that people want to succeed in order to be happy. This study shows that success is one of the ways to be happy.</EX> <TR>Therefore,</TR> I firmly believe that if people should remain positive mind with happiness when people fail their work, success is unnecessary.</SI2></BO2>
 
<CO><TR>To sum up,</TR> it is my belief that keeping happy and positive is the most important. As stated, optimistic mind give people great power to solve a difficult problems and second, success is not that important.</CO>
column23: Organized essay. However, grammar mistakes make essay less clear. Pay attention to sentence structure.

column1: 550&government should collect transportation fees.
column3:
<IN>As people using their cars more than ever, there has been increased debate over whether government should collect transportation fee from people. As people using cars more and more, causing environment pollution and heavy traffic jam in a road, making people trap in the road. For these problems, there has been movement that government should regulate the usa of cars and pose a fee from people. <TS>I believe that government should control cars by collecting fees from the drivers who use their own transportation.</TS></IN>
 
 
<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> It can save environment.</MI1> <SI1>Car pollution is a major cause of damage to the environment and it also is a major issue that scientists are dealing with. Emissions from car exhaust contain a toxic substance, a carbon dioxide, which leads to the global warming. When government regulate the use by posing a financil burden to the car users, people will no loger use their indiviual transportation, cars, and start using a public transportaion. The importance of using a public transportation is unquestionable. They accomodate as many people as they can, it can be efficient for both humans and environment.</SI1></BO1>
 
 
 
<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly,</TR> by collecting fees from a transportation, it can relieve traffic jam.</MI2> <SI2>As technology developed, resulting in urbanization, people center in a major city. They live in suburban and go to workplace in the morning, using their own transportation, cars. One of the main concerns in this society is that there are too much cars in a road. It can be hazardous because, when it comes to using cars when people are in emergency, such as police catching criminals, fire fighters putting out the immediate fires and pregnancy woman going to a hosital for giving birth her child, there is no way go through the enormous cars in the road. Posing a fee to regulating the use of cars is essential for that matter.</SI2></BO2>
 
 
<CO>For these reasons, government should make a law, posing economics burden for drivers. That way there will be serious number of decreased amount of air pollutin. <TR>In addition,</TR> they will be able to reduve a traffic jam in the road, making people live more convenient.</CO>
column23: Very good essay with only few grammar mistakes. But there are no concrete examples to support main ideas.

column1: 551&In general, people are living longer now. Discuss the causes of this phenomenon. Use specific reasons and details to develop your essay.
column3:
<IN>One of the changes brought about in 21 century is yhe extended life expectancy, likewise, there's been a lot of accounts and debates as to the cause of this phenomenon. <TS>Some may argue that it's because of the way people live, with more comfortable house and condition,while it's true, I believe more convincing answer can be found in mainly advancement of medication and agriculture.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>To start with,</TR> it's no secret that people long time ago used to get killed by what is considered minor symptom from today's standard such as malaria or food poisoning.</MI1> <SI1>With advent of vaccines and a numerous preventative medications, we now can deal with those once considered to be lethal with ease. <EX>One promising evidence can be seen from the epidemic that was swiping across Europe in Middle Ages, which killed one third of the population. <TR>Also,</TR> it's widely known that the very cause of killing thousands of natives Americans upon Europeans first encounter with them is their lack of immune 
to those diseases brought about by Europeans at that time, which,of course, is treatable easily with a help of development of vaccines.</EX>In our society, we are now heading to the extent where we can cure even cancers and AIDS. More and more people can be saved with our technology of medication, which was never thought of as possible before. <TR>Therefore,</TR> very reason why people live longer is the medication curing various kinds of sickness and diseases.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover,</TR> every countries might have one or more time in their history when a lot of people died of hunger.</MI2> <SI2><EX><TR>For instance,</TR> in early 1950's, there was what is called "tough hill in Korea." from which more than 2 million people died of lack of food. This very phenomenon was caused by failure of that year's crop.</EX>
Seen from this experience, whether or not certain time's harvest failure can put a thousands and millions of people's live in jeopardy was common even until recently. <EX>After the Industrial Revolution, the demand on food skyrocketed like unprecedented rate, thus the competition mounted up. Companies tried to come up with ways to make mass production of crops and meat possible,which, gradually, led to the development of some sorts. With more food available with much faster productivity, more people can be fed, which is the main source of life in the very first place.</EX></SI2></BO2>

<CO>Thanks to all the people who tried hard to invest and invent variety of medication and treatment, equal thanks to all those involved in making mass production of food possible. We now can enjoy not only much healthy life but also longer life on account of these people and the result of their hard work.</CO>
column23: Excellent essay with very few grammar mistakes. Excellent use of specific examples.

column1: 552&Some people prefer to live in a small town. Others prefer to live in a big city. Which place would you prefer to live in? Use specific reasons and details to support your answer.
column3:
<IN><TS>Students learn a lot of knowledge from a huge university in a big city and people work for a company with a reasonable salary.</TS> These pictures are what nowadays we easily watch in a big city  and one of the reasons that I think that living a big city outweigh living in countryside. Of course, someone who are sick and need the rest would rather stay in countryside. <TR>Also</TR> young boys before entering an elementary school have lots of advantages to live in a small town, because they need big and clean place to play and commune with nature while playing and running on the forest in countryside, it will help them have good identity and healthy. As they are growing up, <TR>however,</TR> they need a higher education such as university so they need to move on a big city for attending institute. <TR>Furthermore,</TR> after they graduate the university, they need to get a job. In a big city, there is a plenty of opportunities rather than a small town.</IN>

 <BO1><MI1><TR>In addition,</TR> as people are getting old, they need a big major hospital when they get severe problems on their body, such as a heart-attack which is really dangerous if you can’t go to hospital as soon as it happens.</MI1> <SI1><TR>Therefore,</TR> elderly would rather stay around a big hospital where they can get to in 10 minutes.</SI1></BO1>

<CO>For those reasons, I believe that people have a lot of advantages to live a big city rather than a small town for every age people except young boys.</CO>
column23: Grammar mistakes make essay very incoherent. The thesis statement is unclear and there are no examples to back up essay argument.

column1: 553&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? A teacher's ability to relate well to students is more important than his or her ability to impart knowledge.
column3:
<IN>It is often said that teachers' first priority is to communicate with students well and understand them from their view point. <TS><TR>However,</TR> I firmly believe that the teachers must concentrate on instructing their students effectively rather than getting along with them because of two reasons : to let them be successful in life and to increase their performance in class.</TS></IN>
 
<BO1><MI1><TR>To begin with,</TR> the teachers' capability to teach the students enables them to be successful in life.</MI1> <SI1>This is attributed to the fact that thought by a teacher who has a efficient teaching skill, students get to be able to study in a more effective way. By doing so, they can get good grades in school and end up going into one of the famous universities in nation. <TR>Moreover,</TR> as modern society is becoming increasingly competitive, today's job market requires job candidate with a degree from noted universities. <EX>According to the Ministry of Labor of Korea in 2008, the degree coming from honorable universities was the most important component in hiring practice, taking up more than 70 percent of the final calls. The interviewers significantly considered what university the applicants graduated.</EX> This implies that the teacher's ability to instruct students in a better way has a direct correlation with the students' success in the future.</SI1></BO1>
 
 <BO2><MI2><TR>In addition,</TR> being instructed by a teacher who is competent in teaching, the students will increse their academic performance by themselves.</MI2> <SI2>This is due to the fact that the teachers' competence for teaching is one of the key motivators for students to perform higher and improve themselves. <EX>According to a study conducted by University of California at Los angeles of the United States in 2010, there existed a huge difference bewteen two groups of students in achievement. Students in group A were thought by a teacher who is good at imparting his knowledge to students and those in group B were thought by an uninitiated instructor. The researchers showed that the former group spent more hours studying by 25 percent and performed higher than the latter group. In particular, the students in group A followed instructions, submitted assignments on time, and participated in class discussion. <TR>On the other hand,</TR> those in group B dozed off in class and lacked focus in class materials. This implies that the higher teachers' ability to teach students, the more the student pour in their study.</EX></SI2></BO2>
 
 <CO><TR>In brief,</TR> instructors' ability to give knowledge to students is more important than maintaining a stable relationship with the students by relating well to them. <TR>All in all,</TR> teachers having a capacity to give a impressive lecture, students will get better grades and be successful in the future through increasing their academic performance.</CO>
column23: Well organized ideas. Some grammar mistakes make essay less coherent. Good use of examples.

column1: 554&Teachers should retrain every five years to avoid being behind the times.
column3:
<IN>Lately, whether teachers should retrain or not has been a controversy among people. <TS>In my opinion, I believe that reeducation for teachers give advantages to them and should be necessary, since instructors can obtain the latest information on the subject and renew their minds as a teacher.</TS></IN>
 
             <BO1><MI1><TR>For starters,</TR> educational instructors can replace the out-dated information with the newest information.</MI1> <SI1>When they are at school, they barely have access to the up-to-date information related to the field since they are busy with school related tasks and lectures. <TR>However,</TR> when they are intentionally provided with the opportunity to take a lecture on retraining, they would be able to get those contents.<TR>Moreover,</TR> since teachers of the same major gather up in one place, they can discuss their expertised field, exchanging opinions on it and broaden their views.</SI1></BO1>
 
             <BO2><MI2><TR>Next,</TR> teachers can reform their minds as educational offerers.</MI2> <SI2>After five years becoming instructors, they can forget about the mind that they had when they were new such as resolutions as teachers and this can be rectified by reeducation. During the retraining lecture, not only it provides them with the newest content but also gives education on humanity. They offer teachers how to deal with children and what it is to become a teacher. By attending this lecture, instructors can look back at the times when they desired to become a teacher and help them set their minds.</SI2></BO2>
 
<CO>Though some people dispute that being a retrainee for teachers is useless and time-consuming, the fact that they can update the information on their teaching field and set up their hearts as instructors cannot be ignored. <TR>In conclusion,</TR> I consent to the idea that educational instructors to attend lectures for retrainable purpose is essential.</CO>
column23: Well organized essay. However there are some grammar mistakes and should use specific examples to deliver argument more effectively.

column1: 555&Some famous athletes and entertainers earn millions of dollars every year. Do you think these people deserve such high salaries? Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3:
<IN>Words alone cannot express the extent to which high salaries of some popular athletes and entertainers are not appropriate price for their works. One should not, however, fall prey to the misconception that some of famous athletes and entertainers should earn more less salaries. <TS>In fact, these Famous people have enough qualifications of high salaries and have unceasingly contributed the development of the society as much as they can, since those athletes and entertainers not only show their best, but also make socially positive effects as great models.</TS> There are numerous actual examples that underscore the validity of this statement.</IN> 
        
<BO1><MI1><EX>A great example of famous athlete deserve high salaries by positive external effects can be seen in the life of Michael Jordan.</MI1> <SI1>Jordan has undoubtedly accomplished much, winning 6 NBA championship titles, several MVPs, and numerous scoring titles. So that Jordan earned exorbitant amounts of money. Yet, Jordan experienced a significant setback and failure in his sophomore year of high school. At 5’11,” Jordan was deemed too short by his coach and failed to make the cut for the varsity basketball team. Undeterred by failure, Jordan practiced relentlessly and woke up at 5 a.m. every morning to refine his moves and shoot the ball around with his father. As a result of his persistence and efforts, Jordan made the varsity team the following year. Likewise, Jordan thought people who have failed in front of their dreams or goals and gave them hope of success.</EX> Not only famous basketball star, but also great example of efforts, Michael Jordan deserve his high salaries.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><EX>The touching story of Jeong Hyeyoung and Shen, a married couple, who both are Korean entertainers, specifically actress and singer, also vividly illustrates that some famous entertainers deserve high salaries due to their socially positive contributions.</MI2> <SI2>Even though both these people are famous and succeed entertainers, they have been making numerous donations for children who are in adverse circumstances. As soon as they received CF appearance fee about one hundred million won, they donated all of this money to many poor children. From the first time this couple started donation to now, Shen and Jeong Hyeyoung have given the proceeds to charitable work and the total amounts of money that they donated are over five hundred million won. Likewise, some famous entertainers like this couple made huge donation for the most vulnerable members of the show that some popular entertainers deserve high salaries.</EX></SI2></BO2> 
        
<CO>It is indisputable that conflicts will always arise when some famous athletes or entertainers receive high salaries. In the final analysis, some of athletes and entertainers who not only show their own talents but also contribute to increase positive aspects of the society, such as giving hopes of dream and donations for poor children certainly deserve the high salaries as the examples of Michael Jordan and Shen and Jeong Hyeyoung couple vividly illustrate.</CO>
column23: Good essay. Good structure with a generally, good flow. However, should use more transition phrases to make flow from one paragraph to another and one sentence to another more coherent.

column1: 556&A common expression in English is "Two heads are better than one." In other words, two people can do a better job than one person. Do you agree with this expression? Use specific reasons and details to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>Opinions might be divided over whether team work leads to better results than working alone. People from different walks may take different stance on this contentious issue. <TS><TR>Personally,</TR> I believe that projects with cooperation would be much better than individual's ability, and there are two reasons that could validate my position.</TS></IN>
 
<BO1><MI1><TR>To start off,</TR> working with others helps to make an opportunity to solve the problem which is hard for oneself to handle with.</MI1> <SI1>As society advances, people require more complex and elaborated procedure to take the prestigious stance. In this sense, various talents are needed to apply each part of the project. To illustrate, when I was a student in the college, there was a chance to take part in the presentation competition. <EX>Actually, I was an introvert; it did not make sense to win the presentation by myself. <TR>However,</TR> I had scouted few talented students among my classmates for winning the presentation. With cooperation with my team members, we finally won the presentation. If I had participated in the competition by myself, this result would have not had been presented. <TR>Consequently,</TR> it is very important to utilize other people's talent which I have not for achieving the goal.</EX></SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>On top of that,</TR> cooperation makes people save their time and physical activities.</MI2> <SI2>By working together for the work, it would be divided to tiny piece of work compared to whole work. This helps people not to be stressed out of their work and have time to have more attention to the details of the work. <EX>The study conducted by the University of California revealed that working with others has much economic effects than working alone. According to the study, self-employed individuals have 10% low income than working with other people.</EX> This is because working together makes people be more efficient and economic person.</SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> not only does team work save time and energy, but also increases the possibility to solve the problem. <TR>Therefore,</TR> I firmly believe that it is much better to work with others than work alone.</CO>
column23: Generally organized with good use of examples. However, grammar mistakes make essay less coherent.

column1: 557&Spending time with family is more important than being at work.
column3:
<IN>There has been a debate over whether spending time with family is more important than being at work. <TS>I agree that family should be a main concern for people for the two reasons.</TS><TR>First,</TR> family members can even advise about your problems. <TR>Second,</TR> people can stay in mental shape better by spending time with their family.</IN>
 
<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> people can get useful advices from family members.</TR></MI1> <SI1>In general, family members more know each other than any others. <TR>Therefore,</TR> when people have difficult time in solving a problem like dealing with friends relationship, Valuable advices are available to them by discussing the problem with family. <EX>Let me take my cousin for an example. When he was a first time to work at a company, he had demanding time in keeping good relationships with his co-workers. At first, he tried to solve the problem by consulting with other senior workers. <TR>However,</TR> actually, it was his father that gave him very useful advices to him. Finally, my cousin told first to co-workers with friendly smile and everything started to change.</EX> For this regard, family members can give invaluable advices to other family members.</SI1></BO1>
 
<BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR> family helps people to keep in shape mentally.</MI2> <SI2>These days, working is harder than ever because workers are supposed to face ever busier lives in and out of company. <TR>Therefore,</TR> maintaining health is more important after all the works in a day. Spending time with family can be a good method to relieve their stress and refresh their brain. <EX>In Korea statistics department, a study shows that more time people spend with their family, healthier people are than ever. The study also states that time with family members plays a key role in relieving their stress and keeping their mental health.</EX></SI2></BO2>
 
<CO>I strongly agree that family is more important than work for the two reasons that I have mentioned above. <TR>First,</TR> valuable advices can be available from family members. <TR>Second.</TR> Spending time with family members can help people to keep in shape mentally.</CO>
column23: Generally organized with good use of examples. However, grammar mistakes make essay less clear.

column1: 558&Some people trust their first impressions about a person’s character because they believe these judgments are generally correct. Other people do not judge a person’s character quickly because they believe first impressions are often wrong. Compare these two attitudes. Which attitude do you agree with? Support your choice with specific examples.
column3:
<IN>Many people tend to make judgments on one's character based on their first impression. This is a big mistake, though; evaluation on people's characters need to be done throughout time. <TS>This is because first impressions are based on how the people look on the outside only, and may not reveal their true personalities.</TS></IN> 

     <BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> making quick decisions on one's characteristics according to his or her look is highly likely to be erroneous.</MI1> <SI1>We have to take time and observe others to make our mind on what kinds of people they are, as they may be different from what they seem to be. <EX>For example, I have a friend who looks pretty gloom on the outside. At first, I assumed  that she must be very quiet and calm. <TR>However,</TR> in the three years I have known her, talking and seeing her, I have found out that she is one talkative, and even rather hyper, girl.</EX></SI1></BO1> 

     <BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly,</TR> first impressions mostly do not reveal one's real characteristics.</MI2> <SI2>For one thing, first impressions vary depending on people's moods, and it may lead you to make a wrong judgment. A person could be depressed at the particular time you first encountered him, even though he is a very bright in general occasions. <TR>Moreover,</TR> there are people who are not very skilled at expressing them. <EX>Fitzwilliam Darcy of Jane Austen's classing Pride and Prejudice demonstrates this well. He seems to be cold and bitter, leading Elizabeth Bennet and numerous others to think that he is an icy man, while he is, in fact, a benevolent and caring person.</EX></SI2></BO2>

      <CO>Judgments made on people's personalities on their superficial attributes are not right, in many cases. <TR>Also,</TR> the expression on their faces may not be exposing their veracious characters, as it can vary according to how they are feeling. Due to these reasons, evaluation on people's characters should not be made based solely on their first impressions.</CO>
column23: Good essay and well organized. Pay attention to grammar mistakes.

column1: 559&Professional athletes do not deserve to the high salaries that they are paid.
column3:
<IN>In today's globalized society, it is widely believed that athletes do not deserve to the high salaries. Some people advocate that most athletes do not make an effort as their high salaries. <TR>However,</TR> I disagree with this view. <TS>I firmly believe that it is reasonable for professional athletes to get high pay.</TS> This is because first, they always spend a lot of time to practice for their great game and second, they can make a profit for their sponsor.</IN>
 
<BO1><MI1><TR>To begin with,</TR> professional players make an effort for nice games much more than general people expect.</MI1> <SI1>In other words, they train for a long time only for games being played for a short time. This is largely due to the fact that winning games is the most important fact for them. <EX>I have experienced this on many occasions but the most notable example was when I had a chance to interview as a jobseeker. I spend a lot of time and effort to prepare to the interview, because I knew that training for a long time is valuable for my interview. I had not trained enough, I would not be a worker.</EX> <TR>Thus,</TR> it is legitimate to say that professional athletes deserve to the high pay as their effect are much bigger than we expect.</SI1></BO1>
 
<BO2><MI2><TR>On top of that,</TR> the athletic players are able to make a big profit to their supporters.</MI2> <SI2><TR>To be specific,</TR> if they make a great game, the watching rate will be continuously increasing so that the profit from the marketing also will be bigger. <EX><TR>For instance,</TR> according to the study done by the New York Times, it revealed that 90 percent of CEOs recognizes the effect of sport marketing. This is because audiences are known the company's products in the banners. This shows that it is very reasonable for athletes to get high pay.</EX></SI2></BO2>
 
<CO><TR>To sum,</TR> it is my belief that professional athletes should get big money. As stated, athletes can make an effort as the value of the high salaries and second, they give their company a enough profit.</CO>
column23: Generally organized and good flow. Pay attention to grammar.

column1: 560&The second reading of a book is more interesting than the first reading.
column3:
<IN>An intriguing topic of discussion at hand is whether or not the second reading of a book is more interesting than the first reading. The answer to this question can greatly vary depending on the individual perspectives. <TS><TR>Thus,</TR> the jury may still be out, but as far as I am concerned, I firmly believe that the first reading of a book and reading various books is more interesting and advantageous.</TS> In this essay, I will present two reasons supporting my standpoint as follows. <TR>First,</TR> it allows one to broaden view of life. <TR>Second,</TR> the second reading of a book is not good for one’s health.</IN>

 

           <BO1><MI1><TR>To begin with,</TR> the first reading of a book and reading various books enables one to widen view of life.</MI1> <SI1>This is attributed to the fact that reading a lot of books at first time will expose one to different worlds of life styles, basic customs, and cultures from various contexts of books, and he or she can be familiarized with and embrace other cultures and people. Thus, one can make different friends with different backgrounds, which helps one to reduce prejudice and be open-minded toward strangers. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> there had been a study conducted by the Seoul National University in Korea. The researchers surveyed a thousand people to see if reading books just first time is good for readers. Of all, 78.1 percent of them stated that it is effective for them because they can read lots of books without the second reading and gain various experience indirectly, leading to broaden their perspectives. For this reason, the Seoul National University in Korea recommends their students to read books first time and various books.</EX><TR>Therefore,</TR> the first reading is more interesting than the second reading of a book as it helps readers to widen view of their life.</SI1></BO1>

 

           <BO2><MI2><TR>In addition,</TR> the second reading of a book is detrimental to one’s health.</MI2> <SI2>This is due to the fact that readers become stressed out when trying to understand the contents of books, and stress is one of the main factors of diseases through weakening the immune system. <TR>Thus,</TR> readers are likely to be weaker when dealing with the challenges. <EX>According to an article, Alex Kim, the Sociology Professor claimed: “People do not need to read books at several times in order to understand the contents of books. This is because as they have to try to understand the whole meaning of connection of sentences, words, and paragraphs in books in order to understand entire contents of books, it is likely that readers become stressed out. <TR>However,</TR> reading books is for being happy, obtaining information, and making one’s mental health good. For this reason, people have to avoid reading books at several times.” <TR>Thus,</TR> the second reading of a book is not effective for people since they easily become stressed out when dealing with difficulties.</EX></SI2></BO2>

 

           <CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR>I strongly argue for my standpoint on account of the two reasons mentioned above. Once again, although the verdict may still be out, I personally believe that two of my rationales are sufficiently convincing enough to represent the viewpoint of a majority of people who are in favor of my claim.</CO>
column23: Generally organized and good flow. Pay attention to grammar to make essay clearer.

column1: 561&Spending time with family is more important than being at work.
column3:
<IN>I have seen many people who only work for their success asding from their family. Although they can do better in their work in a short-period aspect, it seems that it does not long last. On the other hand, I saw a lot of people who achieved the goal whose family is also happy and encouraging. <TS>Therefore, I agree with the statement that speding time with family is more important, and I suppot my opinion for two reasons.</TS> First, since family members tend to care each other, it improves the ability of working. Plus, spending time with family, especially with their children makes a child grow healthier.</IN>
 
     <BO1><MI1><TR>To begin with,</TR> family members used to encourage each other, and this makes themselves work more better.</MI1> <SI1>The relationship between the work and the home is different. The relationship in the work is more or less official and cool-blooded. People in the work only work for their success and they compete with each other. <TR>Moreover,</TR> this relationship often hurts others heart. <TR>On the other hand,</TR> the relationship in the home is coorperative and encouraging. One family member cures and cares for other member in the family who got hurt from his or her work. <TR>As a result,</TR> this enhance one's ability to work better in the job. <EX>One statistic has shown that people who spend more time with their family were promoted to high rank approxmately about 35% more. <TR>However,</TR> people who do not have little possibility to be promoted having posibility of 5%. This report shows how important making good realtionship with family is.</EX></SI1></BO1>
 
     <BO2><MI2><TR>On top of that,</TR> spending time with family help their children grow healthier.</MI2> <SI2>These days, there are tons of children who do not spend their time with their parents, because their both parents are too busy working to care for them. Their parents have no choice but to send them to the children care center. But this brings about serious problems to children. <EX>I have read a newspaper article which states that children whose parents spend most of their time with them are more likely to grow healthier in terms of mental statement. But others who do not are often at odds with their friedns and family, and even show violent tendency in a school.</EX> <TR>Thus,</TR> spending time with family - especially children - is important.</SI2></BO2>
 
     <CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> spending time with family is beneficial in two ways. <TR>First,</TR> family help each other improve the ability of work, because they encourage and care for each one's heart. <TR>Second,</TR> spending time with family, especially children is important for children's growth. For thease reasons, I support the idea which states that spending time with family is more important than in the work.</CO>
column23: Good essay and well organized. Pay attention to grammar mistakes.

column1: 562&How do movies or television influence people’s behavior? Use reasons and specific examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN><TS>I believe that movies or television can make people have bad behavior.</TS> Everyone knows and they call it “stupid box.” Let’s have look at why it is.</IN>
 
<BO1><MI1>People used to read books a lot before the media was invented, reading a book is the only way to learn and contact new knowledge, <TR>however,</TR> nowadays television has taken place and give people news and make them image near future and so on.</MI1>
<SI1>Of course, movies and television offer lots of information, yet I believe that is not much useful and well-organized than books. Virtually, they usually show dangerous and sexual things which could attract people’s attention well. So people don’t get useful information that they want to know, but they are just exposed to the waste information from those media.
<EX><TR>In addition,</TR> on research I read about before, the media drops children’s concentration. It said that the children who watch TV over 4 hours a day had result in bad score on test than others who rarely watch TV. Watching TV and movies, we could also lose our concentration during studying, working and whatever you need to focus on.</EX></SI1></BO1>
 
<BO2><MI2>Another reason is that people are sometimes addicted to watching movies or television.</MI2> <SI2>The person who is addicted to the media tends to think only about it. Even though they have heavy task that they have to do, they occasionally skip it while focusing on what they watch. They could lose their job if he is a worker or failed exam if she is a student.</SI2></BO2>
 
<CO>As you can see, watching movies or television can bring serious problem of people’s behavior. <TR>Therefore,</TR> I personally think that people would rather read books or do exercise than watching movie or television on the couch for several hours.</CO>
column23: Thesis statement is simple but clear. However, the overall essay is not very coherent because of grammar mistakes.

column1: 563&One of the best ways that parents help their children prepare for an adult life is to encourage them to do a part-time job.
column3:
<IN>It has been to debate whether one of the best ways that parents help their children prepare for an adult life is to encourage them to do a part-time job. <TS>I agree that children should do a part-time job for their better adult lives for the two reasons.</TS> <TR>First,</TR>experiences from a part-time job help children learn ability to solve difficult problems. <TR>Second,</TR> children can learn economic system of our society more easily by working as a part-time job.</IN>
 
<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> children can learn various situations while doing a part-time job and those experiences definitely helps children have chance to ability to learn how to overcome difficult problems that might happen to them.</MI1> <SI1>In general, children's experience is limited to small area due to parents' worries. Some kids only go to after-school classes including art and music classes after all the academic classes in school. <TR>Therefore,</TR> Every time they face weird or difficult situations, they always call their parents because they don't have any experience about the problem. <EX>Let me take an example in my middle school student. At that time, I always focused on my study and don't have any experience about anything. My parents worried about that and motivate me to work as a part-time job for your diverse experiences. <TR>Therefore,</TR> I started to work as a part-time job in fast-food store nearby my house. Of course, it was my first time to see various and demanding situations that I have ever had. <TR>However,</TR> when I had a difficult situation that a customer complains that he did not get any ordered food, I recognized that I am more confident than ever because I told him very easily and kindly about the situation that our fast-food store had some problems about preparing his food.</EX></SI1></BO1>

 
<BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR> doing a part-time job helps children learn economic environment of our society because doing a work give them certain money.</MI2> <SI2>These days, using a money smartly is very important than any previous societies. This is because people in our society are supposed to always face increasing prices of necessities without their salary. <TR>Therefore,</TR> it is ever more important for children to learn how to cope with their money for their better adult lives. Of course, parents can give children some money and require them to save or organize the money. <TR>However,</TR> children cannot feel necessities to save money because they think that it is easy to get the money that their parents give them. <EX>According to the Korean statistic department, a study shows that more experience about doing part-time jobs children have, higher chance to learn ability to learn economic systems of our society children have. The study also states that doing part-time jobs plays a key role in children’s better monetary lives.</EX></SI2></BO2>
 

 
<CO>I strongly agree that doing part-time jobs is very important for children to enjoy healthier adult lives for the two reasons. <TR>First,</TR> ability to learn how to deal with difficult situation is nurtured by doing a part-time work. <TR>Second,</TR> economic environment are easily learned by earning money through part-time job.</CO>
column23: Organized and makes some good points. However, there are many grammar mistakes.

column1: 564&companies should be allowed to directly advertise to children under the age of five.
column3:
<IN>An ongoing debate exists over whether companies should be allowed to directly advertise to children under the age of five. Some people believe that young children also have right to choose what they want so that an advertisement aiming children is proper method. <TS>I, <TR>however,</TR> aganist that children can not make a judgement over exaggerated advertisement.</TS> This is largely because children cannot diffrentiate between real and fiction. Moreover, they can be placed in dangerous situation consuming unsafty products.</IN>  
 
  <BO1><MI1><TR>To begin with,</TR> It is widely accepted that children under the age of five have not yet develop their abilty to judge advertisement whether it is true or not.</MI1> <SI1>When they watch the tv advertisement, they often fascinated by their marvelous and entertaing contents which are actually incredible and exaggerated things. They can not differenciate between truth and false. They accept everything they watch whitout filtering the fact. <EX>According to a study conducted by a team of researcher at Korea university, when they showed two videoclips,one is real situation while the other is fairly imaginary situation, more than 90% children under the age of five could not distinguish between reality and imaginary situation. <TR>Therefore</TR> they are too young to find out what is hidden behind the advertisements.</EX></SI1></BO1>
 
  <BO2><MI2><TR>Furthermore,</TR> there is no gurantee about the materials in ads whether it is safe or not.</MI2> <SI2>Especially, snacks and food can be a serious harm to children. <EX>Few years ago, news reported that a five year-old children died because of jelly blocking his throat which was popular among children. Moreover, toys also can be a dangerous to children. There are a lot of toys advertised in tv or radio. However, most are not been tested on their safty level so it can hurt children and even drive them to death.</EX> <TR>Therefore</TR> companies  should announce about their products' riskiness on advertisements.</SI2></BO2>
 
<CO><TR>To summarize,</TR> i contend that the regulation shold be required on advertisements aimed children. The reason is that young children have not been formed a sense of judgement. <TR>Moreover,</TR> the products on ads have possibility of danger. <TR>Therefore,</TR> I think that advertisements directly aimd children should be baned</CO>
column23: Organized essay with a clear structure. However, grammar mistakes make essay not very clear.

column1: 565&people who do not accept criticism cannot be successful at working in a group.
column3:
<IN>An ongoing debate exists over whether people who do not accept criticism cannot be successful at working in a group. Some people believe that a person can conduct tasks successively with his or her own ability. <TS>My view, <TR>however,</TR> is that it is important for people to listen to advice offered by someone else.</TS> This is largely because people can learn many sources needed for group work by communicating with whom have diverse experiences. <TR>Furthermore,</TR> rejecting team members’ suggestion can be a main cause of conflict among the team.</IN>
 
<BO1><MI1><TR>To begin with,</TR> people can improve ability doing their tasks by accepting the criticism from others.</MI1> <SI1>It is no secret that we can get so many valuable advices by asking or accepting group members’ advice. This is because there would be so many people who have more developed skills at their field. <EX>For example, when I was freshman, I had to perform a group project in a major class with seniors and they were more knowledgeable about my major. <TR>Hence</TR> when I had trouble with my work, I usually asked them to help me, so I finally finished my part more easily. Had it not been for their help, I would have done my work poorly.</EX> <TR>Therefore</TR> we can perform our work more effectively by keeping advices in mind.</SI1></BO1>
 
<BO2><MI2><TR>Furthermore,</TR> conflict can occur among team members if they don’t consider each others’ opinion.</MI2> <SI2>In general, group project cannot succeed without consensus between members. <TR>On the contrary,</TR> teams which interact and share their ideas without conflict have more possibility to succeed in a group work. <EX>A survey reported in Korea Times, more than 80% participants replied that it is important to make harmonious atmosphere within a team because conflict can destroy teamwork and finally fail to perform their work successively.</EX></SI2></BO2>
 
<CO><TR>To summarize,</TR> I strongly believe that accepting criticism can be a great source of success in a group work. This is because people can learn valuable lessons and improve their ability. <TR>Moreover,</TR> without conflict among team members, the group work will be performed more productively. As far as individual’s success in a group work, it is important for them to open to others’ criticism.</CO>
column23: Overall an organized and coherent essay. Pay attention to grammar.

column1: 566&Some people prefer to live in a small town. Others prefer to live in a big city. Which place would you prefer to live in? Use specific reasons and details to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>Some people like to live in a small town whereas others prefer to live in a big city. It might depend on their characteristics, or personalities, but it is clear that both of them have advantages, and disadvantages as well. In my case, I experienced lives, both of them, living in a small town and big city. <TS>I think that living in a big city has more advantages than a small town.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First,</TR> in a big city, we have more opportunities to be educated than a small town.</MI1> <SI1>If I have something that I want to learn, I can easily contact with a teacher and make some study groups with people who have similar educational goal to me. <EX>When I lived in Changwon, a small town, located in South Korea, I needed to find some educational institutes where I could learn English, for TOEFL. <TR>However,</TR> there was no institute in my town, so I had to go to Seoul, a capital city of South Korea, spending a lot of money for lending house and tuition. I could not help going to the big city, Seoul, to achieve my dream for studying in the US. It was hard time for me to study in a strange place. If I had lived in a big city, I would not have had difficulties in studying English. To tell the truth, at that time, I envied students who lived in Seoul.</EX></SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly,</TR> with the help of public transportation, we can access any place in a big city.</MI2> <SI2>Now I live in Busan, the 1st port city in my country. I do have a driving license, but I am a student who does not make money, so it is impossible to purchase a car and, needless to say, maintain it. <TR>Therefore,</TR> I cannot help using the public transporting system. It is bus and subway that enable me to commute, go out with my girl friend, and travel to most places in my city. Sometimes we can enjoy ‘City Bus Tour’, which is the program my city sponsors for the citizen and visitors. I have hobby of taking pictures with my camera, so I can go outside riding the bus and take some pictures, landscape of seashore. This accessible public transportation makes me not only save my money, but also give some leisure time in the weekend, making me feel happy.</SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> a big city life meets my requirements to live more convenient life in all account regarding the opportunity of education, and saving my money with using public transportation. <TR>Therefore,</TR> I prefer to live in a big city rather than a small town.</CO>
column23: Good essay with some grammar mistakes. Try to use more concrete examples.

column1: 567&If people cannot say anything nice to someone, it is better not to say anything at all.
column3:
<IN>In today's globalized society, it is widely believed that it is better to say nothing than to say bad things. Some people advocate that saying nothing could maintain the relationship easily. However, I disagree with this view. <TS>I firmly believe that saying nothing is worse than saying anything bad to someone. This is because <TR>first,</TR> giving someone bad things could be an advice and second, saying nothing makes your social relationship worse.</TS></IN>
 
           <BO1><MI1><TR>To begin with,</TR> people usually learn from advices of other people.</MI1> <SI1><TR>In other words,</TR> words that people cannot give nice to someone could be a good advice to help their future. This is largely due to the fact that people realize their bad side when other people notice them. <EX><TR>For instance,</TR> according to a study done by the New York Times, it revealed that 90 percent of CEOs like to hear their fault from others. This is because they think that it is a chance to enhance their character. Thus, it is legitimate to say that saying bad thing to someone is finally good for the listener.</EX></SI1></BO1>
 
           <BO2><MI2><TR>On top of that,</TR> if people do not talk a lot each other, it is difficult for them to be close.</MI2>
<SI2><TR>To be specific,</TR> the best way you can be close with someone is talking a lot even though it is not about good things. <EX>I have experienced this on many occasions but the most notable example was when I was a middle school student. I did not have a lot of friends because I did not talk a lot with my classmates. If I had talked more with my friends, I would have a lot of friends.</EX> <TR>Therefore,</TR> this shows that talking a lot about any subjects is helpful to keep your relationship nice.</SI2></BO2>
 
           <CO><TR>To sum up,</TR> it is my belief that even though people cannot say anything good to someone, it is better to say that. As stated, it is helpful for the listener and second, your social relationship be enhanced.</CO>
column23: Good essay with some grammar mistakes. Try to use more concrete examples.

column1: 568&Famous athletes and entertainers deserve the multimillion-dollar salaries they earn
column3:
<IN>Some people say it is unfair for athletes and entertainers earn millions dollars because of just being famous. <TS><TR>However,</TR>in my opinion, they deserve to get a lot of money.</TS> I think it cannot be controversial to talk about how much they earn considering their endeavor for success and influence on people.</IN>

           <BO1><MI1><TR>To begin with,</TR> athletes and entertainers have been really trying to be the best in their field. In order to success, they should be ready to start their career when they are so young.</MI1> <SI1>It is too tough to be famous and acknowledged among their rivals. <TR>Therefore</TR> they have no choice but they keep trying to develop their abilities and skills. <EX>According to recent survey by BBC, only one tenth who chose to be football player when they were kids makes pro contracts in their field. <TR>However,</TR> among them, only a few soccer players can be famous and win championships. When it comes to entertainment markets, singers who have a large sum of fans and earn lots of money had overcome unimaginably harsh competition since they are too young to get through so many hardships. Rome had not built one day.</EX> We should know and understand how they do their best to become successful.</SI1></BO1>

           <BO2><MI2><TR>On top of that,</TR> advertisement agencies, sports equipment companies and so many people related to successful entertainers and sports players can earn a large amount of money because of them.</MI2> <SI2>They have an incredible influence on normal people who are willing to buy some products that they advertise. <EX><TR>For instances,</TR> Adidas which sells sports equipment support a number of sports player from different sports such as soccer, tennis with trillion dollars a year. Because that company also collects more money than the amount of money they are investing.</EX> Sports industry is so a huge market that companies involved it cannot fail to make much money. <TR>In addition,</TR> products advertised by celebrities are being bought by many people, which mean that famous people allow many companies to sell their goods effectively.</SI2></BO2>

          <CO><TR>To sum up,</TR> famous entertainers and athletes are not ones who use only their popularities to earn lots of money. They have done their best to make successful achievements in their careers and let other people concerned with them get rich. <TR>Therefore,</TR> it is evident that they deserve to become millionaire.</CO>
column23: Good essay with some grammar mistakes. Good use of examples.

column1: 569&Some people like to do adventurous and difficult jobs at their work or school while others prefer to do easy work.
column3:
<IN>There are two options that you can make at work or school. Either to handle a work which is difficult or that is easy to finish. <TS>Many would choose the latter one, however, I would choose the former option.</TS> When I manage the work which is adventurous and requires large amount of endeavor, the work can make development in my skills. <TR>Moreover, when I finish hard works,</TR> I would be able to feel better fulfillment.</IN>
 
             <BO1><MI1><TR>For starters,</TR> when I take part in difficult tasks, I would be able to learn tasks, resulting in advancement.</MI1> <SI1>At first, I would regret taking the hard work and feel stressed about it. <TR>However,</TR> as I take step one by one in order to complete it, I would learn variety of advanced methods and skills. The moment I accomplish it, I would not be the one that I used to be before handling the work. In addition, when taking part in other projects, those works would be handed in easily since I know how to deal with those difficult works since I already have experience.</SI1></BO1>
 
             <BO2><MI2><TR>Next,</TR> when finishing the venturous work, I would be able to sense high achievement which I have never felt before.</MI2> <SI2>Doing a task which everybody can handle easily will make me ordinary and would not give a big impression. <TR>On the other hand,</TR> when finishing an extraordinary project, which others are reluctant to take part in, the attainment which I feel would be bigger than the previous situation, since I would feel myself special, gaining self-confidence.</SI2></BO2>
 
             <CO>Simple work can be done easily with less time spending on it. <TR>However,</TR> hard works will give you much enhancement in work skills and the sense of achievement to yourself. <TR>In conclusion,</TR> I can clearly say that it is more worthy to deal with risky and difficult jobs or works.</CO>
column23: Overall an organized essay. However, thesis should made clearer and more concrete examples should be inclucded in essay.

column1: 570&Because environmental issues are complex, individuals cannot do nothing about them on their own.
column3:
<IN>An ongoing debate exists whether individuals cannot do anything helpful to environment because environment matters feature entangled. <TS>Regarding this controversial issue, I strongly support that individuals have many works to do for keep our environment clean, even though environmental issues are very complicated.</TS> The reasoning behind this is that if individual acts threatening doing less, it will help to be curative for environment. Additionally, individual can make novel ideas to solve the environment problems.</IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>To begin with,</TR> individual can put the effort by doing harmful habits less in order to keep environment clean.</MI1> <SI1>Some people may argue that it is futile to strive to change our life style to harm our nature until all people are engaged in the environmental movement.
