Although such an argument seems true, I believe the accumulation of individual's efforts contributes the start to resolve this huge problem so individual also plays a significant role in approving nature circumstances. <EX>For my own experience, last year, there was an environmental campaign in Korea insisting that individual reduce using cars in order to prevent from increasing air pollution. People think it would fail because one person's effect would be not enough to deal with huge problem. Surprisingly, the air condition has been getting better because individual participated in the campaign, leaving car at home and using public transfortation. As this case shows, it would not reasonable to argue that individuals can not do anything for environment.</EX></SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Furthermore,</TR> individual can create the original resolution to make up for the shortage of environment conservation.</MI2> <SI2>The number of people who are interested in environmental issue and act along the eco-friendly way to live. The worthy noticing is that ideas  that each individual comes up with and his execution are so effective. <EX><TR>To take example,</TR> according to the report released by International Nature Reserve, the prominent expert states that the closest key to solve the city pollution is individual's planting tree on each building roof, so to speak, 'Living Garden'. It will be beneficial to both people who want to more park areas even in the city and environment which needs more trees for distilling air. In this way, individual's creative thinking is conductive to do good for environment.</EX></SI2></BO2> 

<CO><TR>In a nutshell,</TR> I have no doubt that individual plays a significant role in helping environment to keep healthy. This is because one person's trial to reduce the harmful behavior leads good results. <TR>Additionally,</TR> individual can take a measure what nature need with his or her bright ideas. <TR>All in all,</TR> the influence of individual's role should not be overlooked especially when it comes to entangled environmental issue.</CO>
column23: Overall an organized essay. Pay attention to grammar.

column1: 571& Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Spending money on something that lasts for a long time, such as an expensive piece of jewelry, is better than spending money on a short-term pleasure, such as a vacation. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>I disagree with the opinion that spending money on what lasts for a lont time is better than spending money on short and frequent pleasure. Many people likes spending their money on long-lasting things such as jewelry despite the price of those things. <TS><TR>However,</TR> feeling a low degree of pleasure more frequently has a positive effect on people's lives in several ways.</TS></IN>

 <BO1><MI1><TR>To begin with,</TR> spending money on something that last for a short time enables people to live a happy life.</MI1> <SI1>This is attributed to the fact that through spendning money on such things, people can feel more pleasure, satisfying themselves. Moreover, those satisfactory lives is one of the main factors in people's lives to make them feel they are living a happy life. <EX>According to a study conducted by Seoul National University of Korea in 2009, there was a huge difference between two groups of students in happiness index. Students in group A were allowed to spend their money freely anytime they want to. Those in group B were required to spend money on very expensive things that they really want to purchase. The researchers showed that the level of happiness in group A was much higher than that of group B. Moreover, more than 30 percent of the students in group B underwent mild depression. They had to worry about to save money in order to buy long-lasting but expensive things and sometimes they cannot spend their money for this reason. This implies that using money for a short-term pleasure can contribute to people's happiness.</EX></SI1></BO1>

 <BO2><MI2><TR>In addition,</TR> spending money on a long-lasting things end up making them get stressed out.</MI2> <SI2>This is due to the fact that people have to get worried about several possible problems such as losing them, and taking care of them often. These kinds of thoughts cannot allows people to live a stress-free life. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> Jun Kim, one of my university friends, really wanted to buy scooter which is made in Japan and it has a high quallity even if it is a quite expensive one. For him to get this, he took a year off and worked part time job to save money. After a year, he finally bought the japanese scooter and feel really satisfied with it. <TR>However,</TR> one day, he had lost it in dormitory parking lot. He could not be able to find the suspect.</EX> Although the experience of my friends is not regular and usual and it is something that takes place unfrequently, that happening can occur in anyone at anytime, making their lives terribly. This implies that spending money for a long-term pleasure can be a reason people feel some stress level.</SI2></BO2>

 <CO><TR>In brief,</TR> people are able to be more satisfied with their lives by spending money on a short-term pleassure. <TR>All in all,</TR> the importance of such small and short-term pleasure cannot be underestimated to live a happy life, not feeling a bit of stress.</CO>
column23: Generally an organized essay. Pay attention to grammar to make overall essay more coherent.

column1: 572&People should not be allowed to use mobile (cell) phones when they use public transportation (e.g. buses, trains, and airplanes).
column3:
<IN>An intriguing topic of discussion at hand is whether or not people should not be allowed to use mobile phones when they use public transportation. The answer to this question can greatly vary depending on the individual perspectives. <TS>Thus, the jury may still be out, but as far as I am concerned, I firmly believe that employing cell phones in transportation is useful.</TS> In this essay, I will present two reasons supporting my standpoint as follows. <TR>First,</TR> it helps one to relieve stress. <TR>Second,</TR> it improves work efficiency.</IN>

 

           <BO1><MI1><TR>To begin with,</TR> using mobile phones when people use public transportation can significantly reduce their stress level.</MI1> <SI1>This is attributed to the fact that when people have problems about loud noise from others, playing game by cell phones distract them from worries and stress. This simple and quick escape from stress may actually serve as a safety valve to let off some steam as well as a fun way to recharge energy. <EX>For example, there had been a study conducted by the Seoul National University in Korea. The researchers surveyed a thousand people to see if using mobile phones in subway is effective. Of all, 78.1 percent of them stated that it is advantageous for them to deal with stress. When they use public transportation, they are usually irritated by loud noise from others. <TR>However,</TR> they can effectively handle their stress by playing game, surfing the Internet, and chatting with their friends by their mobile phones.</EX> For this reason, utilizing cell phones in transportation is advantageous for people as they can relieve their stress.</SI1></BO1>

 

                             <CO><TR>In addition,</TR> using cellphones in public transportation enhances work efficiency. This is due to the fact that most of businesspeople often spend time out of their offices. Thus, employing their cell phones in public places helps them to get in touch with their co-workers, search useful information, and communicating with expertise whenever they need. <EX>According to an article, Alex Kim, the Sociology Professor at Harvard University in America claimed: “using mobile phones is useful for modern businesspeople to improve work efficiency. This is because as our society is becoming more and more competitive and fast-changing, they have to meet diverse expertise, visit other offices, and meet their clients individually, leading to use public transportation to meet other people and visit other offices.</EX> For this reason, using mobile phones is helpful for them to work in moving.”</CO>  

 

           In conclusion, I strongly argue for my standpoint on account of the two reasons mentioned above. Once again, although the verdict may still be out, I personally believe that two of my rationales are sufficiently convincing enough to represent the viewpoint of a majority of people who are in favor of my claim.
column23: Overall an organized essay with some grammar mistakes. Do not repeat the same sentence too frequently.

column1: 573&Some people think that they can learn better by themselves than with a teacher. Others think that it is always better to have a teacher. Which do you prefer? Use specific reasons to develop your essay.
column3:
<IN>In old korean saying"Do not dare to step even in the shadow of teachers." This short line implies a lot about how important education is and how meaningful teachers are to us. These days, there has been a lot of awareness as to homeschooling due to some of the problems associated with traditional methods. 
Moreover, substantial number of students are apt for studying by themselves. <TS>While it has its own reasons and logic, I believe it's still the best when we study with teachers.</TS></IN> 

<BO1><MI1><TR>First,</TR> teachers are professional.</MI1> <SI1>And the title of professional isn't acquired over night. They must have put in a lot of hours and sweat before they reached at the point where they can educate somebody. 
From university years to graduation, graduation to specialized training courses, and training courses to application to real setting. The amount of efforts and time can never be underestimated. The  accumulation of knowledge on the subject of their major,teaching methods,and ability of engaging students in the classroom conducts can provide students with not only efficiency in their learning but also practicality as well. Why? In case students students study by themselves, all the experience and knowledge of teachers, which can save a lot time of students and offer guideline resulting from experience, pretty much have to be dealt with by oneself. Imagine how unpractical and time-consuming that will be.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly,</TR> by having interaction with teachers, students can have such a sense of role model.</MI2> <SI2>Teachers are not only experienced in teaching and education but also in life in general as well. In my opinion, this can be highly indispensable for enrichment of one's life. One say life is full of unexpectedness, and being prepared for it is the best way to prevent ourselves from predicaments. <TR>However,</TR> those wisdom which can guide and drive to preparation can never be taught in the text books, nor can they be found in any studying materials. Only the ones who can provide that are those who have been that path already. 
Considering relationship with teachers can be different from that of parents, in my opinion, we need to have someone to hold on to and get advised from. And there's always a room that can't be fulfilled by parents. <TR>Thus,</TR> combination of roles of both parents and teacher in that sense can be the best setting one can ever have.</SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>All in all,</TR> teachers are not only imperative for students's development of education, but are they also a choice of must for mental aspect of students. <TR>Thus,</TR> the question of whether or not we can study by ourselves effectively, I believe, is mere shortsighted conclusion without deeper understanding of core reason of their being.</CO>
column23: Very good essay with only few grammar mistakes. But there are no concrete examples to support main ideas.

column1: 574&People should sometimes do things that they do not enjoy doing.
column3:
<IN>It has been a debate whether people should sometimes do things that they do not enjoy doing. <TS>I agree that it is better for people to do things that they don't want to enjoy for the two reasons.</TS> <TR>First,</TR> people can sustain their lives better as regards of works not enjoyable. <TR>Second,</TR> people keep good relationship with their friends by helping difficult and demanding problems together.</IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First,</TR> people need to do work that is not enjoyable for money.</MI1> <SI1>In general, many people have said that following your dream make you earn money finally. <TR>However,</TR> these days, it is even impossible for people to spend numerous time finding dream. This is because that people are always supposed to make money due to difficult monetary situation. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> college students are under the situation that, after graduation, they should have to pay back their college fee by earning money. <TR>Moreover,</TR> family members are always busy to make money to compensate increasing price of necessities. If one of them follows their dream, letting alone earning money, they definitely loss their job and their convenient lives. For this regards, maintaining constant monetary situation needs to do work that looks demanding.</EX></SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR> keeping good relationship with friends needs you do things that are hard to enjoy.</MI2> <SI2>Of course, doing always enjoyable things is what people always want. <TR>However,</TR> there is a bad and unfortunate event that definitely happens around people. This event might happen to you or your friends. <TR>Therefore,</TR> if you help friends who have difficulty in a bad event, you can also receive help from your friends. <EX>In Korean statistical department, a study shows that more friends’ people maintain good relationship with, more easily and quickly people overcome their problem when they are in danger in a bad problem. This study also states that help from friends plays a key role in recovering problems.</EX></SI2></BO2>
 
<CO><TR>To sum up,</TR> I strongly agree that do things that they do not enjoy doing is sometimes good for the two reasons. <TR>First,</TR> people can enjoy their live more constantly without financial difficulty. <TR>Second,</TR> helping friends by doing things that is not enjoyable is better because you can also receive your friends' help when you have difficult situation.</CO>
column23: Generally organized essay. However, there are many grammar mistakes that make the essay less clear.

column1: 575&In order to stay well informed, people should get information from various news resources
column3:
<IN>As the modern civilization continues to be complicated, the need to acknowledge the surrounding events became essential to people. <TS><TR>However,</TR> it is also true and misfortune that most of the people from rural areas lack information regarding the current news with various sources.</TS> <TR>Therefore</TR> in order to stay well informed, people basically should access to information from various news sources to broaden their horizon and to have a success in career.</IN>
         
 <BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> information from various news resources helps people to embrace different points of views.</MI1> <SI1>Since the news report the same occurrence, for those who read numerous news can develop their skills to judge a situation. <EX><TR>For instance,</TR> something happened related to politics in Korea. Then there will be three types of news appear on the same issue. First one would be the article written by the left side of the government, second one would be from the right side of the government and the last one would be from outside Korea with objective view without any bias. Then the civilians of Korea will realize after reading three articles that there was a certain happening, how the opinions from three types are different and finally judge whether that happening is justified or not.</EX></SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2>The other reason is that reading various articles contributes to individual’s career success.</MI2> <SI2>As the modern society is becoming professional and competitive, today’s job markets require job candidates with high awareness on news, thus concentrating on various issues and current news has a direct correlation to success in career. It is important to read news from various sources, since it makes people to develop expertise by creating links with their major field and might suggest a solution on certain social issue after considering different beliefs. Pretend that you are a boss and you are going to employ a person who is good at economics. The questions most likely to ask during the interview would be the current economic crisis and opinion on that crisis. By this example, we can find out that competitive society needs employees with high awareness on news and expertise on their major field.</SI2></BO2>

           <CO>Overall, with various news sources, people can adopt different points of certain news and reading myriad of sources can lead to find a job and have a successful career. <TR>Therefore,</TR> reading various news sources in order to get informed is certainly positive thing to follow.</CO>
column23: Good, organized essay. Clear thesis and main ideas. Pay attention to grammar and use more concrete examples.

column1: 576&Some people have a job in which they work with others while others prefer working alone. Which do you prefer?
column3:
<IN>Whether to work as a group or alone has been a controversy to many people because they have different working styles. Some people claim that it is better to deal with works alone since they can handle it without considerations on others’ opinion. <TS><TR>However,</TR> I firmly believe that it is better to work as a group since it result in better efficiency when dealing with the work.</TS></IN>
 
             <BO1><MI1><TR>For starters,</TR> workers can finish huge amount of work loads in a short period of time.</MI1> <SI1>We cannot say that companies always require a typical amount of work which a person can completely handle in a day. They occasionally give works which one cannot finish it, resulting in incompletion till the due date. <TR>However,</TR> when people work as a group, they can distribute tasks to each person. No matter how many works they have to complete, when people divide tasks and make cooperation with each other, they would be able to match the due date which the company required.</SI1></BO1>
 
             <BO2><MI2><TR>Next,</TR> when each people do works which they are specialized in, it will lead to high efficiency in the work.</MI2> <SI2>All people have different prevalent points in working. Some can have fast computer typing, search for information faster than others be good in decorating and making the format of documents. Every person has specialties and when these variety of people gather up and deal with certain work, not only can they reduce the time in finishing it but also the completion of the work will be even higher than before.</SI2></BO2>
 
             <CO>There is a word ‘Two heads are better than one.’ When working with other people, the effeciency in work will increase since people can distribute works and each of them can handle the part which they are confident in. In conclusion, I argue that it is much more beneficial to work as a group.</CO>
column23: Good essay with few grammar mistakes. However, the essay lack examples to support main idea.

column1: 577&A company has announced that it wishes to build a large factory near your community. Discuss the advantages and disadvantages of this new influence on your community. Do you support of oppose the factory? Explain your position.
column3:
<IN><TS>I personally agree with that a factory is founded on my village.</TS> Because the most important issue for modern society is the economic activation.</IN>

 <BO1><MI1>Needless to say, the effect of building a factory brings big benefit.</MI1> <SI1>They will make a lot of jobs for their factory from the town. Therefore, many people who are between jobs could have a chance to get a job. It would make the town boom the economy.
 In addition, the local government can collect big taxes, which make them wealthy, so that they could give local people many benefits by using it.</SI1></BO1>

 <BO2><MI2>Of course, there are some bad effects from a factory.</MI2> <SI2><TR>Firstly,</TR> the air pollution will be a big problem. It will depend on what kind of products the factory produces, anyway it will give damage to the village.
<TR>Secondly,</TR> the noisy could be a problem, which is caused by sound from factory and trucks carrying products and so on. <TR>In addition,</TR> the traffic around the factory will be jammed.
 But I believe that these kinds of problems have to be dissolved by the company which really want build a factory on there. That is a duty for them.</SI2></BO2>

 <CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> I personally think that a factory in my yard is very welcome. Because they will bring the economic activation to the town, however, it has to be added the condition if they are willing to pay for the all of costs to dissolve the problems which will be possibly appeared during making products.</CO>
column23: The essay lacks any examples to support author's arguments.

column1: 578&With the help of the Internet, students can learn more effectively.
column3:
<IN>Internet brings people enormous changes. <TR>In particular,</TR> in the field of students' learning, internet offers people mant advantages. <TR>For example,</TR> students can get necessary information with very fast and convenient way. <TS>With this reason, I believe the statement mentioned above, that with the help of the internet, stndets can learn more effectively.</TS></IN>
 
<BO1><MI1><TR>To begin with,</TR> Internet helps students get necesary knowledge fast.</MI1> <SI1>And this save a lot of time for students. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> when I started to study for TOEFL test, I did not know much about this test. So, I visited several blogs and related websites which supply visitors enormous and vast information about TOEFL. <TR>As an example of this,</TR> if I type the word "TOEFL" in Youtube, there are various kinds of short lectures from all over the world. Tips for speking section from Canadian lecturer, know-hows for writing section from English teacher are available. Without internet, I could never meet these foreign lecturers who give me essential tips for TOEFL. However, thanks to the existence of internet, I could get crucial information about TOEFL test within two hours and figure out what TOEFL is.</EX></SI1></BO1>
 
<BO2><MI2><TR>On top of that,</TR> students can learn without any hindrance from time and place with internet.</MI2> <SI2>Students can access whenever they are available. Most helpful places for students' learning are limited to access by the time. <TR>For example,</TR> the public library and bookstores in my town are close at 10 p.m. <TR>Thus,</TR> it is so hard for me to visit there during the weekdays because I finish my work around 9 p.m. in the far place from my hometown. <TR>However,</TR> with the internet, I can access whenever and even wherever. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> I can search for needed information in the subway, on the bus or during walking with by connecting internet by using smartphone. Just several clicking, I can get te very information what I wanted to have. This is very conveniet way to learn. And this saved time and energy is hepful for me to concentrate on the subject.</EX></SI2></BO2>
 
<CO>By the reasons which I states above, I believe that internet leads considerable effeiciency for students learning. Thanks to internet, students can collect erequired knowledge for a short time. <TR>In addition,</TR> students can save timme and efforts for gathering  necesssary information thgough internet. <TR>Fot these reasons,</TR> I believe that internet brings students' learning substantial efficiency.</CO>
column23: Good essay and well organized. Pay attention to grammar mistakes.

column1: 579&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Television advertising directed toward children under the age of five should not be allowed. Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3:
<IN>Some people think that watching TV advertising does no harm to children. They think that it is just one of the distractions children can watch and enjoy. <TS><TR>However,</TR> TV advertising has devastating effects on children.</TS> <TR>Firstly,</TR> TV advertising contains undesirable contents. <TR>Moreover,</TR> watching it can be a recipe for children getting addicted to watching TV. <TR>Lastly,</TR> children who are chronically exposed to it could have health problems.</IN>
 
<BO1>Have you ever watched TV advertising recently?<MI1><SI1>Many of the advertisements include plenty of violent scenes, erotic behaviors, celebrities wearing sexually stimulating wardrobe.</MI1> TV advertising is customized to attract people, especially adults, to buy products. They don’t care whether the advertisements contain inappropriate materials for children. Children need to be away from these harmful materials until they’re old enough to sift them out.</SI1></BO1>
 
<BO2><MI2>These days, many children get addicted to watching TV.</MI2> <SI2>It’s a big problem because children don’t want to do what they’re supposed to do like reading books, playing outside with their friends. TV advertisements could add fuel to this bad situation. TV advertising usually contains highly addictive materials like interesting songs, dynamic pictures. That’s because Advertisers should impress customers within a few minutes of advertising. Children would get addicted to these materials easily, which means they would eventually spend plenty of time watching TV, which would increase the chances of the children getting addicted to watching TV.</SI2></BO2>
 
<CO><TR>Lastly,</TR> watching TV advertising can ruin children’s health. <EX>A lot of experts say that the electromagnetic waves emitting from TV is not desirable for children. Moreover, children could be near sighted if they spend too much time watching TV. <TR>On top of that,</TR> TV advertising is said to be harmful to children because the scenes from TV advertising tend to change so rapidly that it unnecessarily stimulates children’s brains. Experts say that could be devastating to normal development of children’s brains.</EX>
 
<TR>Therefore,</TR> what we should do right now is to get children off TV advertising. Otherwise, children will be afflicted with many adverse effects of TV advertising.</CO>
column23: Very good essay with only few grammar mistakes. But use more concrete examples to support main ideas.

column1: 580&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Parents are the best teachers. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>People always learn something from a lot of diverse environments. <TR>Also,</TR> there are always teachers who can give knowledge and information on something. However, parents are not only the best teachers. <TS>I believe that there are many different fields that people can learn something other than parents.</TS></IN>

       <BO1><MI1>In schools, people can learn a lot of things from teachers and friends.</MI1> <SI1>From teachers, they can earn much knowledge from a specific course or deeper thoughts from an advice that the teachers give. Also, while meeting new friends and playing with them, people can learn how to communicate and behave in a group and how to keep a good relationship with others.</SI1></BO1>

      <BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR> to the best teachers, people can be their best teachers as learning from themselves.</MI2> <SI2>They always learn something from their own experience or efforts such as failure, success, and different kinds of emotions they feel. <EX>For example, if a student fails an important test, he/she regrets and get upset on what he/she has done. <TR>After that</TR> the student learns how to get a good grade and how to study for the test.</EX></SI2></BO2> 

    <CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> there are a lot of things that parents do not or can not teach. Parents are not only the best teachers but also teachers and friends in school and themselves. From school, especially friends and teachers can teach interaction with others, specific knowledge from diverse subjects and better attitude. <TR>Furthermore,</TR> people can learn something from their own good and bad experience or efforts to teach themselves.</CO>
column23: Very good essay with some grammar mistakes. Use more concrete examples to support main idea.

column1: 581&It is always better to save money you earn rather than spend it right away.
column3:
<IN>Some people argue that spending money today is better than saving it. And they also claim that since banks offer low interest rate, it is useless to save money. <TS><TR>However,</TR> I think they are wrong because there are many other ways to get high interest rate aside from banks.</TS> <TR>Therefore,</TR> I agree with the statement that it is better to save money than spend it right away. And I have 2 reasons to support my opinion.</IN>
 
     <BO1><MI1><TR>To begin with,</TR> saving is very useful in an emergency.</MI1> <SI1>There are many unpredictable difficulties in our lives. In those cases, we should get money but in high costs if we do not have money to solve those problems. We can borrow money from a bank at a high interest rate or visit serveral friends to get money. But if we have saved money, we would not need to borrow it at expensive costs. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> when my friend's father got a cancer, he could easily afford the operation cost with his savings which had been saved for a long time for this purpose. <TR>As a result,</TR> his father got better thanks to his savings. This example of my friend show how necessary savings are in an emergency.</EX></SI1></BO1>
 
     <BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly,</TR> people can plan their lives with savings.</MI2> <SI2>A life can be devided into several periods. To be specific a life consists of a merriage period, a rasing children period and a preparing period for retiring and each period needs a plan. <TR>Moreover,</TR> to implement these plans it requires money at each period. <EX>I have read a newpaper article which states that many financial planners recommend people to make their plans for their lives and save money to realize it. <TR>Therefore,</TR> many people are saving money for the future of their lives, and more and more financial instruments are produced by financial companies to meet people's needs. This shows how inevitable saving money is for a life planning.</EX></SI2></BO2>
 
     <CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> saving money is not an option anymore, but a necessary thing now. This is because it is very useful when facing an emergency. In addition, to make a life plan and realize it, savings are necessary. For these reasons, I firmly believe that saving money is always better than spending it today.</CO>
column23: Good essay and well organized. Pay attention to grammar mistakes.

column1: 582&With the help of the Internet, students can learn more effectively.
column3:
<IN>Different people have different opinion about the statement that students are able to learn more effectively through the Internet. <TS>I strongly agree with the statement because Internet enables students to access massive information with less efforts and online lectures help students to learn subjects that they consider it hard .</TS></IN>

 <BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> students can use limitless information for their assignments or thesis without big efforts.</MI1> <SI1>Usually, people used to go to the library and have to find numerous books, texts and periodical materials to figure out their problems. <TR>However,</TR> in this days, we are able to get information want to know with just a few clicks. And even some of information are only accessible in the Internet. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> I was assigned in history class and the topic was 'The Environment of Nile River". Without sufficient background information, I couldn't start any word, but after typing 'Nile River' on the portal site, I could get numerous information about the Nile River including various kind of thesis, images, texts and video. it would be take much time if I use only conventional method such as finding books in the library.</EX></SI1></BO1>

 <BO2><MI2><TR>On top of that,</TR> many students get knowledge through watching online lecture.</MI2> <SI2>It improves students knowledge very much. Students can watch the online lecture video and contact professor through e-mail or e-board. <TR>therefore,</TR> they get same information regardless of their place, all they need is just internet-wired PC. it is very useful, convenient learning method. Actually, many universities have founded cyber campus which provide online lecture with same quality as the face to face lecture. Students are able to choose their own course and get a degree through the internet. <TR>Furthermore,</TR> students also can easily access to the of free online course if they are interested in other subjects.</SI2></BO2> 

 <CO><TR>Overall,</TR> students can study more effectively taking online lecture and getting various information on the internet. In this regard, i strongly agree with the notion that Internet helps students to learn more effectively.</CO>
column23: Good essay and well organized. Pay attention to grammar mistakes.

column1: 583&What do you think about winter season?
column3:
<IN><TS>Some people argue that winter is bad because just cold and have many car accident but I think winter is very exciting and good weather.</TS> There has three reasons about my opinion.</IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First,</TR> I like play in snow. I enjoy snow fighting with my friends and riding a snowboard.</MI1> <SI1>Every winter I do this two things. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> when I was in high school, when my class was in P.E. class and snowing outside. Teacher said “do snow fighting with other class” so we did it other class. And went ski resort with my friends after graduated high school. I rid a snowboard 12hours with my friends and had BBQ party after snowboarding. This two things are unforgettable memory in my life.</EX></SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR> in winter, we can overcome the cold weather to wearing many clothes, but in summer, we can’t suppress feel like burn, so take off all of our shirts but still can feel very hot.</MI2> <SI2><TR>For example,</TR> in winter I was extremely cold one day so I wore heat tech, shirt, cardigan and padding. Then I can’t feel and cold. But in summer. <EX>Someday i was in school and very hot to breath. my friends in my class can’t enduring this hot weather, our class has take off shirts and take shower in playground. But weather is still hot. So I think we can get over the cold weather is positive point of winter.</EX></SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>At last,</TR> we have Christmas in winter. Christmas is representing help each other and family love. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> church sharing breads and milk or money to poor people and have plentiful foods with families in Christmas eve.</EX> Also we can get present too. So we can feel warm even if weather is so cold.
In conclusion, these three reasons are why I can tell i love winter season.</CO>
column23: Thesis does not address the prompt correctly. Essay is unorganized. Should pay attention to grammar.

column1: 584&It is better for students to have one long vacation each year than several short vacations throughout the year.
column3:
<IN>Some people think that short-term period vacations are better than a long-term vacation, and they support their idea claiming that short vacations give students a break. <TS><TR>However,</TR> I believe that one long vacation is more helpful to students, because in this long period, students can do their part-time job or study more steadily.</TS></IN>
 
     <BO1><MI1><TR>To begin with,</TR> students can do their part-time job in the stable circumstance.</MI1> <SI1>Usually, the workplaces require students to work for a long time. <TR>Therefore,</TR> they prefer students who graduated from their college or take their semesters off. <TR>As a result,</TR> students who are attending a college have hard time getting a part-time job. They only can work in the vacation period. If students get short-term vacations, they will never get part-time job anymore, even in their vacations. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> a friend of mine could not get any part-time job during the semester, because the owner of the business did not want a student who could not work for a long time. But he could get a part-time job easily in his vacation. This example shows how better a long vacation is.</EX></SI1></BO1>
 
     <BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly,</TR> students can study steadily in a long vacation.</MI2> <SI2>Most students study a certification to get a job. But certifications usually require a long studying period. <TR>Thus,</TR> it is almost impossible to get a certification during the semester, because students are already busy studying their other classes. As a result, <EX><TR>For instance,</TR> my friends studided the financial certificates during his semester. <TR>However,</TR> since he had little time to study in this period, it failed the exam whenever he took. But he could get the certification at one trial during his vacation. This shows how a long period is needed to study.</EX></SI2></BO2>
 
<CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> one long vacation throughout the year gives students an opportunity to work or study. This is because, the workplace need one who can work for a long time. <TR>Moreover,</TR> students can concentrate more on their study during the long vacation, because nothing interrupts them. For these reasons, I firmly believe that one long vacation is more helpful for students than short vacations.</CO>
column23: Generally organized essay. However, incorrect choice of words and grammar mistakes make essay less coherent to reader.

column1: 585&It is better to focus on one project at a time and then start another one.
column3:
<IN>Some people say that people should work on several project at the same time. <TS><TR>However,</TR> in my opinion, it is better to focus on one project at a time and then start another one.</TS> This is because by concentrating on one project at once you can do a better job and complete the project faster.</IN>

 <BO1><MI1><TR>To begin with,</TR> concentrating on one project at a time at once help you do a better job.</MI1> <SI1>If you work on several projects at once, it is too easy to be confused and this confusion between each projects will make errors. <TR>However</TR> if you focus on one project at once, you will make fewer mistakes. <EX>Studies conducted by Korea university have shown that doing multiple tasks at the same time makes people to make 15% more errors than doing one task at a time. So if you want to do a better job, you should concentrate on one project at a time.</EX></SI1></BO1>

 <BO2><MI2><TR>On top of that,</TR> focusing on one project lead you to complete the project faster.</MI2> <SI2>You don't need to care about other things and this help you finish your work more quickly. So you will not be stressful about due date. Let's take my experience as an example. <EX>When I was an elementary school student, my teacher gave us several missions. Some students did the missions at once. And the others did each mission respectively. <TR>At the end,</TR> the students who did the works respectively completed these works faster than the students who did the works at once.</EX></SI2></BO2>

 <CO><TR>To sum up,</TR> focusing on one project allow you to do a better job and complete the project faster. In this regard, I strongly believe that it it better to concentrate on one project rather than on several projects at once.</CO>
column23: Essay had a relatively clear thesis and main idea. However, grammar mistakes make essay less coherent.

column1: 586&Professors should focus on research more than teaching student.
column3:
<IN>It has been a debate whether professors should focus on research more than teaching students. <TS>I agree that professors should concentrate on their research than preparing their classes for the two reasons.</TS> First, studying research is valuable for solving demanding problems. Second, there are already good materials to help students to focus on their study.</IN>
 
<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> doing research plays a key role in developing our society to better place to live.</MI1> <SI1>In general, there are a lot of problem to be solved for better human lives. One of the examples is the global warming. It has been a pressing issue how to cope with global warming these days. Many countries saw their places flooded or consumed by wildfires. Ice sheets are also keeping falling apart. To solve those kinds of problem, researching and studying difficult and challenging problems including the global warming is very important. <EX>According to Korean statistic sf, recent study shows that more money countries to invent on helping professors' research, higher percentage of finding answers of challenges increases. For this regards, concentrating on research have significantly positive effect on our human development.</EX></SI1></BO1>
 
 
<BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR> there are lots of methods for students to learn or get knowledge not from professors.</MI2> <SI2>Those kinds of materials are even better than one prepared by professors. This is because there are lots of education companies always focusing how to make sure students to understand educational lectures. There are even free online education courses that famous university gives In the Internet for free. Although professors try to prepare complete talk for their students, there are already good materials students can use. <TR>Therefore,</TR> economically, for professors, it is better to focus on their research rather than teaching students.</SI2></BO2>
 
<CO>I strongly agree that professors should be more engaged to focus on their research not teaching students for the two reasons. <TR>First,</TR> there are lots of problem that can be solved by professors' research. <TR>Second,<TR> there are lots of good educational materials not from professors.</CO>
column23: A generally organized essay. Make examples clearer. Pay attention to grammar.

column1: 587&Does grade encourage students to study?
column3:
<IN>The question of whether or not grade system is beneficial for students has been debated for decades without definitive conclusion. Some may assert that grade system is indispensable for stimulation purpose, while others believe that there might be better alternatives to that. <TS>While both have their points made, in my opinion, grading system still bears far more advantages than otherwise.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>To start with,</TR> grading system will put students in constant competitive environment, which, I believe, is crucial in upgrading their marks.</MI1> <SI1>Society is composed of numerous and continuous competition, in which, whether we like or not, we are left with no other choice but to comply with. People compete for better occupation, promotion, better house, better education for their sons and daughters, and even better recreational activities. And it can be easily concluded that these all sorts of competition are the core reasons of running the society, and to a larger extent, countries and even the world. Because it is humans' nature to become better than others in any means possible, people might work and upscale their weapons to the fullest capacity. Same logic goes for the school and the grade. Without this competing environment, students would start taking his job, in this case student, lightly thus they would eventually become incompetent one at the end of the day. In another way of saying, they do not have stimulating factors that keep them moving forward.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Add to that,</TR> teachers might have better understanding of where their students are positioned.</MI2> <SI2>Why this is important? When teachers have better ideas as to where their students are, they might come up with better solutions to their problem. Usually, teachers have to deal with from 30 to 50 students at a time, if it were small classroom that she/he manages and cares, then it can be said possible to make the best judgement and advice for the students just by having interaction and conversation with them. However, a lot of cases, it's not that simple. With students that much, I believe, one most effective method one can utilize is by having grade system, which will provide the teachers with precise ideas on their students marks. Based on that understanding, teachers can provide the best mentoring to the students, which is going to be the helpful tool for students to torch their path. This very knowledge on they are good at and want will definitely motivate students to shoot harder work at whatever they are doing.</SI2></BO2> 

<CO><TR>For the reasons followed,</TR>while there might be other substitution for current grading system, I believe, it's the best means for students, provided they are conducted in proper manner.</CO>
column23: Very good essay with only few grammatical mistakes. Supporting ideas are very clear, however, try to give more concrete examples.

column1: 588&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? It is better to live in one city or town than to move one place to another.
column3:
<IN>Some people may think that it is better to move one place to another than to live in one city or town. <TS>However, I disagree with this statement for two reasons. <TR>First,</TR> by living in one place, people can build up strong relationships with other people. <TR>Second,</TR> it is not easy to adjust yourself to a new place.</TS></IN>

        <BO1><MI1><TR>To start with,</TR> when living in one town or city, you can strengthen bond with your neighbors.</MI1> <SI1>As old saying goes, “A close neighbor is better than your brother who lives far away.” When living in a same community, more than likely people interact. They talk, visit, and help each other a lot.</SI1></BO1>
    
    <BO2><MI2><TR>On top of that,</TR> it is hard adjusting yourself to a new place.</MI2> <SI2>When moving away from one place to another, it takes amount of time to get used to it. <TR>Also,</TR> it is even harder to be far away from all people you knew. <EX><TR>For instance,</TR> Hyeon, a friend of mine, lived in one town for 16 years. After graduating from the high school, she moved away from the town. When she entered the high school, she did not know anybody from the school. Everyone, except her, knew each other, so they were hanging out without her. <TR>Also,</TR> she wasn't aware of facilities of the new town. So she was lost and looked for a bus station for an hour. She says she hated that she moved away.</EX></SI2></BO2>

        <CO><TR>On the whole,</TR> when moving away from one place to another, people often encounter numerous hardships because getting used to a new place is very difficult. <TR>In contrast,</TR> when living in one city or town, people can strengthen their relationships with their neighbors. <TR>For these reasons,</TR> I firmly believe that living in one place is better than moving from one place to another.</CO>
column23: Good essay with some grammar mistakes. If you have more than one argument, elaborate on all of them and provide concrete examples.

column1: 589&It has recently been announced that a new high school may be built in your community. Do you support or oppose this plan?
column3:
<IN>Many people oppose the plan that a new high school to be built in their communities because it costs lots of money and they don’t want the noise pollution produced by the construction. There are lots of truth in it. <TS><TR>However,</TR> I think that it has more advantages than disadvantages.</TS> Building a new high school would attract more people to the community and would help ease the crowded classrooms.</IN>
       
<BO1><MI1><TR>Firstly</TR>, building a new high school would collect more people to the community.</MI1> <SI1>When a new high school is built, more families would settle down in the area. <EX>Study from University of Florida Social Center have indicated that the population of city of Gainesville has been 15% increased after the new high school was built. Not only it attracted lots of students from other cities of Florida, also it brought a lot of foreign exchange students from diverse countries.</EX></SI1></BO1>
        
<BO2><MI2><TR>More importantly,</TR> a new high school would help comport the classrooms full of students.</MI2>
<SI2><EX>Let me take my personal experience for example. When I graduated from middle school, there was only one high school in our community. There were about 450 students in one class. Since I had no choice, I had to admit to the school packed of students. It was hard to concentrate on the class because it was too crowded and loud. <TR>Not only that,</TR> it was also hard for the teachers to take good care of each students because there were so many. Thankfully, a new high school had built before I graduate from high school. <TR>As a consequence,</TR> lots of students transferred to the new school and number of students from senior class had decreased from approximately 450 to 300. It was much better to have a class that is not crowded.</EX></SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>On the whole,</TR> Building a new high school in our community brings numerous advantages. It would collect more students not only from the other cities but also from other countries. On top of that, crowded classrooms can be solved by building a new school. All things considered, I support the plan that a new high school to be built in our community.</CO>
column23: Good essay and good use of examples. Pay attention to grammar.

column1: 590&Some people prefer to eat at food stands or restaurants. Other people prefer to prepare and eat food at home. Which do you prefer?
column3:
<IN>Many people think that eating at food stands or restaurants is better than preparing and eating food at home. <TS><TR>However,</TR> given the choice between eating out and eating at home, I would choose eating at home.This is because eating at home is not only healthy but also builds up family bonding .</TS></IN>
        
<BO1><MI1><TR>To start with,</TR> foods served in restaurants are unhealthy.</MI1> <SI1>Most restaurants put too much salt and sugar without considering consumer’s nutrition balance. It is unhealthy eating food which is high in calories and fat. Not only that, most restaurants are often unsanitary. <EX>NBC news have shown that 75% of food stands and restaurants in America are unclean. Although there are tremendous people who eat at restaurant, there is no good hygiene system to stay the place clean. <TR>On the contrary,</TR> when eating at home, people prepare food with fresh and clean ingredients they chose from the market. Also, our own houses can not compare to other restaurants full of germs from anonymous people.</EX></SI1></BO1>
        
<BO2><MI2><TR>In addition,</TR> eating at home strengthens family bonding.</MI2> <SI2>When eating at home, all family members gather around and have conversations. <EX>When I was in high school, I was busy with my school work and my parents were busy with their jobs. There were hardly no time at all to spend together. <TR>However,</TR> we always tried to have dinner together no matter how busy we were. By eating at home instead of eating our own at restaurants, it was possible to keep our family bonding strong.</EX></SI2></BO2>
        
<CO><TR>To sum up,</TR> food from food stands or restaurats are often unhealthy and unclean. People can prepare and get healthy food at home. <TR>Also,</TR> people can build up family bonding by having meal together at home. For these reasons, I prefer eating food at home to eating food at restaurants.</CO>
column23: Great essay. Good use of transitions and examples. However, should still pay attention to grammar.

column1: 591&Some people prefer to live in a small town. Others prefer to live in a big city. Which place would you prefer to live in?
column3:
<IN>Some people may think that living in a small town is better than living in a big city because it is clean and quiet. <TS><TR>However,</TR> I prefer to live in a big city because of the public transportation and lots of opportunities for both education and employment.</TS></IN>
        
<BO1><MI1><TR>To begin with,</TR>using the public transportation in a big city is convenient.</MI1> <EX><SI1>Let me take my personal experience for example. I am living in Petoskey, a small town in Michigan. Without a ride, I could not go anywhere because there's no public transportation at all. When I was living in Seoul city, the capital of Korea, I could just walk 5 minutes to take a bus or a subway if I had to go somewhere. I never had to waste time waiting for a ride.</EX></SI1></BO1>
        
<BO2><MI2><TR>On top of that,</TR> there are lots of opportunity of employment in a big city.</MI2> <SI2>This is because most of the biggest companies are located in a big city. The bigger the company is, the more employments the company will provide. In the same way, the payments will also be higher. Study by UCLA business center have shown that 82% of the companies that make more than 50 billion dollars per year are located in a big city. Aside from better job opportunities, there are a lot of institutes and teachers provide high quality education in a big city. <EX>For instance, servey by Harvard University Education Center have indicated that ACT/SAT score of the students from the big cities are higher than those of the students from small town.</EX></SI2></BO2>
        
<CO><TR>On the whole,</TR> better education and job opportunities are obtainable in a big city. <TR>Not only that,</TR> the public transportation in a big city is convenient. For these reasons, I think that living in a city can not be compared with living in a small town.</CO>
column23: Excellent essay with very few grammar mistakes. Excellent use of specific examples.

column1: 592&It is necessary to understand the past to solve the problems of the present and future.
column3:
<IN>Sometimes, I ask: "Why do we have to study history?" When I think of it more deeply, I realize that there is one great aspect of life that people gain from learning about the past. <TS>Wisdom is what people get and from understanding the past, and that is why it is necessary to know the history. Whatever crisis or problems people face, they are able to tackle it in a more appropriate and effective way.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1>People's life span is short, yet the history of the world is long.</MI1> <SI1>They do not have ample experiences to understand many things. When they come across a problem, they tend to make silly choices, but if they seek some advice from the past, they can make a more appropriate decision. <EX>Take the United Nations for example. If people did not look in the past, they would not have thought of retaining peace in this world. Because people have learnt about all the wars and horrible situations that have occurred before, they decided to have an organization that could help countries to maintain peace.</EX></SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2>Even if people choose the most appropriate way to solve a problem, they need to makes sure it works effectively.</MI2> <SI2>Understanding the past helps to solve a problem more promisingly. People can judge their actions by comparing to the mistakes they made in the past and make sure that does not happen again. That way, people would know the result they would probably have in the end. <TR>For example,</TR> when people combat the pollution in the world, they can refer to the past and develop a better way to solve this problem. They would not make the same mistake again and come up with an effective solution.</SI2></BO2>

<CO>History of this world can seem boring for many people but if they take it more seriously, it can become a friend you can depend on during the hard times. It is important to learn the past and apply your knowledge to solve the problems of the present and future appropriately and effectively.</CO>
column23: Excellent essay with very few grammar mistakes. Excellent use of specific examples. Should use  more transitions to better the flow of the essay.

column1: 593&Parents should give money to their children for high grades they get at school. Do you agree or disagree.
column3:
<IN>It has been a debate whether parents should give money to their children for high grades they get at school. I disagree that money should be given to children according to their academic performance in school. <TR>First,</TR> giving money have short-term effect on children's grades and test scores. <TR>Second.</TR> <TS>Giving motivation to children is more beneficial than just giving money.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> motivating children to study by giving money cannot be long last.</MI1> <SI1>In general, most parents come up with an idea to monetary rewards to engage their children to study hard. Of course, letting children get money as rewards of their academic grades looks good at first. <TR>However,</TR> parents could not control their children any longer when their children earn enough money. <EX>Let me take a child of my cousin for instance. Su-Jin was a student in secondary education. He always loved to enjoy playing games and online social networking. his parents started to motivate him to study hard by giving a suggestion that giving more money when he get higher grades in school. At first, this suggestion looked work well because he studied very hard and got a better grade. However, he gave up studying hard when he had enough money to buy everything and felt it was hard to get higher score than before. This shows that money cannot long-lasting effect on engaging children to concentrate on their academic work.</EX></SI1></BO1>
 
<BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR> self-motivated children study a lot harder continually than other children who are not.</MI2> <SI2>Monetary rewards cannot make children to study hard for a long time as I mention on the first sentence. <TR>However,</TR> children who have intrinsic and strong motivation in their mind show studying hard continually. These days, parents are always busy and supposed to have fast-paced working situation. Naturally, children do not expect parents to spend time with them and focus on computer games. <EX><TR>As opposed to them,</TR> my cousin's primary concern was to spend time on diverse experience and giving advising his children. More time spending on diverse activities together, better they understand each other. These various experience led my cousin's children to find their talent and to enjoy developing them. When the children went back to study, they study a lot harder than other students as they were self-motivated than ever.</EX></SI2></BO2>
 
<CO>I strongly disagree that monetary rewards cannot engage children to study hard for a long time for the two reasons. <TR>First,</TR> it is hard to led children to study continually. <TR>Second,</TR> helping children to find motivation to study is more helpful to make them study a lot harder than giving just money as regards of their academic performance.</CO>
column23: Essay is very incoherent because thesis statement and conclusion do not match. Author should pay attention to grammar.

column1: 594&When people succeed, it is because of hard work. Luck has nothing to do with success? Do you agree or disagree with the quotation above? Use specific reasons and examples to explain your position.
column3:
<IN>Today, many people are living, wanting to know how to succeed in their lives, make much money, or get a good job. No one knows the answer, but we are always pursuing and making an effort to live better life than before. In this sense, people cannot help working hard to succeed in their places. <TR>However,</TR> there are some debates about ‘factors’ for successful life. <TS>I think those who only work hard in their working places cannot achieve their great success for sure.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First,</TR> not only is success pursued by hard working but also by other factors.</MI1> <SI1>If success can be achieved only by the passion in their job or fields where people feel interests, few people regret about their passed time. <EX>Let me introduce my experience that happened in my university laboratory. In my lab, there was a friend who worked with me for a project, relevant to graduation. He was a leader in my team, having passion about his job, but did not entirely care about other members in the group. The project has been continued for seven months, but all he did was just to command to other member without any compassion. In the end of the project, we got the best praise about the project, but all members, except the leader, flew away from the lab. As we can see in my experience, the success cannot be made only of hard working. If we ignored other factors, such as relationship with others, we would not achieve something that we expect.</EX></SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly,</TR> chances come with the name of “Luck.”</MI2> <SI2>We do not know the time when the chance come, which sometimes entirely changes our life. Some renowned people who succeeded in their fields, such as business, engineering, or economy, says that grabbing the best chance is the most important factor to succeed in their life. However, most of the chances are not related to hard working. Even though a person spent time working hard, he would unintentionally leave the chance passing by him. Indeed, I think the chance camouflages with the name of “Luck.” Luck can be interpreted as the timing, such as the generation or era when a person has been born, and related to location, where a person is living. With concerns to success, most people who achieved their goals meet the needs the generation required. Therefore, those who achieved their goals would not remain in honorable history unless they were born in the very location, and the very generation.</SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> a success cannot be achieved only by one’s effort to work hard. Of course, motivation and passion, which make people active in their places, are necessary to be recognized by others. However, there are many of other factors above we need to keep in mind to succeed in our lives.</CO>
column23: Thesis statement is not very clear. Grammatical mistakes make essay incoherent.

column1: 595&Sometimes it is difficult to tell who is telling the truth and who is lying in the media.
column3:
<IN><TR>Today</TR>, people are mainly influenced by the media such as TV, radio, and the Internet when they live their lives. We cannot help getting information from these kinds of mass media. <TS><TR>However</TR>, we should warn ourselves from the information originating from the media because the truth could be hidden in many cases. <TR>Therefore</TR>, we should have eyes to discern whether the information from the media is true or not. There are some reasons why it is difficult to clarify the truth.</TS></IN> 

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, the media, including TV and even the Internet, can be faked if the information is highly related to political or sensitive issue in a society.</MI1> <SI1>In some cases of politicians, some of them sometimes commit extramarital affairs, which are considered highly immoral behaviors by the people. <TR>However</TR>, they can obscure this kind of facts by giving some bribe to those who have ability to change the result from the scandals. Not only in this scandals, but many people who appear on TV or the Internet hide the truth, and they could acquire a lot of financial profits in exchange for spending their money on caching their information. <TR>By doing this</TR>, the origin of who made this truth could be hidden, with many people thinking as lie.</SI1></BO1> 

<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, it can be difficult to determine who tell the truth in the media because many factors relevant to the truth are complicated, like a chain.</MI2> <TR>Of course</TR>, all information, regardless of the themes of news, has the origin that comes from a person who tell the truth. <TR>However</TR>, as if we have difficulties to solve a complex math problem, in the media there can be a complex relationship. With routes where the information is transported entangled, the truth eventually goes into mystery, and even a person who tell the truth would be evaporated. Most people who encounter the media see the final result, with the other unnecessary information ignored, which interferes us not to look on the truth but merely on the result.</BO2>

<CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, it is hard to find who tell the truth in the media if some information needs to be kept confidential, especially in the case of politician-related matter, or it is so complicated that people cannot clarify the origin of who tell the truth. <TR>Therefore</TR>, we need to be careful when believing information from the media.</CO>
column23: The thesis statement is very unclear, but there are good main ideas in each paragraph. It just would be nice if those ideas were expanded upon a bit more.

column1: 596&Positive Impacts in Social Media Sites
column3:
<IN>Most people use smart phones, and there are lots of application that can be downloaded like Facebook, and Twitter. They spend time visiting social media sites when on the bus, subway, or even in the bathroom. As their usages are increasing, various websites are formed as well. <TS>More and more people use social media and they become great impacts on people’s lives. <TR>In this way</TR>, social media sites have great positive impacts on the way people interact and share information.</TS></IN>
     
<BO1><MI1><TR>To start with</TR>, people can receive information that takes place all over the world and respond to it immediately.</MI1> <SI1><EX><TR>As an example</TR>, there was an incident of murder in Korea. The police had trouble finding a criminal during the incident. <TR>Over time</TR>, public criticism was excessive and police became nervous. <TR>Fortunately</TR>, thanks to the informer's report investigators finally arrested the criminal. The informer knew the face of the criminal through Facebook so he tipped off police. <TR>However</TR>, in the old times, people were no help and could only watch.</EX> People didn't even know when an accident happened. This is because they received late information via mass media. <TR>Nowadays</TR>, people can exchange news by SNS and help to an investigation. <TR>Moreover</TR>, these media sites are responsible for a prompt report. When the government receives news quickly, social media also gives positive effects to the them. If international conflicts occur, each country can cope with situations as fast as possible. When they swiftly try a diplomatic solution, social networks will be great help by enhancing communication with each other.</SI1></BO1>
     
     <BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, communication on the internet has an important effect on human relationships.</MI2> <SI2>Throughout the social media like Twitter, everyone can be friends from all over the world. They immediately talk with others as if they are having a chat sitting together. It is possible to maintain a close relationship with people by social media. <EX><TR>For example</TR>, as I have my own story, I still keep in touch with friends who I met in Brazil via Facebook . There I say hello to friends or write comments on a homepage. There is no big difference from sitting face to face. These kinds of sites are very useful to communicate with friends. If I want to give a friend a message immediately, but the friend cannot take a message, I post on the site.</EX> <TR>To me</TR>, communicating by SNS has no prominent difference from sitting face to face. These kinds of SNS are very useful to communicate with friends. <TR>Moreover</TR>, people can contact and build digital relationships with celebrities who are hard to meet for real. Lots of famous people such as politicians, actors or musicians leave messages on Twitter or Facebook. They have millions of followers and they share feelings and communicate. A fan can chat one-on-one and a celebrity becomes closer and interacts individually with them.</SI2></BO2>
     
<CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, there are positive effects in using social media. It is not only that people listen to information happening all over the world, but they can have good relationships with the world people as well. <TR>In this regard</TR>, social sites are greatly worthwhile to people in terms of sharing information and interacting. Social media sites will increasingly improve and the number of users will grow.</CO>
column23: It would be nice if the student had given a thesis that was more specific so there would be a stronger stucture upon which to build the essay later. Despite that, the essay is still strong, with good ideas and supports.

column1: 597&Television has had a significant influence on the culture of many societies. To what extent would you say that television has positively or negatively affected the cultural development of your society?
column3:
<IN>It has been a debate whether television has positively affected the cultural development of our society or not. <TS><TR>I agree that</TR> television has positive impact on our society for the two reasons. <TR>First</TR>, televisions give the method to keep together with family. <TR>Second</TR>, lots of news can be available through television.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, television plays a key role on maintain good relationship between parents and children.</MI1> <SI1><TR>These days</TR>, it is more difficult for parents to spend time with their children. <TR>This is because</TR> workers are given to busy situation to work in and out of the company. <TR>Naturally</TR>, children do not focus on their parents but computer games and online social networking. Lots of news media started to report those problems and, <TR>fortunately</TR>, parents tried to have attention to their ever-more distant relationship of their children. One of good methods to spend more time with children is watching family TV programs together. <TR>These days</TR>, those family TV programs are broadcasted in prime time and get lots of fame. After spending time together by watching those TV programs, parents and children can understand better.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, news TV programs are available easily and help for people to know everything that happens in the world.</MI2> Some people might insist that searching the Internet is better to get those kinds of information than watching televisions. <TR>However</TR>, <TR>as far as trustworthy is concerned</TR>, I strongly claim that watching news TV programs is the best way to get more conceivable knowledge. <SI2><TR>This is because</TR> that material in the Internet can be affected by noisy or biased opinion from lots of internet users. <TR>Moreover</TR>, reading books need lots of time to get knowledge as compared to watching news TV programs. <TR>For these reasons</TR>, watching TV programs is good way to get recent and believable information quickly.</SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>I strongly believe that</TR> televisions have really good impact on our society for the two reasons that I have mentioned above. <TR>First</TR>, televisions give the method to keep together with family. <TR>Second</TR>, lots of news can be available through television.</CO>
column23: There are a lot of unnecessary transitional words and phrases in this essay. The student has a good argument, but doesn't provide any good examples to support it.

column1: 598&People have fewer fields that they are skilled at because they do many activities.
column3:
<IN>There has been heated debate whether people have fewer fields of expertise as they do various activities. Some people may believe this is true while others deem otherwise. <TS><TR>However</TR>, <TR>I believe that</TR> participating various fields of work will enable individual to earn further skills. This is not only because learners will obtain variety of knowledge from the activities but also because they can meet new friends from different fields. In this manner I go against the statement above.</TS></IN>

   <BO1><MI1><TR>The first reason for my opinion is that</TR> experiencing many works will provide opportunities for people to learn numerous skills.</MI1> <SI1>In this heavily competitive world, students do various works. Starting from part time job at cafe to volunteer work, they gain many experience from various areas. This can enable them to know and obtain new skills they did not have before. <EX><TR>For instance</TR>, when I was in University I joined many social clubs. I was in basketball team and orchestra. At social clubs I was taught how to play trumpet and how to work in a team. This example illustrates how we can gain more skills by doing many activities.</EX></SI1></BO1>
 
<BO2><MI2><TR>Another reason for my argument is that</TR> individuals can make new friends who can teach us new skills.</MI2> <SI2>Though participating numerous activities do deter people to only concentrate one specific area, it is beneficial to acquire new friends. Getting acquisition with new people is favorable. This can lead individual to learn new fields which they are now sure about. <TR>In addition</TR>, through the new friends people may have chance to work in new fields as well. <EX><TR>To be more specific</TR>, according to the recent survey done by Seoul National University it shows that people believe meeting new friends can make us to obtain new abilities. Many people had working experience like internship through their new personal relationship.</EX> Also while talking to new people from different areas it can broaden individuals view. <TR>This case proves how</TR> acquiring new friends can facilitate us to think broader and gain new skills.</SI2></BO2>
 
<CO><TR>Subsequent to mulling over this query</TR>,  I disagree with the statement given above. The more work people experience from new fields more capabilities they will earn. <TR>Besides</TR> by having new pals from variety of area it will enable them to have acquire new set of skills. <TR>To conclude</TR>, there is doubt that doing fewer skills has something to do with many activities.</CO>
column23: This student could have used more examples to support his/her argument.

column1: 599&People should follow their dreams even if they are impractical.
column3:
<IN><TR>It is evident that</TR> in our society dreams have a tremendous importance in our lives. Some people think that people should follow their dreams though it is impractical while others do not. <TS>I <TR>however</TR>, believe that it is better for people to follow their dreams. There are several reasons that I could discuss to support my argument so I will limit my discussion to the two that I feel are the most relevant to the topic : the concepts of success and stress.</TS></IN>

 <BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, <TR>the most important reason for my thinking this way is that</TR> following their dreams is much better way to become successful professionals.</MI1> <SI1>Commonly in society<, a substantial amount of successful professionals tend to be people who followed their dreams and became experts in their respective fields. <TR>Thus</TR> <TR>it can be said that</TR> it is better for people to follow their dreams because they can easily get the expertise and become successful.

 <BO2><EX>A really good example can be seen in Ahn. I read online that Ahn, the CEO of the Ahn Company, transformed his company into one of the most profitable information technology enterprises in Korea because he kept following his dream though it was considered impractical 10 years ago. In one of his interviews, he said that his parents severely disagreed with his dream because it was not a money-making job. <TR>However</TR>, he went forward to study computer science because it was exciting for him. <TR>Eventually</TR> following his dream motivated him to study hard and it led him to create V3 : the most successful vaccine program in Korea.</EX> <TR>This example clearly shows that</TR> people should following their dreams though they are impractical because of the success it entails.</BO2>

<BO3><MI3><TR>Another reason for my thinking this way is that</TR> not following dreams can cause substantial amount of stress.<MI3> <SI3>Most businessmen are stressed out because of the tremendous workload they reluctant to do. <TR>Thus</TR> it can be said that if people don`t follow their dreams and do what they do not want to do, they will receive additional stress which often leads to health problems.

<BO4><EX>A recent report I read on the Chosun Herald revealed some interesting findings. <TR>According to the article</TR>, a surprising number of businessmen who have not followed their dreams claimed that they had problems related to stress. One executive mentioned that he got a stomach ulcer because his tasks were not of his interest and he was stressed out. He regretted not following his impractical dream. <TR>This outcome, or the lack thereof, clearly shows that</TR> people should follow their dreams though it is impractical.</BO4>

 <CO><TR>All things considered</TR>, <TR>with the reasons mentioned above</TR>, <TR>I believe that</TR> I have adequately and sufficiently explained my position on the matters regarding this topic.</CO>
column23: This student has excellent grammar and vocabulary, though they tend to abuse transitional words and prhases.

column1: 600&People learn more by watching television than by reading books.
column3:
<IN>An ongoing debate exists whether learning by watching television is more helpful than learning by reading books. <TS><TR>Regarding this controversial issue</TR>, <TR>I firmly believe that</TR> people are more likely to learn better through the visual materials such as television rather than written materials like books. <TR>The reasoning behind this is that</TR> learning by watching television enhances the possibility to remember. <TR>Additionally</TR>, people achieve some knowledge more easily by watching television than by reading books.</TS></IN> 

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, people can remember what they see in the television better.</MI1> <TR>This is because</TR> when the visual materials are created, producers strive to make it more vivid and effective to stimulate people's imagination.
