<BO1><MI1><TR>Firstly,</TR> doing farming set me free from complex thoughs of city life because it is close to not mental labour but physical labour.</MI1><SI1><EX> I was grown up in contryside and my parents were and are farmers. Whenever I visit my hometown, I feel comfortable and doing farming help me to forget my cily life.</EX></SI1> </BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly,</TR> Farming is productive activity as well as makes me simple.</MI2> <SI2><EX><TR>Once,</TR> I ate whatever I saw when I got stress. It made me fat so I got stress from my heavy weight and ate again.<TR> In other word,</TR> it was a vicious circle. <TR>However,</TR> farming produces something as well as good for my body. <TR>For instance,</TR> if I help my mother to harvest, ultimately the result of my work affects my mother and me in good ways.</EX></SI2> </BO2>

<BO3><MI3>Lastly, doing farming in countryside enables me relax.</MI3> <SI3>To poeple, the environment of countryside is better than that of city. <EX>While I work, I can hear songs of birds, breathe fresh air, drink clear water and so on. All of them help me relax.</EX> Suppose that you lay down on green grass and watch clouds. It will be the best way of escaping stresses.</SI3> </BO3>

<CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> although there are many ways of escaping steresses, my best way is the doing famring. It help me relax, forget my problems and it is even productive. I highly recommend that people have to choose the wholesome way to solve their problems.</CO>
column23: This is a pretty good essay.  Your ideas are defended relatively well, but I think you need to rephrase your second main idea.  It doesn't really fit with that paragraph.  Also, that same paragraph has far too many transitions.  Please take some of them out.

column1: 722&If you could invent something new, what product would you develop? Use specific details to explain why this invention is needed.
column3:
<IN>Inventing new sometimes becomes an interesting issue among people. The choice could be made in diverse ways. <TS><TR>As for me,</TR> I would like to make electronic translators. There are two reasons that make my view convincing. This is because people can read foreign material easily and spend many time in studying their major field</TS>.</IN>
 
<BO1><MI1><TR>Above all</TR>, I would choose to invent electronic translators, for reading foreign material easily.</MI1> <SI1>Many students used to read for foreign books to study their major. <TR>However</TR>, most of students, being not familiar with foreign languages, have the difficulty of reading - when they read foreign materials, they might not understand contents. <TR>Thus,</TR> electronic translators help them to read foreign information easily and broaden their knowledge through it. <EX><TR>For example, </TR> when I do my homework, I often refer to Internet. <TR>However</TR>, I am difficult to read it because lots of information in Internet was English information.</EX> I think electronic translators is very useful in that case.</SI1> </BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>What’s more</TR>, people can spend many time in learning their major field.</MI2> <SI2>Many students expand time and effort on studying foreign languages in order to enter a graduate school or get a job. It interfers with their major study because learning foreign languages takes them away lots of time. <TR>Therefore,</TR> electronic translators may escape people from studying foreign languages and make them spend the time in studying major fields. <EX><TR>For instance,</TR> I averagely study English for three hours per day to enter a graduate school. Learning English imposes a heavy burden on me; I often don’t complete my homework due to lack of time</EX>. In this case, electronic translators will free me from learning English and help me to concentrate upon my major.</SI2> </BO2>

<CO><TR>As shown above,</TR> I want to make electronic translators. There are two reasons for this: to read foriegn material easily and to spend many time in studying their major field. I am sure that electronic translators escape many people from burden of learning foreign languages.</CO>
column23: I think you have missed the point of the question.  It is asking if you could invent something, what would you invent? If you want to invent a translator, what would make it better than the translators that are already out there?

column1: 723&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? One should never judge a person by external appearances. Use specific reasons and details to support your answer.
column3:
<IN><TS><TR>Basically,</TR> I agree with the position that one should never judge a person by external appearances.</TS> <TR>As a matter of fact,</TR> I believe that one cannot know a person throughly through only external appearances. There are two reasons to support this perspective. People cannot understand one’s characteristic and grip one’s ability. </IN>

<BO1><MI1>The primary reason is that people cannot grasp one’s character by means of external appearances.</MI1> <SI1>When a person makes a friends or recuruits new employees, their character is very important. This is because those who have bad character may bring him negative influence. To grip one’s personaility, people should know comprehensive traits such as one’s values and human relations. it is impossible to grasp one’s traits by only external appearances. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> I have served as a manager in a computer company since 1995. When I select new employees, I value human nature above external appearances. This is because those who have generous mind can unite other employees. <TR>Thus, </TR>solidarity of employees would make our company the sound firm.</EX></SI1> </BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>What’s more,</TR> people cannot know one’s ability throughly by external features.</MI2><SI2> In many companies, managers want to select capable employees. To know one’s ability and potential power, they should watch one’s achievements and results of qualified tests. This is because they guarantee one’s ablility. <TR>However,</TR> external appearances cannot be the standard of judging one’s capability. <EX><TR>For instance,</TR> I have no good appearance. When I applied a computer company, managers in the company are interestied in my carrier more than my outward appearance. Because they selected me, I could work for the company and have developled new products. <TR>After that,</TR> many managers in my company begun to recognize that they should not judge one by outward appearances.</EX></SI2> </BO2>

<CO><TR>As Stated above,</TR> I agree with those who claim that one should never make out a person by external appearances. There are two reasons for this: not to understand one’s characteristic and not to grip one’s ability. I am sure that judging a person by appearances results in not grasping one’s true character.</CO>
column23: This is a pretty good essay, but the writing is a little messy.  It is hard to pick out what is important and what isn't.  Try to clean it up a little.  Also, try to incorporate your reasons into your thesis statement.

column1: 724&Plants can provide food, shelter, clothing, or medicine. What is one kind of plant that is important to you or the people in your country? Use specific reasons and details to explain your choice.
column3:
<IN>Plants provides us with food, shelter, clothing or medicine. <TR>All of them,</TR> I think that an important thing of their function is to supply food. The Eastern people eat various plants, especially gains such as rice, barley, bean and millet. <TS>In my country, Korea, we are going to eat rice. I think that one of the significant gains is the rice.</TS></IN>
 
<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> rice is the principle food and our convention in Korea.</MI1> <SI1>Our ancestor had eaten the rice as their basic diet. We also are going to have it. <TR>In the future,</TR> our offspring will take it. Even thought other gains such as wheat import from another country the present time, we ought to take our customary food. Because rice is our characteristic tradition. <SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly,</TR> there is a saying ■The rice is an adjuvant■.</MI2><SI2> Adults are used to tell us if we don't have breakfast, we will not powerfully be active. Actually, when I didn't eat breakfast I'm not able to anything. <TR>In that time,</TR> I realize the significance of food. <TR>Therefore</TR> I surely have a meal although I will lately arrive my job site. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In summary,</TR> the rice is the most significant food in my country. And we should develope a variety of goods using rice. It will make to increase rice consumption rate so our children have close friendship. Rice is our custom and if we don't protect it, our tradition will vanish.</CO>
column23: Your essay doesn't make very much sense.  The first main paragraph I can understand - eating rice is a tradition in Korea and a lot of people depend on it.  The second paragraph I don't understand.  It sounds like you are saying eating breakfast is important.  What does that have to do with rice?  Finally, how does the presence of rice have anything to do with children having  good friendships? You need to think about this more and come up with better reasons why rice is the most important grain in Korea.

column1: 725&Some students prefer to study alone. Others prefer to study with a group of students. Which do you prefer? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>There are many students who have their own study habits. Some prefre to study alone and others prefer to study with a group of students. <TS><TR>From my experiences,</TR> I am sure that studying with a group students is better than studying alone. There are three main reasons why I prefer to study with a group of students : this way is more efficient, save studying time, and remove wrong fixed concepts.</TS> </IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>Firstly,</TR> studying with a group of students is more efficient than studying alone.</MI1><SI1><EX> When I was a university student, I usually prepared for the exam by studying with a group of students during an exam term. We could share information of the test and find out the solution by discussing problems which is hard for me to solve by myself.</EX></SI1> </BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly,</TR> those who study with a group of students can save studying time.</MI2><SI2>If I study by myself, I will have to go to the library to seek for a solution of difficult problems. It require a great deal of time. By studying with a group of students,<TR> however</TR>, I save much time to ask them these problems and acquire their answers. </SI2></BO2>

<BO3><MI3><TR>Finally,</TR> to study with a group of students helps me get rid of wrong fixed conceps.</MI3><SI3> By studying them together, I can find out and correct my errors. If I studied alone, it shoud take me much time to discover my problems.</SI3></BO3> 

<CO><TR>In conclusion.</TR> to study with a group of students has many advantages. This way is very efficient, saves studying time, and helps correct my errors. <TR>For these reasons,</TR> I prefer to study with a group of students.</CO>
column23: A good essay, although a little short.  You make good points!  Try to turn your thesis statement into one strong statement.

column1: 726&You have received a gift of money. the money is enough to buy either a piece of jewelry you like or tickets to a concert you want to attend. use specific reason and details to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>If people have gotten a gift of money, some people would like to buy a piece of jewelry, while others would like to buy a ticket to a concert. <TS><TR>In my case,</TR> i would buy a ticket to a concert, because concerts must give me pleasant memories that i will never forget in my life.</TS> With the use of specific explanation, i will demonstrate why i would like to purchase a ticket for a concert.</IN>
 
<BO1><MI1><TR>Firstly,</TR> i can be pleased with concerts, whenever I recollect experiences in concerts</MI1>. <SI1><EX><TR>For example,<TR> i have been to several concerts which i was really longing to go to. Those concerts gave me pretty great memories. i've remembered all experiences in concerts, such as dancing, singing loudly, and shouting. Whenever i think of concerts i enjoyed, i feel really happy, and i feel like going to concerts again.</EX> Maybe, wearing jewelry i really want would also give me gaiety, but i think the pleasure is quite different from it in concerts, i want to feel great whenever i remind of concerts i have had fun with.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly,</TR> concerts help me lower stress level.</MI2> <SI2>I believe people must get away from work, and sometimes enjoy and relax themselves. <TR>Nowadays,</TR> people are anxious to earn money.<TR> Probably,</TR> that somewhat reflects an aspect of the present world where money is everything. <TR>However,</TR> people require to free away from work. i think one of ways is going to concerts. <EX>For example, i usually get stress easily, because i feel insecure about my future, so, for me, releasing stress is sometimes needed to stick to hard work again. </EX><TR>Therefore,</TR> i would rather buy a concert ticket than buy jewelry. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, people have different opinions in making a choice between jewelry and concert tickets. It depends on what is important to them. <TR>In my case,</TR> i would like to get tickets for a concert, because it gives me everlasting happiness, and release stress to be refreshed and to be energized</CO>
column23: This is a very good essay!  You make your points well. I think in the second main paragraph you need to explain a little better how work stress is relieved by going to a concert.  Also, pay attention to your use of transitions.  If you have three in three sentences in a row, that's too many. Otherwise, good job!

column1: 727&In some countries, teenagers have jobs while they are still students. Do you think this is a good idea? Support your opinion by using specific reasons and details.
column3:
<IN>Some people think that it is not good for teenagers to work when they are still students. They say that it will take away their time to study. <TR>However</TR>, I don’t agree to their their thought. <TS><TR>Of cource,</TR> if most of their time is spended on their work, it will probably harm their academic grade. <TR>Yet</TR> if the time spended in work is appropriate and not excessive, it will provide students more advantages than disadvantages.</TS></IN>
 
<BO1><MI1><TR>Firstly</TR> ,what I want to mention as the advantage of working career when they are students is the chance of getting responsibility.</MI1><SI1><TR> In fact,</TR> many teenagers don’t have the responsibility these days. They go to school , study , have a lunch and come back home as their teachers and parents want them to do. They can’t have the feeling they are doing something for their own and it definitely depends on their conduct. <TR>However,</TR> if a student has a part time job which is proper for their schedule, they can do their work feeling satisfaction when the work is well done. Even if they make a mistake , they can get a sense of responsibility that will never be attained from daily school life.</SI1> </BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly,</TR> they can easily appreciate their parents’ effort while they are working and earning money.</MI2><SI2> Generally most students think it natural to get school fee and other cost from their parents. <TR>However,</TR> if they have their own job and find a difficulty in earning money, they eventually realize their parents’ effor for them. <TR>Moreover,</TR> they will be more prudent in spending money from then on.</SI2> </BO2>

<CO><TR>Besides,</TR> during their various work career, they can find their true talent and think about what they can do well in the future. <TR>Like this,</TR> some students can find their genuine aptitude more easily through an extra activity than boring school life. <TR>For these reasons,</TR> I agree that it is good for teenagers to have extra work other than study if it is not excessive. Having a job will give them not only a sense of responsibility and money , but also a new chance for finding their hidden talent.</CO>
column23: You make some really excellent points in this essay.  Your ideas are great, but you need to clean up your writing just a little bit.  The idea of your thesis is great - now combine the sentences to create one strong sentence.  Your main ideas are good and so are your supporting ideas, but it looks like your conclusion could be separated into a third paragraph and a conclusion.  I like the idea of a job helping students find their hidden talents.  Talk more about that.  Give examples.  THEN you can give a conclusion.  Finally, watch your transitions.  If you have three transitions in three sentences in a row, then there are too many.

column1: 728&Your school has received a gift of money. What do you think is the best way for your school to spend this money? Use specific reasons and details to support your choice.
column3:
<IN>suppose there can be varied about ways, which are essential in how to spend a gift of money for one’s school. <TS><TR>In my perspective,</TR> I believe that this money should be spent to expand scholarship. There are two reasons for this. Expanding scholarship inspires students to study hard. School can, moreover, get higher reputation.</TS> </IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>For one thing,</TR> expanding scholarship encourages students to study hard.</MI1><SI1> There are many students who have to earn their tuition to study continuously in school. If a school brings students with exellent results a scholarship, they must study hard to get a scholarship. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> the university which I went to gives many students a scholarship. Because many classmates, included me, are not so rich, we should earn our tuition. <TR>Thus,</TR> we studied hard and then can get a scholarship. <TR>After that,</TR> we could enter large companies due to our exellent grade.</EX> I think expanding scholarship encourages us to study hard.</SI1></BO1> 

<BO2><MI2><TR>What’s more,</TR> expanding scholarship increase reputation of a school.</MI2> <SI2>To get a scholarship, many applicants with exellent grade apply the school of expanding it. Since the school have superior students, the level of the school is increased due to their active research and distinguished papers. <TR>Thus,</TR> the school can get higher reputation.<EX><TR> For instance,</TR> my university have brought fifty percent of all students a tuition. This exceptional condition attract many applicants’ attention. When receiving applications ended, competitive rate of my university is very high and many superior applicants applied it. <TR>Therefore</TR>, my university can get higher reputation by means of exellent students.</EX></SI2> </BO2>

<CO><TR>Generally,</TR> different people have different attitudes regarding how to expend a gift of money for one’s school. <TR>In my view, however,</TR> expanding scholarship has been generally considered as the most important for these reasons: to inspire students to study hard and to bring one’s school higher reputation. It is impossible to overstate the importance of expanding scholarship.</CO>
column23: Excellent essay!  Very good job overall.  My only suggestion is to combine your opinion with your reasons to make your thesis statement into one good, strong sentence.

column1:
729&A person you know is planning to move to your town or city. 
What do you thing this person would like and dislike about living in your town or 
City? Why? 
Use specific reasons and details to develop your essay.
column3:
<IN>All places where people live have advantages and disadvantages. <TR>Likewise,</TR> My town has merits and drawbacks. <TS>If a person I know move to my town, he or she would be good felt about such aspects as park, convenient facilities, but he or she would be bad felt about such aspects as education, environment.</TS></IN>
 
<BO1><SI1>My town has a large number of famous parks. People come to park in the weekend because of its outstanding scenery, a lot of exercise instruments. <TR>In addition,</TR> my town locates in center of traffic. Buses which have various routes pass through my town, and a subway station locates about three minute distances. <TR>Besides,</TR> many convenient building is dotted in my town.</SI1></BO1> 

<BO2><MI2><TR>On the other hand,</TR> my town isn’t having only merits.</MI2><SI2> Although my town have great parks, other nature environments except them are seriously polluted. <TR>For instance,</TR> when people go creek in my town, they must stop nose because of creek’s bad smell. <TR>Also.</TR> A person moving in my town can’t see education facilities around my town. For going school, children must take buses or subway. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> people would be felt not only advantages but also disadvantages wherever they move. My town also has merits and drawbacks. While having such good facilities as park, traffic means, convenient facilities, my town has drawbacks such as environmental pollution, lack of school. I think my town is a good place for living although having drawbacks.</CO>
column23: This is a very good essay, and I think it could only be improved with more development.  I'm sure your town has many more advantages than you talk about.  It would be good to learn more about the ones you DO talk about, too - make your paragraphs a little longer!  Talk a little more about the advantages and disadvantages of your town.  Also, your disadvantage paragraph has a main idea but your advantage paragraph does not!  Fix that, and you will have a great essay.

column1: 730&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? It is more important for students to study history and literature than it is for them to study science and mathematics. Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3:
<IN>As technologies develop increasingly fast, the amounts of information are enormous. How to choose to learn in lots of materials? Some people say that it is more important for students to study history and literature and other people say that to study science and mathematics it is more important for them. <TS><TR>In my opinion,</TR> I am strongly in favor of the opinion that to study science and mathematics plays by far more pivotal role than history and literature because those have enabled us a comfortable life and are the key to protect the nature as well as to solve the food scarcity.</TS> </IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First,</TR> I support math and science because they have provided us with a more convenient life.</MI1><SI1> Without scientists' pursuit of knowledge related to math and science, we cannot live the modernized, information world. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> a creative inventor Edison, made a light bulb. Until prehistoric time, people should sleep early because there was no light at night or used wood for fire. With the invention of Edison's light bulb, we can study at night and work far into the night.</EX> Edison applied to mathematics and science in his experiment, not history and literature to make the light bulb. <TR>Therefore</TR> I support the importance of these two subjects for our modernized world. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR> without math and science, we can't imagine what we should do to settle the problem such as protecting the nature as well as solving the food scarcity in the world.</MI2><SI2> <EX><TR>For instance,</TR> from the first industrial revolution in England, we used the steam as a source of power. Then by scientists' strenuous efforts in order to reduce pollution of Mother Nature, they invented electricity in 1950; Otherwise it was impossible without math and science.</EX> <TR>Thus</TR> we could reduce the pollution more than past. <TR>As well as that,</TR> we faced food lack problem in the world in the near future. So scientists are doing experiments to make alternative food to provide people sufficiently. I believe this will come true in about ten years. So it is desperately need not only to develop the replacement for rice or wheat but also to abate the nature pollution. I think that this will be settled only by scientists.</SI2> </BO2>

<CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> I disagree with the statement that it is more important for students to study history and literature than it is for them to study science and mathematics because of math and science's contribution to in our comfortable life and their potential to guard our nature and ensure our subsistence in the world.</CO>
column23: An A+ essay! Great work!  My only suggestion is to make your conclusion a little less similar to your introduction.

column1: 731&Many people visit museums when they travel to new places. Why do you think people visit museums? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>There are several museums in my town where is considered as one of historical place in my country. From childhood, visiting museums and studying about history there became the big part of my memory. <TR>Also,</TR> we have many tourists to look around historical places in my town including old castle, battle place and museums. The interesting fact is that from young children to the old, no one can even think about sightseeing at my town without visiting museums. <TR>Fortunately,</TR> I could find some specific reasons why people like to visit museums when they travel throughout my personal experience to new places.</IN> 

<BO1><MI1><TR>Firstly,</TR> I believe that the fastest way to understand history can be visiting museums at any place including when people travel in overseas.</MI1><SI1><EX> I had an experience to show the museum in my town to one of foreigner who came from Japan and try to explain about history and the relationship between two countries a long time ago. I remembered that she was surprised to hear my explanation about historical stories since she had never learned about that before. <TR>After that,</TR> she took some pictures whenever she found interesting place which were related with the history in my country and even asked many questions to me.</EX> No matter what kind of history a country has, visiting museum and having an experience to look around many historical places and tools will be very helpful to understand one country’s history as well as culture.</SI1> </BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly,</TR> visiting museum is very essential to young generation to understand history and culture at the view of education.</MI2> <SI2>Young people are sometimes having difficulty in understanding their ancestor’s culture and thought if they don’t have a chance to learn about history. <TR>In other words</TR>, old people are in charge of making them understand a country’s history and culture throughout the education no matter how long it will take. Because my country has such a long history, it is so hard for young people to understand history only from book. That’s why many schools are trying to take visiting museums as a essential part in the course of history class. That’s why I still remember when I went to museum and did some project such as reporting, drawing and team research. As a part of educational policy, visiting museum is very essential factor for young people to understand history. </SI2></BO2>

<CO>To be summed up, human being is considered not to be able to exist without past time. We have to remind our offspring not only to agree with this opinion, which we are connected with past time but also to learn about history and culture whether they are interested in history or not. Visiting museum is one of my favorite hobbies whenever I travel. I’ve been learning history and culture of my country throughout the experience to visit museum and also my parents’ discipline to study history from my childhood. There is a word, “ Rome was not built for a day” which reminds me to think about importance of history. Museums are the right place to see one country’s history and culture at one time.</CO>
column23: This is a good essay except for one huge problem - there is no thesis statement!  Why do you think people visit museums?  Make sure you say why in your introduction.

column1: 732&Some people prefer to eat at food stands or restaurants. Other people prefer to prepare and eat food at home. Which do you prefer? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN><TS>Even though food in restaurants may not be as nutritious as in your own houses, I prefer to eat outside because of its a lot of advantages. It helps people to save time and to refresh themselves.</TS> The reasons and examples why I prefer to have lunch or dinner outside will be following. </IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, if you eat at a restaurant, you can save your time.</MI1><SI1> You do not have to buy materials to make, you do not have to spend lots of time making foods, and you do not have to be exhausted washing dishes. <TR>On the contrary,</TR> if you prepare food at home, it takes much time to prepare and clean it. It is known that time can earn money nowadays. Having dinner and wasting time can waste money. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI1><TR>Secondly</TR>, eating food outside can refresh you.</MI2><SI2> Go to a fancy restaurant when you feel tired. In the restaurant, you might have a fantastic dinner with a glass of wine listening classical music. After dinner, you would be in a happy mood for a while.</SI2></BO2> 

<BO3><MI3><TR>In addition,</TR> it is indeed convenient to eat at food stand.</MI3><SI3> When you may want to go shopping around mall, you do not have to worry about to prepare and have lunch. You can simply have lunch in the mall at food stands. After lunch, you can also look around more and finish the shopping. </SI3></BO3>

<CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> I like to eat outside better than to eat at home. Having food outside has plenty of benefits like saving my time, refreshing myself, and its convenience. When I eat outside, I just consider what is the most nutritious food.</CO>
column23: Good essay!  You make good points and have organized your thoughts well.  You could make your paragraphs a little longer.  Also, try to make your thesis statement into one strong sentence.

column1: 733&Some people prefer to eat at food stands or restaurants. Other people prefer to prepare and eat food at home. Which do you prefer? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>My mom has been running a small franchise of cooker a few years ago. She is not only selling many kinds of cookers but also teaching how to cook with those cookers. My family seldom goes out since she started cooking for us every meal instead of finding a good place to eat or ordering food as many other mom do. My family got used to my mom’s home made cooking as well as didn’t try to go out and buy some food as much as we can. <TS>I know that there are several reasons why some people including my family prefer to eat food at home.</TS> </IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> I sometimes say that I can not even compare food between at home and at restaurant since I get used to eat my mom’s food at home.</MI1><SI1> Not only she is one of best cook but, it is so hard to find tasty food as much as my mom’s food at any place. I know some people who really like to go out and try to eat food at restaurant or food stands around me. I found there were some commons among them such as they don’t like to cook and they are so busy to prepare and eat food at home. Compared with them, my family including my two sisters is really enjoying making food though sometimes it is not exact taste what my mom make. <TR>In addition,</TR> we don’t have any idea that eating food at restaurant can provide us same amount of nutrition as much as mom’s home made cook does. My mom always reminds us not to put many chemical sources when we cook but there are many places, no matter what kind of restaurant it is, to make food with many chemical sources which are not good for health when they cook. I even heard that some people who run food stands or restaurants are not willing to give their food at restaurant to their kids. This gave me very critical reason why I prefer to eat food at home though it sometimes takes long time to make food than I can save much time if I go out. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly,</TR> eating at home can be related with family affection with several reasons.</MI2><SI2> I’ve spent certain time to help mom prepare food or set the table every meal when I stay at home. <TR>In modern society,</TR> it is so hard to gather whole family member at one time more and more though they are living together. <EX>In the case of my family, we can have dinner together only one time among three times of meal a day. When we have dinner at home, we try to help set the table after school and sometimes we’ve got a chance to learn how to cook from mom. We enjoy food and talk each other even after dinner with having tea together.</EX> I believe that preparing food and eating at home will be very helpful for all family members to spend time together and know each other. No matter how busy we are, we need to save some time to spend together such as making food and having tea.</SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>To be concluded,</TR> eating food has been even included into essential one among three categories what human being need for living with house and clothing. This tells us how important eating food for people will be. No matter how long cooking time will take, it is very important to make food at home especially for parents who have child or children. There is a word, “ No food can be made without effort”, which means if we do an effort to make food, it will taste good”. No one can think about nutrition when they make food for their own family. <TR>Also,</TR> children can learn about how to cook as well as what they should do when they have meal together at home. In a view of education, we don’t need to worry about the relationship between parents and their kids if they have many chances to spend time together such as having meal and tea. I’ll also teach my children how to prepare and cook food in the future as often as I can.</CO>
column23: This is a good essay, but I think you are trying to stuff too much information into the allotted paragraphs.  Say only what is necessary.

column1: 734&What do you consider to be the most important room in a house? Why is this room more important to you than any other room? Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3:
<IN>Some people think that the study room is the most important room in their house ,and Others say the dining room. <TS><TR>However,</TR> If someone ask me what do I consider the most important room in my house, I will say that the restroom is more important than any other room in my house.</TS> There are two main reasons for my view : sanitation and a busy room. </IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>Firstly</TR>, the restroom is the symbol of sanitation of the house.</MI1> <SI1>It is said to go to the restroom and look at its condition if you want to know how sanitary the house is. This means that the restroom is the most important room in sanitation of the house. <EX><TR>For examples</TR>, When I visited the house of my friend two years ago, I was surprised at the huge room and luminous furniture. Going into the restroom, <TR>however,</TR> I was much disappointed and unpleasant to know that the restroom was unclean, smelly, and messy.</EX></SI1> </BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly,</TR> the restroom is the busiest room in the house. </MI2><SI2>The room which is most members of the family go into and out of most frequently every morning is the restroom. As most people are very busy every morning, my family is no exception, too. <EX>Father, mother, an old brother and I used to compete to enter the restroom every morning because all of us had to go to company on time. <TR>Recently,</TR> since we moved to the house with two toilets, we came to be less competitive.</EX></SI2> </BO2>

<CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> since it represents cleanness of a house and is the most frequent room, I think that the restroom is more important than any other room in a house.</CO>
column23: This is definitely the most entertaining essay I've read so far!  You defend your point quite well and your argument is quite interesting.  I may never be able to enter someone's house without looking at their bathroom again. However, I don't know if I would call it the busiest room in the house - maybe the most urgently necessary?  Great job!

column1:
735& It has recently been announced that a large shopping center may be 
Built in your neighborhood. Do you support or oppose this plan? Why? 
Use specific reasons and details to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>Unlike a small market, grocery, A large shopping center include a large number of such convenient facilities as ice-cream shops, cloth shops, cosmetic shops, or restaurants. Although a large shopping center cause people to crowd and traffic to complicate, it brings about benefits in a tax, and employs many people. <TR>Also</TR>, by building in my neighborhood, I and my family members can conveniently buy many things rather than.</IN>
 
<BO1><MI1><TR>First,</TR> by building in my region, my region will obtain economical benefits.</MI1><SI1> My region will accept tax from a shopping center and people who sell certain things will obtain money. <TR>Furthermore,</TR> My region will invest earned money for region’s environment and economy. <TR>As a result,</TR> my region would be developed rather than. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2>Also, I and my families can use a large number of facilities.</MI2><SI2> Convenient facilities almost aren’t around my region. We must walk about twenty minutes for using convenient facilities. <EX><TR>For instance,</TR> I must go about thirty minutes for buying clothes, cosmetics, and common items.</EX> But, if building a shopping center, I can go in only several minutes for buying such things. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TS><TR>In conclusion,</TR> I will support plan which builds a large shopping center in my neighborhood. Although it brings such disadvantages as complex traffic, dirty street, it brings more advantages. My region can earn more money, and we can enjoy more things. <TR>As a result,</TR> my region would be more developed and more activated.</TS></CO>
column23: Your thesis statement should be in the introduction - right now, it is in the conclusion.  Try to summarize the main idea of your essay in one sentence.  Your reasons are good, but you could use more examples and a little more content.

column1: 736&Awards and prizes are given for excellence in various fields. Do these awards and prizes serve a useful purpose? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>We sometimes received awards and prizes for our excellence in some fields. Whenever they are given to us, we are happy. There is no exception on this view. <TS><TR>Also</TR> There are some reasons that awards and prizes are good.</TS></IN>
 
<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all, as I mentioned before,</TR> we are happy after winning in various fields, and receiving awards.</MI1><SI1> It makes me self-confident. This is the fundamental force that I can do my best.</SI1> </BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>On the other hand,</TR> because It's an expression about my superb ability, it means that I am considered as an expert in those fields.<MI2> It's very important factor of our society. </BO2>

<BO3><MI3><TR>Finally,</TR> to receive awards and prizes means financial aids.</MI3> <SI3><EX><TR>For example,</TR> sometimes gold and money are given as alternatives of awards and prizes.</EX> They help us resolve financial problems. </SI3></BO3>

<CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> there are three reasons that awards and prizes are good. It makes me happy, means that others agree with my superb ability, and helps me resolve financial problems. That's why I surely agree on this point of view.</CO>
column23: This essay just barely answers the question.  You need to add more content - details, research, examples, etc.  Try to add more meat to this outline.

column1: 737&You have been told that dormitory rooms at your university must be shared by two students. Would you rather have the university assign a student to share a room with you, or would you rather choose your own roommate? Use specific reasons and details to explain your answer.
column3:
<IN>If I entered the university that I wanted and confronted to share the room by two students, whether I choose my own roommate for dormitory room or my university assign a student to share a room with me is somewhat important matter to me. It is related to successful adaptation to my first school life. <TS><TR>Concerning it considerably,<TR> I think sharing with one I don't know well is more beneficial in the beginning of my school work.</TS> </IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> adaptation is one of the most important things at that time when I entered the school.</MI1><SI1> I am not accustomed to the facilities, teachers and students in the university. If I want to be well-adapted, new friend is needed. One of the purposes that school assign a student to share is to give an opportunity to make friends in the school. With your roommate, you can be accustomed to it faster. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><SI2>When I get many friends and fully adapted to the school, I can choose my own roommate for dormitory room. Maybe, one you choose is your first roommate or familiar friend. <TR>Anyway, from then on,</TR> you can have your choice because more important thing than adaptation is to study your own major or make real close friend to help each other when it is needed.</SI2> </BO2>

<CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> when I just entered the university, it is more adequate that my university assign a student to share a room with me because adaptation is important at that time. If you lived for enough time in your school, <TR>from then on,</TR> you can choose your own roommate. I conclude it is the most beneficial way to manage your school life.</CO>
column23: I don't understand your second point.  It doesn't really go with your original point. Try to think of another reason it is good to have a roommate you don't know instead of pointing out that you can get a roommate you DO know later. It makes it sound like you don't really know what you are saying.

column1: 738&What are the important qualities of a good son or daughter? Have these qualities changed or remained the same over time in your culture? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>There is one thing that has never changed for a good long time. That is the relationship between parents and their children. Therefore qualifications that sons and daughters should satisfy are same as they were. <TS><TR>That is,</TR> respecting their parents, behaving theirselves and remaining life-long friends are the factors that are considered requirements for a good son or daughter</TS>.</IN> 

<BO1><MI1><TR>Above all things</TR> a son or daughter have an obligation to respect his or her parents.</MI1><SI1> They deserve it only because they gave birth to them and raise them. Besides they teach how to deal with this tough society, what is good behavior and what is not. They are equal to teachers who accompany through thick and thin. <TR>In many aspects,</TR> they are above teachers who don't give all love from the bottom of their hearts. <TR>Therefore</TR> it is natural to present admiration to those who devote themselves to bringing their children up good people. It is not an oboligation but a right to respect parents.</SI1> </BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly,</TR> a good son or daughter behaves himself or herself.</MI2><SI2> <EX>Think of the time when children do something bad. Even though it's children's business, those who get criticism are not a son or daughter, but their parents.</EX> In case of a celebrity under arrest, her father as well as she acts like sinner. If you really want not to let them down, first of all do not something to embarrass your parents. That's the first step to show your love. <TR>Whenever you go,</TR> don't forget you mirror your parents.</SI2> </BO2>

<BO3><MI3><TR>Last but not least</TR> be a life long friend to your parents.</MI3><SI3> After going through adolescence, a son or daughter is likely to get along with his or her friends rather than with parents. <TR>From that moment,</TR> the distance between them is getting longer and longer. As they get older, they want to make more time to communicate and stay with their son and daughter. Sloughing off the relationship between parents and children, they should share their feelings as grown-up vs grown-ups,</SI3></BO3> 

<CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> a son or daughter need to esteem parents, not to do anything to make their parents lose face and also remain as a good friend for a long time to be called as an excellent child. Furthermore I'd like to stress one more thing. Don't try to carry all those methods into practice at the same time. At first take one step and then it will lead to other steps.</CO>
column23: This is a great essay.  I can tell you really believe in what you are saying.  Good work!

column1:
739&When students move to new school, they sometime face problems. 
How can schools help these student with their problems? 
Give the reasons and examples to explain your answer.
column3:
<IN>Do you have ever seen students who move to new school? Most of them are afraid of new circumstance. 
It take time to became accustomed with new circumstance because at first time they know little about their new classmates, teachers, surroundings and so on. Does the School do nothing but waiting them to accustomed with their surrounding? <TS>I think the school can help them to adjust to new school earlier by giving a guide line.</TS> I discourse about what is the guide line. </IN>

<BO1>I suggest that school has a guild line for them. <MI1><TR>At first,</TR> school should check their knowledge about new school.</MI1> <SI1>School give them a guide line that contain where are the gym, the lab, domestic etc and what is the trait of school rule. When people come to the place first they are confused and often wander. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2>School can guide them also through the other people.</MI2><SI2> Most student who has any friends have a difficulty to attend a new school. They feel lonely and boring. So school has to other classmates take tare of them. All student can be his or her alter mates. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> Ann is his guide mate on Tuesday and have a lunch with the one talking about how the math class are awful or difficult. The other dates, the other students became his guide mate. This will help to make friend easily.</EX> </BO2>

<CO><TR>In short,</TR> a school should has the guide line for both new students and their classmates. Don't forget new school student who getting along with is good to not only themselves, but also the other people: other students and the school.</CO>
column23: You have good ideas for this topic.  I'd like to read more.  Try to add some more content to these paragraphs!  Have you ever been new at a school?  Talk about your experience.  Also, in your first main paragraph, you don't need your first sentence. You already made that point clear in the introduction.  The main paragraphs are to prove why that idea is a good one.

column1: 740&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? All students should be required to study art and music in secondary school. Use specific reasons to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>Some think studying art and music is not needed in secondary school because it is not useful to prepare entrance examination to the university which they want. <TR>In addition,</TR> they think those have little practical adventage to the students. <TS><TR>But from my point of view,</TR> though those give them no direct benefit at that time, I contend it is clearly useful to study art and music in secondary school for several reasons.</TS> </IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> through art and music, you can get more relaxed time from tired life</MI1>.<SI1> Refreshment is one of the most important things to live a life. Especially, that is the time when they must study hard. <EX>When I was a student in secondary school, sometimes I felt sick of studying the subjects like math and science. At that time, art and music gave me new energy. In my room, I listened to my favorite musics or painted something I want on the paper.</EX></SI1> </BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Next,</TR> art and music is essential subjects at that age because those help students find their identities or their own competences.</MI2> <SI2>If they study a few subjects except them, they'll have difficulties to find the appropriate way in their future. All subjects have different purposes and we might want to respect their importances equally.</SI2> </BO2>

<CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> Art and music enable us to be refreshed and occasionally to get over the hard time that he or she would encounter during their school lives. <TR>In addition,</TR> it is better for us to study all the subjects equally in secondary school because we want to find who we are, what I can do well and what is my real competence at that time. <TR>Therefore,</TR> art and music are as fundamental as other important subjects.</CO>
column23: I think you have good points in this essay; however, be careful about the example you use in your first main paragraph.  Someone could look at that and say, "Ok, so why not just let kids listen to music and paint and home? Why do it in school?"  Also, I think you need to defend your second point a little more.  Add an example or a bit of research.  Finally, your conclusion has a few too many transitions.  If you have a transition in three sentences in a row, that's too many.

column1:
741&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? 
People should sometimes do things that they do not enjoy doing. 
Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN><I agree that people should sometimes do things that they do not enjoy doing. <TR>Of course,</TR> the best ideal work is what do work only they want. But people must sometimes work they don’t want by certain force. <TS>Although people have drawbacks when they do hating works, I think it can bring such advantages as patience increase, experience that he or she don’t know.</TS></IN>
 
<BO1><MI1>First, people can improve patience if executing works that they hate.</MI1><SI1> These day, a large number of young people hate what do difficult works. <TR>As a result,</TR> they prone to quit works when they encounter slight difficult troubles. <TR>But,</TR> if they themselves bear and overcome difficult or hate works, they can improve their patience. <TR>Also,</TR> when doing different works, they will solve more readily.</SI1> </BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Also,</TR> people can experience a lot of works that they don’t know.</MI2><SI2> People would be experienced only favorite works to themselves. <EX><TR>For instance,</TR> I do like what play soccer and watch soccer a game. I couldn’t learn other exercises when I went middle school and high school. But, when I played basketball and base ball that I hated with patience, I could learn the exercises’ charming and importance.</EX></SI2> </BO2>

<CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> people would be confronted not only works they like but also works they hate. People must not avoid the works when they face difficult or hate problem. Although the works are hate and difficult works, they can improve patience and experience many works if executing hate works.</CO>
column23: Very good thesis statement and good first main paragraph.  Your point about patience is very good. However, I'm not so convinced by your second main paragraph. If someone hates the work, then they have probably already done it and learned something about it.  If you think it is important to learn about something you hate, back it up with evidence, research and a different example.  You learned basketball even though you didn't like it - did it help you? Are you glad you did it? Why? Explain yourself.

column1: 742&Some people prefer to live in a small town. Others prefer to live in a big city. Which place would you prefer to live in? Use specific reasons and details to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>Nowadays, many people live throughout the country in small towns and in big cities. Some people wants to live in a small town and others want to live in a big city. they must have different sense of value on which place is better. <TS><TR>In my point,</TR> I prefer to live in a big city. Lliving in a big city has several advantages; can travel to other place quickly, enjoy entertainment facilities, gain better education.</TS> </IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>Firstly,</TR> most of the big cities are built a long time ago and has develped for thousands of years. So these cities have very good traffic link to other places.</MI1><SI1> If I want to go somewhere inner city, I can take varies bus or subway. In an rural place, there is few bus to ride and probably no subway. If I want to go outside of the city, I can travel by highway, train, or even airplane. <TR>However,</TR> in a rural place, there Is none of these.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly,</TR> the bigger the city, the large number of people live in it and there would be more entertainment and leisure facilities and in a small city.</MI2><SI2> These include library, movie theater, museum, public office, health club, good restaurant and so on. I can't just live with rice and I need some places to meet friends and enjoy the leisure time.</SI2> </BO2>

<BO3><MI3><TR>Finally,</TR> in a large city there is better education.</MI3> <SI3>There is more number of school in a large city. Education system in a large city is not just good in quantity but also in quality as well. These schools are larger and have better equipped lab. Teachers want to teach in a large city and so maybe teachers in the city are well prepared, too. Also there are more extracurricular-lesson teachers to find.</SI3></BO3>

<CO>Living in a rural area has some advantages, like cleaner environment, but living in an urban area has much larger advantages; faster traffic links, more leisure facilities and better education. <TR>So, in my opinion,</TR> living in a large city is more preferable.</CO>
column23: I can tell that you are a person who loves the city.  I especially like your statement, "I can't live with just rice." It is very personal. You defend your opinion well, although I think you could make your essay a little longer.  Also, try to shorten your thesis statement a little while still keeping all the important information in it.

column1: 743&Some people prefer to watch movies in a theater. Other people prefer to stay home and watch movies on video. Which do you prefer? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>When we are planning to watch a movie, we consider the place where we watch. Some prefer to watch in a theater. Others prefer to do at home. Because people have different tastes each other. <TS><TR>Personally,</TR> I prefer to watch a movie at home.</TS> <TR>Now,</TR> I mention some reasons why I prefer to do that. </IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> Watching at home is more economic in some ways than watching in a theater.</MI1><SI1> I don't need to spend much time buying tickets or going a theater. And, I can save a lot of money. It is so expensive to watch movies in a theater. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly,</TR> I can watch it more comfortable.</MI2><SI2> In a theater, We have to keep a quiet mood all time. <TR>So,</TR> If I want to go a toilet and drinking water, I couldn't do that. And we feel uncomfortable to sit soon.</SI2> </BO2>

<BO3><MI3>Some people tell it is difficult to watch at home not concentrating on movie but also enjoying real feeling.</MI3><SI3> But I can make the mood like a theater with curtains only. It is up to you concentrating.</SI3> </BO3>

<CO><TR>Therefore,</TR> I like to watch movies at home. It is so simple that whenever you want to watch, you can do it. If you know the pleasantness watching movie at home, you'd enjoy it, maybe.</CO>
column23: You really need to make this essay longer.

column1: 744&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? There is nothing that young people can teach older people. Use specific reasons and examples to support your position.
column3:
<IN>There have been a fixed relationship between children and adults, until a few decades ago. It was just order and direction from adults and just obedience for children. <TR>However</TR>, the world has changed. <TS>With the development of science, new technology and new information are created and spread more quickly and even the speed of increase is accelerating. So even old people have to learn throughout their lives and these are normally done from younger people.</TS></IN>

<BO1><SI1><TR>In the past,</TR> the only thing human have to know was how to acquire food and make place to sleep. <TR>In these period,</TR> older people had much larger experiences and could teach the young about the skills.<TR> However nowadays, </TR>new goods especially electric ones like computer, video player or mobile phone, are newly made and updated every day. These are the things that the old people didn't see when they were young. Most of them are afraid of learning new stuff and try to build walls with those things.<SI1><MI1>Young people, <TR>in the other hand</TR>, are confident with fresh scientific equipments and they can teach old people without any dificulties.</MI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2>Also, some old people didn't have enough time or money to learn when they were young and if they want to learn them even now, young people could teach them.</MI2><SI2><EX><TR> For example</TR>, I have seen many academic classes which teach old people to write and to pass the certificate examinations. </EX></SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In my point of view,</TR> most of the information needed to us are taught by older people to younger people, but there are certainly things that younger people can teach older people. These includes how to handle new electronic goods, and how to write and read to illiterate old people. </CO>
column23: Your ideas are pretty good, they just need to be organized a little better.  You need to move your first main idea up to the top of the paragraph.  You also need to write more in your second main paragraph.  There's barely anything there!  Give examples, or add research.  In fact, both main paragraphs could use a little more research. Convince your reader!

column1: 745&It is better for children to grow up in the countryside than in a big city. Do you agree or disagree? Use specific reasons and examples to develop your essay.
column3:
<IN>If parents who have their own children are given the choice of place for children to live in between the countryside and a big city, what would their choices be? Some people may say that the countryside is a better place than a big city, because there is less polluted environment, such as fresh air and water, in rural area than in urban area. <TS>I think, <TR>however,</TR> living in a big city, especially for children has several advantages, so I disagree with the statement that the countryside is better place for children to live in. </IN>

<BO1><MI1>One reason is that living in a big city is safer than in the countryside.</MI1> <SI1>There are a lot of health and medical facilities in a municipal area. In case that children have a severe fever or cold, we can get to the near hospital or medical center. <TR>On the contrary,</TR> in the rural area we can hardly get such service easily. <EX>When I was young, I used to live in a rural area which had two small hospital and once in a midnight I got painful stomachache, I had to go outside to big city, because those two hospitals were closed.</EX> There are also many police stations in a big city, besides a lot or neighbors can help parents take care of their children each other. Therefore the urban life provides more security than rural life.</SI1> </BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover,</TR> children can get better education in a big city.</MI2><SI2> There are a great number of educational facilities from public and private schools to private institution in a large city. We can go to the school library to read books, and we can go the art museum to see the exhibition. <TR>Thus</TR> living in a big city is good for education. </SI2></BO2>

<BO3><MI3><TR>In addition,</TR> there are many kinds of entertainment, such as, big sports complex, large theaters, and refined family restaurants in a huge city.</MI3><SI3> We can see many families go out for the amusement especially on weekends. <TR>On the contrary</TR> in a rural area, although there is some natural museums, they can not fully amuse children at all. So the city life offers more amusement.</SI3> </BO3>

<CO><TR>All things considered,</TR> although there are some drawbacks in a city life for children, the above mentioned advantages can outweigh the disadvantages. <TR>therefore</TR> I think that living in a big city is better than living in the countryside.</CO>
column23: This is a pretty good essay!  Take the part about your disagreement with the prompt out of the thesis statement.  Saying what you feel and why is enough.  Your first paragraph is great - well organized and well developed.  Try to make your next two paragraphs more like that too.

column1: 746&when people need to complain about a product or poor service. some prefer to complain in writing and others prefer to complain in person, examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>When I find a product that I buy or the service for me is very poor, I can have the right to complain about it. If the case isn't pointed out by someone, we can't expect it will be mended properly. <TR>Thus,</TR> complaining method is very important for our better qualified lives. There are two ways to complain ; writing and personal speaking. <TS><TR>In my case</TR>, I prefer to complain in writing rather than in person.</TS> </IN>,

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> when I complain in writing, I can be more careful and tell them all I want to point out logically.</MI1> <SI1>If I complain in person, It is somewhat difficult to say in reasonable way because I don't have enough time to ponder about it. Complaining in writing provides me with serene time to think logically and express enough. Then they'll also react more carefully. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Next,</TR> complaining in writing is more well accepted to them than in person.</MI2><SI2><TR> Nowadays,</TR> most companies are very sensitive to our comment so written article is recorded to be considered. <TR>Thus,</TR> it is more effective to complain in writing. Those who want to provide buyers with contentful products and give them more satisfactory services also want to listen to the consumer's complaint to improve their brand image.</SI2> </BO2>

<CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> if I have discontent about the product I buy or trouble in service, I prefer to complain in writing because I can think carefully, express wholly what I want to tell and it is more efficient way to be recorded for improvement. I think good complaint makes good content. Productive and beneficial compalint is needed now.</CO>
column23: A very thoughtful and well-organized essay.

column1: 747&it has recently been announce that a new high school may be built in your community. Do you support or oppose this plan?
column3:
<IN><TS>I strongly support the plan that a new high school is built in my community. There are two main reasons for this: a new high school is beneficial not only for students but also for residents of my community.</TS></IN>
 
<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> a new high school provides students with better environment to study.</MI1> <SI1>There are about one thousand and eight hundreds students in my community while there are only two highschools. <TR>Thus,</TR> a students has at least fifty classmates, and a teacher should take care of fifty to sixty students by himself or herself. If a new high school is built, students can study more pleasant circumstance with more care of teachers.<SI1> </BO1>

<BO2><MI2>Another reason why a new high school should be built in my community is just for the sake of residents in the community.</MI2> <SI2>In my hometown, there is no proper place such as park where community people can do exercise. A new high school will be open to community people in the moring or afternoon when students are not in the school; people can do exercise in the play ground such as jogging or playing badminton. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> a new high school will offer better environment for students to study in and for community people to do exercise in as well. <TR>Therefore,</TR> my community needs a new highschool.</CO>
column23: I think this has all the makings of a great essay.  Your points are very thoughtful, you just need to add a little information to convince your reader!

column1: 748&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? With the help of technology, students nowadays can learn more information and learn it more quickly. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>We can see advanced technologies surrounding overselves everyday. For example, car, television, etc. But among them all, we are facing the most popular and familiar one, which is called the computer and the internet. Even though some traditional mechanic technology can give some advantages in a learning process, I agree to the statement, especially because of the computer and the internet, that <TS>technology made students learn more information and learn it more quickly.</TS> </IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> we can get more information than usual with this network technology.</MI1><SI1><EX> Let's think about the situation that you want to learn the C++ programming language. Then you can just type "C++ programming language" in famous search sites and get enormous number of reference sites including many self study materials, the amount of which is much larger than that which can be gathered without the internet, e.g. from book stores. </EX></SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly,</TR> we can learn them more quickly.</MI2> <SI2><EX><TR>For example,</TR> in traditional education system, if we want to learn how to make a transister radio, we had to meet some experts or go to a book store to get necessary information. It took some people much time in some cases.</EX> Even though these traditional way of learning is still useful, above technology made it possible for us to find some moving picture files, which shows direct example of making a transister radio, in the internet. We can get immediate guidelines and try doing it ourselves.</SI2> </BO2>

<CO>From these two example, I can say that students who want some information in need can get it more quickly and even better can learn it faster than before this technology called the computer and the internet showed up.</CO>
column23: I have marked your thesis statement as the only necessary part of that long sentence. This is a good essay, but I think you could talk a little more about the subject.

column1: 749&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? People should read only those books that are about real events, real people, and established facts. Use specific reasons and details to support your opinion.
column3:
<IN><TR>Nowadays,</TR> many people read books for some reasons. they learn information they want from the books or read them just for entertainment and refreshment. when I was a student in my university, I must read books related to my major for academic purpose. <TR>Generally,</TR> those would be based on real events, real people and established facts. But after graduation, I begin to read fantastic fictions realizing those are also helpful for my own life.</IN>

<BO1><TS>I think fictions is as important as nonfictions based on real story.</TS> <MI1>They can broaden our creative ability.</MI1><SI1><EX> <TR>For exemple,</TR> "beauty and the beast" is the fable, fantastic story. most people know that story and sometimes wish to be the beauty or prince of it. They can imagine their own story. so do I.</EX> when I go to bed at night, I create my own story. It helps me to broaden my creative ability.</SI1> </BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>In addition,</TR> through reading fictions, we can escape the real world for a while.</MI2><SI2> they make us relaxed to refresh our mind and prepare to begin our daily life vividly. When I am tired of my work, I can refresh my mind and be energetic again. That gives me very precious experience. Even though I am not happy, I can find myself very happy through journey provided by the book. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> those books that are based on fictions like fantastic, scientific or queer story provide us with more creative mind and time to rest preparing to work in real world.<TR> Apparently,</TR> it would be very unbalanced only to read real story for your own life. <TR>Therefore,</TR> I conclude It is very useful and beneficial to read them.</CO>
column23: While I appreciate what you want to say in this essay, it needs to be cleaned up a little before it will be easy to read.  The first sentence of your second paragraph sounds the most like a thesis statement, so it should be in your introduction.  Your points are the reading fiction help inspire creativity and allow the reader to escape from the world.  Focus on defending those two points.  In your conclusion, your statement about only reading non-fiction creating an unbalanced life sounds a little offensive.  Unless you can prove it, don't put it in your essay.

column1: 750&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Playing games teaches us about life. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>It is known to be true that life is similar to playing games. <TR>As a matter of fact,</TR> I am convinced that playing games brings many advantages in various ways. <TS><TR>In particular,</TR> we can learn about life through playing games not only because we are rewarded as our effort but also because we can improve our sociability. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> playing games teaches us there is proper reward for our struggle in life.</MI1><SI1><EX><TR> As an example,</TR> suppose that a man in football team prepares some game. For the game, he exercises ten hours a day and he controls his food. <TR>As a result of this,</TR> he may keep best condition and get a lot of points in the game. There can be no doubt that he would think that his effort brings him appropriate reward.</EX></SI1></BO1> 

<BO2><MI2>In addition to rewarding our effort, we enhance our sociability through playing games.</MI2><SI2><EX> This can be illustrated by my case that I went to honeymoon trip. <TR>In that time,</TR> we had to move together with other couples along same schedule, whom we did not know. <TR>With this in mind,</TR> our trip guide suggested us play beach volleyball. <TR>In our surprising,</TR> we became familiar after game; <TR>moreover,</TR> we could know each other.</EX> This example shows that we improve our sociability while we play games together.</SI2> </BO2>

<CO><TR>As has been previously stated,</TR> I agree with those who claim that we can acquire something about life through playing games. There are two reasons for this: playing games brings us reward about our effort, and it makes us more sociable. <TR>Therefore,</TR> we need to learn about life through playing various games with a wide range of people.</CO>
column23: This is a relatively good essay.  It is pretty well organized, but it needs a little help. First, your second paragraph has way too many transitions.  If you have a transition in 3 sentences in a row, that is too many.  Next, I think you need to add a little more content to your main paragraphs.

column1: 751&What are the important qualities of a good son or daughter? Have these qualities changed or remained the same over time in your culture? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>To be a good son or daughter, there are many rules to take. <TR>But above all</TR>, the most important things are respect and assistance. These qualities have never changed in my culture. Thus, children learn them to be a good offsprings. The custom is very precious and useful to make our country become more unified strongly. If you keep these rules desirably, you would be called good son or good daughter in our society. </IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> to respect old people including my own parents is very important custom in my country.</MI1> <SI1>In the subway train, If the old comes in and there is no seat. the young almost always gives the old his seat. One who don't have the mind to do that is to blame in my culture. We regard him as very rude person and blame his parents. <TR>Thus generally</TR>, parents teach their children the manner to respect the old.</SI1> </BO1>

<BO2><MI2>In addition to respecting the old, good son or daughter assist their parents with all their heart.</MI2><SI2> <TR>In our culture,</TR> their parents are retired and get old enough, their children tell them to live together and assist them until the last day of their parents lives. If they don't assist their parents, even though they have difficulties to live alone, they must be to blame because we admire the virtue of assisting the old.</SI2></BO2> 

<CO><TS><TR>As has been previously stated,</TR> to be a good son or daughter, you must respect the old and assist your own parents.</TS> These qualities have remained the same over time in my culture. If the young break the rule we have preserved preciously, my country would face serious situation like individualism we are wary of and unification of people would be broken before long. These qualities remained the same over time in my culture until now and must be preserved not changed so long.</CO>
column23: This is a pretty good essay, although your introduction lacks a thesis statement.  Take it from the conclusion and put it in the introduction! Your main paragraphs are pretty good. Add some examples to make them even better.

column1: 752&Many people visit museums when they travel to new places. Why do you think people visit museums? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>There are several museums in my town where is considered as one of historical place in my country. From childhood, visiting museums and studying about history there became the big part of my memory. <TR>Also,</TR> we have many tourists to look around historical places in my town including old castle, battle place and museums. The interesting fact is that from young children to the old, no one can even think about sightseeing at my town without visiting museums. <TR>Fortunately,</TR> I could find some specific reasons why people like to visit museums when they travel throughout my personal experience to new places.</IN> 

<BO1><MI1><TR>Firstly,</TR> I believe that the fastest way to understand history can be visiting museums at any place including when people travel in overseas.</MI1><SI1><EX> I had an experience to show the museum in my town to one of foreigner who came from Japan and try to explain about history and the relationship between two countries a long time ago. I remembered that she was surprised to hear my explanation about historical stories since she had never learned about that before. <TR>After that,</TR> she took some pictures whenever she found interesting place which were related with the history in my country and even asked many questions to me.</EX> No matter what kind of history a country has, visiting museum and having an experience to look around many historical places and tools will be very helpful to understand one country’s history as well as culture.</SI1> </BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly,</TR> visiting museum is very essential to young generation to understand history and culture at the view of education.</MI2> <SI2>Young people are sometimes having difficulty in understanding their ancestor’s culture and thought if they don’t have a chance to learn about history. <TR>In other words</TR>, old people are in charge of making them understand a country’s history and culture throughout the education no matter how long it will take. Because my country has such a long history, it is so hard for young people to understand history only from book. That’s why many schools are trying to take visiting museums as a essential part in the course of history class. That’s why I still remember when I went to museum and did some project such as reporting, drawing and team research. As a part of educational policy, visiting museum is very essential factor for young people to understand history. </SI2></BO2>

<CO>To be summed up, human being is considered not to be able to exist without past time. We have to remind our offspring not only to agree with this opinion, which we are connected with past time but also to learn about history and culture whether they are interested in history or not. Visiting museum is one of my favorite hobbies whenever I travel. I’ve been learning history and culture of my country throughout the experience to visit museum and also my parents’ discipline to study history from my childhood. There is a word, “ Rome was not built for a day” which reminds me to think about importance of history. Museums are the right place to see one country’s history and culture at one time.</CO>
column23: This is a good essay except for one huge problem - there is no thesis statement!  Why do you think people visit museums?  Make sure you say why in your introduction.

column1: 753&Some people prefer to spend time with one or two close friends. Others choose to spend time with a large number of friends. Compare the advantages of each choice. Which of these two ways of spending time do you prefer?
column3:
<IN>Some people like to have a lot of friends rather than have few close friends. <TR>On the other hand,</TR> some people prefer to have just few close friends, like soul mate. This is a matter of personal tendency in making friends. <TS>Among these two ways of tendency, having a lot of friends and having one or two friends, I prefer to have as many people as my friends in following reasons.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First,</TR> people who have a wide circle of acquaintances tend to be more open-minded than people who prefer to have few people.</MI1><SI1> They make their friends through talking, listening and sharing feelings with each other. That is the basic step not only to be intimate but also to keep relationship. <TR>Thus,</TR> they usually get used to give attention to other's opinion. <TR>On the other hand,</TR> second type of people who prefer have few friends like to share their emotion with only there friends.</SI1> </BO1>
