column1: 807&Some students prefer to study alone. Others prefer to study with a group of students. Which do you prefer? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer
column3:
<IN><TS>I prefer to study alone.</TS> I think each study style has its own characters and advantages. Therefore the study style must be chosen after considering many affects such as the subject what I study.</IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR> of all, if I will study alone, I can spend time more effectively than stydy with friends. </MI1> <SI1>That because, I can use my time studying what I need to. Moreover, if I study with other people I couldn't study with my study style. For example, I always hear music when I study. However, many people don't like listening music while they study. Therefore I can't spend time effeciently in this situation. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR> of all, I like silent atmosphere. </MI2> <SI2>Because, I can't concentrate on in noisy place. In addition, it is obvious that studying with other people disturbs person's cocentration. </SI2></BO2>

<BO3><MI3><TR>Third</TR> of all, the subject what I learn should be learned alone. </MI3> <SI3>In my country, most homeworks should be done alone, and each person has differents topics or questions. Therefore, if I want to get good grade, I should do my homework alone. </SI3></BO3>

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, because studying alone has many advantages such as good for concentration or grade, I like to study alone with my own study style. </CO>
column23: Cohesive and effective essay

column1: 808&Teachers should get payed according to how much their students learn. Do you agree or disagree?
column3:
<IN><TS>I don't agree with the statement that teachers should get payed according to how much their students learn. Because it has so many drawbacks that it isn't useful not only student's educaion, but also teachers effeficiency.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>Firs of all</TR>, this rule can destroy relationships among teachers. </MI1> <SI1>Teachers who recieve more than other techers should be proud of themselves. However, teachers who recieve less, may dissapoint. therefore, the friendship will be destroyed, consequently the rule cause the decreasing of teacher's accomplishments. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR> of all, if we use this rule, teachers teach their children only about the way of increasing scores. </MI2> <SI2>Because most teahcers want to earn more money than other teachers by increasing student's score. In addition, improved score never be advantageous to improve our educational conditions. </SI2></BO2>

<CO>According to above statements, I don't agree with the statements that teachers should get payed according to how much their students learn. I think that education is the most important business for nation's future developement. However I think this rule not makes our educational conditions improve but decile. </CO>
column23: More supporting information will increase this student's score

column1: 809&A company has announced that it wishes to build a large factory near your community. Discuss the advantages and disadvantages of this new influence on your community. Do you support or oppose the factory? Explain your position.
column3:
<IN>Recently, it has been said that a large factory is being built near my community. <TS>I think there are both disadvantages and advantages to this plan. It would help my community in economic way, however it would pollute the air and harm my community in several ways. </TS></IN> 

<BO1><MI1>One of the biggest advantages of a factory is the employment opportunity it could bring. </MI1> <SI1>Factories need workers, and the wages that factories pay are generally better than those workers can earn in service jobs. People living in my community would get a chance to get better jobs and it would improve my community's standard of living. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>However</TR>, it would harm my community in several ways. </MI2> <SI2>The smoke and trashes from the factory would pollute the air and destroy our natural environment. In addition, noises from building the factory would drive many people out of the community. Building a factory may harm the quality of my community's life. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, building a new factory may be helpful to my community since it would solve the problem of unemployment. On the other hand, my community already has enough factories nearby. More factories would only lower the quality of my community's life. Therefore, I oppose to this plan. </CO>
column23: Weak thesis that does not take a stance

column1: 810&A company has announced that it wishes to build a large factory near your community. Discuss the advantages and disadvantages of this new influence on your community. Do you support or oppose the factory? Explain your position.
column3:
<IN>If someone heard that a company wishes to build a large factory near his/her community, there will be different opinion about that. Some people will say it will cause adverse effect on their community since it will bring environment pollution and traffic congestion. On the other hand, others will say that it will make positive effect on their community since it will develope their community and provide more jobs to people who have no job. <TS>In my opinion, I prefer the latter idea because my town is not developed yet. </TS></IN> 

<BO1><MI1><TR>In the first place</TR>, a large factory will cause disadvantages to the community since it will cause environment contamination and traffic jam. </MI1> <SI1>If a large factory is built, it will 
release dirty waters and dirty airs from chimneys. It can cause water pollution and air pollution to the community. Furthermore, a large number of people and cars from other community will come to the town. So there will be serious traffic jam. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>On the other hand</TR>, a large factory will cause advantages since it will develope our town and provide new job to people from the factory. </MI2> <SI2>If a new factory is built in our community, the company will have more investment to both factory and the town. Therefore, our community can develope more rapidly than before. Moreover, the factory will provide more job to people who still have no job. Since it is a serious social problem of non-working people in Korea, it can be a good solution. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, like all human activities, building a large factory will cause dual effects on the community. Advantages of the factory is that it will cause environment pollution and traffic jam. By contrast, disadvantages of the factory is that it can develope the community and provide new jobs to people who have no job in the community. In my case, since my town is not fully developed yet and there are still many people who have no job, I prefer the latter opinion. </CO>

column1: 811&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? A zoo has no useful purpose. Use specific reasons and example to explain your answer.
column3:
<IN>In my opinion, zoo has no reason to be built. It only stands for filling pleasure of people. It seems to be built to abuse animals. <TS>Since human beings are not the lord of the nature, animals have rights to live in nature.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>The first</TR> disadvantage of building a zoo is that it is only for human being, not for animals. </MI1> <SI1>We are looking over nature where we from. Nature is not owed by human beings. It is lord of itself. We do not have any rights to abuse it. People are merely looking over this fact. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>The second</TR> drawback of a zoo is it can give harmful effect to children. </MI2> <SI2>Some children might think that animals should only be in cage rather than in jungle or forest. However, this is not true at all. Nowadays, we can enjoy watching animals living in nature through internet and television. Compare two kids, one has been a zoo and the other has been watching animals on television. I am pretty sure that child who watch animals through screen would probably have more accurate knowledge about them. He/She would think animals in their right place instead of a zoo. </SI2></BO2>

<BO3><MI3><TR>Lastly</TR>, it gives us unpleasant odor. </MI3> <SI3>If there is a zoo, the owner of it really tries hard to clean up all the mass that animals make. But it might be implausible, since there are so many animals in the zoo. Then, it can give neighboring people terrible environment to live in. </SI3></BO3>

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, I assert that a zoo is useless. We should not build a zoo because of our pleasure. It also gives our children incorrect information about animals. In addition, it can harm the nearby resistance with its unpleasant odor. </CO>
column23: Superficial support information.

column1: 812&It has recently been announced that a new high school may be built in your community. do you support or oppose this plan? why? use specific reasons and detail in your answer.
column3:
<IN><TS>I think that establishing a high school has so many advantages in a few aspects, because It helps to develop economic circumstances of community and can change atmosphere of community better than now.</TS> Through use a couple of examples and specific explanation, I will demonstrate that why I support that plan. </IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, building the school helps the community advance in economic situation.. </MI1> <SI1>In reality in my community, last year a high school was built and then a lot of shops simultaneously appeared around the school so that the economic value of building around the school rose. Our family had some profit too, having buildings around it. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover</TR>, from a lot of shops appearing, we have so much convenience: </MI2> <SI2><EX>for example we can easily buy stationery form the stationery store around the school. And because of appearance of many restaurants such as fast food stores, we could get food easily.</EX> These facilities have ,since, given sufficient convenience </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>thus</TR>, As a result of my experience, I agree to built high school in my community because I think it would give much advantage such as economic profit, commodity facilities and so on. Also I wish that another school would be built in my community especially around my building. </CO>
column23: Could use a little more elaboration on the examples

column1: 813&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Attending a live performance (for example, a play, concert, or sporting event) is more enjoyable than watching the same event on television. Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3:
<IN>Some people like to attend a live event such as a play, concert, or sporting play while other people enjoy watching those events at home. <TS>Between the two choices, I prefer to take part in a live performance. Here are some reasons for my position.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR> of all, you can get out of everyday difficulties or stress through a live event. </MI1> <SI1><EX>For instance, last month I had been to a rock concert, in which I wanted to listen to.a rock music. In the concert, I could scream and yell. In this way, I could remove everyday stress and bad memories at that time.</EX> <TR>In addition to that</TR>, I could feel happiness. Likewise, I believe that attending a live performance is more worthy of taking part in than just watching TV in a couch at home. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2>To be able to get along with your close friends is another reason for attending a live performance. </MI2> <SI2>When I attend a live performance, especially sports event, usually I accompany with one or two of my close friends who have similar favorites or intereste in something. In other words, by just attending a live performance, we can have chances to make and keep good relationship with friends. We can not get those chances only through watching the events on television. </SI2></BO2>
 
<BO3><MI3><TR>Lastly</TR>, we can appreciate a wide range of performance. </MI3> <SI3>Television provides us with only a limited range of scene of the event. Thus, sometimes, you will lose lots of scene of the events, which you like to see. However, if you attend a live performance, you can see whatever you want to see without any limitation on it. You can see other players listening to song by a singer in a music concert. </SI3></BO3>

<CO>As I mentioned above, I prefer to attend a live performance with friends. Since I can feel free from stresses and get good opportunity of making a good relationship with my friends. In addition, I will be able to appreciate the whole mood of a live performance which television can’t convey. </CO>
column23: Poorly written sentences

column1: 814&A gift (such as a camera, a soccer ball, or an animal) can contribute to a child’s development. What gift would you give to help a child develop? Why? Use reasons and specific examples to support your choice.
column3:
<IN>There are a lot of things we can give a child for a gift from a toy, a volley ball to an expensive digital camera. Some people may choose a volley because it can be helpful to the child’s outdoor activity, others may choose the camera because it can capture important aspects of the child. <TS>I think, however, books are most preferable gift for a child : they can give some knowledge, fun and help decide the future.</TS> </IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, books can provide numerous knowledge. </MI1> <SI1>Although we can get the knowledge from teachers in schools, most of the knowledge can be obtained from books. When I was in high school, I was very interested in the world history, however, the school offered so confined information and was boring. Then my father gave me world history books for a birthday present and I got a lot about the world history with those books from ancient Egypt to modern China. Therefore, books are beneficial to the studies of a child </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, books can be a good amusement. </MI2> <SI2>There are many kinds of books from non-fiction novels to more specilalized magazines, among them some books are interesting and fascinating. Once I got the detective storybooks from my Uncle for graduate gift. I was so amused by the intelligence and wit that Sherlock Holmes had that I could not sleep reading those books for several days. Many children like some cartoon books and they spend much time to get fun. Thus books can be a big fun </SI2></BO2>

<BO3><MI3><TR>In addition</TR>, a child can decide his or her future through books. </MI3> <SI3>Books contain a lot of information about profession, people especially young children can find a good source in books which they are interested in. Some celebrity’s biography can deeply influence a child to choose his or her future characters. I could determine my present career : history professor by reading many history books and collecting data from other related books. So, books can make a child’s future. </SI3></BO3>  

<CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, no one denies that a child need other tings to develop such as a toy and a pet. However, on the whole, books can provide a lot of knowledge, fun and career source, therefore books are the best choice. According to the importance of books, we have to be more careful to choose good quality books. </CO>

column1: 815&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Parents are the best teachers. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>I think parents are the most affective people to their children in many ways. But kids have different parents in that some of them give them good education, but some don't. <TS>I disagree with the statement of "Parents are the best teachers" as follow reasons. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>Firs of all</TR>, most of parents are not experts for teaching. </MI1> <SI1>Kids need persons who have affection to study much knowledge to grow normally and nicely. If children only study with parent, most of them hardly can be more great people than their parents. That's why we have a school to educate people. </SI1></BO1>

<BO1><MI1><TR>Moreover</TR>, Few of parents may influence bad effect for healthy growth to the their children if parent have terrible habits such as alcoholic, child abuse, drug addiction. </MI2> <SI2>We can realize it easily by the fact that most of the criminals were grown up from the bad parent. </SI2></BO2>

<BO1><MI1><TR>In addition</TR>, we have specialist like teacher to educate from child to young man who have learned teaching methods in university. </MI3> <SI3> Most of them have enough skills to teach kids. </SI3></BO3>

<CO>All thing considered, Parents can be one of the most effective people, but they are not the best teacher. Therefore, it is perfect situation that parent have good talent in education for children. Also parent need to endeavor to be a role model for children. </CO>
column23: Poor support information

column1: 816&Some people believe that the best way of learning about life is by listening to the advice of family and friends. Other people believe that the best way of learning about life is through personal experience. Compare the advantages of two different ways of learning about life. Which do you think is preferable? Use specific examples to support your preference.
column3:
<IN>There are many ways of learning about life in the course of one’s life time. Some people may argue that it is better to listen to the advice that family or friends give because they can save time and energy. <TS>I think, however, the best of way of learning about life is personal experiences : we can truly understand the meaning of life and get the vital lessons through individual experiences. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, we can learn the life more vividly by experience. </MI1> <SI1>In general, family members and friends have their own specific knowledge and information that the advice from those confined source can hardly apply to the all cases which we encounter in life. Besides, because of the difference: from ability, strength, taste to personality, it is almost out of the question for all people to feel and carry out something in the same way. Here is hypothetical case, when we want to know the importance of health: can the genuine understanding of that be obtained by listening to the opinions of others? The answer is absolutely “no.” Therefore the true meaning of life is provided by individual experiences. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, we can also learn a lot of good lessons through our own experiences. </MI2> <SI2>Someone may give some direct advice to others such as choosing a career or profession. However, that is all. On the contrary, when we have to decide something and there is no help except ourselves, then we should make an arduous effort to achieve our goals. Through that effort we can get the feeling of virtues: diligence, perseverance and honesty. Once I worked in bookstores for part time job, although I did not get much money, I learned the priceless lessons from that experience : the value of money and labor. Thus, in the course of personal experience, we can get some pivotal lessons. </SI2></BO2> 

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, there are some drawbacks in learning about life through direct personal contact: time consuming and the possibility of trial and error. However, the strengths : giving vivid knowledge and lessons outweigh those demerits. Therefore we also should do our best to get some experiences and apply them into real life. </CO>
column23: Some strange constructions. Overall good essay

column1: 817&In some countries, teenagers have jobs while they are still students. Do you think this is a good idea? Support your opinion by using specific reasons and details.
column3:
<IN>We learn a lot of things at school, which are basically knowledge, but there are more we need to know and learn to survive in real world. <TS>Having jobs during the school years help us to experience and learn valuable lessons like social interaction, responsibility, and independence, necessary to live. Though there are a few drawbacks, I think the benefits far overweight any downsides. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1>If we have part-time job, we encounter so many people; managers, coworkers, customers, and so on. </MI1> <SI1>By dealing with these people, we experience social relationship and come to learn how to cooperate and get along with different people, not parents or classmates. There is no doubt that these experiences at early age will prepare for the social life and benefit throughout the whole life. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR> to social relationship, we can also learn responsibility by working. </MI2> <SI2>We know that we get pay as much time as we work and that the manager would hire us for certain period of time as long as we work hard, unless he or she may kick us out. As a result, we come to realize that we must do best on our jobs during working hours. 
Furthermore, despite the status of students we are not dependent upon our parent any more if we work after school hours. The wages we get may not enough to buy what we want, but this little money teach us to budget the monthly pay, set priority what you need, and save the extra money. Slowly and step-by-step we learn finance; how to manage the money you earn, accordingly we become independent</SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, the most evident drawback of part-time job is that the teenagers work so much that they may not study sufficiently, or that they are too busy to participate in extracurricular school activities. For this, parents should make sure that school is prior to job and that let their sons or daughters work only if their grades are good enough to do more than study. School cannot teach everything teenagers need to know and learn, but fortunately they can have part-time jobs giving useful lessons for their life as well as money. </CO>
column23: Choose 1 topic and stick with it.

column1: 818&People remember special gifts or presents that they have received. Why? Give specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>There are a lot of gifts or presents that we receive from other people. Some people may say that the special presents are so nice that anyone who receive them never forget that memory. <TS>I think, however, we remember the gifts , because they can remind us of special date and those who gave them. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, the gifts can remind us of special days. </MI1> <SI1>In general, we receive some gifts on a special day, such as birthday, graduation day and Christmas day. As we never forget the such specific day, we are likely to be aware of the gift which is related to that day. When I was young, my father gave me some books :from fairy tales to detective stories on my birthday every year; whenever I see those books, I remember my birthday. Therefore the presents are closely related to the specific days. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, the gifts can make us think of the people who gave those things. </MI2> <SI2>On the whole, we are likely to get the presents from intimate people such as parents, friends, and co-workers, that we can easily remember the special things when we think of the givers. Whereas my father have given me some books, my mother who used to be a musician have offered me concert tickets since my childhood. I never see those books or tickets without thinking of my parents. Thus, we can remember the gifts because those are connected with the givers. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, although we can not forget the presents because they are very gorgeous and even expensive, above all, however, the present are so intimately related to the particular days and doners that we always remember those thing and people. We should keep in mind that the bottom line is not the price of the present but the mind of the giver. </CO>

column1: 819&When famous people such as actors, athletes and rock stars give their opinions, many people listen. Do you think we should pay attention to these opinions? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>To be famous people, they should do their best in their area. <TS>Thus, when famous people give an announcement about their life or their profession, I think it is worth paying attention. There is probably something for us to learn from them.</TS> </IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR> of all, many people become famous after lots of failure. </MI1> <SI1>They do not give up their will and they do their best. <EX>For example, ChunEae Emm, one of Korean marathoners, was very poor and her parents passed away. Moreover, she should take care of her younger sister. In spite of all this hardship, she exercises everyday. Due to her strong will, she got a gold medal in Olympics. When she made an announcement about her win, she said that she just loved to run and running enabled her to forget all anxieties. Through running, I could get rid of all sorrow.</EX> When I heard about her speech, I was so impressed. I think it was worth watching her speech on TV. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Another</TR> reason that people should pay attention to speech of famous people is that people can follow their route. </MI2> <SI2>Suppose that I want to be a famous director. When famous directors like Alfred Hitchcock give a speech, through their plentiful experience, they gave a point of filmmaking. Thus, it will be good for the prospective director, like me. I agree with the old cliché, experience is best teacher. Of course, we can read their books or see their films but what we hear their speeches is different feeling from reading or watching. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, the famous people have some particular reasons that they become famous. Thus, it is worth listening their speech. People can learn what is important in life and what is good procedure to be success in a particular area. Besides, we can be impressed by their famous speech: ‘I have dream’ by Martin Ruther King. </CO>
column23: A lengthier conclusion will help

column1: 820&people learn in different ways. Some people learn by doing things; other people learn by reading about things; others learn by listening to people talk abot things. Which of these methods of learning is best for you? Use specific examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>There ard many ways to learn. Most people especially learn by reading and listening to people talk about things. Each has own merits. Learning by listening to people has advantages. It can be practical and save time. <TS>But i think learning by reading is better because of providing various , accurate and deep knowledge and giving a chance to get touch with other opinions. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, people can get knowledge about diverse theme whereas topics of listening to people are limited. </MI1> <SI1>People has own taste. Thus people can choose and find information that they have interest in. People casn also get knowledge about things that they cannot experience by reading . </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Next</TR>, people can get deep and accurate knowledge by reading, As most people are not expert, they have a little knowledge. </MI2> <SI2>Books are written by experts of each branch. Therefore 
we can get more profound knowledge. Also, the contents of a book is more belivable because sometimes people are misinformed. </SI2></BO2>

<BO3><TR>Finally</TR>, people can get touch with various views. Since people has a limited relationship, 
learning by listen to people also has a limited to touch different views. As getting tousch with various opinions, psople can have a wide eye. </SI3></BO3>

<CO>We can learn by reading listening to people. The method which fits each person may be different. I have gotten divers and fundamental knowledge through reading many books. I get an open and wide eye by reading, therefore, i think reading is more useful. </CO>

column1: 821&It has been said, “Not everything that is learned is contained in books.” Compare and contrast knowledge gained from experience with knowledge gained from books. In your opinion, which source is more important? Why?
column3:
<IN>People can gain knowledge from books and experience. The knowledge of history or literature is easy to gain from books. However, the knowledge about life is based on experiences. <TS>To me, the experience is more important because wisdom about life is more valuable than physical knowledge from books.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR> of all, people can learn lots of things from books. </MI1> <SI1>Reading books is the best way to learn some special subjects: history, literature and science. When I was a high school student, I read lots of history books. Through them, I learned when my country is established, what our myth is and what Korean War is. In addition this, I read lots of fiction books and it gave me what people give value on. To gain knowledge about fact such as history, reading book is the best way. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>However</TR>, the knowledge from books is good for our common sense but it cannot teach me what friendship is and what life is. </MI2> <SI2>Of course, I read lots of books that treat friendship but it is totally different from the reality. After I broke up with my friends, I realized that what my fault was and how important the patience was. Even though I read patience is important between friends, it less affects than experience. In other words, I agree that experience is the best teacher. Books can explain that when we fight with our friends, how much terrible it is but they cannot explain about my own feeling. </SI2></BO2>

<BO3><EX>To compare reading books with experience, suppose that you read about Canada from book and visit Canada. In spite of lots of knowledge from books, one visiting Canada will be more memorable. I read Canada is famous for maple but I have no idea how Canadian are proud of it. However, when I visited Canada, I realized that Canadian really like their symbol, maple. It shows us how much important experience is. </EX></BO3>

<CO>I think sharing life with people is more important than increasing common sense. <TR>Thus</TR>, experience is more significant. Reading book gives us lots of information so it is very useful to gain physical knowledge but it cannot provide what life is. Experience will be the best way to learn about life. </CO>
column23: There is disorientation of the main idea throughout the essay

column1: 822&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Parents are the best teachers. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>Through their life, most people are influenced by their parents, friends, teachers, and so forth. It is hard to determine who is the most crucial person of all advisers. Some people consent that protectors are the best instructors. On the contrast, others feel that pupils, teachers,or neighbors is the best professor. <TS>In my opinion, parents are the best admirable teachers for their children as parents are the best supporters and good models for youngsters. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>In the first place</TR>, because parental affections and attentions to their children encourage kids not to give up the difficult learning, parents are the best supporters for offsprings with much love attention. </MI1> <SI1><EX>For example, in 2001, i took a test in mathematics from January to september and my grade was in the forties during the periods. Because of my low grade, i suffered from the bad headache ,trouble and feel sorry for my parents. My parents, however, did not scold severely me for bad mark and inspired me to try again. Thus, i would try to follow the respectable parents's behaviors. therefore, decent parents could be the best instructor for me.</EX> Of course ,others offered me righteous basis of action but my parent always gave me the best lesson and serve me the fully models. </SI2></BO2>

column1: 823&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? A zoo has no useful purpose. Use specific reasons and example to explain your answer.
column3:
<IN>In my opinion, zoo has no reason to be built. It only stands for filling pleasure of people. It seems to be built to abuse animals. <TS>Since human beings are not the lord of the nature, animals have rights to live in nature. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>The first</TR> disadvantage of building a zoo is that it is only for human being, not for animals. </MI1> <SI1>We are looking over nature where we from. Nature is not owed by human beings. It is lord of itself. We do not have any rights to abuse it. People are merely looking over this fact. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>The second</TR> drawback of a zoo is it can give harmful effect to children. </MI2> <SI2>Some children might think that animals should only be in cage rather than in jungle or forest. However, this is not true at all. Nowadays, we can enjoy watching animals living in nature through internet and television. Compare two kids, one has been a zoo and the other has been watching animals on television. I am pretty sure that child who watch animals through screen would probably have more accurate knowledge about them. He/She would think animals in their right place instead of a zoo. </SI2></BO2>

<BO3><MI3><TR>Lastly</TR>, it gives us unpleasant odor. </MI3> <SI3>If there is a zoo, the owner of it really tries hard to clean up all the mass that animals make. But it might be implausible, since there are so many animals in the zoo. Then, it can give neighboring people terrible environment to live in. </SI3></BO3>

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, I assert that a zoo is useless. We should not build a zoo because of our pleasure. It also gives our children incorrect information about animals. In addition, it can harm the nearby resistance with its unpleasant odor. </CO>

column1: 824&Some people believe that the Earth is being harmed(damaged) by human activity. Others feel that human activity makes the Earth a better place to live. What is your opinion? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>The Earth has been developed by human over the centuries. Some people think that the Earth has benefited from human activity, because it has given us numerous convenience. Others may believe that we only have made the Earth desolate leaving behind something unpleasant. <TS>I think that the Earth have been made worse place to live than before, because we have cultivated a lot of lands and polluted natural environment. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, we have exploited a large number of lands. </MI1> <SI1>As a result of industrial development, we needed more lands to build factories, officies and other related buildings that the lands in which otherwise wild animals or plants lived or grew have been used for those buildings. Therefore, wild animals have been deprived of their habitats or killed in the course of construction and some unknown beautiful flowers have been driven away. When I was young, I lived in small town which had few buildings and I could listen to the music which birds made. However, after a large shopping mall which occupied much space was built, I could hardly feel the sound that nature made. Thus, an excessive cultivation of land make our planet unpleasant place to live. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, we have made our land polluted much. </MI2> <SI2>As the science and technology develops tremendously, we become accustomed to the modern appliances and cosmetics, such as car, washing machine, and shampoo. However, those things have made considerable nuisance and harm to our environment : cars make traffic jams and clean air dirty, washing machine make great noise and the river filthy with complex chemicals and so on. My home town used to be a quiet and clean but after several buildings were built and nearly every household owned a car, it became crowded and unpleasant place to live. So, human activity have contaminated our planet’s environment. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, no one denies that in some aspects we have made our planet more convenient to live. I think, however, on the whole, we have eliminated the habitats of our friend, wild life and polluted the natural surroundings. Therefore, before developing something, we should keep in mind that the bottom is the not the profit or convenience but the harmonious coexistence between humans and nature. </CO>
column23: Examples either too broad or too specific. Need to have more cohesion

column1: 825&In general, people are living longer now. discuss the causes of this phenomenon. use specific reasons and details to develop you essay.
column3:
<IN>Today people are living to be longer now than the past period. <TS>Although there are several reason, yet I believe that one of major among several reason is advanced science has brought a mankind into the longer length of life now.</TS> I will demonstrate why I attribute the lengthened life span to the scientific development. </IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, The advancement science causes development in medical field. </MI1> <SI1>Accordingly, the developed medicine make possible to cure disease that couldn't be healed. <EX>I'll take my case for example. Years ago my mother got the brain-cancer. I was so gloomy when heard the notice but I heard good information that although the cancer couldn't be cured just years ago, now the disease could be cured because of innovation of the advanced medical equipment. We had used the equipment and now my mother has a good health.</EX></SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>. From developed science, we can come to prepare for a disaster. </MI2> <SI2><EX>I will take a natural calamity for example. In former time, we could prepare for a natural calamity such as a flood, a heavy snow, an earthquake and that sort of things so that so many people died by such thing. But nowadays we can protect a calamity through prediction with high technology.</EX> </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, longevity is affected positively by advanced scientific. In other world, it gives us lengthened life by way of curing disease that is impossible cure and by preparing for a natural calamity. For the above-mentioned reason, I thank that the developed science is the most prior reason for human life span. </CO>

column1: 826&Would you prefer to live in a traditional house or in a modern apartment building? Use specific reasons and details to support your choice.
column3:
<IN>Nowadays, in Korea, many apartment buildings are getting built. Because Korea is such a small country with dense population, these modern buildings are in common use. <TS>Although I lived in an apartment for my whole life, I can still see the benefits of living in a house. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>Firstly</TR>, living in a traditional house can give you a feeling of freedom. </MI1> <SI1> If you live in a house, you can do whatever you want in your place. Instead, in apartments, there are rules that you must deal with. <EX>For instance, you are living in an apartment. Maybe you want to have pets, such as dogs. But, if there is a rule that prevents you from keeping a dog, you will feel like you are not free.</EX> You will be able fulfill your desires without any restriction. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, you will be able to have more experience caring about your properties. </MI2> <SI2>A traditional house may have a lawn and a garden and maybe a backyard. From these areas you can have experience mowing the lawn, planting new plants in the garden and help growing them. These experiences can be a great advantage in your adulthood. </SI2></BO2>

<BO3><MI3><TR>Finally</TR>, a house can be a better place to have a party or celebrate than in modern apartments. </MI3> <SI3>Apartments may have many facilities that could satisfy people, such as a swimming pool or a sports arena. But, in my view, I think is better in a traditional house. Even though apartments have these wonderful facilities, they do not have a private place that a family could spend a terrific time. </SI3></BO3>

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, a traditional house is a relaxing and independent place that people can spend their most of their life. Even though I am living in an apartment building, because of Korea’s big population, I am truly willing to live in a house. In my opinion, house is the place where you can really have your life a better thing! </CO>

column1: 827&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Parents are the best teachers. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>Through their life, most people are influenced by their parents, friends, teachers, and so forth. It is hard to determine who is the most crucial person of all advisers. Some people consent that protectors are the best instructors. On the contrast, others feel that pupils, teachers,or neighbors is the best professor. <TS>In my opinion, parents are the best admirable teachers for their children as parents are the best supporters and good models for youngsters. </TS></IN>

Because of my low grade, i suffered from the bad headache ,trouble and feel sorry for my parents. My parents, however, did not scold severely me for bad mark and inspired me to try again. Thus, i would try to follow the respectable parents's behaviors. therefore, decent parents could be the best instructor for me.</EX> Of course ,others offered me righteous basis of action but my parent always gave me the best lesson and serve me the fully models. </SI2></BO2>

column1: 828&If you could go back to some place and time in the past, where would you go? why?
column3:
<IN>Most people imagine that if they could go back to some place and time in the past, it would change the present and feel better. Like one of them, I have a story that is very cheerful and happy as I think about it. It was my ten years old attended at elementary school, and I knew a girl who was one of the top 10 which means that she was a pretty, smart and kind girl in my class. <TS>Now, I regretted that I was not ready to get her.</TS> If I could go back to that time, I would do my best to be brave and smart guy who should be interesting to any girl. </IN>

<BO1><MI1>I was not brave like others. </MI1> <SI1>My friends having been fun with girls, however, were out going, so they could talk easily with any girl, and have a good time when they met. Furthermore, I was a son of a poor farmer; as a result, my skin was almost black. I had thick hair scrambled and only had a pair of pants and shirt for a week, etc. I had to work after school at home. Definitely, I was ashamed that I had to be serious in life because I was so little. Fortunately, she came to me and invited me in her birthday party. Of cause, I was there, but I was not brave. In fact, there were so many girl and boys prepared for the party, and they looked different with me; they wore nice suits and had big presents for her, but I did not because that was my first visit to a friend's house, so I had no idea. I was so embarrassed, so I left my poor present back home. On the other hand, she was so kind that she wanted me to stay there. Besides, I could not say anything to her even good bye. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2>I was not as smart as other was because I did not have much time to keep up with my school schedule having been strict. </MI2> <SI2>Therefore, I always was lower than average, and I could not do homework well because I could not get helpful school supplies such as dictionary, reference, guide book that sort of things. Frankly, I was a hard working student, but my circumstances were bad. In every weekend, she helped me to get a good grade, and I was much better. I almost fell in love with her, and It did not bother her. Surely, she respected my life and my parents; in other words, my parent had five sons and six daughters. </SI2></BO2>

<CO>Finally, she moved away from my home town, and I could not get her information after she moved. After all, I met her again when she was twenty nine years old. Now, I have a wife and a daughter, and we are happy. I, however, sometimes talk with my wife about her, and I have remembered that she was pretty, smart, and kind. If I could go back to then, I would be brave and smart, so it might change a lot of my life and me. </CO>
column23: A very genuine story

column1: 829&Some students prefer to study alone. Others prefer to study with a group of students. Which do you prefer? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>There are two ways in studying : studying alone, studying in a group. I have been through with both both ways in my studies when I was in university. Some people may believe that it is better to study alone, because they can a lot and concentrate some weak points as they please. <TS>I prefer, however, studying with some friends than studying alone : the group study is efficient, beneficial to the study and fun. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, a group study can save time and energy to the studies. </MI1> <SI1>In general, most of the classes include so broad range of studies that we can hardly master all parts of studies for ourselves. However, if we study together with friends, we can distribute the studies into some parts about which each group member know well. Then every member can only focus on some specific parts and all members gather and exchange the data and information. When I was a freshman in university, I took the world history class. The ranges of the exams for that class so wide: from ancient Greek to modern China, I was very interested in old culture, then I made a study group with friends and divided the part to study. As a result of that method, I got A in that class. <TR>Therefore</TR>, a group study is effective method for the studies. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, a group study helps students get good grades. </MI2> <SI2>Studying alone, we tend to be boring and lazy. On the contrary, if we study with others, we are likely to compete each other, thus we can achieve good result in class. Once I studied for the math exam in school with one diligent friend, he studied so hard that he stayed up all night in the library. I was forced to study harder to see him study such like that, otherwise I would have gone to bed or wasted time. So I could get A plus in that class. <TR>Thus</TR> a group study can make us get good result by principle of competition.. </SI2></BO2>

<BO3><MI3><TR>In addition</TR>, studying together can make us maintain good condition. </MI3> <SI3>When we study alone, we are not likely to manage our study time effectively: we study hard one day staying up all night and then oversleep till afternoon. In that way we can hardly be in good condition when take an exam which is held in the morning. On the other hand, we study with other people, we can take a rest during the study playing basketball and taking to each other. Our study group used to play table tennis when we got sick and tired of studies; after the play, we could easily concentrate on our own studies. So, a group study can provide a good refreshment. </SI3></BO3>

<CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, some genius or some elementary area need not a group study. I think, however, on the whole, the group study is better choice, because it can give us effectiveness, improvement and refreshment. In addition to that, through group study we should not only improve our studies, but also develop good personalities in a social life. </CO>

column1: 830&Some people say that computers have made life easier and more convenient. Other people say that computers have made life more complex and stressful. What is your opinion? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answers.
column3:
<IN>Recently, there is controversy about efforts of computers, but the new machine becomes one of vital elements for modern human lifestyle. Therefore, it is very interesting to find out what kinds of benefits by using computers. </IN> no thesis

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, there is enormous time saving by using computers. </MI1> <SI1>Before this new invention, most data were treated by a pen and bare hands. The traditional and inefficient process took a long time to arrange and analyze the data. <EX>For example, all employers and employees spent over a month to calculate a bunch of important numbers.</EX> Nowadays, only a few accountant and computer experts are needed to operate an account program and more precise and faster results come up inner a week. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, a computer provides instant information. </MI2> <SI2>Computers can be characterized the method in order to search and manage information sufficiently. In addition, information is critical factor in modern life. The more information you have, the more success you win. Therefore, these two truths are matched perfectly. <EX>For instance, if somebody needs to information about some African countries 3 years ago and has a computer linked to the Internet, he or she can achieve the information by typing the countries’ name into a blank on a searching homepage. </EX></SI2></BO2>

<CO>Consequently, a computer is necessary for more convenient life with the two reasons; saving much time and offering information fast. </CO>

column1: 831&Some people choose friends who are different from themselves. Others choose friends who are similar to themselves. Compare the advantages of having friends who are different from you with the advantages of having friends who are similar to you. Which kind of friend do you prefer for yourself? Why?
column3:
<IN>It is absolutely known to be true that people make friends with many kinds of persons : different personality, hobby, social status, career and so on, through their lives. Some people may choose the same kinds of persons for their friends, because there is no conflict among them. <TS>I prefer, however, to make friends with persons who are similar to me, because we can learn a lot, make up for some weak points and get some lessons. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, we can learn a lot from different kinds of persons. </MI1> <SI1>Some people may have their own unique knowledge, experiences and hobbies. If we are to make friends with them, we can get priceless information and develop new hobbies. I have two close friends in my high school. One was rather poor so that he had to get a job in a computer company instead of going to the university, but got used to the computer work; he taught me a lot about computer graphic and photo shops. The other was so rich that he enjoyed many outdoor sports. I, who had been indoor person, get to know how to water ski, windsurfing and golf. As those experiences illustrate, we can benefit from different kinds of persons. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, we can correct our drawbacks by making friend with different kinds of persons. </MI2> <SI2>In general, when we are in the similar kinds of persons, we can hardly see our weak points such as bad manner and strange habits. On the contrary, when we get in touch with different kinds of persons, they are likely to indicate our abnormal behaviors. I had a bad habit: making loud noise during the meal time. My friend who was frank and honest unlike me, told me how bad that eating habit was, after then I have had a meal silently. Therefore, different kinds of persons can become a good teachers. </SI2></BO2>

<BO3><MI3><TR>Moreover</TR>, we can get some important lessons from persons who are different from us. </MI3> <SI3>When friends have same personality, they can only strengthen the same quality, but they can not develop other good traits. Once I lived in a dormitory room with one friend for one year. Then I was so lazy and not interested in the study that l got low grade almost every class. Unlike me, he was so diligent and arduous to learn something that he got up early, cleaned the whole room and went to the library every day. As a result, he could get a scholarship with honors, That good model could change my attitude to life and make me study hard. Thus, some different kinds of persons can teach us a lot. </SI3></BO3>

<CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, although the saying goes : birds of feathers flock together, we are likely to be friends with people who are similar to us. I would rather, however, choose friends who have different knowledge, hobbies, and even skills for they can be good teachers in many ways. </CO>
column23: Need to focus the body paragraphs to prove the thesis

column1: 832&"In your country, is there more need for land to be left in its natural condition or is there more need for land to be developed for housing and industry? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer"
column3:
<IN>My country is not so large, but much land is not used. <TS>Thus we can convert it avilable or leave it as it is.</TS>  However, there are some reasons why the land should be developed. </IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, in our country, so many people live in small sections; that is, the ratio of people versus area of land is very high. </MI1> <SI1>To illustrate, in Seoul, almost twenty million people are live in there. This corresponds that each of them has few square meters as his or her own place. Consquently, we should develop our land in order to solve this problem. </SI1></BO1>  

<BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, the development of land offers money to us. </MI2> <SI2>If unavailable land is used for growing rice, the farmer who will reap it may earn money. Similarily, the factorys founded there will make many kinds of goods, which may be converted into money. The land which is left gives us nothing, byt the land which is developed present us money. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, we can obtain the guarantee of extent where we live and the money by exploiting land. If someone doesn't utilize his or she land, this will be the damage to him or her, the country, and the world. </CO>
column23: Body paragraphs need to contain more  analysis

column1: 833&Some people believe that a college or a university education should be available to all students. Others believe that a higher education should be available to only good students. Discuss each views. Which do you agree with? Why?
column3:
<IN>People attend a college or a university for perparing career, new experience as well as increasing knowlege, which means that a university and college is not only for increasing knowledge. <TS>I believe that a college or a university education shold be opened for all students. </TS></IN> 

<BO1><MI1>If only good students can attend a college or a university, a college or a university will lose great potential students. </MI1> <SI1>When I was a high school student, one of my friends was not good at grade. She was a very fashionable girl but there was no class for fashion study in my highschool. In order to attend a university or college, students in Korea should pass the enterence exam. She failed the enterence exam and started to work at a fashion model. She made a wonderful success and wanted to study futher. Ten years after graduating high shcool, she could get into a university because of her career. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>However</TR>, if she had been accepted by a university when she graduated the high school, she would have succeed more greatly than now. </MI2> <SI2>At that time, she really wanted to study fashion design. This story shows us that although some students are not good at their grades in high school, they may have potential abilities to study in a particular area. Therefore, a college or a university should be available for all students as long as they want to attend. </SI2></BO2>

<BO3><MI3><TR>Another reason</TR> that a college or a university should be available for all students is that a college or a university provides students with various experiences. </MI3> <SI3>In addition to increasing knowledge, many students who have different backgroud gather and share their cultures at a college or a university. In some ways, it is more educational than studying at a class. People have rights to meet and share their culture at a college or a university so they can be accepted whethe they are good students or not. </SI3></BO3>

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, I would like to say that students can attend a university or a college as long as they want. While they are attending at higher education, they can decide their mind: quit or continue. Therefore, students can easily enter into a university or a college. </CO>

column1: 834&Some people think that children should begin their formal education at a very early age and should spend most of their time on school studies. Others believe that young children should spend most of their time playing. Compare these two views. Which view do you agree with? Why?
column3:
<IN>There is no doubt that playing is important as mush as studying for children because children can learn various things: team work, keeping a rule and admission their lost while they play. <TS>Of course, studying at a school is also important but playing is more essential than it for children. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1>Schooling is good for learning knowledge: history, math and science and it is necessary for socialization. </MI1> <SI1>Moreover, because schooling is cheaper than private education, attending school is worth. However, in spite of all these benefits, for young children, emotional development is more important than increasing knowledge from books. Most character is built when people are young. Therefore, it is important what young children see, hear and experience. Unfortunately, in Korea, so many parents force their children to study from when they are so young. Parents believe that if their children learn something at a school, they will succeed when they grow up. Some children have no time to play with their friends. They have to go to public school, receive tutoring, piano lessens and painting lessens. They are so tired and get stress. It is natural that they undergo mental problems. It is sad that I hear children’s mental problem on television. I doubt that it is worthy that children learn so many things at the school. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2>Young children should spent most their time playing with their parents or friends. </MI2> <SI2>I think they can learn lots of things through playing. <EX>For example, because I grew up at a country, I always played outside with my friends. We went to fields in order to grab grasshoppers, frogs and dragonflies. Without reading book or studying at the school, I learned what they eat, when they bear their babies and how they fly. While getting along with my friends, I also learned what friendship is and what teamwork is. I did not take a kindergarten school but I passed an entrance exam for a university. My story shows that it is not always right that young children learn more at the school. Fortunately, my nieces and nephews play a lot because my siblings do not force them to study. I believe that my nieces and nephews can enjoy their lives because they know what is worthy in their lives.</EX></SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, I strongly suggest that the older generation do not push young children to study from their young. Happiness is not from knowledge but from relationship among people. While young children play with their friends and parents, they learn a lot and develop their emotion. </CO>

column1: 835&It is generally agreed that society benefits from the work of its members. Compare the contribution of artist to the society with the contibution of scientist. Which type of contribution do you think is valued more by your society? Give specific reason and support your answer.
column3:
<IN>Our society is composed of a variety of members. <TS>Especially the artist and scientist have a great influence on the society The artist gives the cultural benefit and the scientist gives the practical benefit generally. In this essay, I will compare these two benefit and decide who contribute more in our society.</TS> </IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>Fist of all</TR>, the artist give the cultural benefit. </MI1> <SI1><EX>For example, the musician give people lovely song. When people listen to music, they can be comfortable and calm down.</EX> In my case, I l listen to classic music to get away the stress. Anothe example is the contribution of painter. The painter give us beautiful drawing and make the environment more beautiful. According to expert, when the surrounding is beatiful, people can have mentally healthy life and get less stress. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2>The scientist also have a goof effect on our society. </MI2> <SI2>We can see a lot of scientific devices around us. The computer, car, elevator can be one instance. Thanks to these scientific acievement, we can have convienient life. we can have a lot of imformation through the Internet. we can go to a distant area by riding the car. We can also go up to the high floor without hard effort by using the elevator. Therefore, scientist enable us to save time and effort. </SI2></BO2>

<CO>I think the scientist give the society more contribution. Though the artist makes us have less stress and calm down, the scientist makes us save time and effort. Nowdays, the society change rapidly. Without the help of the scientific achivement, we can not pace with the society. Therefore I think the scientist give more contribtion than the artist does. </CO>
column23: The writer needs to support one position in the beginning and spend the rest of the essay defending that position. Do not talk about both.

column1:
836&In the future, students may have the choice of studying at home by using 
technology such as computers or television or of studying at traditional schools. 
Which do you prefer?
column3:
<IN>Technology has benefited to humans in the entire aspects of humans' lives. 
It is the same in educational point of view. Many useful tools like computers or 
televisions help advance the teaching method for teacher. <TS>But I think that using 
this technology is not always good, because it cannot teach precious 
relationship between people and shows only limited information through computer 
monitor or television. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, students cannot be educated human relations on the computer monitor. </MI1> <SI1>
It offers only regular information and knowledge. On the other hand, students 
can learn mutual relations between students or teachers in the traditional school. 
<EX>For instance, students sometimes argue or quarrel each other, and they every 
now and then borrow or lend some money to their friends.</EX> Through these activities, 
students can learn how they should do in each situation and many kinds of social 
promises and invisible contracts. It must be useful to school students. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, students can experience various methods of education tools in the 
traditional school. </MI2> <SI2>When teacher want to use big screens for his pupils, 
he always can take advantage of it. Also, in case of art class or music class, 
they have to participate in the class directly. It cannot be done through 
the on-line class. Therefore, traditional school is more proper than on-line class 
which has limit in delivery of information and knowledge. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, recently, technology make our life richer and more abundant. 
However, traditional school should be persisted to teach students human relations 
and provide manifold ways of teaching. We have to notice that learning at home 
using computer or television has limitation behind its shining technology. </CO>

column1: 837&Your community has enough money to hire one new employee. Which of the following should your community hire? A police officer, a recreation center director, a teacher. Use specific reasons and details to develop your essay.
column3:
<IN>There are a lot of people working in my community. Given a choice whom to hire, some people may choose a police officer, because he or she can protect our town from crimes; others may select a recreation center director, because he or she can give us fun. <TS>I think, however, the teacher should have priority for producing intelligence and improving the quality of education. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, a teacher can breed and develop intelligence. </MI1> <SI1>Our community are lack of natural resources, such as, wood, coal, gas and water and so on. However, the population is rather large compared to the land size. Because the only thing we can depend on is human capital, if we can hire more teachers who can teach our children, then our competence becomes larger than before. My high school which has many good teachers has yielded so many good graduates who have become famous in their own fields that even people living in other community know our community. Therefore a teacher can create the human power. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, the more teachers, the better of the quality of education. </MI2> <SI2>Because of the overpopulation, most of the schools in my community are overcrowded with students. If more teacher are to hired in the schools, the ratio between the students and teachers becomes considerably low. Then the students are likely to get better education: they can have more space to study and more time to discuss with teachers. When I was in middle school, my class had 60 students who had only to receive the lessons from teachers, On the contrary, my high school had only 35 students in each class, so I could really enjoy the school life. As those examples illustrate, a teacher can increase the environment of schools. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, no one denies the fact that a police officer and a recreation director can contribute to the community in a sense. I think, however, a teacher, who can teach the promising potentials and make the better condition of education, is the best choice among them. </CO>

column1: 838&A company has announced that it wishes to build a large factory near your community. Discuss the advantages and disadvantages of this new influence on your community. Do you support or oppose the factory? Explain your position.
column3:
<IN>If someone heard that a company wishes to build a large factory near his/her community, there will be different opinion about that. <TS>Some people will say it will cause adverse effect on their community since it will bring environment pollution and traffic congestion. On the other hand, others will say that it will make positive effect on their community since it will develope their community and provide more jobs to people who have no job. In my opinion, I prefer the latter idea because my town is not developed yet. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>In the first place</TR>, a large factory will cause disadvantages to the community since it 
will cause environment contamination and traffic jam. </MI1> <SI1>If a large factory is built, it will 
release dirty waters and dirty airs from chimneys. It can cause water pollution and air 
pollution to the community. Furthermore, a large number of people and cars from other 
community will come to the town. So there will be serious traffic jam. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>On the other hand</TR>, a large factory will cause advantages since it will develope our 
town and provide new job to people from the factory. </MI2> <SI2>If a new factory is built in our 
community, the company will have more investment to both factory and the town. 
Therefore, our community can develope more rapidly than before. Moreover, the factory 
will provide more job to people who still have no job. Since it is a serious social 
problem of non-working people in Korea, it can be a good solution. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, like all human activities, building a large factory will cause dual effects 
on the community. Advantages of the factory is that it will cause environment pollution 
and traffic jam. By contrast, disadvantages of the factory is that it can develope the 
community and provide new jobs to people who have no job in the community. In my 
case, since my town is not fully developed yet and there are still many people who 
have no job, I prefer the latter opinion. </CO>

column1:
839&People attend college or university for many different reasons (for example, new 
experiences, career preparation, increased knowledge). Why do you think people attend college of university? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>Today, more people are going to college or university than before. Every people has difference reasons to attend them : new experiences, career preparation, increased knowledge etc. <TS>Of all the reasons, I would say that the main reasons are to get specialized knowledge, to intensify their ability, to get the degree of college or university</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, some people may attend college or university to get specialized knowledge. </MI1> <SI1>
They can learn various parts of knowledge systematically from the college or university. 
These people are often those who like to study to get a job after graduation. They believe getting knowledge from college or university is one process to prepare their office life and it will be useful when they work later. </SI1></BO1> 

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, people also go there to intensify their ability at the office. </MI2> <SI2>Today, many people who have their job now attend college or university. This is because most of them may feel the need of more theorized knowledge to assist their work. They may want to have competitive ability to accomplish their work successively. </SI2></BO2>

<BO3><MI3><TR>Third</TR>, to get degree can be one the reasons of attending college or university. </MI3> <SI3>Especially, elder people who missed proper time to study go to school with this reason. Most of them might not have the aim like getting job, new experiences etc. The main reason is to get the degree of college or university. </SI3></BO3>

<CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, I classified the reasons to go the college or university : to get specialized knowledge, to intensify their ability and to get degree of college or university. Whatever the reason is, I would like to say that will to learn must be encouraged because the attitude is one trial to develop oneself. </CO>

column1:
840&Some people choose friends who are different from themselves. Others choose friends 
who are similar to themselves. Compare the advantages of having friends who are 
different from you with the advantages of having friends who are similar to you. Which 
kind of friend do you prefer for yourself? Why?
column3:
<IN>Anybody in a society has to have relationship with others. However, there are many 
ways to choose the right one, and the methods can be divided into two parts: a group of 
people similar to themselves and a group of people different from them. <TS>Comparing the 
two groups, the relationship with people characterized differently has more advantages 
than another. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, having friends who have same characters would have an advantage that each 
person understands each other easily. </MI1> <SI1>Sometimes, people cannot find a way to 
comprehend another because of the own personalities and thoughts, but there may be no 
conflict between same thoughts and minds. However, staying the group in equality 
obstructs progress and attempt. <EX>For example, when two friends go to a restaurant and if 
they have the same taste, there will be no argue, but they also cannot try a new one.</EX> </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Otherwise</TR>, a relationship between different people promotes developing themselves. </MI2> <SI2>
They may be controversial first, but then they start sharing and understand new 
information and even make a stronger relationship. <EX>For instance, my friend and I had 
different opinion about a girlfriend. After some dispute the topic, we respected each 
other more and even learned some know-how. </EX></SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>Consequently</TR>, having a different person as a friend is better choice because of many 
chances to advance themselves and make a strong friendship. In addition, anybody who 
meets new people and respect them, he or she will have great friends and advisers. </CO>
column23: Get a better score: support only one opinion

column1: 841&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Dancing plays an important role in a culture. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>From the beginning of the human history, many cultures have appeared and disappeared. <TS>Among the cultures, dancing is located as one of important human cultures, and the importance can be explained by following reasons. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, dancing forms itself as a direct expression of people’s thought and mind. </MI1> <SI1>Most people act or react for deficit their feeling and will, and these motions transfer the pure object to other peoples. <EX>For instance, a smooth hands movement gives people relaxation and comfortableness. Otherwise, a rapid and vigorous motion implies passion and anger.</EX> There two opposite motions can bring the same feelings by copying the same motions in a normal life. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, dancing is a culture which people enjoy easily and together, regardless of boundaries. </MI2> <SI2>Its advance started from any actions of hands and legs, and whatever a person does is acceptable. Some may put up their hands like stretching, or some may shake legs and jump. All of these can be part of dancing. The old or young and males or females can dance with slow and fast move. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>Consequently</TR>, dancing is dedicated to an essential culture. In addition, dancing with people always gives you fun and special experience. </CO>

column1: 842&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? It is more important for students to study history and literature than it is for them to study science and mathematics. Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3:
<IN>It is hard to say that studying history and literature is more important than studying science and mathematics. Each area has a unique subject matter and it is necessary for students to study. <TS>I think that both sides: studying history and literature and studying mathematics and science are important. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1>Through studying literature, students improve their emotional feeling. </MI1> <SI1>When I was a high school student, I read a lot of fictions. While I read books, I learned what love is, what human beings are and what life is. Of course, these has been changed a lot but it is obvious that reading fictions stimulates my emotion and affects my view of the world. Therefore, I think studying literature is worthy. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2>Studying history is essential because history tells us where we are. </MI2> <SI2>Through studying the past time, students can learn the present and predict the future. Studying history can give students what is important in life, how to live and even why people live. <EX>For example, with studying martin rooter king, students can learn why discrimination is terrible and should be stopped.</EX> Thus, studying history is also worthy. </SI2></BO2>

<BO3><MI3>Let's think about science and mathematics. Personally I like to study mathematics because it is simple and logical. </MI3> <SI3>One of my high school friends hated studying mathematics and science. She thought that they were not useless to live. However, I disagreed to her. Studying science and mathematics helps students to think logically, which affects our ability of understanding nature. Nowadays people live in high technology society. Whether people like or not, people should be familiar with technological society. Students should have abilities to operate a lot of facilities. Probably, studying science and mathematics is helpful to live in this modern society. </SI3></BO3>

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, I disagree that it is more important for students to study literature and history than it is for them to study mathematics and science. Both area is worthy: learning history is necessary because it tells students what is important in their lives, learning literature enables students to improve their emotion and learning science and mathematics give students logical thinking ability. Thus, students should learn both sides. </CO>
column23: Agree or disagree: choose one side. Do not talk about both

column1: 843&Some people prefer to eat at food stands or restaurants. Other people prefer to prepare and eat food at home. Which do you prefer? Use specific reasons and examples to suppot your answer.
column3:
<IN>Some people prefer to eat at restaurants because of its convenience. You do not have to shop, cook, and clean-up when you eat at restaurants. In other words, eating outisde definitely has its benefits. <TS>However, I prefer to eat at home since the advantages of eating at home outweigh those of eating at restaurants. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>The first</TR> reason why I prefer to eat at home is that there is hygienic problem. If you eat at outside, you have no idea how your food are made. </MI1> <SI1><EX>For example, I worked in a fast-food restaurant when I was in high school. My co-worker usually didn't wash his hands before making food. It was disgusting even for me. Furthermore, we didn't clean the kitchen often because the manager didn't care about the hygien of the enviroment where food are made.</EX></SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>The another</TR> drawback of eating at restaraunts is health problem. You never know how good or bad the ingredient of food are. </MI2> <SI2>They serve high-fat and low nutritional food to attract costomer since that kind of food taste better than so-called healthy food. On the other hands, if you cook yourself at home, you can choose high-nutritional ingredients for food. In my case, once I got allergy after eating in a restaurant in my neigborhood. Later, it was revealed that the restaurant used low quality food and it was eventually closed off. As my case shows, they might serve low quality food to increase their profit. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, although eating at home is time-consuming and need pains, I would rather choose to eat at home than eat outside because of health and hygienic problem. If I have an appointment with my friends or have no time, I eat at restaurants, but I always try to eat at home since I aware of the benefits of eating at home. Moreover, it is more cheaper to eat at home than eat outside. When you eat at home, you can keep your good health while saving your money. </CO>

column1: 844&There are many different kinds of advertising (on the radio, on television, in newspapers, in magazines, and on billboards). In your opinion, which one of these kinds of advertising is the most effective? Why? Use specific reasons and details to explain your answer.
column3:
<IN>We encounter many kinds of ad in every day life such as in morning papers, in monthly fashion magazines, between dramas on television and so on. Some people may say that the newspapers are the most effective media for advertisement, because they can read them in the morning. Others may believe that radio ads are the best of all, because there is no need to much money for them. <TS>I think, however, television should have the priority for its intimacy and methods. </TS></IN>
