<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, television occupies much time of most people’s daily lives. </MI1> <SI1>In general, as the culture of broadcasting develops, we have become much dependent on television for pastime. In every day life, the whole family watch television during the breakfast and dinner and a housewife continue to watch it until her children come back from schools. In my office, I can never work without hearing and talking about previous soap drama or movie series broadcast on television. Therefore, because most people enjoy watching television, it can be most efficient to advertise something on television </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, television uses both visual and sound methods. </MI2> <SI2>Newspapers and magazines have no sound and the radio ads can not show the graphics and pictures, On the contrary, we can not only see the colorful, vivid motions and pictures, but also hear the natural and synthesized music that can capture the demanders minds. Once I was planning to buy digital camera, I tried to search the magazines and newspaper ads, but I could decide which one to buy. Then I could happen to watch some ads of cameras in which I was interested on cable television, they explained the usage well and the price was reasonable so I could get one camera soon. As that case vividly illustrates, television has powerful method for advertising. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, no one denies the fact that other media have their own advantages such as low cost. However, I would rather choose television for its predominance of people’s life and strong methods. </CO>

column1: 845&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Attending a live performance (for example, a play, concert, or sporting event) is more enjoyable than watching the same event on television. Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3:
<IN>Some people like to attend a live event such as a play, concert, or sporting play while other people enjoy watching those events at home. <TS>Between the two choices, I prefer to take part in a live performance. Here are some reasons for my position. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, you can get out of everyday difficulties or stress through a live event. </MI1> <SI1><EX>For instance, last month I had been to a rock concert, in which I wanted to listen to.a rock music. In the concert, I could scream and yell. In this way, I could remove everyday stress and bad memories at that time.</EX> In addition to that, I could feel happiness. Likewise, I believe that attending a live performance is more worthy of taking part in than just watching TV in a couch at home. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2>To be able to get along with your close friends is another reason for attending a live performance. </MI2> <SI2>When I attend a live performance, especially sports event, usually I accompany with one or two of my close friends who have similar favorites or intereste in something. In other words, by just attending a live performance, we can have chances to make and keep good relationship with friends. We can not get those chances only through watching the events on television. </SI2></BO2>

<BO3><MI3><TR>Lastly</TR>, we can appreciate a wide range of performance. </MI3> <SI3>Television provides us with only a limited range of scene of the event. Thus, sometimes, you will lose lots of scene of the events, which you like to see. However, if you attend a live performance, you can see whatever you want to see without any limitation on it. You can see other players listening to song by a singer in a music concert. 

<CO>As I mentioned above, I prefer to attend a live performance with friends. Since I can feel free from stresses and get good opportunity of making a good relationship with my friends. In addition, I will be able to appreciate the whole mood of a live performance which television can’t convey. </CO>

column1: 846&What are some important qualities of a good supervisor(boss)? Use specific details and examples to explain why these qualities are important.
column3:
<IN>There are a lot of traits that a good boss should have. Some peoples may choose the sense of humor, because it can soften the mood between a boss and employees. Others may select the diligence, because it can benefit the business. <TS>I prefer, however, to choose two personalities : not having favoritism and the willingness to accept the responsibility, because those traits can harmonize the boss and workers well. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, a good boss should not have favoritism. </MI1> <SI1>If the boss exclusively likes a certain employee and gives him or her some benefit, then the unity of whole workplace will collapse. We can witness same situation in schools : when some teachers have affection with only specific student, so called teacher’s pet, the harmony between teachers and students will break up. Once I heard the news, some salesman who had been received partial love from his boss, got to be isolated by other workers so utterly, that he committed suicide. As that incident vividly illustrates, a good boss should treat the employees equally. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, a good boss should have a mind to take responsibility willingly. </MI2> <SI2>In general, whereas a leader in a group may have many privileges and rights, he or she has many duties and obligations about the work. In addition, to be a good supervisor, he or she must get to the work early and clean up the area where he or she works voluntarily. There was news report that some small clothing company could get out of nearly being bankruptcy during the depression owing to the unity : the boss poured his own properties into the business and the employees determined that they would not get paid until the business could strive. Therefore, the responsibility that a boss should work not only for himself or herself, but also the work members is pivotal traits for a good boss. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, no one denies the fact that there are other vital elements to be a good boss. However, I would rather choose those two traits : being impartial and the sense of responsibility, because it can create the sense of unity in the workplace. Above all, a leader should demonstrates those qualities before he or she demands others to do so. </CO>

column1: 847&Some people believe that a college or a university education should be available to all students. Others believe that a higher education should be available to only good students. Discuss each views. Which do you agree with? Why?
column3:
<IN>Recently, many universities and colleges have accepted students who show special ability in specific fields like literature, math, science, statement, or even paduk. <TS>I think this current tendency is quite desirable, and I have a opinion that even students who don't have good grades or who are not smart should be accepted to college as well if they are talented or enthusiastic in a certain field.</TS> Here are two reasons to support my opinion. </IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, students who have not been successful in school work also have the right to be educated, and information or knowledge should be distributed to everyone in society. </MI1> <SI1>If college keeps on accepting only smart and well-educated students, students from uneducated families can not benefit from higher education. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, students who haven't distinguished themselves until highschool can find out and enhance their potential ability after they get into university. </MI2> <SI2>Usually in high schools in Korea, capacity of students is measured by total sum of variety of subjects. Thus, there are very few opportunity to figure out their talent or ability in a specific field. <EX>For example, I have had a friend from high school who were very talented in writing poems, but she wasn't regarded as a good student, because she was not good at math and science. Nevertheless, she got into university through special entrance system for students who are good at literature and writing, and now she is applying herself in writing poems and also winning many awards.</EX></SI2></BO2>

column1: 848&Think of the most interesting class you have ever taken. Why did you enjoy this class so much? Use specific reasons and details to explain your answer.
column3:
<IN>I have been attending a lot of classes for several years. There were some boring classes, also some interesting classes. I enjoyed my English class which I took at university. It was different from a boring high school English class. <TS>Because university English class was in English, non-traditional class, I liked this class and learned many things. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, university English class which was processing in English gave me more advantages than high school English class which was in Korean. </MI1> <SI1>Because not only the text book but also teacher's words were English, I had to learn all grammar and memorize all examples in English. Memorizing in English gave me more knowledge of vocabulary and phrase. The high school English class which was in Korean couldn't give me a clear sense of English grammar because the text book was translated in Korean which had not exact meaning of English </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, the university English class was non- traditional class, I had a chance to present my opinion. </MI2> <SI2>In high school, it was traditional class which made student passive. Even though I had a good idea, I couldn't talk to my teacher. He thought that students must follow the teacher's opinion. However, in university English class, I could speak my opinion and if it was good, the teacher would accept it. It made me confident. Also, I had to speak in English in this class, I could improve my English speaking skill. </SI2></BO2>

<CO>I have learned a great amount of knowledge in many classes. However, there are few classes which give me real advantages. I am interested in class which can give me real knowledge to use in the future. The university English class makes me more confident, give me more freedom to speak my opinion, and know many things about English. Therefore, I enjoyed learning in English in non-traditional class like my university English class. </CO>

column1: 849&You have enough money to purchase either a house or a business. Which would you choose to buy? Give specific reasons to explain your choice.
column3:
<IN>Given a choice between buying a house and business, some people may choose the first choice, because a house can give us comfortable shelter and can be a safe asset. <TS>I think, however, it is better to have one’s own business, a business can make us earn a big money and lead a happy life.</TS> </IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, we can get a lot of money by owning a business. </MI1> <SI1>In general, if we have a house, we have to pay a lot for the house from income tax, maintenance cost to the insurance cost. In addition, the value of the house is likely to decrease years after years. On the contrary, if we have own businesses and take good care of managing them, we can earn considerable money except for the essential cost. Recently, my father who retired from some manufacture company started to sell accessories in a small shop, although at first some money had to pay, the shop now is crowded with many young people spending much money. As that case illustrates, owning a business can give us a big fortune. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, purchasing a business can be fun. </MI2> <SI2>As a rule, owning and managing a house is a great stressful activity. We should always concern about the security from theft or fire. On the hand, when we get businesses, we can enjoy our life working in the business. It has been known to be true that the people who have jobs are likely to live longer that those who do not. My grandparent still have their own business which is small bakery shop, although they are over seventies, they are healthy and satisfied with everything. Thus, getting a business can be a enjoyable activity. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, no one denies the fact that a house can provide some benefits and owning a business can be a dangerous investment. However, I would rather choose to have a business: if well planned and managed, it can make us prosperous and happy.</CO>

column1: 850&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Games are as important for adults as they are for children. Use specific reasons and example to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>They had have a number of games in their children hood. However, there are many adult who still enjoy playing games whether it is a kind of sporting game or not. In my view, games beloved imply that games are important for adults as they are for children. 
<TS>I stongly agree with games are not important any less adult than the child. This opinion dues to the two reasons : provinding refreshment , improvement of social realationship.</TS> </IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, games give refreshment and pleasure to every body. </MI1> <SI1>To people who are tired of thier works and have stressed, one game are good way resolve to their under the pressure or tireness. My father often play Chiniese chess with my brother for fun. On that game, the loser charge a lunch, which give them to more concertrated on that. They never stop thinking on the play because it is from their favor. Game is fun. To have fun is need to adults also. After playing exiting game, they will work harder and more efficiently. </SI1></BO1> 

<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, games devolop social relationships. </MI2> <SI2>
Not only child, but also adult has a limit relationship; collegues are usually regarded only as co-workers so between them, there are lack of initativeness. Through the game like a basketball or other group sport, one can get along with more positive feeling to them sweating togther on the playground. </SI2></BO2>

<CO>There are so many games one can have in every day life. Through game one can refresh oneself certainly and have a chance to improve relationships of other people. That will enable adults to enjoy their life. For this reasons, it is natural that importance of games is applied to adults as much as children. </CO>

column1: 851&A company has announced that it wishes to build a large factory near your community. Discuss the advantages and disadvantages of this new influence on your community. Do you support or oppose the factory? Explain your position.
column3:
<IN>If someone heard that a company wishes to build a large factory near his/her community, there will be different opinion about that. Some people will say it will cause adverse effect on their community since it will bring environment pollution and traffic congestion. On the other hand, others will say that it will make positive effect on their community since it will develope their community and provide more jobs to people who have no job. <TS>In my opinion, I prefer the latter idea because my town is not developed yet. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>In the first place</TR>, a large factory will cause disadvantages to the community since it will cause environment contamination and traffic jam. </MI1> <SI1>If a large factory is built, it will release dirty waters and dirty airs from chimneys. It can cause water pollution and air pollution to the community. Furthermore, a large number of people and cars from other community will come to the town. So there will be serious traffic jam. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>On the other hand</TR>, a large factory will cause advantages since it will develope our town and provide new job to people from the factory. </MI2> <SI2>If a new factory is built in our 
community, the company will have more investment to both factory and the town. Therefore, our community can develope more rapidly than before. Moreover, the factory will provide more job to people who still have no job. Since it is a serious social problem of non-working people in Korea, it can be a good solution. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, like all human activities, building a large factory will cause dual effects on the community. Advantages of the factory is that it will cause environment pollution and traffic jam. By contrast, disadvantages of the factory is that it can develope the community and provide new jobs to people who have no job in the community. In my case, since my town is not fully developed yet and there are still many people who have no job, I prefer the latter opinion.</CO>

column1: 852&Some people think that the family is the most important influence on young adults. Other people think that friends are the most important influence on young adults. Which view do you agree with? Use examples to support your positions.
column3:
<IN>As people grow up, they have contacted many persons from parents to university professors. Some people may say that young adults, between 16 to 19 years old, are more influenced by the family, because they are still young. <TS>However, I think, high teens are more affected by friends, since they spend most of their time together and develop their characters after the friends. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, young adults spend a lot of time with friends. </MI1> <SI1>In general, as the society become complicated and busy, the family members can hardly have time to get together except for the dinner time. On the contrary, young people can meet their friend almost in any place from school, library, playground, and even cafeteria where they work for part time job. When I was in high school, I spent most of the time, that is except for the sleeping time, with some friends studying, playing and going on movies. Therefore, through spending a huge amount of time with friends, the young adults are likely to be influence by them. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, friends can make a good model for young people. </MI2> <SI2>As a rule, when people are still young, they imitate their parents and determine their future after them. However, as they grow older and they become to know some friends, the situation changes. One may follow some friends who are clever and honest and make them his or her future model. Once there was a friend who was so diligent and studied hard that he always got the highest grade in my class. I tried to make an effort not to fall behind him, therefore I could graduate the high school with honors with him. As that case shows, young adults can develop good quality owing to friends. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, some people may argue that young adults are still more in the surrounding of the family, so that the friends can make little influence on them. I think, however, friends are the most influential factors to the young adults, for their frequent contacts and the possibility of good examples. </CO>

column1: 853&When students move to a new school, they sometimes face problems. How can schools help these students with their problems? Use specific reasons and examples to explain your answer.
column3:
<IN>Students sometimes move to different schools because of the relocation or sudden immigration and so on. Some people may argue that there is no need to assist them since they can get over the difficulty soon. <TS>However, I think, schools can help the newcomers adjust the environment easily by arranging the time for introduction and contacting them continuously. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, schools can make time for introduction and information about the schools and students. </MI1> <SI1>In general, students who come from other schools do not feel comfortable at new surroundings. If they have time for getting the information of the schools and introducing themselves to the students they can easily accustomed to the new school life. I have been through many different schools, because my father have been public school teacher. Especially easily could I adapt myself to new school which made me introduced to other students and informed of the school life. As that case illustrates, schools can help the newly moved students providing the communication time. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, schools need to take care of new students on and on. </MI2> <SI2>As a rule, since the newcomers have unique taste due to the different regional background, they tend to be despised or isolated by other students. Therefore, after giving them some information, schools have to constantly keep in touch and even consult them. There was a new report that one high school student, who were newly moved to the other school, committed suicide himself because of the utter fear for other classmates. Also, I have experienced some depression in one school which had hardly concerned about the newcomers. Thus, through constant concerns and counsels, schools can help the newly moved students. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, although there are some parts that the newcomers should put up with, and those are their responsibilities. Nevertheless, I would rather recommend schools to have an opportunity for communication and incessant contact. Those methods can help all the school members including newcomers lead a harmonious school life. </CO>

column1:
854&Do you agree or disagree with the follwing statement? It is more important for 
students to study history and literature than it is for them to study science and 
mathematics. Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3:
<IN>Some people say history and literature are more important subject than science and mathmatics. <TS>On the other hand, others sicence and mathmatics are more important. however, I do not agree with both of them. I think it is related people's situaion which they are in. </TS></IN>

<BO1><EX>In my case, I am studying electrical engrieering in University. My major is related with mathmatics and science very deeply.</EX> <MI1> So, if I want to success in that field, I have to study those kinds of subjects, mathmatics and science.</MI1> <SI1>I do not need to register the history or literature class, because it dose not effect on my study or anything. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><TR>On the other hand</TR>, <EX>a friend of mine, whoes major is English literature, she have not attended any kinds of mathmatics or science since she enterd the university. She just have some kinds of literature classes or history classes. She said that it is sometimes important for her to study history to understand the history of literature, but mathmatics and science are just optional. </EX></BO2>

<CO>When I was a high school or middle school student, I have to study all of them. I think that they are all important for the young student because they help the youth to develop their knowledge, and the knowledge is very important to make them educated human beings. Thus, I do not agree with the statement. I think the importance depends on the situation which the people are held in. </CO>

column1: 855&It has been announced that a new high school may built in your neighborhood. Do you support or oppose this plan? Why? Use specific reasons and details to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>When it comes to constructing new high school near our community, some people may oppose the plan, because the new high school can make some problems such as traffic jams and shortage of housing, <TS>I think, however, providing that there must be some urgent needs for building a new school, it is preferable plan, since it can benefit both students and community. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, if a new high school is built in our neighborhood, students are likely to have better education. </MI1> <SI1>In the first place, they do not have to attend the school which is far away from home. Moreover, the schools in our country usually are so crowded with many students, that they can hardly provide good lessons. Thus when a new school are to be constructed, the quality of the education should be improved without question. Recently, a new high school was built near my house, and my younger brother entered that school. He can walk to the school and make friend with friends and teachers compared to my high school life. As that case vividly shows, building a new high school can give better educational environment. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, the new high school can give credit to community. </MI2> <SI2>As a rule, unlike the other building, a high school have many useful facilities, such as library, playground and museum. If a high school is built in the vicinity of my community, all the people living here can enjoy those facilities and therefore can lead a happy life. After the new high school was constructed near my town, people can read and borrow a lot of books in that library instead of buying them and play some sport with family members. Therefore, the new high school provide the community a lot of amusement. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, although there may be some drawbacks in building a new high school, such as traffic problems and increase in cost of living. Nevertheless, I would rather recommend to set up a new high school, because it can offer pleasant education to the students and make our community better place to live in. With all benefits offsetting the disadvantages, why should I oppose the plan? </CO>

column1: 856&What do you consider to be the most important room in a house? Why is this room more important than any other room? Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3:
<IN>There are several rooms which have different functions in our house. Some people may say that the bed room is the most important of all, because it can provide comfortable rest for the next day activity. Others may argue that the living room should have the priority, since the whole family members can enjoy something together in that place. <TS>I think, however, the dinning room is the most significant room, because we can get energy and communicate each other in that room. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, we can have energy in the dinning room. </MI1> <SI1>In general, above all, people should eat for survival. Without eating something people can never do anything. In addition, it has been known to be true that people who have regular meals at home are more likely to accomplish something than those who do not. Since childhood, I make it a rule to have breakfast in the dinning room at home with parents. After I have breakfast at home not in the street food stand which serves so called junk food, I can never be tired of something. Therefore, the place in which we are constantly getting energy source should have vital position in the house. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, most of the communications take place in the dinning room. </MI2> <SI2>As the society is getting busy and complicated, people can hardly have time to get together. Only in the dinner table, can they meet each other. Children tell something happened in schools and ask difficult quiz given by teachers in the course of having a meal. As for my family, we usually make some plans, such as going on a vacation and visiting relatives and so on. Having a delicious and decent meal, family can express their feeling and change their opinions pleasantly. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, although there can be no denying the fact that each room has its own function and strength. Nevertheless, I would rather give the priority to the dinning room, because we can have food and communicate each other in that place. That is why most of the housewives examine that place before they buy or rent the house. </CO>

column1: 857&You have decided to give several hours of your time each month to improve the community where you live. What is one thing you will do to improve your community? Why? Use specific reasons and details to explain your choice.
column3:
<IN>There are a lot of things to benefit the community from investing money to collecting the garbage. Some people may choose the donation, because the money can help the poor in the community. Others may prefer to make up certain group, since the people living in the same region can communicate and know each other well. <TS>I think, however, several hours should go the literacy program, because it can help the illiterate adjust the society and boost the cultural level of the community. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, literacy program can assist the illiterate to adapt themselves to civilized society. </MI1> <SI1>In general, unlike the old culture, almost all media are written in letters. If people can not read and write, they can not lead a happy life. My grandparents, who did not have chance to learn how to write and read, have been depressed by the fact that they were illiterate. After I began to teach them how to read and write some months ago, their depression has gone away. As that case vividly shows, investing the time on literacy program will benefit the people who are not able to read and write. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, literacy program can help the community become more civilized. </MI2> <SI2>As in the community which is lack of other natural resources, such as gas, water, and wood, we should only rely on the people for the prosperity. If many people are in the position of being illiterate, then the community have only to become poor and uncivilized. We can witness many wealthy and brave countries whose people had no means of communicate were gone away in world history. Thus, teaching people to read and write can benefit the community. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, no one denies the fact that there are some other ways to improve our community. However, I would rather choose to spend several hours to make the illiterate have an access to the literacy, because both the people and the community can be benefited from that program. With all benefits, why not participate in that activity? </CO>

column1: 858&What are some qualities of a good parent? Use specific details and examples to explain your answer.
column3:
<IN>Becoming a good parent is very important because it is a parent who mostly affects children. When children are young, what they see, what they hear and what they feel greatly affect building their personality. Thus, parents should give them a good condition as possible as they can. <TS>I think that parents should be good listeners, should be patient with children and should not push children into their expectations. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, I think that communication between children and parents is most important to understand one another. </MI1> <SI1>Many parents tend to ignore children's opinion. When I was a young girl, my mother and I went to shop for buying my clothes. I wanted to buy a yellow skirt but my mother though my choice was too immature and chose a white skirt. The person who wears a skirt is not my mother but I. My mother did not listen to my opinion, why I wanted to wear the yellow skirt. After that time, I couldn't enjoy shopping anymore. That adults think nothing can be what children think very important. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2>Children cannot act like adults but many parents expect their children to act mutually although they are still young. </MI2> <SI2>Children need a time to be mutual. Everybody knows that children' spoiling clothes is natural but many parents cannot put up with it and yell and scream to their children. Sometimes, parents give their children a hard time not because of children's faults but because of their anger. If parents want to teach their children carefulness, they should speak to their children in a voice of sweet reason. Otherwise, children cannot understand why they receive a hard time and do not reflect on their conduct. </SI2></BO2>

<BO3><MI3>Children are not parent's possession. </MI3> <SI3>In Korea, many parents push their children into their expectations. My father wanted to be a doctor but he could make it because my grandfather passed away when my father was a high school student. Unfortunately, my father push my first brother into a doctor and they fought a lot. Children have rights to do whatever they want to do as long as it is wholesome. Parents can give an advice but should not push their children. </SI3></BO3>  

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, of many qualities to be a good parent, I think the following three qualities are very important. Parent should be good a listener, should be patient with children and should not push children into their expectation. Becoming a good parent is not completed at one time so parents must make a huge effort. </CO>

column1: 859&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? A zoo has no useful purpose. Use specific reasons and examples to explain your answer.
column3:
<IN>A zoo is useful because it gives us a chance to meet wild animals and plants. Human beings, a kind of animals, cannot survive without other animals. <TS>Thus, people should learn about animals and a zoo is a good place to learn about them. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>Firstly</TR>, I believe the old cliché, the experience is the best teacher. </MI1> <SI1>When children learn about animals, they use books and videotapes. They learn that there are tigers, kangaroos and hippos in the world but they cannot see them with visiting of a zoo because they do not live in a city. Children can imagine how big they are, how look they are and what they eat. However, if they see them at a zoo, they can surely understand what tigers are and kangaroos are. Visiting a zoo is very educational. </SI1></BO1>  

<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, observing animals or plants are fun. </MI2> <SI2>From time to time, I visit a zoo because it gives me refresh. While I watch monkeys, I forget my stress from a city life, which ultimately reduce my stress. While I watch dolphins, I imagine that if I were a dolphin, I could live the ocean. If people go a zoo with their family or friends, they share their feeling. It is fun as well as it is good for getting rid of stress. </SI2></BO2>  

<BO3><MI3><TR>Lastly</TR>, in some aspects, a zoo is good for animals themselves. </MI3> <SI3>Of course, some people think that building a zoo is good not for animals but only for people. In spite of disadvantages, however, building a zoo gives a safe environment to some animals. Some animals cannot survive at natural their habitat because of human beings: hunting or pollution or because of other reasons: disease or lack of pray. Some animals need a protection. A zoo can work for week animals. </SI3></BO3>  

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, I think a zoo is useful in various ways. It is educational to adults as well as children and safe for animals themselves. In addition to these, visiting a zoo is eventful and fun. Thus, animals that live in a zoo should be raised under the best condition.</CO>

column1: 860&Businesses should hire employees for their entire lives. Do you agree or disagree? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>As time goes by, the structure of employment is getting various. A couple years ago, lifetime employment is common in Korea. Nowadays, however, lifetime employment becomes an old structure and both employees and employers prefer flexibility. <TS>I disagree that business should hire employees for their entire lives. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1>Changing businesses is more challengeable than staying one company. </MI1> <SI1>In spite of the same areas, people can change companies because of different circumstance. Each company has their own policies. <EX>For example, when I worked as a computer programmer, I changed companies two times. First company was good for wages but they discriminated women. I could not put up with their discrimination so I moved to another company.</EX> Of course, my position was as same as before. I think a chance to change work place is good idea. </SI1></BO1>  

<BO2><MI2>People' interest can be changed. After graduating university, for two years I worked as a computer programmer. </MI2> <SI2>I always interested in computers from when I was a young girl. Thus, I attended computer science at a university and worked as a programmer but my interest changed all of sudden. After watching the documentary, Extremely Ordinary, I made up my mind to become a director of documentary. I just quitted my job and entered the documentary world. There are so many people like me. Thus, businesses need not to hire employees for their entire life. </SI2></BO2>  

<BO3><MI3>In the point of view of businesses, goal of businesses make a profit. </MI3> <SI3><TR>Therefore</TR>, if some employees are not useful anymore, they can fire their employees. <TR>Otherwise</TR>, businesses waste lots of money on people who do not work for their business. Of course, before fire, businesses should have reasonable reasons and support them for a few months even after fire. Government should make a good raw for employees, which can be victims because it is obvious that employers have more power than employees. </SI3></BO3>  

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, lifetime employment can be bad policy for some people and some businesses. Thus, I disagree that businesses should hire employees for their whole life. If employees want to change their job, they feel free to do it. If businesses want to fire some employees, they can do it under reasonable ways. </CO>

column1: 861&Schools should ask students to evaluate their teachers. Do you agree or disagree? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>Teachers are very important because they affect students in various ways. Thus, teachers should have some good qualites: fairness, honesty, patience and good teaching skill.  The principal can evaluate teachers but it is students who exactly know who is the best teacher. <TS>I agree that schools should ask students to evaluate their teachers. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>Firstly</TR>, we can say that teaching skill is one of the most important qualites of teachers. </MI1> <SI1>Although a teacher is intellegent, if he or she has no skill to teach, students would lose their interst in studying. Students know who has a good skill because they receive teaching from teachers. When I was a high school student, our history teacher looked know everything but he spoke too quietly to hear and he just read books. All students were sleeping at the history class. I was not sure if the principal knew this or not but I was sure that all my classmates disliked his teaching style. If we had participated the evaluation of teacher, our history teacher have tried to change his teaching style. The advice from students would be the best way for teachers to know if they are doing well or not. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, teachers are advisors as well. </MI2> <SI2>Whenever students have problems, they can meet teachers. If teachers avoid this, students hardly solve their problems. when I was a middle school student, one of my classmates ran away. She didn't show up at school for more than 4 days. My teacher tried to find her and finally she found her at a shelter. My teacher listened to her story and gave her an advice. After that, my teacher send my classmate a letter frequently. I think she was a really good teacher. Although she are not excellect at teaching, I would like to chose her as the best teacher if schools give me a chance to evaluate teachers. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, I think students know teachers more than anyone. Of cousre, it is risk that only students evaluate their teachers because of immature or bias. However, I am pretty sure that evaluation from students can clearly show some qualities of teachers. </CO>

column1: 862&Read and think about the following statement. Only people who earn a lot of money are successful. Do you agree or disagree with this definition of success? Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3:
<IN>When it comes to judging people whether they succeed in life or not, some people may say that only those who make a huge amount of money can be called successful people. <TS>I think, however, other than the money, satisfaction and earnest to the work are necessary for the successful people. Therefore, I disagree with that statement. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, to succeed in life, people should be satisfied with the life. </MI1> <SI1>If people making a lot of money never contend with what they have and what they do, then the life becomes miserable. On the contrary, people who earn a little money, but are satisfied with the present position, can lead a better life than those greedy people. My grandfather, who is 70 years old and does not have much money, run a small bakery shop. He enjoys cooking and making bread so much that I never enter that shop without seeing a smile on his face. As that smile vividly shows, people should be happy with the work and life to lead a successful life. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover</TR>, people should be earnest in their works. </MI2> <SI2>In general, people consider their jobs to be just necessary evil, so they are likely to passive in doing work. On the other hand, some people should make great efforts to do and carry their works. We can witness that many famous painters made a marvelous masterpiece after numerous trials and errors. Once I saw my grandfather make a cake for my birthday party, he was so absorbed in his work that I could not even talk to him. Thus, people who are devoted to their works deserve to be called successful. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, there can be no denying the fact that the wealth is one criterion of success and without a reasonable money people can not live a plentiful life. However, I think, besides money, two mentioned conditions : satisfaction with the work and earnestness to the work, are necessary for successful people. If people should be called really successful in life, they should have those material, mental and spiritual prerequisites.</CO>

column1: 863&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Television has destroyed communication among friends and family. Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3:
<IN>When it comes to the influence of television on the communication among people, some people may say that it has abolished the dialogues of friends and family members, because they have been so occupied by television. <TS>However, I would rather oppose that statement, because of the fact that the communication mainly depends on people’s way of life and people can communicate each other by way of television. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, having the opportunity of communication is a matter of the attitude which people have on life. </MI1> <SI1>Some outgoing person may contact many people and have frequent dialogue with them. On the contrary, some indoor people may like to enjoy so called solitary hobby, such as reading and meditation and have few words with even their family members. My family members enjoy watching television almost everyday from action movies to baseball games. However, among them my mother and my brother likes to talk to siblings but other members do not. As that example illustrates, television has little effect on the communication among people . </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, television can create new themes of communication. </MI2> <SI2>In general, almost all people watch something no matter what program may be on television everyday and they tend to tell other people something on television what they saw and what captured their mind. Therefore because of the television, they are more likely to converse with others. My office, which is made up of 10 people who have different taste, is usually full of dialogues about the television program aired previous day such as sex scandals between celebrities and talk show about complicated financial problem around country. <TR>Thus</TR>, through television, people can have more chance to communicate each other. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, there can be no denying the fact that as the television program develops, the possibility of watching television is likely to increase. I think, however, that tendency do not always equal to the decrease in communication among people, because the dialogue is primarily is a problem of people’s way of life and rather can be created by television. The most important thing is that we should develop good communication with the help of good media including television. </CO>

column1: 864&When people move to another country, some of them decide to follow the customs of the new country. Others prefer to keep their own customs. Compare these two choices. Which one do you prefer? Support your answer with specific details.
column3:
<IN>When people move to another country, people face with so many different customs because every country has their own customs. Whether people follow the new customs of not depends on which one is more progressive and which one is more meaningful. In general, most young people follow the customs of the new country but most old people want to keep their own customs. <TS>Personally, I prefer to follow the new customs of the new country. </TS></IN>

<BO1><EX>When I came to Canada from Korea, I met many immigrant Korean people. Usually the first generation keep the Korean traditional customs but their children, second generation follow the customs of the Canada. For example, the Chinese New Year is very big holiday in Korea. We eat DDuk, rice cake, and play NulDDuKi. The first immigrant Korean enjoys the Chinese New Year although they have been lived in Canada for a long time. I think it is natural because they are old enough to understand Korean customs and they are really familiar with Korean customs. If they have to follow the Canadian customs, they will get stress instead of enjoying.</EX></BO1>

<BO2><EX><TR>However</TR>, when the young people like me came to Canada, they tend to follow the new customs. They try to understand what is Canadian culture and if it is really meaningful, they are ready to follow this customs. Korean society is still conservative and women are still worse position than men. When I came to Canada a few years ago, feminism in Canada was more active than Korea. I want to learn what is basic idea about women and follow Canadian customs. It is common people see the women's bus driver but in Korea, bus driver is still men's job. </EX><MI>The most important thing is not what is new customs but what is more progressive customs to follow or keep. </MI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, if the new country that people move to has good customs, people should follow the new customs but if the new customs is worse than their own customs, people should keep their own customs. In addition to this, it is true that young people are easily to adjust the new customs but it is hard to old people. Anyway, the most important thing is what is good for life and what is more progressive. </CO>

column1: 865&Plants can provide food, shelter, clothing, or medicine. What is one kind of plant that is important to you or the people in your country? Use specific reasons and details to explain your choice.
column3:
<IN>Plants are important in people's lives. If they do not exist, people will die for lack of provided things that they are oxygen, fruits, foods, grain, etc. so plants are one of important things need to people's lives. and people have important plants from country to country. <TS>In my country case, it is ginseng.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, Ginseng is better than other medicines form old days in my country, because it had being used to recover various sickness. </MI1> <SI1>Ginseng is better to no heat in body, to prevention a cold, is help to recover cancer and other sickness, etc. so many of parts, it play important role from medicines. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondary</TR>, Ginseng is invaluable thing of sold medicines. </MI2> <SI2>it was sold a high price to chinese by korea chemists in the old days. because it lack in china and is a necessary medicine, and is difficult medicine to grow at a waste of china. so, lacked ginseng was treated form china chemists. at now, ginseng is still a high price, because ginseng is difficult to grow at anywhere. to grow ginseng, environment is particular. it demand suitable wether, place, heat, windy, humidity, etc. so ginseng was treated by medicines and was sold a high price. </SI2></BO2>

<CO>In a conclusion, somebody ask me. "What is one of kind of plant that is important to my country?" in my answer, one of kind of important plant in my country is ginseng. it is high price and invaluable medicine. but it is proud of my country, because my country take an environment for ginseng growing. so ginseng is one of kind of important plants. </CO>

column1: 866&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Playing games teaches us about life. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>While people play games, they can learn many things: what is fairness, what is teamwork and what is friendship. It doesn't matter whether people are young or old. <TS>I agree that playing games gives a lecture about what is life. </TS></IN>

<BO1><EX>Suppose that you play the basketball. To win, you should encourage your team players as well as do your own duty because it is a team play. While you play the basketball, you can learn what is teamwork. <SI1>Our society is composed of many people and human beings cannot survive alone. People have to consider others and take care of them.</SI1> <MI1>Thus, it is important to know others, understand them and help one another. </MI1></BO1>

<BO2><TR>In addition to this</TR>, <SI2><EX>when you lose at games, you should accept your lost and celebrate winners. If you feel unfair at that game, you can assert investigation but if there is no problem, you should accept your failure. It is a kind of discipline. Life is not simple and it is natural that people fail from time to time.</EX> <SI2>Whenever people are frustrated, they need to accept their failure and overcome the bad mood. In general, many games produce winners or losers after playing whether it is serious or not. <MI2>If people can easily accept their failure and plan for next games, it will help people live positively. </MI2></BO2>

<BO3><MI3>The most important learning from games is friendship. </MI3> <SI3>When I play the BaDuk with my friend, I used to lose. Actually, my friend had a good skill in BaDuk. I really want to defeat her but it was too hard. Although I liked her but whenever I lost games, I hated her. I decided I wouldn't play with her anymore. My friend wanted to meet me but I denied. One day, my mother came to me and said to me that I was a lucky girl because I had a good Baduk player. Without my friend, I even wouldn't know what is BaDuk. I agreed to her and thought that I was a lucky girl. After that night, I called my friend and apologized. She accepted my apology and we played again. I still lost the games but it did not hurt me anymore. </SI3></BO3>  

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, playing games are fun and good for mentally and physically. Through playing games, we can learn what is fairness, how can put up with your lost and what is friendship. I love to play games and as long as people want to play, as long as the games are wholesome, people can play games. </CO>

column1: 867&Some people believe that the best way of learning about life is by listening to the advice of family and friends. Other people believe that the best way of learning about life is through personal experience. Compare the advantages of these two different ways of learning about life. Which do you think is preferable? Use specific examples to support your preference.
column3:
<IN>The way of learning about life is various. It comes from not only listening to the advice of family and friends but also personal experience. Both have advantages. <TS>Indirect experience by listening to the advice of friends or family can make me reduce failure in life and my direct experience gives me my own ways to understand life. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1>One of advantages of learning about life by friends or family is that I can predict what will happen to me and what I should avoid, which reduces mistake. </MI1> <SI1>My mother always said to me visiting other countries was very worthy because I could learn lots of things and that affected my point of view positively. It was hard to save enough money to visit other countries and I would rather buy cars instead of visiting other countries. Nevertheless, my mother encouraged me and finally I decided my mind to go China. Consequently, it turned out great experience that I ever had and I am still thankful for mother's advice. In addition to this, when I packed my luggage, my mother told me what was necessary and what was unnecessary. It was really useful. Learning about life by family and friends is really worthy because it makes my life more safe and comfortable. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2>Differently from this, my own experience teaches me unforgettable memories. </MI2> <SI2>Family and friends can tell me what is good to visit and bad to sleep but they cannot tell me feeling. When I visited China, I mat an old woman who came from Korea, my country. She had lived Bukyoung after the Korean War. It was shocked me and I started think about correlation between women and war. I still remembered her face and her sorrow. It is a very important benefit to experience for me. I think advice from family or friends cannot cover this kind of feeling. </SI2></BO2>  

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, leaning life through family or friends helps me reduce mistake and encourage me to do good things but it cannot teach me how I feel. On the other hands, learning life through my personal experience can be risk but gives people unforgettable memories. Personally, I prefer personal experience because safe life is little bit boring to me. </CO>
column23: Run on sentences; unclear stance

column1: 868& It is sometimes said that borrowing money from a friend can harm or damage the friendship. Do you agree? Why or why not? Use reasons and specific examples to explain your answer.
column3:
<IN>Human beings cannot live alone because we are social animals. We should help one another. When people face with difficulties, people ask help to friends. <TS>I think borrowing money from a friend can give a chance to be closer between friends. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1>We live in a capitalistic country so money is essential. </MI1> <SI1>Sometimes, it happens that people need to borrow money from somebody. At that time, friends can be the best people to borrow. Through this, friends understand one another more deeply. When my father passed away all of sudden, I couldn't withdraw it right away because I invested all my money to my own business. When I asked my friends to borrow money, she was willing to do it. When she gave money to me, she said that when she was a high school student, she needed some money in a hurry. At that time, I gave all my money that I had to her. Actually, I didn't remember at all but she couldn't forget what I did. If friends help me to solve difficulty, the relationship between friends and me will be stronger. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2>People say that borrowing money from friends can harm their friendships because nobody knows whether or not friends may pay back. </MI2> <SI2>However, I believe that most friends who borrow money feel more responsibilities. When I borrow some money from my best friend, I always thought that I should pay back on time. Besides, when I pay back or my friend pay back her owes, we used to meet at beautiful restaurant. While we ate, we shared our stories. It is much better than borrowing money from banks. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, borrowing money from friends is not harm friendships as long as they trust one another and they pay back their owes. On the contrary, they can be closer and understand deeply. I would rather borrow money from friends than banks. </CO>

column1: 869&When people need to complain about a product or poor service, some prefer to complain in writing and others prefer to complain in person. Which way do you prefer? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answers.
column3:
<IN>When it comes to expressing complaint about goods or services, some people may like to write a letter, because they can arrange their opinions more logically and avoid of direct confronting people who provided such goods or services. <TS>I think, however, it is better to make a complaint in person, because it can prevent people from misunderstanding and solve the problem effectively. </TS></IN> 

<BO1><MI1><TR>Above all</TR>, person to person contact in complaint can lessen the possibility of misunderstanding. </MI1> <SI1>In general, people are likely to have outdated or even wrong information about products or services which they want to have, so that they can be upset or angry with the price or the quality. If they ask the provider to explain those problems, then most of the wrong information can be easily corrected. Once I bought a digital camcorder which I had in mind through some catalogues. When I brought it home and tested something, I found that it did not have some functions. Then I ran to the shop and told the shop owner about that, but soon I realized that the camcorder that I saw in the catalogue was different one during the conversation with him. As that incident vividly shows, face to face complaint can correct the misunderstanding easily. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, we can solve the problem related to the product or service effectively. </MI2> <SI2>As a rule, if we take the means of writing a letter to complain, it takes a lot of time and energy to solve the problem : writing a letter, going to the post office to send a letter and waiting for the reply. On the contrary, when we go and talk to people who are in chare of the problem, then we can easily find the solution. There was one happening. My printer which bought recently did not work suddenly, then I brought with it to the shop which sold it to me and asked what the problem was. Through several talks and checking, I could find the problem : the printer was wrongly connected with the computer. If I had chosen other methods I could hardly solved the problem immediately. Therefore personal contact when complaining about something can be efficient way to solve the problem. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, there are also, of course some disadvantages in direct complaint, such as causing a controversial dispute. Nevertheless, the strengths, reducing the chance of misunderstanding and solving the problem with ease, can outweigh the drawbacks, so I prefer to choose the direct personal contact. With such an easy and convenient way, why not select that method? </CO>

column1: 870&People learn in different ways. Some people learn by doing things; other people learn by reading about things; others learn by listening to people talk about things. Which of these methods of learning is best for you? Use specific examples to support your choice.
column3:
<IN>Every person has their own ways to learn: reading, doing things, and listening to people talk about things. <TS>Of those methods of learning, I like to learn by doing things because I believe the old cliché; the experience is the best teacher. </TS></IN> 

<BO1><MI1>Through reading books, people can gather information but they cannot show people what life is. </MI1> <SI1><EX>For example, people can learn what friendship is and how much it is important by reading books but it cannot teach people about their feeling when people fight with their friends. I read the book; Friendship and I know what I should avoid and what I should do when I play with my friend. In spite of all these, from time to time, I fought with my friend. After fighting, I realized that friendship was really important and I shouldn't fight with my friend. I cried more than 2 days and apologized for this.</EX> This experience is different from knowledge gained from books because books do not tell me about my situation and my friend. After only fighting, I know that friendship is the most important in my life. </SI1></BO1> 

<BO2><MI2>Learning by listening to friends and family talk about things is useful. </MI2> <SI2>However, my experience is more memorable and valuable than learning by listening. When I planned to visit Japan, my friends talked about their experience. Thus, before visiting Japan, I knew that Japan is clean and Japanese are very kind. However, when I visited Japan, I felt Japan was not much clean that I thought and some people were really kind but others were too cold. Mostly country people were warm and they gave me good impression but city people looked always busy. Of course, it is not general opinion but it is my opinion about Japan. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, although reading books and listening what people talk is one way to learn but I think experience is the best way to learn something. Experience gives people their own feeling and their particular memory. Whether or not people have experience successfully, all experience give people information and knowledge. </CO>

column1: 871&People learn in different ways. Some people learn by doing things; other people learn by reading about things; others learn by listening to people talk about things. Which of these methods of learning is best for you? Use specific examples to support your choice.
column3:
<IN>There are three ways of thinking about learning. While some people prefer to learn by doing things, others prefer to learn by reading about things or learn by listening to people talk about things. <TS>However, there are many overweighing advantages in learning by doing things. Thus I prefer to learn by doing things rather than others.</TS> I will explain a basis of my opinion with several reasons and examples. </IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, we can obtain better information after many trials and errors. </MI1> <SI1>Those are more valuable than by reading about things and listening to people talk about things. <EX>For example, when I was a freshman at university, I spent most of time to meet my friends and travel all around places. However, by accident, I got a part-time job and worked for two months. I felt that it was very difficult for me to make money. Then, I concentrated on my study</EX> </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, information learned by doing things can touch me to my heart, so we don't forget those times’s impressions easily. </MI2> <SI2>For that reason, we should come by a wide range of experience. It certainly helps you improve your quality life. On the other hand, information learned by reading and listening was forgotten without difficulty, and we can not say that all of the information is correct, </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, for the above-mentioned reasons, I prefer directly to learn by doing things. Everything has its own advantages and disadvantages, though. Therefore, last but not least, I think that we should catch out good things of the three cases and adjust to our real life. </CO>

column1: 872&Should a city try to preserve its old, historic buildings or destroy them and replace them with modern buildings? Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3:
<IN>When it comes to conserving or destructing and replacing old historic buildings such as cathedrals and museums, some people may say that it is better to abolish those buildings, because they serve no purpose. <TS>I think, however, we should continue to have those buildings as possible as we can, since preserving them can benefit people and save time and efforts. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, many old constructions which were built from ancient pre historic times or just a few decades ago, can deliver a lot of profits. </MI1> <SI1>In general, historic relics contains historic people and events, so we can learn from them a number of good lessons, such as information of ancient cultures, the way of life and so on. Besides they may provide an excellent place for amusement. Here is an example, we have a gorgeous old palace named “Gyeongbokung” where many famous kings lived and ruled this country. We can see a number of glorious rooms and gardens which shows immortal beauty and get a lot of information related to Yi dynasty. Besides we can take a picture or sit somewhere and draw the some monuments over there. Thus, Preserving the cultural heritages provides us information and fun. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, maintaining some old historic buildings can be economical. </MI2> <SI2>If we demolish those buildings and construct the new buildings, then it takes a lot of time and money and cause complicated problems such as traffic conjunction and loud noise. On the contrary keeping those buildings demands almost nothing compared to replacing : we have only to pay for the maintenance and take good care of it. Recently, some old building in my town which is known as the residence of the primitive had to be demolished and the new city hall was built according to city plan. As a result, the road becomes tied with a lot of cars and we have to pay more tax related to the new construction and frequent road repair. Therefore, conserving inherited buildings can be economical. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, there are, of course some old buildings which need to be demolished. Nonetheless, I think, most of the old buildings that contain the precious history should be preserved, because of benefits which they offer and the efficiency. Above all, we should cherish those cultural heritages and inherit them to next generation in good condition. </CO>

column1: 873&Some people believe that a college or university education should be available to all students. Others believe that higher education should be available only to good students. Discuss these views. Which view do you agree with? Explain why.
column3:
<IN>When it comes to high education, some people may say it is necessary only for qualified students, because the university or the colleges have been established for that purpose. <TS>I think, however, such education can be accessible to all students who want, because that is needed for the principle of equal opportunity in education and can be beneficial to getting jobs. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, the principle of equal opportunity applies to the area of education, especially high education. </MI1> <SI1>People are born with certain rights : liberty, freedom of speech and of course equal opportunity, and those rights are protected by constitutional law in almost every country. Therefore, in relation to the education, people who are willing to get more refined education should have no barrier in chances, simply because they are not good at studies. If students who showed excellent grades in schools only can enter the university, it just means authoritarianism. Therefore the natural law demand us to provide equal access to education. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, we are likely to have a better job through high education. </MI2> <SI2>In general, people could get a job without college degree in just a few decades ago and they had only to have their own skills in their works. However, as the society develops and the opportunity for education increases, most of the students who graduated high school tend to go to higher schools instead of getting jobs and leaning work skills. Therefore most of the companies demand candidates for work to have at least college degree. That is unavoidable situation, so not to fall behind the times, everyone needs to get college education. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, there is, of course some limit in college education : even if they are give the opportunity go to the college or the university, they may not be selected the lack of capacity in number or they may be dropped out of the school due to the poor grades. However, I think, the door to the high education should be open to all people who want to enter, because we have a inborn right and we can have a decent job through the high education. Also, the bottom line is that we should take advantage of such education and apply it to the future work.</CO>

column1: 874&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? All students should be required to study art and music in high school. Give specific reasons to support your opinion.
column3:
<IN>When it comes to the opinion about the art and music class, some people may say that it is better for all high school students to study those subjects, because they can benefit from those classes. <TS>I think, however it is not necessary for all of them to learn those classes in high school, because the high school can not provide those subject effectively and they can be best learned other way. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, the high school is not able to give those lessons efficiently. </MI1> <SI1>In general, the high school provides a huge number of so called essential classes, such as mathematics, world history, and biology etc. So, there is hardly ever room for other classes. Besides they can not hire teachers who have excellent skills and careers, due to the lack of limited money. In such a poor circumstances, students are not likely to get good art and music classes. I could hardly recall good memory of art and music class which one teacher took chare in and gave only two written tests a year. Therefore they can hardly get good lessons of those classes in high school for lack of the prerequisites. </SI1></BO1> 

<BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, there exist other opportunities for such classes. </MI2> <SI2>Students who are interested in art and music can learn and practice lessons and skills outside schools. If only they are able to pay some money for those lessons, students can get sufficient lessons. Also, the university or the college provide can provide more professional education with excellent facilities and faculties. My sister, who is now professional pianist, had to get lessons from university student who majored in music during the high school year and went into the university to major in music. As that case vividly indicates, students in high school can get such lessons better by other ways. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, in principle, it is preferable for all students who have aptitude for music and art to have such classes in high school. In practice, however, for the lack of good condition of those classes and the existence of good alternative of high school classes, I would rather recommend that it is not necessary for all of them to have those classes. Students can be good musicians or painters by means of lessons outside high schools. </CO>

column1:
875&A company has announced that it wishes to build a large factory 
near your community. Discuss the advantages and disadvantages of 
this new influence on your community. Do you support or oppose 
the factory? Explain your position
column3:
<IN>To build a large company may affect our community in good and 
bad influences.A large company can provide chances that we 
improve our life in financial condition by working in that 
company . A large company in our community influences not only 
good sides but also bad effects. The company may influence our 
enviroment and traffic jam badly so we may live in harmful surrounding 
and have health problems. <TS>In my opinion, I oppose that a building a 
large company near our community. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1>A large company in our community can give us many good points 
that we can choose and work in that community in a variety of 
profession, we can earn more money by working and our community can 
obtain more rates by large amount of personal incomes. </MI1> <SI1><EX>For example, the 
city, chang-won where I lived for 4 years in child, there were many 
large company and people who lived in the city could more chances of 
choosing and working their jobs. The more working, the higher level 
of incomes. The more incomes of a private person, the more taxes in 
commnity by which a local autonomy can provide more investment in 
convenient facilities; haspitals, schhols and parks. After all people 
who lived in the city can obtain many good sides of building of 
company and used convenient conditions of city in a large amount of sides.</EX> </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2>A company in our community also influence by harmful conditions 
that our enviroment may be destroyrd by company facilities and

community, Jamsil is busy town where there are many facilities,

Company also may bring serious traffic jam with froating populations

<CO>If I have to choose to support or oppose with builing a large company,

breathe is developed enough and destoyed. And we do not need more company and 
facilities but need purification of surrounding and polluted enviroment. 
I think the community is not site of company or factory but living 
area where we can take a rest and live a life in comfort.</CO>

column1: 876&Businesses should hire employee for their entire lives. Do you agree or disagree? Use specific reason and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>Little wonders that it is important for businesses to guarantee employment.;no one would question that statement. <TS>I also agree in principle, yet my opinion on employment is rather different. To hire employee for their entire lives might be preceived as desirable, but in reality it does not have always a good effect on us. </TS>In this essay, I will demonstrate two reasons why objecting to guarantee employment for employee's whole life is reasonable and justifiable.</IN> 

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, our society is a very completing society. </MI1> <SI1>So on Businesse company has to effort for their survival. in this commercial situation. Businesse could not hire employee for their entire lives. if they guarantee employment they lost competition and fill in low efficiency. finally, company which guarrantees employment goes bankrupt. It is disadvantage not only to a comany but also to all people. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, I think that if employees are hired for entire lives, they donot work hard to develop themselves or company. </MI2> <SI2>So to speak, They do not have any reason to make a effort. I thank that it is one of many reasons why communism ends in a failure. No completition is no advence. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>Conclusively</TR>, I am opposed to guarantee employment for whole life. Because it is unreal. Namely it does not agrees with our completing society and it may disturb for employee to make an effort to live better life. How our society advance without competition and our effort. </CO>

column1: 877&What do you consider to be the most important room in a house? Why is this room more important to you than any other room? Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3:
<IN>As world becomes convenience way, a simple house construction has become more complicated since the first house built. As a result, there are many rooms in house as different occasion demands. In the kitchen we cook food and eat. In the bedroom, we sleep and so on. <TS>Among these rooms, I think the living room is the most important room.</TS> I want to present two reasons to support my opinion. </IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>Firstly</TR>, all family members gather together in the living room. </MI1> <SI1>In my case, father works out of my town. Mother is a teacher. Sister is a university student in Seoul. For this reason, all family members can flock once a week only. But whenever our family gets together in the living room, we enjoy conversation with eating fruits and watching TV. In this way, each member can understand each other dearly and feel the importance of family. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, we are able to enjoy spare time in the living room. </MI2> <SI2>Like most of people, it is in the living room that the things we can enjoy leisure time as TV, radio, video, running machine, computer and so on. So whenever I am tired of something, I go out of my room and go to the living room. There I can enjoy music, eat some snack and watch TV over sitting on a sofa. It makes me feel much better. I can also forget the stress of study during the peaceful time in the living room. </SI2></BO2>

<CO>As I state above, the living room; family members can meet together and it is comfortable place to take a break. Nowadays people are so busy that all family members can’t gather easily. It makes importance of living room far bigger. So I consider the most important room in a house is the living room. </CO>

column1: 878&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Parents are the best teachers. Use specific reasons and examples to spport your answer.
column3:
<IN>little wanders that parents are important to teach their children. no one would question that statement. <TS>I also agree in principle, yet my opinion that parents are best teachers is rather different. thougth parants may be first teacher they cannot be best teacher.</TS> In this essay, I will demonstrate some reasons why supporting that Parents are the best teachers is not acceptable and should no be praised for tree following distinct reasons. </IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, All parants donot have a vast knowledge. </MI1> <SI1>some parants ,such as famer, driver donot know a math. so they donot teach their children a math. they may need teacher teaching them a math. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>secound</TR>,, Parants may be too closed to teach children emotionally. </MI2> <SI2>Parants tend to enforce their thank to children. if it is not success, parant may be anger. So parant donot teach their children reasonalbly. <EX>For instance, if children donot follow your intention you will anger before teaching them. </EX></SI2></BO2>

<BO3><MI3><TR>Third</TR>, there is differentence between parant's and children' interesting. </MI3> <SI3>Parant can have no knowledge that children is very interent. So they always teach something that childern are boiling. So children donot best on learning. </SI3></BO3>

<CO>Based on the above-mentioned statements, it can be concluded that parants arenot alway best teacher. Parants are very emotionally when teaching and may have no knowledge in which children are interest and donot have all knowledge that children want to learn. So though parants is first teacher they arenot best teacher. </CO>

column1: 879&Some high school require all students to wear school uniforms. Other high schools permit students to decide what to wear to school. Which of these two school policies do you think is better? Use specific reasons and details to develop your essay.
column3:
<IN>It has long been argued in our country that whether we should allow high school students to wear their own clothes or not. Some people may say that it is better for the students to choose to put on their own clothes, because they can carry out the school life freely with convenient clothes. <TS>I think, however, demanding them to wear uniforms is the preferable choice, since it can help them concentrate on their studies and keep in harmony with other students. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, requiring the students in high school to wear uniforms is beneficial to the study. </MI1> <SI1>In general, as in the age of 16 to 19, the students tend to be sensitive to others’ behavior or outer appearance.
