If they are allowed to choose their own clothes, then they are likely to select more good looking and expensive clothes because of jealousy. On the contrary, when they have to wear same clothes, they need not waste energy on such trivial things. I have been through with those two policies. When I had on uniform, I easily came to devote myself to the study. As that case vividly illustrates, school uniforms can improve the study. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, school uniforms can contribute the harmony of the schools. </MI2> <SI2>As a rule, when the students have on different kinds of clothes, the sense of the unity is likely to collapse, because of the tendency that people evaluate people by their outer appearance. On the other hand, when all the member of schools put on the same clothes, they can easily get to the harmony. Besides, teachers are likely to evaluate the students only by their grades or behavior. When I chose my own clothes in high school, the students tended to divided some groups by their clothes, so there was some unpleasant mood in the classroom. Thus, school uniforms can help the schools to unite their member closely together. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, no one denies the fact that wearing their own clothes has some conveniences. Nevertheless, I would rather choose the opposite position, because school uniforms can help the students study and the schools unite with all members. With all such advantages, why not require the students to wear uniforms? </CO>

column1: 880&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? A zoo has no useful purpose. Use specific reasons and details to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>A lot of people go to the zoo with the family and friends on weekends. When it comes to the utility of the zoo, some people may argue that the zoo is of no use, because they can see and learn about animals other means, such as television, books and so on. <TS>However, I would rather oppose that opinion, since the zoo can give us vivid images of wild life and we can communicate with them interactively. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, the zoo can provide us live lessons. </MI1> <SI1>In general, although we can encounter a large number of animals through encyclopedia and documentary television program, we can hardly feel the real aspects of living things. However, when we go to the zoo to observe live animals, then we can see the smile of monkeys, hear the voice of tigers and even feel the smell of elephants. That is a real and direct education. When I was young, I did not distinguishes monkeys from gorillas, but at the zoo, I came to discern the difference between them. As that case vividly shows, the zoo can be a real education. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover</TR>, the zoo can make us communicate with animals mutually. </MI2> <SI2>As a rule, even if we can get a lot of knowledge of animals from books or other media, we can not take part in the relation of the animals. On the other hand, when we are at the zoo, we can talk to the birds and yell at the tigers to see what their reaction might be. We live in the harmony of human beings and other precious surroundings including animals, therefore through the interaction with the animals at the zoo, we can realize the fact we are families. Thus, the zoo can make us contact the animals actively. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, no one denies the fact that we can get a lot of information about animals. However, if we get the real images of the animals and enjoy the communication with them, we have only to go to the zoo and take a close look at them. With all benefits, why not go to the zoo? </CO>

column1: 881&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Reading fiction(such as novels and short stories) is more enjoyable than watching movies. Use specific reasons and examples to support your position.
column3:
<IN>Most ot the people spend the leisure time reading some novels or watching movies. When it comes to the degree of the amusement, some people may argue that watching movies give them more fun than reading novels, because they can enjoy audio sound and visual images. <TS>However, I think that reading fictions which are the original of the movies is more exciting, since it is convenient and more interactive activity. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, we can enjoy the novels at any time and at any places. </MI1> <SI1>In general, when we watch movies, there should be some prerequisites, such as theaters or video players. Besides it takes considerable time and money to enjoy movies. On the contrary, in relation of book-reading, there hardly is any obstacles : we can read detective stories in the subway and we can carry them during the vacation. Moreover we can stop reading at some part or reread the whole books as we please. I go to the office by subway and I make it a rule to read one novel a week in a subway. That hobby gives me a lot of fun. Thus, reading novels is efficient way of amusement. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, we can actively take part in the story of the novels. </MI2> <SI2>As a rule, when we watch movies, we just sit and passively accept the scenes which screen provides. That is just one side communication. On the other hand, if we read some interesting story books, we are likely to go into the mind of author and interact with the hero or heroine of the novels. According to the position or mood of the readers, the whole story can be translated totally different. Once I read some detective stories with my sister, I was surprised to find that she had different opinion of the characteristic of the detective in those books. Any way, reading novels can make us participate in the story itself. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, no one denies the fact that movies provide us with acting motion and sounds. However, I think reading novels offers us more fun, owing to the convenience and interactive activity. With all benefits, why not choose to read novels. </CO>

column1: 882&Businesses should hire employees for their entire lives. Do you agree or disagree? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>According to the development of the society, the aspect of the employment has been changed. When it comes to lifetime employment, some people may argue that it is better for workers to be employed for their whole lives, because it can help them manage secure living. <TS>I think, however, from the aspect of application to new environment and profit of the business, it is not necessary for the employers to hire their works for their life time. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, the environment of the business has been greatly changed. </MI1> <SI1>A few decades ago, the works thought their jobs to be nature callings, therefore they tended to be dedicated to their works for long. However, the society surrounding business has been dramatically developed and changed, the work which used to be done by human force has to be replaced by machines. Therefore a lot of worker had to leave the work and find the new jobs. My father who had worked in shoe-manufacturing company lost his job, because of the introduction of new machines. So, current working environment demand for new change in employment. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, we can no longer keep the traditional employment system in the perspective of business profit. </MI2> <SI2>In old days when the family members had same jobs, the sense of lifetime employment was possible. However, these days most of the people get a variety of jobs and the owner of the company are likely to think highly of his or her profit. Therefore, when some workers showed inability of work or there is urgent need for decreasing the cost of the company, some employers have to leave the work. My father had to find a new job, according to the downsizing policy of the company. As that case vividly show, the pursuit of the gain in business makes it almost impossible to get lifetime employment. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, in principle, it is good for all workers to carry out their workers as long as possible. However, in practice, because of the circumstances of the new business and the tendency for getting more money, we should not require the owner of the company to employ his or her workers for their lifetime. The bottom line is that we should try to make an effort to adjust ourselves to new employment system. </CO>

column1: 883&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? It is better to be a member of a group than to be the leader of a group. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>Some people think that to be a member of a group is better than to be the leader of a group. Other people disagree and think to be the leader of a group is better. <TS>In my opinion, to be the leader of a group is much better than just to be a member of a group.</TS> There are some reasons I believe that. </IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, the leader of a group can feel much more achievement than members after they finish some projects.</MI1> <SI1>A group might be consisted of members and a group's leader. However, if a group gets a prize, the leader of a group receives a prize instead of all members. From my experience, when I was a president of my class in high school, I got a medal for the best class on the final exam in front of all students. That was not just for me. However, I felt a lot of achievement at that time. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, the leader gets a more active life in society that is filled with challenging and courageous things.</MI2> <SI2>All people may pay attention to the leader’s behavior and sometimes he/she speaks up for their group’s interest. To the leader, there is no anonymousness. The leader of a group has to stand in front of a group. </SI2></BO2>

<CO>Clearly, to be the leader of a group has more fascinating elements that can gain strong fulfillment and live in a lively life. Therefore, I think to be the leader of a group is better than to be a member of a group. </CO>

column1: 884&Some people prefer to spend most of their time alone. Others like to be with friends most of the time. Do you prefer to spend your time alone or with friends? Give reasons to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>When it comes to spending their leisure time, some people may say that it is better to be alone by doing something such as reading novels and watching television, because they can concentrate on something without being interfered by someone. <TS>I think, however, being with friends on leisure time is more preferable choice, because we can enjoy ourselves better and learn something significant.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, spending the paste time with friends gives us more fun than solitary amusement. </MI1> <SI1>In general, when we enjoy the leisure time with friends, we are more likely to entertain ourselves, since we can exchange our feeling and cheer us up. On the contrary, if we keep ourselves from contacting others in free time, we tend to be easily tired of something. When I was in high school, whenever I was free from work or study, I used to play basketball with friends or go to movies with them. Through the play and viewing, we could enjoy energetic movements and discussing. However, when alone doing solitary hobby, such as reading novels, I got easily tired and hardly amused myself. As those experiences vividly show, spending the free time with friends can be fun. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, we can learn a lot being with friends in free time. </MI2> <SI2>In practice, as we learn from co-workers in the workplace, when we are doing something with friends in leisure time, we are likely to get something from our friends, such as cooperative mind, willingness to accept the responsibility etc. When I was playing basketball with friends, I learned team work, generosity and the sense of responsibility in the course of defeating other teams by fair play. So, friends who spend the leisure time can teach us some lessons. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, there are, of course some times that we need to be alone, like meditating something important. However, I would rather choose to spend with friends in free time, because they can give us a lot of fun and significant lessons. With all those merits, why not spend our precious leisure time with companions? </CO>

column1: 885&Some people like doing work by hand. Others prefer using machines. Which do you prefer? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>When it comes to working, some people may say that it is better to work by hand, because hand-made products are unique and expensive. <TS>I think, however, working by machine is more preferable, since it is more ient and perfect than doing by hand. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, working by machine is easy and fast. </MI1> <SI1>In general, when we work by hand, it takes more time and energy to complete work. On the contrary, when we use machines to make and finish the work, we can produce more goods and carry out much work in given time, owing to the automation. Here is a hypothetical case. I used to write a letter or composition by hand, when I made mistake some part, I had to rewrite it. However, after using a word processor or computer, I can easily correct my mistakes right away. As that case illustrates, machines can make us do the things conveniently.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, we can make or do the things more perfectly. </MI2> <SI2>As a rule, people tend to make mistake in doing work, due to the mental or physical causes. On the other hand, machines are not likely to be affected by those circumstances, they can make things more correctly. When I make a report or document, the correction system of the computer can help me complete the thesis easily. So we can increase the degree of the perfection for the work by machine.</SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, no one denies the fact that some famous art have made masterpieces by hand. Nonetheless, I would rather choose to work by machines, because we can easily and perfectly carry out the work by them. The most important thing is that we should know the right way of using machines and take the best advantages of them in our own work. </CO>

column1: 886&Some people say that physical exercise should be a required part of every school day. Other people believe that students should spend the whole school day on academic studies. Which opinion do you agree with? Give reasons to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>Schools provide the students with a lot of classes from mathematics to world history. When it comes to the curriculum, some people may argue that it is good for students to concentrate on solely academic classes, because they can enjoy physical movements outside school. <TS>I think, however, it is preferable for students to have physical activities in the school, since those physical activities can free students from the daily stress and help students enjoy the school life. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, a daily physical exercise can help the students relax themselves in the school life. </MI1> <SI1>In general, it is getting more and more complicated and stressful in competitive society, especially in schools. Here in Korea, most students tend to go to the school early in the morning and come back home late in the night with heavy book bags. They hardly have chances to get rest. If the school introduce physical exercise program that dry area, then the students are more likely to relived from burden of the study. Besides that program can make the students healthy and therefore easily concentrate on the study. When I was in high school, we had martial art class after lunch. I could forget unpleasant things from daily activity and manage healthy condition. Thus, a daily physical exercise can make the students relaxed and healthy. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, that program can make the school life enjoyable. </MI2> <SI2>As a rule, the academic classes are likely to make the students bored and tired. When we have time for physical activity other than mental one, we can have fun in the course of playing with others. Even a small amount of time devoted to the physical exercise on daily basis can create a big fun. I had great fun during the martial class : I could break a few bricks and enjoy practicing defense skills with classmates. As that experience vividly shows, students can enjoy themselves through that class. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, no one denies the fact that the academic class is an important part for the students. However, I think that student should also have time for daily exercise, since it can provide some rest and fun. Besides, the students can concentrate on academic classes easily through that exercise. </CO>

column1: 887&Some young children spend a great amount of time practicing sports. Discuss the advantages and disadvantages of this. Use specific reasons and examples in your answer.
column3:
<IN>A lot of young children tend to enjoy practicing some sports. When it comes to the sports, some people may argue that it is not preferable to force young kids to do the sports, because they need to concentrate on the studies. <TS>I think, however, although practicing sports has some demerits such as requiring some money and depriving them of the study time, it has also strong advantages : being beneficial to health and giving the children a lot of lessons. </TS>Therefore I would rather recommend the children to do the sports. </IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, exercising some sports can make young children have strong body and mind. </MI1> <SI1>In general, people, especially young children need to exercise some physical activity to stay healthy. As the society becomes more complex and competitive, young children are likely to be forced into the academic studies. If they do not have time for practicing some active movements, they can hardly grow up well. When I was young and had free time, my father used to make me play some sports, such as basketball or volleyball with the family members or friends. As a result I still can have strong body to resist any difficulty. Thus playing some sports gives young children good health </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, they can learn a lot from sports. </MI2> <SI2>As a rule, sports have some rule to follow and in order to win the game, the group members have to cooperate each other in playing sports. Therefore through the play, young children can obtain a great many good quality in life, such as the sense of responsibility, cooperative mind and bravery. When I was in the play among groups, I could learn valuable lessons like sportsmanship. Therefore, the sports can be a good teacher for young children. </SI2></BO2>

<CO>There might be some drawbacks for children to practice sports. As in the most of the case, when they play some sports, they need some tools and facilities, such as balls, bats, suits, and playground. Besides some sports can not be played by one or two members. However, the cost related to the play is usually cheap and it is easy to get together for play. So the strengths of the playing sports outweigh the demerits of it. The most important thing is that we should provide young children with sufficient condition of the play. </CO>

column1: 888&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Playing a game is fun only when you win. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN><TS>Many people seem to believe that playing a game is fun only when we win. This is a myth that many of our generation like to hold. It has several critical flaws. Thus, I disagree with this opinion. </TS>I will explain a basis of my opinion with several reasons and examples. </IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, I think results are not important when we are playing a game. </MI1> <SI1>In other words, a process is more significant than an effect. <EX>For example, players take part in a marathon race.</EX> <TR>However</TR>, some players came by a shortcut to win a race, and is this victory really valuable? Although players, running all the courses according to the rules, lost a game, I think that they are winners.</SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, I am sure that we can obtain fun in the game. </MI2> <SI2>I like basketball, so I sometimes play basketball with my friends. In the game, I often lose, but I never am in a bad mood. Of course, my friends have a similar opinion. We just concentrate on our game, and do our best in the game.</SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, for above-mentioned reasons, I disagree that playing a game is fun when we win because more important is not only we participate in the game fairly, but also we come by a lot of fun in the game.</CO>

column1: 889&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? It is better for childrem to grow up in the country side than in a big city. Use specific reasons and examples to develop your essay.
column3:
<IN>Some parents want to get their children raised in the country side. But other parents hope that their sons or daugthers grow up in a big city. Both cases have their own adventages. <TS>If I were to become parents, I take my children grow up in a big city in several reason.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, children growing up in a big city can get modern concepts. </MI1> <SI1> Technolodge such as computer, celluler phone, and PDA which may be usually seen in a big city modernizes children's thoughts make children opiminize their future. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR> to getting modern concepts, they in this case were educated in good enviornments. </MI2> <SI2>There are well-skilled teachers, developed textbooks, and infomation of education in a big city. So children in a big city can be educated by efficient method. </SI2></BO2>

<CO>As I've discussed above, that children are raised in a big city can take several adventages such as modern concepts and good educations to them. They should grow up in a big city for their own future and hope. </CO>

column1:
890&You want to persuade someone to study your native language. 
What reasons would you give?
column3:
<IN>Recently, many foreigners have visitrd our country, Korea ,to learn about us. However, they are suffering from learning about us because there are many differences between their and our culture. Above all, it's main problem not to conversation with us. <TS>so I want to advise them to learn our native language for understanding ours and living here more comfortablely. </TS></IN> 

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, if a foreigner can speak or write our language, he/she will learn more easily about us</MI1> <SI1>, <EX>for example, our culture, economic state, literature and so on. </EX>To learn about us, they have to read books concerned with us, because most of the books about us are written by our language. Moreover, in our language are absolved history about us and especially, in case of whom want to learn our history and literature, foreigners need to study our language above all. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, foreigners who want to live in our country can live more comfortably, if they know our language. </MI2> <SI2>Because in our country, our language is generally used in every place, <EX>for instance, signs, advertisement, guide book, etc, When they want to go somewhere or do something, they can't do anything without aids. </EX>Though many of those are written by English, those not apt to be more precise than those written by our language. For example, even when the want to use taxi, they'll need interpretos to transmit their their requires. </SI2></BO2>

<CO>Fore these reason, if foreigner want to live in our country, I want then to study our language to understand us, live more comfortely, and do anything what they want. If I have to live in or learn about another country, I will study their language, too. </CO>

column1: 891&In your country, is there more need for land to be left in its natural condition or is there more need for land to be developed for housing and industry? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>My country which has short period of development have cultivated a great number of lands, as the industrial society develops. When it comes to using lands, some people may argue that it is better for land to be used for building houses and factories, because there are urgent need for them. <TS>I think, however, it is preferable for land to be untouched, since uncultivated land is beneficial to both the community and wild life. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, conserving the land can make the community pleasant place. </MI1> <SI1> In general, due to the dramatic development of the industry, we have built a lot of buildings, such as factories, apartments and other convenient facilities. Thus, there is hardly any need to build such buildings these days. Besides, our life has become more unhealthy and unhappy with those building, since they use a lot of energy and release a large amount of harmful liquid and gases. If the land is to be undeveloped, then those nuisances can not happen any more. Then we can take a walk with family members or play some sports with friends over the land, Therefore, preserving the land is beneficial to the community. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, we can provide the good shelter for wild life. </MI2> <SI2>It has been known to be true that wild life has been deprived of a lot of habitats, owing to the construction of new buildings. When I was young, I used to see unnamed beautiful flowers and hear some birds sing on uncultivated land. However, after new apartment complex and some shopping mall were set up on that land, I could no longer witness that gorgeous scenery. If some lands are to be undeveloped, a large number of animals can live and beautiful plants can grow on them. Therefore, uncultivated lands can be a excellent home to the wild life. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, no one denies the fact that it can be harsh for the land owners to demand them not to use their lands. Nevertheless, I would strongly recommend that the land should not be used for buildings, in the prospective of preserving the good environment for the community and wild life. Now the time has arrived when we think our planet as the common place where human beings and wild life can live together. </CO>

column1: 892&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Attending a live performance (for example, a play, concert, or sporting event) is more enjoyable than watching the same event on television. Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3:
<IN>As the industry of the entertainment develops, we can enjoy a lot of events either on the place or through television. When it comes to the method of amusement, some people may argue that it is not necessary for them to take part in the performance, because they can fully enjoy the even by broadcasting. <TS>I think, however, it is more interesting to be in the place where the event is being held, because a live performance can give us vivid impression and relive the stress. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, we can get real impression from a live event. </MI1> <SI1>In general, when we take part in the live performance, such as music concert or baseball stadium, we are likely to obtain direct and exciting images of the event. We can see the minute motion of the musicians and hear the loud audience’s applause. I often go to the baseball stadium at night to see the professional games, there, even I do not favor any team, I am always excited by the sound of batting the ball. Besides I can communicate with the players and spectators by shouting and applauding. Therefore a live performance can make us active participants. </SI1></BO1> 

<BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, we can free ourselves in a live performance. </MI2> <SI2>As a rule, when we watch a certain event, no matter how exciting it might be, on television, we can hardly make ourselves relieved, because we just always sitting and lying on some places doing nothing: that makes us nervous and tired. On the contrary, when we take part in some performances, we can reduce the daily stress in the course of interactive movements. <EX>After I see the big baseball game, I get great energy for the next day work. So, participation in a live event makes us relaxed from the stress. </EX></SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, no one denies the fact that there is some conveniences in watching the event on television. However, I would rather recommend the people to participate in that event, since we can get live impression and reduce the tension of the daily life. With all benefits, why not go to that place? </CO>

column1: 893&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? It is better to be a member of a group than to be the leader of a group. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>Today, we participate in many kinds of group from the family, the most essential one of our society, to the nation. And all of groups have some who lead them and others who just take part in them. <TS>Though being a leader of a certain group must not be an easy job, it also offers several instruction. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1>One advantage that we can get as leaders is being active in attitude. </MI1> <SI1>This can be illustrated by my experience. When I worked as a director in the general hospital I was more active in treating patients than when I was just a plain resident of my university hospital. I knew all the circumstances about my hospital, got to be willing to do everything and never hesitated. Passivity isn't the proper character for a leader. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Another</TR> instruction is belief. When we are leaders of group, we will face many trials and errors. </MI2> <SI2>And in the course of our coming over this kind of difficulties we will learn to be adventurous and not be afraid of any failure. Confidence in ourselves we can get. </SI2></BO2>

<BO3><MI3><TR>In addition</TR> to active behavior and belief in ourselves, leading groups teaches us responsibility. </MI3> <SI3>Leader has to make a progress of his group and guide his members to the right direction. Members of groups usually follow his policy because they believe their leader's decision. </SI3></BO3>  

<CO>Since we can learn these qualities from being a leader such as activity, confidence and responsibility, we shouldn't be afraid of being a leader as long as we are able to be. These abilities are available and applicable not only in leading a group but also in planning our own life. </CO>

column1: 894&Some people think that they can learn better by themselves than with a teacher. Others think that it is always better to have a teacher. Which do you prefer? Use specific reasons to develop your essay.
column3:
<IN>There have been two different views about education in general. On one side, people say that education is most effective with teachers while on the other side, they argue that education is best when students learn by themselves. <TS>Each one has their own benefits but I am more inclined to say that education can function well with teachers around for following reasons. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, teachers provide students of their knowledge and experience. </MI1> <SI1>This is much valuable than one can learn by reading books or self-studying. Teachers may have little intellectual knowledge compared to thousands of books. But being a senior in a society, they can help the students to make less mistakes and head for the right way of learning. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, self-learning might be dangerous. </MI2> <SI2>If everyone starts to learn in their own way and see it will lead the learners to self-righteousness, which is very dangerous. Because the students are not able to get advice or care from their teachers, the students cannot even realize that they are making major mistakes. So students need someone to watch them over and that is what teachers are supposed to do. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, education is a highly complicating and demanding work, and students themselves cannot manage to educate themselves properly. Therefore, teachers are needed in every field of education to prevent side-effects from self-learning and to reach the academic goal more easily. </CO>

column1: 895&People work because they need money to live. What are some other reasons that people work? Discuss one or more reasons.
column3:
<IN>As the industries are increasingly developing faster, people's job has more diverse than the past. There are some reasons that people work. <TS>Some people work only to make money and others work to cultivate their character and others work because they like their job.</TS> I'll briefly discuss these two aspects of the people's work: to cultivate their minds and satisfy their curiosity. </IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>On the one hand</TR>, people work to develop their character.</MI1> <SI1> <EX>For example</EX>, when a person enter a shoe-making corporation as an apprentice. He will be in difficulty for some time until he learns the lopes. Too often he will be scolded by his supervisor about the problem due to his mistake in making shoes. However, unless he endures the hard times, he will not become a successful cobbler as well as a man of noble character. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>On the other hand</TR>, people's curiosity about a certain job urges them to stick to the job.</MI2> <SI2>No one deny the fact that a person has an inclination about some fields. So do I. <EX>For instance, I work in the electronic laboratory because I like to research about semiconductor devices related laser. One time, I studied so hard that I concentrated on the work more than 10 hours without eating anything unbecknownst to me. Similarily to me, all people may have experienced such things.</EX> People are willing to work according to their interests. By doing that, they can work with a pleasure because they are working what they want. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In summary</TR>, although it seems true that people work to earn their living, other effects such as developing their mental achievement and satisfying their attraction is the other causes of people's working. </CO>

column1: 896&Some people trust their first impressions about a person’s character because they believe these judgments are generally correct. Other people do not judge a person’s character quickly because they believe first impressions are often wrong. Compare these two attitudes. Which attitude do you agree with? Support your choice with specific examples.
column3:
<IN>It has been known to be true that we encounter a lot of persons who have different traits. When it comes to the evaluation of persons, some people may say they can catch the personality, because outer appearance is a vital indication of what a person is. <TS>However, I would rather oppose that opinion, because people have their own preference and they can hardly understand the person’s real character in such a short time. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, people’s prejudice can lead people to make a false understanding of the person. </MI1> <SI1>In general, according to the diversity of the society, people tend to have their own unique tastes about person. Some outgoing persons are likely to have a good opinion about a person who tells frank opinion openly. <TR>On the contrary</TR>, some reserved people are fond of a person who show polite and quiet manner. Thus according to their trait, people have completely different evaluation about the same person. Once I introduced my girlfriend who liked taking to others to my family members, to my surprise, the response was divide into two groups : my parents thought her rater rude but my sister consider her very frank. As that case vividly shows, the evaluation of the first impression is a matter of one’s preference. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover</TR>, people can catch only small portions of the character of a person. </MI2> <SI2>As a rule, when meeting others, people tend to behave more cautiously that they really are, since they are not familiar with them and they do not want to make trouble with him by showing their real personality. Therefore, people can hardly know what the person is at first meeting. As in my case, although I really like taking to other people about my concerns, I never express those topics to a person who I meet for the first time, so even my girlfriend though me as a reserved person at first. So, the first impression means just initial indication of a person and that is all. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, there are, of course, some people who show their real characters from the beginning to the end. Nevertheless, on the whole, the first impression has such a possibility of misleading that we should not overestimate and depend on it when we judge a person. We can actually know a person’s character through several contacts with him or her. </CO>
column23: A very good essay!  You make your points well and they are very interesting.  Good examples.  Try to make your thesis statement a little stronger - it should be able to stand on its own.

column1: 897& In general, people are living longer now. Discuss the causes of this phenomenon. Use specific reasons and details to develop your essay.
column3:
<IN>Most people think that people are living longer now owing to development of medical science, improvement of nutrient, increasing concern about health and so on. <TS>Among them, I consider development of medical science and improvement of nutrient as the most important reasons. There are a couple of reasons why I think so.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, Medical science is developed so steeply for few decades. </MI1> <SI1>Before about 30 years ago people died while they even do not know why they are ill and dead. In my country, many people have died because of malaria. People do not know about malaria so they do not deal with it. Therefore lots of patients died before they cured properly. But now in my country, malaria is not a severe illness. Because medical science is well developed and the medicine was made, the patients can be cured easily. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover</TR>, people eat well. </MI2> <SI2>In my country, plenty of people starved before few decades. They even do not eat a meal per day. Although they eat a meal, that is not a rice or bread. It is rough plant such as pine tree, weed and so on. But in these days, people seldom starve and have lots of food in their refrigerators. If they starve, probably he tries to lessen their weight. Consequently a number of people who do not eat a meal are diminished so starvation is not the reason of death any more. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>As shown above</TR>, I think that people are living longer now because of development of medical science and improvement of nutrient. While comparing with a hundred years ago, we expanded our life. And we can live better than in the past</CO>
column23: A very good essay!  I think you could make it a little longer, but your points are good and you have organized your essay well.  Consider cleaning up your thesis statement a little by making it one sentence instead of two.

column1: 898&It has been said, “Not everything that is learned is contained in books.” Compare and contrast knowledge gained from experience with knowledge gained from books. In your opinion, which source is more important? Why?
column3:
<IN>People learn many knowledges from both experience and books. Some people emphasize knowledge gained from experience, while others think knowledge gained from books is more important. Both of these knowledges have their own advantages. <TS>Personally, I believe that knowledge acquired from experience is more significant. </TS>Through the use of a couple of examples and specific explanation, I will demonstrate why knowledge acquired from experience is more significant. </IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, books can provide us for professional knowledges which experts such as scientist, artist offer. </MI1> <SI1>When we need some helps of various fields which is unfamiliar with us, we often go to a library. In addition, books, especially novels, are full of stories about a variety of classes of people. We are able to experience other people's life and have a broaden comprehension of the society where we live. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>However</TR>, knowledge from experience is more realistic than that from books. </MI2> <SI2>People often say that "Seeing one once is much better than questioning one a hundred times, and experiencing one once is more useful than seeing one a hundred times.", which signifies an importance of knowledge from experience. Moreover, abroad experiences give an open mind and wider eyes for the world. So, many firms in Korea prefer people who have an abroad experience. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, I think experience and books are each a good source for knowledge. But, I am inclined to think that knowledge from experience is more important because it influences more closely on our real life.
column23: This has the potential to be a great essay. Since it is a compare and contrast essay, you need to spend more time on each subject, meaning your main paragraphs need to be longer.  Say more!

column1: 899&Some universities require students to take classes in many subjects. Other universities require students to specialize in one subject. Which is better? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN><TS>Universities should give many chances to learn variable subjects to their students for their ability.</TS> Today, our society seems to require and prefer specialized men or women. Also, many companies want to take professional works and just look for what the workers do specially. Because of above reasons, some universities require students to specialize in one subject. </IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>However</TR>, there are particular reasons why universities should require students to take classes in many subjects, not just one subject. </MI1> <SI1>
Most of all, studying is not a mono way. It could be completed by interacting with each idea from different subjects. I am a university student now, and my major is Biology. I take many kinds of bioscience classes, also I take several other subjects of classes. During studying my major, I usually get some problems to understand what the class is saying. Whenever I get these understandable problems, it is easily to be solved by studying economics, psychology, or history, not by studying biology. biochemistry, or immunology. Enzyme’s feedback effect is not economic idea; however, when I tried to make it sense, economic ‘s theory was really helpful to understand. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Other particular reason</TR> is that a university is not for only narrow experiences about the world. </MI2> <SI2>In the university, students should experience many kinds of idea and learn many ways to see the world. For these purposes, universities should give many chances to learn variable subjects to their students. The point of view of the life in biology is different to chemistry’s view of it. The life in biology is not just chemical reaction, but the life in chemistry could be represented by chemical reaction. In addition, the life in psychology is not same as in bioscience and in chemistry. After all, studying many other subjects make we could learn many other ways to see the world and experience other world. </SI2></BO2> 

<CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, because of these two particular reasons, I prefer the universities that require students to take classes in many subjects. </CO>
column23: Your ideas for this essay are great, they just need a little more organization.  Keep the general ideas in the introduction and use the main paragraphs only for your main points.  Your main points in this essay are great!

column1: 900&Some people prefer to eat at food stands or restaurants. Other people prefer to prepare and eat food at home. Which do you prefer? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>There are two methods of eating food, those that eat at food stands or restaurants and those that eat food at home. Eat food stands or restaurants have several advantages such as convenience and comfortable. <TS>However, there are overweighing advantages in eating food at home. Thus, I prefer eating at home.</TS> I will explain a basis of my opinion with several examples and reasons.</IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, we are able to feel a good fun with cooking a dinner or breakfast. </MI1> <SI1><EX>For example, sometimes, I prepare food for my family. Of course, I am not good at cooking, but I am very pleasant during my cooking because my family will eat the food very well whether this food is delicious or not.</EX></SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, modern society is really busy, so we can’t afford to see each other in our family(home). </MI2> <SI2>Therefore, eating time is a good chance to talk. We should try to eat dinner at least one or two times in a week. I think that this is really important (to make a sweet home) event.</SI2></BO2>

<BO3><MI3><TR>Moreover</TR>, we can save a large amount of money. </MI3> <SI3>A restaurant, which consists of a good facility, has too many things on our hands. Family is made of several members. .</SI3>For that reason, we should occasionally eat food outdoors</BO3>

<CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, for above-mentioned reasons, I prefer to eat food at home. However, everything has its advantages and this advantages and above opinion is the same situation. Therefore, last but not least, I think that we should catch our good things of the two cases and adjust to our real life.</CO>
column23: You make some very good points in this essay, but I think you need to add just a little more to your main paragraphs.  What else can you say about this topic.  Be careful about your conclusion - it sounds like you are trying to disprove your own essay in the end!

column1: 901&Some people prefer to spend time with one or two close friends. Others choose to spend time with a large number of friends. Compare the advantages of each choice. Which of these two ways of spending time do you prefer? Use specific reasons to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>There are two views about number of people who to spend time with .<TS>Some people say that they prefer to spend time with one or two close friend and others think to spend time with a large number of friends. Both have their own advantage and dis advantages.</TS> These opposite opinions offer a number of good comparisons.</IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>On the one hand</TR>, spending time with a lot of friends have many benefits. </MI1> <SI1>It can share a variety of information such as others notions, various experiences, fields which I didn't know before. We have learned many things through not only personal experiences but also others various experiences. The lessons from their friends are so diverse that they can apply to the similarly situations. Therefore to spend time with a number of friends can offer a plenty of information, lessons from their friends's experiences. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>On the other hand</TR>, spending time with one or two closer friends can increase amusement for spending time in that small minority is enable to concentrate each other. </MI2> <SI2>One or two friends who you choose may really know about to like, to hate, interesting things of each other. Also they are so friendly that can understand easily about relative situation. Because of friendliness and understanding they don't have to debate or rush up against. It is hardly that they awake their spending time due to different view. As a result they will have good time through to comprehension, to concentrate each other. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, to spend time with minority or majority bring about different result. But I prefer spending time with closer minority friends rather than spending time with a lot of friends. Because it can add to satisfaction for spending time through greatly friendship. Also they are too friendly to spoil their spending time. </CO>
column23: This essay has a disorganized feel to it, and it makes it confusing to read.  First, since this is a compare and contrast essay, you need to make your main paragraphs longer and make sure you touch on several points, not just one.  You still need to give examples.  Make an outline and try doing this again.

column1: 902&In some countries, teenagers have jobs while they are still students. Do you think this is a good idea? Support your opinion by using specific reasons and details.
column3:
<IN>In these days, a lot of teenagers work in supermarket, gas station and books store to earn money in our country. <TS>Some people think that teenager should not have jobs for they have to study hard. That opinion is partially right, but I have somewhat different idea. I will demonstrate why I think so. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, teenagers can learn difficulties of earning money during working. </MI1> <SI1>They generally work for long time in order to make money because they are not skilled workers. <EX>For example, a student may work at supermarket. The job is very simple and do not need difficult skills. The supermarket’s owner does not give him enough money as much as he wants.</EX> Therefore teenagers realize that making money is very hard. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover</TR>, teenagers can be more independent. </MI2> <SI2>They have to spend much money to go to see movies, have some snacks and meet with their friends. If they do not make money they can not do what they want to do. If a student really likes a classic guitar, he may want to buy it. But a classic guitar is too expensive to buy for student. Then he has to make money to buy a guitar. While teenagers have jobs, they can be more independent of their parents. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, I think teenagers can have jobs while they are still students, because they can learn difficulties of earning money and be more independent during working. In my opinion, student can learn about society by having a job. </CO>
column23: This is a pretty good essay.  It sounds like your second paragraph is trying to decide whether it wants to talk about teenage independence or learning the value of money.  You could add a third paragraph about the value of money - it could only make your essay stronger!

column1: 903&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Attending a live performance (for example, a play, concert, or sporting event) is more enjoyable than watching the same event on television. Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3:
<IN>These days the advanced technologies give us many amusing experience and comfortable life. Especially, the television is the best thing that makes us see many things around our life without spending time so much. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> if we want to see a play, concert, or sporting event, we don’t need to take a time to get the place where these are performing any more.</EX> <TS><TR>However</TR>, in spite of several advantages of the television, many people prefer going to the place where these are performing to watch not watching on television.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1>In a live performance, we can watch a real play, concert, or sporting event. </MI1> <SI1> Even though the television broadcasts a play almost exactly, it can’t show us everything about the play. Limited time and equipments resist our sights on television. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2>Attending a live performance could be a good family event. </MI2> <SI2>My family has gone to a live concert. Every time we go to a live concert, we wear good clothes, and we go to a special restaurant to eat lunch or dinner because usually concert halls are far from my house. Wearing good clothes and eating special dinner is a kind of good event. </SI2></BO2>

<BO3><MI3><TR>Finally</TR>, watching a game with many people not alone or family is awesome. </MI3> <SI3>When I was high school student, I really don’t like to go watching baseball game. <TR>However</TR>, when I went watching my high school baseball play in a playground, I was really enjoying the game because there are many people who were excited of the game. The fact that I was watching the game with many people was interesting at the moment. </SI3></BO3>

<CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, because of mentioned reasons, I like to watch a live performance more than I watch it on television. </CO>
column23: There are a few issues with length and content in this essay.  First of all, your introduction is the longest paragraph in your essay.  Your main paragraphs should be the longest because those are the ones with ideas that need to be defended.  Your first and second paragraph need more content.  Your third reason is simply your opinion, so it cannot be defended or disproved. Take it out. Otherwise, your thesis statement is pretty strong and your writing is clear!

column1: 904&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Television has destroyed communication among friends and family. Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3:
<IN>Television is one of the great inventions. People can’t imagine their lives without television. Nowadays, there is a lot of media such as newspaper, magazine and Internet. <TS>But TV is the best way to communicate among friends and family.</TS> We can know what’s going on the world. It makes us discuss and exchange each opinion about one issue or topic. TV promotes to communicate among friends and family.</IN>

<BO1><MI1>I’ll give you how television helps people communicate each other. </MI1> <SI1>The first of examples, in family, there is very funny and interesting TV program which every family is interested in. while the program is showing, all family approach to TV. Naturally, they can talk about this program and communication can develop toward how family members spend their time today. TV can be a good motivation to start to communicate among family. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second of all</TR>, there are many educational programs and news for adults and students. </MI2> <SI2>In school and at home, family or friends can discuss about today’s new issue. All issues have two sides, disagree or agree. Some people agree to some issue and other people disagree to the issue. Watching educational programs such as documentary programs is good method to develop students’ thought when they communicate between friends and teachers. <TR>Therefore,</TR> TV helps people communicate more and more. </SI2></BO2>

<BO3><MI3>The last of examples how TV makes communication among people, in my country, Korea, there was some popular soap drama that was very famous among all age groups. </MI3> <SI3>When this drama was showing, just few people were walking around street such as downtown streets or some bars. As soon as people finished their works, they came back to their home. <TR>At that time,</TR> in the street there was no traffic and no crimes no drunken people. Because they spent time at home with their families and family can feel love each other. I confirm that TV can tie to family in love. So family can have enough time to communicate by the soap TV drama. </SI3></BO3>  

<CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, TV has made more communication among friends and family. If we don’t have TV, we are very difficult to find the topic in a group. TV makes people’s relationships more naturally by communication. TV gives us more opportunity to communicate each other. </CO>
column23:
It looks like your third main paragraph is really just a continuation of your first main paragraph - another example of a popular show that brings people together.  Put them together to strengthen your first paragraph. After all, you said you would give multiple examples and you only gave one. Also, in the third paragraph, you say "I confirm that TV can tie to family in love". How? To confirm something like that, you need to use a personal example.  Your second paragraph should be continued. In your introduction, you say that it helps people know what is going on in the world, so add that to your second paragraph. Finally, your thesis statement claims that TV is the BEST way to communicate between family and friends. If you are going to say something this strong, you had better have really good examples of how it is good and how other things AREN'T as good.
I know it seems like I have a lot of criticisms, but I really do think this has the potential to be a great essay.  You just need to change a few things!

column1: 905&When famous people such as actors, athletes, and rock stars give their opinions, many people listen. Do you think we should pay attention to these opinions? Give specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>In these days, as the media, such as television, Internet develops, we can encounter a lot of sayings which are made by many celebrities. When it comes to their opinions, some people may argue that we do not need to think highly of their opinions, because most of the celebrities pretend to know something well. <TS>I think, <TR>however,</TR> they made great efforts to succeed in their own field, can make public opinion and have a lot of experiences, <TR>therefore</TR>, it is worth while to listen to them.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, they tried hard to get recent fame. </MI1> <SI1><TR>In general</TR>, most of the famous people have spent a lot of time and effort to become successful. They tend to have a lot of good qualities such as, perseverance, diligence and the sense of responsibility. <EX>Once, I heard the news that one Korean baseball athlete who is now playing in American major league team, donated 10 milion won to some orphanage center saying that giving is better than accepting.</EX> As that saying vividly influenced my heart, it is better to listen and pay attention to the opinions of celebrities who have great traits. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, famous people tend to make public opinion. </MI2> <SI2>As a rule, we are likely to follow others who have prestige or authorities in any field. <EX>A few months ago, Korean rock singer who had both Korean and American citizenship, declared that he voluntarily gave up the American citizenship to join the Korean army which is draft system. As soon as that pronouncement became broadcasted in newspaper and television, a lot of youngsters who were in the same situation followed after him.</EX> Thus, celebrities’ word can make the public have same opinion. </SI2></BO2>

<BO3><MI3><TR>Moreover</TR>, celebrities have been through many difficulties. </MI3> <SI3>In the course of success, they have encountered a number of hardships and trials. Therefore the words which they make usually contains certain truth and lessons. <EX>According to recent news report, the rate of smoking population has been dramatically decreased, after an old famous comedian ‘Yijuil’ suffered from lung cancer and campaigned non-smoking movement featured in television and newspapers. My father who is chain smoker came to quit smoking.</EX> So, we need to listen to them cautiously. </SI3></BO3>

<CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, no one denies the fact that we do not need to follow all words and acts of the celebrities. <TR>However,</TR> I think, on the whole, we better pay attention to them, since they made great efforts, are able to make public opinion, and have many experiences of life. We may understand the society better, when we listen to them carefully. </CO>
column23: This is a pretty good essay.  For the most part you use good examples and defend your points well.  However, I think your second main paragraph should be removed.  It doesn't really follow the prompt.  The question is whether we should listen to celebrities or not, and your second paragraph just says that we do listen to them.  I think you can build a good enough argument off of the first and last main paragraphs.

column1: 906&It has recently been announced that a new high school may be built in your community. Do you support or oppose this plan? Why? Use specific reasons and details in your answer.
column3:
<IN>If a new high school may be built in our community, I strongly support this plan. <TS><TR>As a matter fact,</TR> I believe that our village has many advantages because of a new high school.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1>The primary reason is that students could easily take advantages of educational facilities. </MI1> <SI1><EX>When I was a high student; my school was located in my neighborhood, I often used to go a library, a bookstore, a gymnasium and other resources associated with the school. But my friend who lived in a remote region could not almost use these facilities.</EX> </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2>What’s more, many students can save money and time. </MI2> <SI2>Because of living near their school, they don’t have to take a crowded subway or a bus and can start without every morning’s fuss and fatigue. <TR>In addition,</TR> students maybe have healthier body. </SI2></BO2>

<BO3><MI3><TR>Finally</TR>, a high school can provide more job opportunities for many people. </MI3> <SI3>There are teachers, faculties, janitors, cleaners and so on. A school can give work place for them. </SI3></BO3>

<CO><TR>As stated above</TR>, I agree this plan that a new high school may be constructed in our village. There are three reasons for this: taking advantages of educational facilities, saving money and time and providing job opportunities. I insist that our community should need A NEW HIGH SCHOOL. </CO>
column23: You have all the makings of a very good essay.  Now you need to give more examples and support to your argument.  Your three main essays are quite short.  Your audience needs a little more convincing! You might want to talk about your community a little bit, to show how things are now and how they would be better with a school.

column1: 907&Many students choose to attend schools or universities outside their home countries. Why do some students study aboard? Use specific reasons and details to explain your answer.
column3:
<IN>My country of Korea has a very well developed educational system. Despite our fine schools and universities, many students choose to go aboard to study. Some might wonder what leads these individuals to abandon perfectly good educational institutions in our country. <TS>I believe that many students go aboard to study because they want to learn subjects that cannot properly be studied at home or because they want to enjoy a different educational style.</TS></IN> 

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, students who study aboard can properly study their chosen area of interest. </MI1> <SI1><EX>A person who is interested in American history would probably get a better education in this subject in America than in our country of Korea.</EX> <TR>Likewise,</TR> some universities have a reputation for being “the best” in a particular academic area. If a Korean student wants to get a MBA degree, he could do so in his home country. <TR>However,</TR> he could never get the same quality of MBA education at home that he could get at Wharton Business School. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, many young students leave their countries because they want to enjoy an educational system that is new and different for them. </MI2> <SI2>Korean middle and high schools are very different from those of America. Korean students go to school six days a week, take a very competitive examination, and cannot enjoy recreation. <TR>Moreover,</TR> Korean teachers are often harsh and strict as compared to American teachers. <TR>Consequently,</TR> some students move to America because they are attracted to the general and mild air of American schools. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, a vast majority of students choose to go aboard to study because they cannot get a good education in their chosen area at their home and because they want to enjoy a new and different educational system in a foreign country. </CO>
column23: An excellent essay!  Good work!

column1: 908&Some people enjoy change, and they look forward to new experiences. Others like their lives to stay the same, and they do not change their usual habits. Compare these two approaches to life. Which approach do you prefer? Explain why.
column3:
<IN>There are different ways of life from person to person. When it comes to change, some people may like change, because they can satisfy and amuse themselves by new experiences. Others may love to be in the same position, since the change can make their life unstable. <TS><TR>However,</TR> I would rather take the first position, because, in spite of some drawbacks, some change in life can give us satisfaction and fun.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, we can make ourselves contended by change. </MI1> <SI1><TR>In general,</TR> It has been known to be true that people are not likely to satisfied with what they have and what they do. <TR>Besides,</TR> they are under the pressure of everyday routine work or study. So they are always in pursuit of something new to get out of the stress. <EX>Once I was deeply stressed by the poor results of the midterm exam in high school, I happened to change study habits : from night owl to early bird, which gave me better grades next semester. </EX>As that case vividly illustrates, even a small change can give us contentment. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, we can enjoy ourselves by having some experiences. </MI2> <SI2><TR>As a rule,</TR> people can have fun by adventuring new areas, such as playing new sports, traveling foreign countries and making friends with other people. <TR>On the contrary,</TR> when we are in the same position, place and hobbies, we are more likely to be tired and bored with present conditions. 
I make it a rule to travel some new region in which I have never been before, I always have fun with encountering new surroundings and people. Thus new experiences can make our lives enjoyable. </SI2></BO2>

<CO>There is a certain demerit in changes. If we look forward to changes to the extreme extent, such as addicting dangerous sports, we may get hurt or even lose our lives in the course of activities. <TR>However,</TR> except for such extreme cases, change is preferable for our daily lives: it can give us fulfillment and amusement. We can lead a pleasant life by having some new experiences. </CO>
column23: An excellent essay!  My only comment is that I think you mean to say something different in your first main point.  Your say change can bring contentment, but it sounds more like the changes you imply can be a change for the better.  In that case, change can bring small - lor large - improvements.

column1: 909&It has recently been announced that a new restaurant may be built in your neighborhood. Do you agree or disagree?
column3:
<IN>Resently many people enjoy eating outside. So, they have other foods and find new restaurants and new foods. <TS>Hence I think in my neighborhood, building a new restaurant had many merits. </TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, many restaurants have many kind of foods and If a new restaurant open, it adds some kinds of foods. </MI1> <SI1>that is many people think happy because they have an exprience of eating a new food . </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, If a new restaurent open, they need some people becaus of serving or making foods. </MI2> <SI2>Then my neighborhoods catch an opprotunity and they improve their income. Furthermore they will spend more much money to eat outside. <TR>After all</TR>, aspect of restaurant give a merit. </SI2></BO2>

<BO3><MI3><TR>Third</TR>, many restaurants open my neighborhood, they compete other restaurants. </MI3> <SI3><TR>Hence,</TR> food quality and service will improve more than yesterday. <EX><TR>For example</TR>, Just one open there, they donot care of food and service but people must go there because they donot any other place. <TR>However</TR> another place open, this situation change. mabye, they make maor good food and more service.</EX> </SI3></BO3>

<CO><TR>In the conclusion</TR>, I agree that a new restaurant open my neighborhood in the economic, variety of food and better service condition. </CO>
column23: You really need to develop your main ideas more.  The first main idea is so vague that it is almost pointless to mention.  How could having a new kind of food restaurant in your neighborhood benefit you and your neighbors?  Please talk about that more.  You need to develop your second main idea a little more as well.

column1:
910&Nowadays,food has become easier to prepare. Has this change improved the 
way people live? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer
column3:
<IN>Today, we are living in the throes of overflowing technology. <TS>Because of the developed science, our quality of life has improved; thus, making us to prepare for food easier. That is why I believe, it has improved the way people live. </TS></IN> 

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, we can cook quickly thorough electric appliances. </MI1> <SI1>This is a very important factor since we are living in a extremely busy world. Housewives can't spend their time just cooking all day long. They have many other things to 
care aout: cleaning the house,laundering and so on.<TR>Therefore,</TR> the change has made housewives to live in a more comfortable circumstances; and gave time to relax. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, it helps us to taste variety foods. </MI2> <SI2><EX><TR>For exmaple,</TR> the oven helped us to bake cakes. If it wasn't for our useful appliance as such, it would have been impossibleto taste such a mouth-watering delicious food; for we can't make it by rollingit on the fire like barbecue.</EX> It is peoples instinct to try all sorts of food. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, It is true that the improvement in science have destroyed and conteminated our nature. <TR>However,</TR> because of it, we have been able to cope with the fast moving world, and take full advantagy of god given creation. 
With the power of science, we will probably make something that does not pollute the air nor destroy our nature in the near future. </CO>
column23:
Your essay needs a little work in order to be really convincing.  I understand your first point about the microwave, and I suppose I can understand the second one about the oven too, but they are both machines.  What about the way science has helped us to make 3-minute curry, or freeze-dry vegetables that will never go bad, etc?  There is a big piece of this argument that is missing.  If added, it could give you a really strong essay.
Also, take a look at your conclusion, and then read the rest of your essay.  Where did those strong statements come from?  It doesn't have much to do with food at all.  Not only is it off-topic, but it conveys a strong personal opinion about something without making an attempt to support it.  Please rewrite it and stay on topic.

column1:
911&"When people succeed, it is because of hard work. Luck has nothing 
to do with success." Do you agree of disagree with the quotation above? Use 
specific reasons and examples to explain your position
column3:
<IN>When we consider about the people who have succeeded, we can all find out how hard they have tried to seize it. Some people say, it is for their hard works. <TS>I do agree with these people in some degree, <TR>however</TR> i belive that luck plays vital role in succesion.</TS> There are some reasons to support my opinion. </IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, there are people who fails to succeed after all the works they have put in. </MI1> <SI1><EX>I know a person who were working, even taking out time from sleeping. He tried everything he could to keep his company, but eventually his company had bankrupted. I would say he was out of luck, because he did his best.</EX> </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, those ones who won the lottery, did not work hard to earn that money. </MI2> <SI2>They may have put their nerves into it, but no efforts were in it. they only won it because they were lucky. That is why there are so many people lured into it and tries to earn it by taking such a method. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, it does not mean that succeeded people have depended on the luck. I know that if it wasn't for their hard work, they wouldn't have achieved it. <TR>However,</TR> as we have considered, luck does take part in ones succession. If the person is not lucky enough he may fail, but if he is lucky he could win million dollars in a day. Sometimes unwise ones waste all their money at the horse racing. That is why we must be careful not to get trapped into it. </CO>
column23: Your thesis statement is great.  Your first example is great, although your paragraph needs to be longer and you need to add some more supporting statements.  Your conclusion should NOT be longer than either of your main paragraphs - make your main paragraphs longer.  Your second paragraph about the lottery makes a point about luck, but it feels a little weak.  As you said, there is no work involved, so can you really use it as an example?  I guess it would be a good idea to define what you mean by 'success' as well.

column1: 912&People attend college or university for many different reason (for example, new experiences, career preparation, increased knowledge). Why do you think people attend college or university? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>Many people have been going to the university or college since they come into being in the world. <TR>Moreover,</TR> the greater part of people want to go to the university or college after they graduate a high school. <TR>Of course,</TR> if a family of somebody is a poor, he or she will work in the sociality. <TS><TR>In my opinion,</TR> most people can prepare themselves for a lifetime career.</TS> </IN> 

<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, it is important to get a good job. </MI1> <SI1>There can study a high level knowledge if you studies in the university or college. This knowledge can use in the work. You who graduated the university or college are more learned than somebody who didn’t. you are recognized reasonably by other people who is a co-worker. In my country, it is difficult to find good job without a diploma of the university or college. <TR>Moreover,</TR> it is hard for someone who has no job to get married. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>Another</TR> reason is that people can prepare for a sociality life at the university or college. </MI2> <SI2>A lecture of the university or college mainly consists of experience and actual training. These are a necessary for the sociality life. You can also study that you want a something at the university or college. In here, you can meet a person who has a common matter of concern and interest. This is a good condition for the future life. </SI2></BO2>

<CO>Because the university or college education is different from the high school, people think it deserves to study the advanced education. I also think that what the university or college go needs to get a good life and job of the future. </CO>
column23: You need to organize your ideas a little better. Your second main paragraph has a few sentences that really belong in your first main paragraph, and the last sentence of your first main paragraph doesn't belong in there at all, unless you mean that it is difficult for people who don't go to college to get married - then it should go into your second main paragraph.  As for your thesis statement, you need to strengthen it but at least mentioning college.

column1: 913&Some people enjoy change, and they look forward to new experiences. Others like their lives to stay the same, and they do not change their usual habits. Compare these two approaches to life. Which approach do you prefer? Explain why.
column3:
<IN>Everyone has daifferent opinons when it comes to topic. <TR>in general, however,</TR> it is possible to distinguish two major kinds of opinion. enjoying change is better than staying the same and opposite position, both of these types have advantage and disadvantage.<TS><TR>In my view, howevr,</TR> I prefer changing to staying the same because of getting many experiences and enjoying life. </TS></IN> 

<BO1><MI1>It is obvious that staying the same can make people's life stable. </MI1> <SI1>people just need to care something or someone around them. <TR>however,</TR> it is easy to make their life monotonous beause they do samething everyday. </SI1></BO1>

<BO2><MI2><TR>On the other hand</TR>, enjoying change has more chance to experience many things such as meeting different people from their work and learning knowedge of different areas from their job. </MI2> <SI2><EX><TR>For example,</TR> my father likes traveling all around the country as well as foreign countries. he said that getting new experiences give him a lot of fun. and these can be energy when he comes back to work.</EX> <TR>however,</TR> enjoying often changes sometimes make people often change their goals. </SI2></BO2>

<CO><TR>Generally,</TR> people show different attitudes toward this topic.<TR>In my opinion, however,</TR> I think that enjoying change has more benefits than the other. learning from the change can be your best knowlege of your life</CO>
column23: First of all, you have far too many transitions for such a short essay.  You only need to use one at a time. Secondly, your essay really needs some reorganization.  You jump around a lot without supporting your ideas. You especially need to write a lot more about your first main paragraph.  A paragraph should be 4-5 sentences at the least.  For both main paragraphs, you end with a sentence against the point you just made, but with NO EVIDENCE! You have to support all your points with research and evidence.

column1: 914&Some people think government should spend as much money as possible exploring outer space (for example, traveling to the Moon and to other planets). Other people disagree and think government should spend money for our basic needs on Earth. Which of these two opinions do you agree with? Use specific reasons and details to support your answer.
column3:
<IN>As the science and technology develop, we have reached the point that we can launch the unmanned satellite to the outer space. When it comes to the investment on developing the universe, some people may argue that the investment on our planet instead of outer space has the priority, because there are still urgent needs to deal with on Earth, such as poverty, air pollution and so on. <TS><TR>However,</TR> I would rather choose the investment on outer space, since it is beneficial to both government and people, and can give us a lot of amusement.</TS></IN>

<BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, we can get a lot of benefit from exploiting outer space. </MI1> <SI1><TR>In general</TR>, we have developed our planet so utterly that we are overcrowded with people and buildings. <TR>Besides,</TR> overdevelopment have made Earth desolate and polluted.
